2996/* end of global private API defs */
2997
2998RGFW_info* _RGFW = NULL;
2999void RGFW_setInfo(RGFW_info* info) { _RGFW = info; }
3000RGFW_info* RGFW_getInfo(void) { return _RGFW; }
3001
3002
3003void* RGFW_alloc(size_t size) { return RGFW_ALLOC(size); }
3004void RGFW_free(void* ptr) { RGFW_FREE(ptr); }
3005
3006void RGFW_useWayland(RGFW_bool wayland) { RGFW_init(); _RGFW->useWaylandBool = RGFW_BOOL(wayland); }
3007RGFW_bool RGFW_usingWayland(void) { return _RGFW->useWaylandBool; }
3008
3009void RGFW_clipboard_switch(char* newstr);
3010void RGFW_clipboard_switch(char* newstr) {
3011 if (_RGFW->clipboard_data != NULL)
3012 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard_data);
3013 _RGFW->clipboard_data = newstr;
3014}
3015
3016#define RGFW_CHECK_CLIPBOARD() \
3017 if (size <= 0 && _RGFW->clipboard_data != NULL) \
3018 return (const char*)_RGFW->clipboard_data; \
3019 else if (size <= 0) \
3020 return "\0";
3021
3022const char* RGFW_readClipboard(size_t* len) {
3023 RGFW_ssize_t size = RGFW_readClipboardPtr(NULL, 0);
3024 RGFW_CHECK_CLIPBOARD();
3025 char* str = (char*)RGFW_ALLOC((size_t)size);
3026 RGFW_ASSERT(str != NULL);
3027 str[0] = '\0';
3028
3029 size = RGFW_readClipboardPtr(str, (size_t)size);
3030
3031 RGFW_CHECK_CLIPBOARD();
3032
3033 if (len != NULL) *len = (size_t)size;
3034
3035 RGFW_clipboard_switch(str);
3036 return (const char*)str;
3037}
3038
3039/*
3040RGFW_IMPLEMENTATION starts with generic RGFW defines
3041
3042This is the start of keycode data
3043*/
3044
3045
3046
3047void RGFW_initKeycodes(void) {
3048 RGFW_MEMSET(_RGFW->keycodes, 0, sizeof(_RGFW->keycodes));
3049 RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform();
3050 u32 i, y;
3051 for (i = 0; i < RGFW_keyLast; i++) {
3052 for (y = 0; y < sizeof(_RGFW->keycodes); y++) {
3053 if (_RGFW->keycodes[y] == i) {
3054 _RGFW->apiKeycodes[i] = y;
3055 break;
3056 }
3057 }
3058 }
3059
3060
3061 RGFW_resetKey();
3062}
3063
3064u32 RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(u32 keycode) {
3065 /* make sure the key isn't out of bounds */
3066 if (keycode > sizeof(_RGFW->keycodes) / sizeof(u8))
3067 return 0;
3068
3069 return _RGFW->keycodes[keycode];
3070}
3071
3072u32 RGFW_rgfwToApiKey(u32 keycode) {
3073 /* make sure the key isn't out of bounds */
3074 if (keycode > sizeof(_RGFW->apiKeycodes) / sizeof(u32))
3075 return 0;
3076
3077 return _RGFW->apiKeycodes[keycode];
3078}
3079
3080void RGFW_resetKey(void) { RGFW_MEMSET(_RGFW->keyboard, 0, sizeof(_RGFW->keyboard)); }
3081/*
3082 this is the end of keycode data
3083*/
3084
3085/*
3086 event callback defines start here
3087*/
3088
3089
3090/*
3091 These exist to avoid the
3092 if (func == NULL) check
3093 for (allegedly) better performance
3094
3095 RGFW_EMPTY_DEF exists to prevent the missing-prototypes warning
3096*/
3097#define RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(x, x2) \
3098RGFW_##x##func RGFW_##x##CallbackSrc = NULL; \
3099RGFW_##x##func RGFW_set##x2##Callback(RGFW_##x##func func) { \
3100 RGFW_##x##func prev = RGFW_##x##CallbackSrc; \
3101 RGFW_##x##CallbackSrc = func; \
3102 return prev; \
3103}
3104
3105RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowMaximized, WindowMaximized)
3106#define RGFW_windowMaximizedCallback(win, x, y, w, h) if (RGFW_windowMaximizedCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowMaximizedCallbackSrc(win, x, y, w, h);
3107
3108RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowMinimized, WindowMinimized)
3109#define RGFW_windowMinimizedCallback(w) if (RGFW_windowMinimizedCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowMinimizedCallbackSrc(w);
3110
3111RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowRestored, WindowRestored)
3112#define RGFW_windowRestoredCallback(win, x, y, w, h) if (RGFW_windowRestoredCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowRestoredCallbackSrc(win, x, y, w, h);
3113
3114RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowMoved, WindowMoved)
3115#define RGFW_windowMovedCallback(w, x, y) if (RGFW_windowMovedCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowMovedCallbackSrc(w, x, y);
3116
3117RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowResized, WindowResized)
3118#define RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, w, h) if (RGFW_windowResizedCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowResizedCallbackSrc(win, w, h);
3119
3120RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowQuit, WindowQuit)
3121#define RGFW_windowQuitCallback(w) if (RGFW_windowQuitCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowQuitCallbackSrc(w);
3122
3123RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(mousePos, MousePos)
3124#define RGFW_mousePosCallback(w, x, y, vecX, vecY) if (RGFW_mousePosCallbackSrc) RGFW_mousePosCallbackSrc(w, x, y, vecX, vecY);
3125
3126RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(windowRefresh, WindowRefresh)
3127#define RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(w) if (RGFW_windowRefreshCallbackSrc) RGFW_windowRefreshCallbackSrc(w);
3128
3129RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(focus, Focus)
3130#define RGFW_focusCallback(w, inFocus) if (RGFW_focusCallbackSrc) RGFW_focusCallbackSrc(w, inFocus);
3131
3132RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(mouseNotify, MouseNotify)
3133#define RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(w, x, y, status) if (RGFW_mouseNotifyCallbackSrc) RGFW_mouseNotifyCallbackSrc(w, x, y, status);
3134
3135RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(dataDrop, DataDrop)
3136#define RGFW_dataDropCallback(w, files, count) if (RGFW_dataDropCallbackSrc) RGFW_dataDropCallbackSrc(w, files, count);
3137
3138RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(dataDrag, DataDrag)
3139#define RGFW_dataDragCallback(w, x, y) if (RGFW_dataDragCallbackSrc) RGFW_dataDragCallbackSrc(w, x, y);
3140
3141RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(key, Key)
3142#define RGFW_keyCallback(w, key, sym, mod, repeat, press) if (RGFW_keyCallbackSrc) RGFW_keyCallbackSrc(w, key, sym, mod, repeat, press);
3143
3144RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(mouseButton, MouseButton)
3145#define RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(w, button, press) if (RGFW_mouseButtonCallbackSrc) RGFW_mouseButtonCallbackSrc(w, button, press);
3146
3147RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(mouseScroll, MouseScroll)
3148#define RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(w, x, y) if (RGFW_mouseScrollCallbackSrc) RGFW_mouseScrollCallbackSrc(w, x, y);
3149
3150RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(scaleUpdated, ScaleUpdated)
3151#define RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallback(w, scaleX, scaleY) if (RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallbackSrc) RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallbackSrc(w, scaleX, scaleY);
3152
3153RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE(debug, Debug)
3154#define RGFW_debugCallback(type, err, msg) if (RGFW_debugCallbackSrc) RGFW_debugCallbackSrc(type, err, msg);
3155#undef RGFW_CALLBACK_DEFINE
3156
3157#ifdef RGFW_DEBUG
3158#include <stdio.h>
3159#endif
3160
3161void RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_debugType type, RGFW_errorCode err, const char* msg) {
3162 RGFW_debugCallback(type, err, msg);
3163
3164 #ifdef RGFW_DEBUG
3165 switch (type) {
3166 case RGFW_typeInfo: RGFW_PRINTF("RGFW INFO (%i %i): %s", type, err, msg); break;
3167 case RGFW_typeError: RGFW_PRINTF("RGFW DEBUG (%i %i): %s", type, err, msg); break;
3168 case RGFW_typeWarning: RGFW_PRINTF("RGFW WARNING (%i %i): %s", type, err, msg); break;
3169 default: break;
3170 }
3171
3172 RGFW_PRINTF("\n");
3173 #endif
3174}
3175
3176void RGFW_window_checkMode(RGFW_window* win);
3177void RGFW_window_checkMode(RGFW_window* win) {
3178 if (RGFW_window_isMinimized(win) && (win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMinimizedFlag)) {
3179 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMinimize;
3180 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMinimized; e.common.win = win);
3181 RGFW_windowMinimizedCallback(win);
3182 } else if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win) && (win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMaximizedFlag)) {
3183 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMaximize;
3184 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMaximized; e.common.win = win);
3185 RGFW_windowMaximizedCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
3186 } else if ((((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowMinimize) && !RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) ||
3187 (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowMaximize && !RGFW_window_isMaximized(win))) && (win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRestoredFlag)) {
3188 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowMinimize;
3189 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win) == RGFW_FALSE) win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowMaximize;
3190 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRestored; e.common.win = win);
3191 RGFW_windowRestoredCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
3192 }
3193}
3194
3195/*
3196no more event call back defines
3197*/
3198
3199size_t RGFW_sizeofInfo(void) { return sizeof(RGFW_info); }
3200size_t RGFW_sizeofNativeImage(void) { return sizeof(RGFW_nativeImage); }
3201size_t RGFW_sizeofSurface(void) { return sizeof(RGFW_surface); }
3202size_t RGFW_sizeofWindow(void) { return sizeof(RGFW_window); }
3203size_t RGFW_sizeofWindowSrc(void) { return sizeof(RGFW_window_src); }
3204
3205RGFW_window_src* RGFW_window_getSrc(RGFW_window* win) { return &win->src; }
3206RGFW_bool RGFW_window_getPosition(RGFW_window* win, i32* x, i32* y) { if (x) *x = win->x; if (y) *y = win->y; return RGFW_TRUE; }
3207RGFW_bool RGFW_window_getSize(RGFW_window* win, i32* w, i32* h) { if (w) *w = win->w; if (h) *h = win->h; return RGFW_TRUE; }
3208u32 RGFW_window_getFlags(RGFW_window* win) { return win->internal.flags; }
3209RGFW_key RGFW_window_getExitKey(RGFW_window* win) { return win->internal.exitKey; }
3210void RGFW_window_setExitKey(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_key key) { win->internal.exitKey = key; }
3211void RGFW_window_setEnabledEvents(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eventFlag events) { win->internal.enabledEvents = events; }
3212RGFW_eventFlag RGFW_window_getEnabledEvents(RGFW_window* win) { return win->internal.enabledEvents; }
3213void RGFW_window_setDisabledEvents(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eventFlag events) { RGFW_window_setEnabledEvents(win, (RGFW_allEventFlags) & ~(u32)events); }
3214void RGFW_window_setEventState(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eventFlag event, RGFW_bool state) { RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.enabledEvents, event, state); }
3215void* RGFW_window_getUserPtr(RGFW_window* win) { return win->userPtr; }
3216void RGFW_window_setUserPtr(RGFW_window* win, void* ptr) { win->userPtr = ptr; }
3217
3218
3219#if defined(RGFW_USE_XDL) && defined(RGFW_X11)
3220 #define XDL_IMPLEMENTATION
3221 #include "XDL.h"
3222#endif
3223
3224#ifndef RGFW_FORCE_INIT
3225RGFW_info _rgfwGlobal;
3226#endif
3227
3228i32 RGFW_init(void) { return RGFW_init_ptr(&_rgfwGlobal); }
3229void RGFW_deinit(void) { RGFW_deinit_ptr(&_rgfwGlobal); }
3230
3231i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void);
3232void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void);
3233
3234i32 RGFW_init_ptr(RGFW_info* info) {
3235 if (info == _RGFW || info == NULL) return 1;
3236
3237 RGFW_setInfo(info);
3238 RGFW_MEMSET(_RGFW, 0, sizeof(RGFW_info));
3239 _RGFW->queueEvents = RGFW_FALSE;
3240 _RGFW->polledEvents = RGFW_FALSE;
3241#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3242 _RGFW->useWaylandBool = RGFW_TRUE;
3243#endif
3244
3245 _RGFW->files = (char**)(void*)_RGFW->filesSrc;
3246 u32 i;
3247 for (i = 0; i < RGFW_MAX_DROPS; i++)
3248 _RGFW->files[i] = (char*)(_RGFW->filesSrc + RGFW_MAX_DROPS + (i * RGFW_MAX_PATH));
3249
3250 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head = &_RGFW->monitors.data[0];
3251 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur = _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head;
3252
3253 for (i = 1; i < RGFW_MAX_MONITORS; i++) {
3254 RGFW_monitorNode* newNode = &_RGFW->monitors.data[i];
3255 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur->next = newNode;
3256 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur = _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur->next;
3257 }
3258
3259 RGFW_initKeycodes();
3260 i32 out = RGFW_initPlatform();
3261 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoGlobal, "global context initialized");
3262
3263 return out;
3264}
3265
3266#ifndef RGFW_EGL
3267void RGFW_unloadEGL(void) { }
3268#endif
3269
3270void RGFW_deinit_ptr(RGFW_info* info) {
3271 if (info == NULL) return;
3272
3273 RGFW_setInfo(info);
3274 RGFW_unloadEGL();
3275 RGFW_deinitPlatform();
3276
3277 _RGFW->root = NULL;
3278 _RGFW->windowCount = 0;
3279 RGFW_setInfo(NULL);
3280 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoGlobal, "global context deinitialized");
3281}
3282
3283RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindow(const char* name, i32 x, i32 y, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_windowFlags flags) {
3284 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_window));
3285 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3286 return RGFW_createWindowPtr(name, x, y, w, h, flags, win);
3287}
3288
3289void RGFW_window_close(RGFW_window* win) {
3290 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3291 RGFW_window_closePtr(win);
3292 RGFW_FREE(win);
3293}
3294
3295RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPtr(const char* name, i32 x, i32 y, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
3296 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3297 RGFW_MEMSET(win, 0, sizeof(RGFW_window));
3298 if (_RGFW == NULL) RGFW_init();
3299 _RGFW->windowCount++;
3300
3301 /* rect based the requested flags */
3302 if (_RGFW->root == NULL) {
3303 RGFW_setRootWindow(win);
3304 }
3305
3306 /* set and init the new window's data */
3307 win->x = x;
3308 win->y = y;
3309 win->w = w;
3310 win->h = h;
3311 win->internal.flags = flags;
3312 win->internal.enabledEvents = RGFW_allEventFlags;
3313
3314 RGFW_window* ret = RGFW_createWindowPlatform(name, flags, win);
3315
3316#ifndef RGFW_X11
3317 RGFW_window_setFlagsInternal(win, flags, 0);
3318#endif
3319
3320#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
3321 win->src.gfxType = 0;
3322 if (flags & RGFW_windowOpenGL)
3323 RGFW_window_createContext_OpenGL(win, RGFW_getGlobalHints_OpenGL());
3324#endif
3325
3326#ifdef RGFW_EGL
3327 if (flags & RGFW_windowEGL)
3328 RGFW_window_createContext_EGL(win, RGFW_getGlobalHints_OpenGL());
3329#endif
3330
3331 /* X11 creates the window after the OpenGL context is created (because of visual garbage),
3332 * so we have to wait to set the flags
3333 * This is required so that way the user can create their own OpenGL context after RGFW_createWindow is used
3334 * if a window is crated, CreateContext will delete the window and create a new one
3335 * */
3336#ifdef RGFW_X11
3337 RGFW_window_setFlagsInternal(win, flags, 0);
3338#endif
3339
3340#ifdef RGFW_MACOS
3341 /*NOTE: another OpenGL/setFlags related hack, this because OSX the 'view' class must be setup after the NSOpenGL view is made AND after setFlags happens */
3342 RGFW_osx_initView(win);
3343#endif
3344
3345#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3346 /* recieve all events needed to configure the surface */
3347 /* also gets the wl_outputs */
3348 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) {
3349 wl_display_roundtrip(_RGFW->wl_display);
3350 /* NOTE: this is a hack so that way wayland spawns a window, even if nothing is drawn */
3351 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowOpenGL) && !(flags & RGFW_windowEGL)) {
3352 u8* data = (u8*)RGFW_ALLOC((u32)(win->w * win->h * 3));
3353 RGFW_MEMSET(data, 0, (u32)(win->w * win->h * 3) * sizeof(u8));
3354 RGFW_surface* surface = RGFW_createSurface(data, win->w, win->h, RGFW_formatBGR8);
3355 RGFW_window_blitSurface(win, surface);
3356 RGFW_FREE(data);
3357 RGFW_surface_free(surface);
3358 }
3359 }
3360#endif
3361
3362 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
3363 RGFW_window_setName(win, name);
3364 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowHide)) {
3365 RGFW_window_show(win);
3366 }
3367
3368 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoWindow, "a new window was created");
3369
3370
3371 return ret;
3372}
3373
3374void RGFW_window_closePtr(RGFW_window* win) {
3375 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3376
3377 #ifdef RGFW_EGL
3378 if ((win->src.gfxType & RGFW_gfxEGL) && win->src.ctx.egl) {
3379 RGFW_window_deleteContext_EGL(win, win->src.ctx.egl);
3380 win->src.ctx.egl = NULL;
3381 }
3382 #endif
3383
3384 #ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
3385 if ((win->src.gfxType & RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL) && win->src.ctx.native) {
3386 RGFW_window_deleteContext_OpenGL(win, win->src.ctx.native);
3387 win->src.ctx.native = NULL;
3388 }
3389 #endif
3390
3391 RGFW_window_closePlatform(win);
3392
3393 RGFW_clipboard_switch(NULL);
3394 _RGFW->windowCount--;
3395 if (_RGFW->windowCount == 0) RGFW_deinit();
3396
3397 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoWindow, "a window was freed");
3398}
3399
3400void RGFW_setQueueEvents(RGFW_bool queue) { _RGFW->queueEvents = RGFW_BOOL(queue); }
3401
3402void RGFW_eventQueueFlush(void) { _RGFW->eventLen = 0; }
3403
3404void RGFW_eventQueuePush(const RGFW_event* event) {
3405 if (_RGFW->queueEvents == RGFW_FALSE) return;
3406 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->eventLen >= 0);
3407
3408 if (_RGFW->eventLen >= RGFW_MAX_EVENTS) {
3409 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEventQueue, "Event queue limit 'RGFW_MAX_EVENTS' has been reached automatically flushing queue.");
3410 RGFW_eventQueueFlush();
3411 return;
3412 }
3413
3414 i32 eventTop = (_RGFW->eventBottom + _RGFW->eventLen) % RGFW_MAX_EVENTS;
3415 _RGFW->eventLen += 1;
3416 _RGFW->events[eventTop] = *event;
3417}
3418
3419RGFW_event* RGFW_eventQueuePop(RGFW_window* win) {
3420 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->eventLen >= 0 && _RGFW->eventLen <= RGFW_MAX_EVENTS);
3421 RGFW_event* ev;
3422
3423 if (_RGFW->eventLen == 0) {
3424 return NULL;
3425 }
3426
3427 ev = &_RGFW->events[_RGFW->eventBottom];
3428 _RGFW->eventLen -= 1;
3429 _RGFW->eventBottom = (_RGFW->eventBottom + 1) % RGFW_MAX_EVENTS;
3430
3431 if (ev->common.win != win && ev->common.win != NULL) {
3432 RGFW_eventQueuePush(ev);
3433 return NULL;
3434 }
3435
3436 return ev;
3437}
3438
3439void RGFW_resetPrevState(void) {
3440 size_t i;
3441 for (i = 0; i < RGFW_keyLast; i++) _RGFW->keyboard[i].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[i].current;
3442 for (i = 0; i < RGFW_mouseFinal; i++) _RGFW->mouseButtons[i].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[i].current;
3443 _RGFW->scrollX = 0.0f;
3444 _RGFW->scrollY = 0.0f;
3445 _RGFW->vectorX = (float)0.0f;
3446 _RGFW->vectorY = (float)0.0f;
3447 RGFW_MEMSET(&_RGFW->windowState, 0, sizeof(_RGFW->windowState));
3448}
3449
3450RGFW_bool RGFW_isKeyPressed(RGFW_key key) {
3451 return _RGFW != NULL && _RGFW->keyboard[key].current && !_RGFW->keyboard[key].prev;
3452}
3453
3454RGFW_bool RGFW_isKeyDown(RGFW_key key) {
3455 return _RGFW != NULL && _RGFW->keyboard[key].current;
3456}
3457
3458RGFW_bool RGFW_isKeyReleased(RGFW_key key) {
3459 return _RGFW != NULL && !_RGFW->keyboard[key].current && _RGFW->keyboard[key].prev;
3460}
3461
3462
3463RGFW_bool RGFW_isMousePressed(RGFW_mouseButton button) {
3464 return _RGFW != NULL && _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current && !_RGFW->mouseButtons[button].prev;
3465}
3466RGFW_bool RGFW_isMouseDown(RGFW_mouseButton button) {
3467 return _RGFW != NULL && _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current;
3468}
3469RGFW_bool RGFW_isMouseReleased(RGFW_mouseButton button) {
3470 return _RGFW != NULL && !_RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current && _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].prev;
3471}
3472
3473void RGFW_getMouseScroll(float* x, float* y) {
3474 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW != NULL);
3475 if (x) *x = _RGFW->scrollX;
3476 if (y) *y = _RGFW->scrollY;
3477}
3478
3479void RGFW_getMouseVector(float* x, float* y) {
3480 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW != NULL);
3481 if (x) *x = _RGFW->vectorX;
3482 if (y) *y = _RGFW->vectorY;
3483}
3484
3485RGFW_bool RGFW_window_didMouseLeave(RGFW_window* win) { return _RGFW->windowState.winLeave == win && _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave; }
3486RGFW_bool RGFW_window_didMouseEnter(RGFW_window* win) { return _RGFW->windowState.win == win && _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter; }
3487RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMouseInside(RGFW_window* win) { return win->internal.mouseInside; }
3488
3489RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isDataDragging(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_window_getDataDrag(win, (i32*)NULL, (i32*)NULL); }
3490RGFW_bool RGFW_window_didDataDrop(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_window_getDataDrop(win, (const char***)NULL, (size_t*)NULL);}
3491
3492
3493RGFW_bool RGFW_window_getDataDrag(RGFW_window* win, i32* x, i32* y) {
3494 if (_RGFW->windowState.win != win || _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging == RGFW_FALSE) return RGFW_FALSE;
3495 if (x) *x = _RGFW->windowState.dropX;
3496 if (y) *y = _RGFW->windowState.dropY;
3497 return RGFW_TRUE;
3498}
3499RGFW_bool RGFW_window_getDataDrop(RGFW_window* win, const char*** files, size_t* count) {
3500 if (_RGFW->windowState.win != win || _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop == RGFW_FALSE) return RGFW_FALSE;
3501 if (files) *files = (const char**)_RGFW->files;
3502 if (count) *count = _RGFW->windowState.filesCount;
3503 return RGFW_TRUE;
3504}
3505
3506RGFW_bool RGFW_window_checkEvent(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_event* event) {
3507 if (_RGFW->eventLen == 0 && _RGFW->polledEvents == RGFW_FALSE) {
3508 _RGFW->queueEvents = RGFW_TRUE;
3509 RGFW_pollEvents();
3510 _RGFW->polledEvents = RGFW_TRUE;
3511 }
3512
3513 if (RGFW_window_checkQueuedEvent(win, event) == RGFW_FALSE) {
3514 _RGFW->polledEvents = RGFW_FALSE;
3515 return RGFW_FALSE;
3516 }
3517
3518 return RGFW_TRUE;
3519}
3520
3521RGFW_bool RGFW_window_checkQueuedEvent(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_event* event) {
3522 RGFW_event* ev;
3523 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3524 _RGFW->queueEvents = RGFW_TRUE;
3525 /* check queued events */
3526 ev = RGFW_eventQueuePop(win);
3527 if (ev != NULL) {
3528 if (ev->type == RGFW_quit) RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
3529 *event = *ev;
3530 return RGFW_TRUE;
3531 }
3532
3533 return RGFW_FALSE;
3534}
3535
3536void RGFW_setRootWindow(RGFW_window* win) { _RGFW->root = win; }
3537RGFW_window* RGFW_getRootWindow(void) { return _RGFW->root; }
3538
3539#ifndef RGFW_EGL
3540RGFW_bool RGFW_loadEGL(void) { return RGFW_FALSE; }
3541#endif
3542
3543void RGFW_window_setFlagsInternal(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_windowFlags cmpFlags) {
3544 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
3545 if (flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor) RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
3546 #endif
3547
3548 if (flags & RGFW_windowCenter) RGFW_window_center(win);
3549 if (flags & RGFW_windowCenterCursor) RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (win->w / 2), win->y + (win->h / 2));
3550 if (flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder) RGFW_window_setBorder(win, 0);
3551 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowNoBorder) RGFW_window_setBorder(win, 1);
3552 if (flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen) RGFW_window_setFullscreen(win, RGFW_TRUE);
3553 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowFullscreen) RGFW_window_setFullscreen(win, 0);
3554 if (flags & RGFW_windowMaximize) RGFW_window_maximize(win);
3555 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowMaximize) RGFW_window_restore(win);
3556 if (flags & RGFW_windowMinimize) RGFW_window_minimize(win);
3557 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowMinimize) RGFW_window_restore(win);
3558 if (flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse) RGFW_window_showMouse(win, 0);
3559 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowHideMouse) RGFW_window_showMouse(win, 1);
3560 if (flags & RGFW_windowHide) RGFW_window_hide(win);
3561 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowHide) RGFW_window_show(win);
3562 if (flags & RGFW_windowFloating) RGFW_window_setFloating(win, 1);
3563 else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowFloating) RGFW_window_setFloating(win, 0);
3564 if (flags & RGFW_windowFocus) RGFW_window_focus(win);
3565
3566 if (flags & RGFW_windowNoResize) {
3567 RGFW_window_setMaxSize(win, win->w, win->h);
3568 RGFW_window_setMinSize(win, win->w, win->h);
3569 } else if (cmpFlags & RGFW_windowNoResize) {
3570 RGFW_window_setMaxSize(win, 0, 0);
3571 RGFW_window_setMinSize(win, 0, 0);
3572 }
3573
3574 win->internal.flags = flags;
3575}
3576
3577
3578void RGFW_window_setFlags(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_windowFlags flags) { RGFW_window_setFlagsInternal(win, flags, win->internal.flags); }
3579
3580RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isInFocus(RGFW_window* win) {
3581#ifdef RGFW_WASM
3582 return RGFW_TRUE;
3583#else
3584 return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.inFocus);
3585#endif
3586}
3587
3588void RGFW_setClassName(const char* name) { RGFW_init(); _RGFW->className = name; }
3589
3590#ifndef RGFW_X11
3591void RGFW_setXInstName(const char* name) { RGFW_UNUSED(name); }
3592#endif
3593
3594RGFW_bool RGFW_window_getMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32* x, i32* y) {
3595 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3596 if (x) *x = win->internal.lastMouseX;
3597 if (y) *y = win->internal.lastMouseY;
3598 return RGFW_TRUE;
3599}
3600
3601RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_key key) { return RGFW_isKeyPressed(key) && RGFW_window_isInFocus(win); }
3602RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isKeyDown(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_key key) { return RGFW_isKeyDown(key) && RGFW_window_isInFocus(win); }
3603RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isKeyReleased(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_key key) { return RGFW_isKeyReleased(key) && RGFW_window_isInFocus(win); }
3604
3605RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMousePressed(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouseButton button) { return RGFW_isMousePressed(button) && RGFW_window_isInFocus(win); }
3606RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMouseDown(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouseButton button) { return RGFW_isMouseDown(button) && RGFW_window_isInFocus(win); }
3607RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMouseReleased(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouseButton button) { return RGFW_isMouseReleased(button) && RGFW_window_isInFocus(win); }
3608
3609
3610
3611#ifndef RGFW_X11
3612void* RGFW_getDisplay_X11(void) { return NULL; }
3613u64 RGFW_window_getWindow_X11(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return 0; }
3614#endif
3615
3616#ifndef RGFW_WAYLAND
3617struct wl_display* RGFW_getDisplay_Wayland(void) { return NULL; }
3618struct wl_surface* RGFW_window_getWindow_Wayland(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
3619#endif
3620
3621#ifndef RGFW_WINDOWS
3622void* RGFW_window_getHWND(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
3623void* RGFW_window_getHDC(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
3624#endif
3625
3626#ifndef RGFW_MACOS
3627void* RGFW_window_getView_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
3628void RGFW_window_setLayer_OSX(RGFW_window* win, void* layer) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(layer); }
3629void* RGFW_getLayer_OSX(void) { return NULL; }
3630void* RGFW_window_getWindow_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return NULL; }
3631#endif
3632
3633void RGFW_setBit(u32* var, u32 mask, RGFW_bool set) {
3634 if (set) *var |= mask;
3635 else *var &= ~mask;
3636}
3637
3638void RGFW_window_center(RGFW_window* win) {
3639 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3640 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
3641 RGFW_window_move(win, (i32)(mon.mode.w - win->w) / 2, (mon.mode.h - win->h) / 2);
3642}
3643
3644RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_scaleToWindow(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_window* win) {
3645 RGFW_monitorMode mode;
3646 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
3647
3648 mode.w = win->w;
3649 mode.h = win->h;
3650 return RGFW_monitor_requestMode(mon, mode, RGFW_monitorScale);
3651}
3652
3653void RGFW_splitBPP(u32 bpp, RGFW_monitorMode* mode) {
3654 if (bpp == 32) bpp = 24;
3655 mode->red = mode->green = mode->blue = (u8)(bpp / 3);
3656
3657 u32 delta = bpp - (mode->red * 3); /* handle leftovers */
3658 if (delta >= 1) mode->green = mode->green + 1;
3659 if (delta == 2) mode->red = mode->red + 1;
3660}
3661
3662RGFW_bool RGFW_monitorModeCompare(RGFW_monitorMode mon, RGFW_monitorMode mon2, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
3663 return (((mon.w == mon2.w && mon.h == mon2.h) || !(request & RGFW_monitorScale)) &&
3664 ((mon.refreshRate == mon2.refreshRate) || !(request & RGFW_monitorRefresh)) &&
3665 ((mon.red == mon2.red && mon.green == mon2.green && mon.blue == mon2.blue) || !(request & RGFW_monitorRGB)));
3666}
3667
3668RGFW_bool RGFW_window_shouldClose(RGFW_window* win) {
3669 return (win == NULL || win->internal.shouldClose || (win->internal.exitKey && RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, win->internal.exitKey)));
3670}
3671
3672void RGFW_window_setShouldClose(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool shouldClose) {
3673 if (shouldClose) {
3674 win->internal.shouldClose = RGFW_TRUE;
3675 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
3676 } else {
3677 win->internal.shouldClose = RGFW_FALSE;
3678 }
3679}
3680
3681#ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
3682void RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(RGFW_window* win) {
3683 RGFW_monitor monitor = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
3684 if (monitor.scaleX == 0 && monitor.scaleY == 0)
3685 return;
3686
3687 RGFW_window_resize(win, (i32)(monitor.scaleX * (float)win->w), (i32)(monitor.scaleY * (float)win->h));
3688}
3689
3690void RGFW_window_moveToMonitor(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_monitor m) {
3691 RGFW_window_move(win, m.x + win->x, m.y + win->y);
3692}
3693#endif
3694
3695RGFW_surface* RGFW_createSurface(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
3696 RGFW_surface* surface = (RGFW_surface*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_surface));
3697 RGFW_MEMSET(surface, 0, sizeof(RGFW_surface));
3698 RGFW_createSurfacePtr(data, w, h, format, surface);
3699 return surface;
3700}
3701
3702void RGFW_surface_free(RGFW_surface* surface) {
3703 RGFW_surface_freePtr(surface);
3704 RGFW_FREE(surface);
3705}
3706
3707RGFW_nativeImage* RGFW_surface_getNativeImage(RGFW_surface* surface) {
3708 return &surface->native;
3709}
3710
3711RGFW_surface* RGFW_window_createSurface(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
3712 RGFW_surface* surface = (RGFW_surface*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_surface));
3713 RGFW_MEMSET(surface, 0, sizeof(RGFW_surface));
3714 RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(win, data, w, h, format, surface);
3715 return surface;
3716}
3717#ifndef RGFW_X11
3718RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
3719 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
3720 return RGFW_createSurfacePtr(data, w, h, format, surface);
3721}
3722#endif
3723
3724const RGFW_colorLayout RGFW_layouts[RGFW_formatCount] = {
3725 { 0, 1, 2, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatRGB8 */
3726 { 2, 1, 0, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatBGR8 */
3727 { 0, 1, 2, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatRGBA8 */
3728 { 1, 2, 3, 0 }, /* RGFW_formatARGB8 */
3729 { 2, 1, 0, 3 }, /* RGFW_formatBGRA8 */
3730 { 3, 2, 1, 0 }, /* RGFW_formatABGR8 */
3731};
3732
3733
3734void RGFW_copyImageData(u8* dest_data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format dest_format, u8* src_data, RGFW_format src_format) {
3735 RGFW_copyImageData64(dest_data, w, h, dest_format, src_data, src_format, RGFW_FALSE);
3736}
3737
3738void RGFW_copyImageData64(u8* dest_data, i32 dest_w, i32 dest_h, RGFW_format dest_format, u8* src_data, RGFW_format src_format, RGFW_bool is64bit) {
3739 RGFW_ASSERT(dest_data && src_data);
3740
3741 u32 src_channels = (src_format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 4 : 3;
3742 u32 dest_channels = (dest_format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 4 : 3;
3743
3744 u32 pixel_count = (u32)(dest_w * dest_h);
3745
3746 if (src_format == dest_format) {
3747 RGFW_MEMCPY(dest_data, src_data, pixel_count * dest_channels);
3748 return;
3749 }
3750
3751 const RGFW_colorLayout* src_layout = &RGFW_layouts[src_format];
3752 const RGFW_colorLayout* dest_layout = &RGFW_layouts[dest_format];
3753
3754 u32 i, i2 = 0;
3755 for (i = 0; i < pixel_count; i++) {
3756 const u8* src_px = &src_data[i * src_channels];
3757 u8* dst_px = &dest_data[i2 * dest_channels];
3758 u8 rgba[4] = {0};
3759 rgba[0] = src_px[src_layout->r];
3760 rgba[1] = src_px[src_layout->g];
3761 rgba[2] = src_px[src_layout->b];
3762 rgba[3] = 255;
3763 if (src_channels == 4)
3764 rgba[3] = src_px[src_layout->a];
3765
3766 dst_px[dest_layout->r] = rgba[0];
3767 dst_px[dest_layout->g] = rgba[1];
3768 dst_px[dest_layout->b] = rgba[2];
3769 if (dest_channels == 4)
3770 dst_px[dest_layout->a] = rgba[3];
3771
3772 i2 += 1 + is64bit;
3773 }
3774}
3775
3776RGFW_monitorNode* RGFW_monitors_add(RGFW_monitor mon) {
3777 RGFW_monitorNode* node = NULL;
3778 if (_RGFW->monitors.freeList.head == NULL) return node;
3779
3780 node = _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head;
3781 mon = node->mon;
3782
3783 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head = node->next;
3784 if (_RGFW->monitors.freeList.head == NULL) {
3785 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur = NULL;
3786 }
3787
3788 node->next = NULL;
3789
3790 if (_RGFW->monitors.list.head == NULL) {
3791 _RGFW->monitors.list.head = node;
3792 } else {
3793 _RGFW->monitors.list.cur->next = node;
3794 }
3795
3796 _RGFW->monitors.list.cur = node;
3797
3798 node->mon = mon;
3799 _RGFW->monitors.count += 1;
3800 return node;
3801}
3802
3803void RGFW_monitors_remove(RGFW_monitorNode* node, RGFW_monitorNode* prev) {
3804 _RGFW->monitors.count -= 1;
3805
3806 /* remove node from the list */
3807 if (prev != node) {
3808 prev->next = node->next;
3809 } else { /* node is the head */
3810 _RGFW->monitors.list.head = NULL;
3811 }
3812
3813 node->next = NULL;
3814
3815 /* move node to the free list */
3816 if (_RGFW->monitors.freeList.head == NULL) {
3817 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.head = node;
3818 } else {
3819 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur->next = node;
3820 }
3821
3822 _RGFW->monitors.freeList.cur = node;
3823}
3824
3825RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIcon(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
3826 return RGFW_window_setIconEx(win, data, w, h, format, RGFW_iconBoth);
3827}
3828
3829void RGFW_window_holdMouse(RGFW_window* win) {
3830 win->internal.holdMouse = RGFW_TRUE;
3831 _RGFW->mouseOwner = win;
3832 RGFW_captureCursor(win);
3833 RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (win->w / 2), win->y + (win->h / 2));
3834}
3835
3836RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHoldingMouse(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.holdMouse); }
3837
3838void RGFW_window_unholdMouse(RGFW_window* win) {
3839 win->internal.holdMouse = RGFW_FALSE;
3840 _RGFW->mouseOwner = NULL;
3841 RGFW_releaseCursor(win);
3842}
3843
3844void RGFW_updateKeyMod(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_keymod mod, RGFW_bool value) {
3845 if (value) win->internal.mod |= mod;
3846 else win->internal.mod &= ~mod;
3847}
3848
3849void RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool capital, RGFW_bool numlock, RGFW_bool control, RGFW_bool alt, RGFW_bool shift, RGFW_bool super, RGFW_bool scroll) {
3850 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modCapsLock, capital);
3851 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modNumLock, numlock);
3852 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modControl, control);
3853 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modAlt, alt);
3854 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modShift, shift);
3855 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modSuper, super);
3856 RGFW_updateKeyMod(win, RGFW_modScrollLock, scroll);
3857}
3858
3859void RGFW_updateKeyMods(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool capital, RGFW_bool numlock, RGFW_bool scroll) {
3860 RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(win, capital, numlock,
3861 RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_controlL) || RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_controlR),
3862 RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_altL) || RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_altR),
3863 RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_shiftL) || RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_shiftR),
3864 RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_superL) || RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, RGFW_superR),
3865 scroll);
3866}
3867
3868void RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
3869 if (show && (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse))
3870 win->internal.flags ^= RGFW_windowHideMouse;
3871 else if (!show && !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse))
3872 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowHideMouse;
3873}
3874
3875RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMouseHidden(RGFW_window* win) {
3876 return (RGFW_bool)RGFW_BOOL(((RGFW_window*)win)->internal.flags & RGFW_windowHideMouse);
3877}
3878
3879RGFW_bool RGFW_window_borderless(RGFW_window* win) {
3880 return (RGFW_bool)RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder);
3881}
3882
3883RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFullscreen(RGFW_window* win){ return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen); }
3884RGFW_bool RGFW_window_allowsDND(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND); }
3885
3886void RGFW_window_focusLost(RGFW_window* win) {
3887 /* standard routines for when a window looses focus */
3888 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_FALSE;
3889 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen))
3890 RGFW_window_minimize(win);
3891
3892 size_t key;
3893 for (key = 0; key < RGFW_keyLast; key++) {
3894 if (RGFW_isKeyDown((u8)key) == RGFW_FALSE) continue;
3895
3896 _RGFW->keyboard[key].current = RGFW_FALSE;
3897 u8 sym = RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar((u32)key);
3898
3899 if ((win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_BIT(RGFW_keyReleased))) {
3900 RGFW_keyCallback(win, (u8)key, sym, win->internal.mod, RGFW_FALSE, RGFW_FALSE);
3901 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
3902 e.key.value = (u8)key;
3903 e.key.sym = sym;
3904 e.key.repeat = RGFW_FALSE;
3905 e.key.mod = win->internal.mod;
3906 e.common.win = win);
3907 }
3908 }
3909
3910 RGFW_resetKey();
3911}
3912
3913#ifndef RGFW_WINDOWS
3914void RGFW_window_setDND(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool allow) {
3915 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowAllowDND, allow);
3916}
3917#endif
3918
3919#if defined(RGFW_X11) || defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_WASM) || defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
3920#ifndef __USE_POSIX199309
3921 #define __USE_POSIX199309
3922#endif
3923#include <time.h>
3924struct timespec;
3925#endif
3926
3927#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) || defined(RGFW_X11) || defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
3928void RGFW_window_showMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
3929 RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(win, show);
3930 if (show == RGFW_FALSE)
3931 RGFW_window_setMouse(win, _RGFW->hiddenMouse);
3932 else
3933 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
3934}
3935#endif
3936
3937#ifndef RGFW_MACOS
3938void RGFW_moveToMacOSResourceDir(void) { }
3939#endif
3940
3941/*
3942 graphics API specific code (end of generic code)
3943 starts here
3944*/
3945
3946
3947/*
3948 OpenGL defines start here (Normal, EGL, OSMesa)
3949*/
3950
3951#if defined(RGFW_OPENGL)
3952/* EGL, OpenGL */
3953#define RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS { \
3954 /* Stencil */ 0, \
3955 /* Samples */ 0, \
3956 /* Stereo */ RGFW_FALSE, \
3957 /* AuxBuffers */ 0, \
3958 /* DoubleBuffer */ RGFW_TRUE, \
3959 /* Red */ 8, \
3960 /* Green */ 8, \
3961 /* Blue */ 8, \
3962 /* Alpha */ 8, \
3963 /* Depth */ 24, \
3964 /* AccumRed */ 0, \
3965 /* AccumGreen */ 0, \
3966 /* AccumBlue */ 0, \
3967 /* AccumAlpha */ 0, \
3968 /* SRGB */ RGFW_FALSE, \
3969 /* Robustness */ RGFW_FALSE, \
3970 /* Debug */ RGFW_FALSE, \
3971 /* NoError */ RGFW_FALSE, \
3972 /* ReleaseBehavior */ RGFW_glReleaseNone, \
3973 /* Profile */ RGFW_glCore, \
3974 /* Major */ 1, \
3975 /* Minor */ 0, \
3976 /* Share */ NULL, \
3977 /* Share_EGL */ NULL, \
3978 /* renderer */ RGFW_glAccelerated \
3979}
3980
3981RGFW_glHints RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC = RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS;
3982RGFW_glHints* RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL = &RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC;
3983
3984void RGFW_resetGlobalHints_OpenGL(void) {
3985#if !defined(__cplusplus) || defined(RGFW_MACOS)
3986 RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC = (RGFW_glHints)RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS;
3987#else
3988 RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL_SRC = RGFW_DEFAULT_GL_HINTS;
3989#endif
3990}
3991void RGFW_setGlobalHints_OpenGL(RGFW_glHints* hints) { RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL = hints; }
3992RGFW_glHints* RGFW_getGlobalHints_OpenGL(void) { RGFW_init(); return RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL; }
3993
3994
3995void* RGFW_glContext_getSourceContext(RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
3996 RGFW_UNUSED(ctx);
3997
3998#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
3999 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) return (void*)ctx->egl.ctx;
4000#endif
4001
4002#if defined(RGFW_X11)
4003 return (void*)ctx->ctx;
4004#else
4005 return NULL;
4006#endif
4007}
4008
4009RGFW_glContext* RGFW_window_createContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
4010 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4011 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) {
4012 return (RGFW_glContext*)RGFW_window_createContext_EGL(win, hints);
4013 }
4014 #endif
4015 RGFW_glContext* ctx = (RGFW_glContext*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_glContext));
4016 if (RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(win, ctx, hints) == RGFW_FALSE) {
4017 RGFW_FREE(ctx);
4018 win->src.ctx.native = NULL;
4019 return NULL;
4020 }
4021 win->src.gfxType |= RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW;
4022 return ctx;
4023}
4024
4025RGFW_glContext* RGFW_window_getContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
4026 if (win->src.gfxType & RGFW_windowEGL) return NULL;
4027 return win->src.ctx.native;
4028}
4029
4030void RGFW_window_deleteContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
4031 RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(win, ctx);
4032 if (win->src.gfxType & RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW) RGFW_FREE(ctx);
4033}
4034
4035RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(const char* extensions, const char* ext, size_t len) {
4036 const char *start = extensions;
4037 const char *where;
4038 const char* terminator;
4039
4040 if (extensions == NULL || ext == NULL) {
4041 return RGFW_FALSE;
4042 }
4043
4044 while (ext[len - 1] == '\0' && len > 3) {
4045 len--;
4046 }
4047
4048 where = RGFW_STRSTR(extensions, ext);
4049 while (where) {
4050 terminator = where + len;
4051 if ((where == start || *(where - 1) == ' ') &&
4052 (*terminator == ' ' || *terminator == '\0')) {
4053 return RGFW_TRUE;
4054 }
4055 where = RGFW_STRSTR(terminator, ext);
4056 }
4057
4058 return RGFW_FALSE;
4059}
4060
4061RGFWDEF RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_base(const char* extension, size_t len);
4062RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_base(const char* extension, size_t len) {
4063 #ifdef GL_NUM_EXTENSIONS
4064 if (RGFW_globalHints_OpenGL->major >= 3) {
4065 i32 i;
4066
4067 GLint count = 0;
4068
4069 RGFW_proc RGFW_glGetStringi = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("glGetStringi");
4070 RGFW_proc RGFW_glGetIntegerv = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("glGetIntegerv");
4071 if (RGFW_glGetIntegerv)
4072 ((void(*)(GLenum, GLint*))RGFW_glGetIntegerv)(GL_NUM_EXTENSIONS, &count);
4073
4074 for (i = 0; RGFW_glGetStringi && i < count; i++) {
4075 const char* en = ((const char* (*)(u32, u32))RGFW_glGetStringi)(GL_EXTENSIONS, (u32)i);
4076 if (en && RGFW_STRNCMP(en, extension, len) == 0) {
4077 return RGFW_TRUE;
4078 }
4079 }
4080 } else
4081#endif
4082 {
4083 RGFW_proc RGFW_glGetString = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("glGetString");
4084 #define RGFW_GL_EXTENSIONS 0x1F03
4085 if (RGFW_glGetString) {
4086 const char* extensions = ((const char*(*)(u32))RGFW_glGetString)(RGFW_GL_EXTENSIONS);
4087
4088 if ((extensions != NULL) && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len)) {
4089 return RGFW_TRUE;
4090 }
4091 }
4092 }
4093 return RGFW_FALSE;
4094}
4095
4096RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_OpenGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
4097 if (RGFW_extensionSupported_base(extension, len)) return RGFW_TRUE;
4098 return RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(extension, len);
4099}
4100
4101void RGFW_window_makeCurrentWindow_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
4102 if (win) {
4103 _RGFW->current = win;
4104 }
4105
4106 RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(win);
4107}
4108
4109RGFW_window* RGFW_getCurrentWindow_OpenGL(void) { return _RGFW->current; }
4110void RGFW_attribStack_init(RGFW_attribStack* stack, i32* attribs, size_t max) { stack->attribs = attribs; stack->count = 0; stack->max = max; }
4111void RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(RGFW_attribStack* stack, i32 attrib) {
4112 RGFW_ASSERT(stack->count < stack->max);
4113 stack->attribs[stack->count] = attrib;
4114 stack->count += 1;
4115}
4116void RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(RGFW_attribStack* stack, i32 attrib1, i32 attrib2) {
4117 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(stack, attrib1);
4118 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(stack, attrib2);
4119}
4120
4121/* EGL */
4122#ifdef RGFW_EGL
4123#include <EGL/egl.h>
4124
4125PFNEGLINITIALIZEPROC RGFW_eglInitialize;
4126PFNEGLGETCONFIGSPROC RGFW_eglGetConfigs;
4127PFNEGLCHOOSECONFIGPROC RGFW_eglChooseConfig;
4128PFNEGLCREATEWINDOWSURFACEPROC RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface;
4129PFNEGLCREATECONTEXTPROC RGFW_eglCreateContext;
4130PFNEGLMAKECURRENTPROC RGFW_eglMakeCurrent;
4131PFNEGLGETDISPLAYPROC RGFW_eglGetDisplay;
4132PFNEGLSWAPBUFFERSPROC RGFW_eglSwapBuffers;
4133PFNEGLSWAPINTERVALPROC RGFW_eglSwapInterval;
4134PFNEGLBINDAPIPROC RGFW_eglBindAPI;
4135PFNEGLDESTROYCONTEXTPROC RGFW_eglDestroyContext;
4136PFNEGLTERMINATEPROC RGFW_eglTerminate;
4137PFNEGLDESTROYSURFACEPROC RGFW_eglDestroySurface;
4138PFNEGLGETCURRENTCONTEXTPROC RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext;
4139PFNEGLGETPROCADDRESSPROC RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = NULL;
4140PFNEGLQUERYSTRINGPROC RGFW_eglQueryString;
4141PFNEGLGETCONFIGATTRIBPROC RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib;
4142
4143#define EGL_SURFACE_MAJOR_VERSION_KHR 0x3098
4144#define EGL_SURFACE_MINOR_VERSION_KHR 0x30fb
4145
4146#ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
4147 #include <windows.h>
4148#elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
4149 #include <dlfcn.h>
4150#endif
4151
4152#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4153#include <wayland-egl.h>
4154#endif
4155
4156void* RGFW_eglLibHandle = NULL;
4157
4158void* RGFW_getDisplay_EGL(void) { return _RGFW->EGL_display; }
4159void* RGFW_eglContext_getSourceContext(RGFW_eglContext* ctx) { return ctx->ctx; }
4160void* RGFW_eglContext_getSurface(RGFW_eglContext* ctx) { return ctx->surface; }
4161struct wl_egl_window* RGFW_eglContext_wlEGLWindow(RGFW_eglContext* ctx) { return ctx->eglWindow; }
4162
4163RGFW_bool RGFW_loadEGL(void) {
4164 RGFW_init();
4165 if (RGFW_eglGetProcAddress != NULL) {
4166 return RGFW_TRUE;
4167 }
4168
4169#ifndef RGFW_WASM
4170 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
4171 const char* libNames[] = { "libEGL.dll", "EGL.dll" };
4172 #elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
4173 /* Linux and macOS */
4174 const char* libNames[] = {
4175 "libEGL.so.1", /* most common */
4176 "libEGL.so", /* fallback */
4177 "/System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/OpenGL" /* fallback for older macOS EGL-like systems */
4178 };
4179 #endif
4180
4181 for (size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(libNames) / sizeof(libNames[0]); ++i) {
4182 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
4183 RGFW_eglLibHandle = (void*)LoadLibraryA(libNames[i]);
4184 if (RGFW_eglLibHandle) {
4185 RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = (PFNEGLGETPROCADDRESSPROC)(RGFW_proc)GetProcAddress((HMODULE)RGFW_eglLibHandle, "eglGetProcAddress");
4186 break;
4187 }
4188 #elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
4189 RGFW_eglLibHandle = dlopen(libNames[i], RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_GLOBAL);
4190 if (RGFW_eglLibHandle) {
4191 void* lib = dlsym(RGFW_eglLibHandle, "eglGetProcAddress");
4192 if (lib != NULL) RGFW_MEMCPY(&RGFW_eglGetProcAddress, &lib, sizeof(PFNEGLGETPROCADDRESSPROC));
4193 break;
4194 }
4195 #endif
4196 }
4197
4198 if (!RGFW_eglLibHandle || !RGFW_eglGetProcAddress) {
4199 return RGFW_FALSE;
4200 }
4201
4202 RGFW_eglInitialize = (PFNEGLINITIALIZEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglInitialize");
4203 RGFW_eglGetConfigs = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGSPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetConfigs");
4204 RGFW_eglChooseConfig = (PFNEGLCHOOSECONFIGPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglChooseConfig");
4205 RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface = (PFNEGLCREATEWINDOWSURFACEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglCreateWindowSurface");
4206 RGFW_eglCreateContext = (PFNEGLCREATECONTEXTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglCreateContext");
4207 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent = (PFNEGLMAKECURRENTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglMakeCurrent");
4208 RGFW_eglGetDisplay = (PFNEGLGETDISPLAYPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetDisplay");
4209 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers = (PFNEGLSWAPBUFFERSPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglSwapBuffers");
4210 RGFW_eglSwapInterval = (PFNEGLSWAPINTERVALPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglSwapInterval");
4211 RGFW_eglBindAPI = (PFNEGLBINDAPIPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglBindAPI");
4212 RGFW_eglDestroyContext = (PFNEGLDESTROYCONTEXTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglDestroyContext");
4213 RGFW_eglTerminate = (PFNEGLTERMINATEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglTerminate");
4214 RGFW_eglDestroySurface = (PFNEGLDESTROYSURFACEPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglDestroySurface");
4215 RGFW_eglQueryString = (PFNEGLQUERYSTRINGPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglQueryString");
4216 RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext = (PFNEGLGETCURRENTCONTEXTPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetCurrentContext");
4217 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGATTRIBPROC) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress("eglGetConfigAttrib");
4218
4219#else
4220 RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = eglGetProcAddress;
4221 RGFW_eglInitialize = (PFNEGLINITIALIZEPROC) eglInitialize;
4222 RGFW_eglGetConfigs = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGSPROC) eglGetConfigs;
4223 RGFW_eglChooseConfig = (PFNEGLCHOOSECONFIGPROC) eglChooseConfig;
4224 RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface = (PFNEGLCREATEWINDOWSURFACEPROC) eglCreateWindowSurface;
4225 RGFW_eglCreateContext = (PFNEGLCREATECONTEXTPROC) eglCreateContext;
4226 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent = (PFNEGLMAKECURRENTPROC) eglMakeCurrent;
4227 RGFW_eglGetDisplay = (PFNEGLGETDISPLAYPROC) eglGetDisplay;
4228 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers = (PFNEGLSWAPBUFFERSPROC) eglSwapBuffers;
4229 RGFW_eglSwapInterval = (PFNEGLSWAPINTERVALPROC) eglSwapInterval;
4230 RGFW_eglBindAPI = (PFNEGLBINDAPIPROC) eglBindAPI;
4231 RGFW_eglDestroyContext = (PFNEGLDESTROYCONTEXTPROC) eglDestroyContext;
4232 RGFW_eglTerminate = (PFNEGLTERMINATEPROC) eglTerminate;
4233 RGFW_eglDestroySurface = (PFNEGLDESTROYSURFACEPROC) eglDestroySurface;
4234 RGFW_eglQueryString = (PFNEGLQUERYSTRINGPROC) eglQueryString;
4235 RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext = (PFNEGLGETCURRENTCONTEXTPROC) eglGetCurrentContext;
4236 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib = (PFNEGLGETCONFIGATTRIBPROC)eglGetConfigAttrib;
4237#endif
4238
4239 RGFW_bool out = RGFW_BOOL(RGFW_eglInitialize!= NULL &&
4240 RGFW_eglGetConfigs!= NULL &&
4241 RGFW_eglChooseConfig!= NULL &&
4242 RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface!= NULL &&
4243 RGFW_eglCreateContext!= NULL &&
4244 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent!= NULL &&
4245 RGFW_eglGetDisplay!= NULL &&
4246 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers!= NULL &&
4247 RGFW_eglSwapInterval != NULL &&
4248 RGFW_eglBindAPI!= NULL &&
4249 RGFW_eglDestroyContext!= NULL &&
4250 RGFW_eglTerminate!= NULL &&
4251 RGFW_eglDestroySurface!= NULL &&
4252 RGFW_eglQueryString != NULL &&
4253 RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext != NULL &&
4254 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib != NULL);
4255
4256 if (out) {
4257 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
4258 HDC dc = GetDC(NULL);
4259 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay((EGLNativeDisplayType) dc);
4260 ReleaseDC(NULL, dc);
4261 #elif defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
4262 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool)
4263 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay((EGLNativeDisplayType) _RGFW->wl_display);
4264 else
4265 #endif
4266 #ifdef RGFW_X11
4267 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay((EGLNativeDisplayType) _RGFW->display);
4268 #else
4269 {}
4270 #endif
4271 #if !defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) && !defined(RGFW_WINDOWS) && !defined(RGFW_X11)
4272 _RGFW->EGL_display = RGFW_eglGetDisplay(EGL_DEFAULT_DISPLAY);
4273 #endif
4274 }
4275
4276 RGFW_eglInitialize(_RGFW->EGL_display, NULL, NULL);
4277 return out;
4278}
4279
4280
4281void RGFW_unloadEGL(void) {
4282 if (!RGFW_eglLibHandle) return;
4283 RGFW_eglTerminate(_RGFW->EGL_display);
4284 #ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
4285 FreeLibrary((HMODULE)RGFW_eglLibHandle);
4286 #elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) || defined(RGFW_UNIX)
4287 dlclose(RGFW_eglLibHandle);
4288 #endif
4289
4290 RGFW_eglLibHandle = NULL;
4291 RGFW_eglGetProcAddress = NULL;
4292}
4293
4294RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eglContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
4295 if (RGFW_loadEGL() == RGFW_FALSE) return RGFW_FALSE;
4296 win->src.ctx.egl = ctx;
4297 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxEGL;
4298
4299#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4300 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool)
4301 win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow = wl_egl_window_create(win->src.surface, win->w, win->h);
4302#endif
4303
4304 #ifndef EGL_OPENGL_ES1_BIT
4305 #define EGL_OPENGL_ES1_BIT 0x1
4306 #endif
4307
4308 EGLint egl_config[24];
4309
4310 {
4311 RGFW_attribStack stack;
4312 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, egl_config, 24);
4313
4314 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_SURFACE_TYPE, EGL_WINDOW_BIT);
4315 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_RENDERABLE_TYPE);
4316
4317 if (hints->profile == RGFW_glES) {
4318 switch (hints->major) {
4319 case 1: RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_ES1_BIT); break;
4320 case 2: RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_ES2_BIT); break;
4321 case 3: RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_ES3_BIT); break;
4322 default: break;
4323 }
4324 } else {
4325 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, EGL_OPENGL_BIT);
4326 }
4327
4328 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_RED_SIZE, hints->red);
4329 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_GREEN_SIZE, hints->green);
4330 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_BLUE_SIZE, hints->blue);
4331 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_ALPHA_SIZE, hints->alpha);
4332 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_DEPTH_SIZE, hints->depth);
4333
4334 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_STENCIL_SIZE, hints->stencil);
4335 if (hints->samples) {
4336 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_SAMPLE_BUFFERS, 1);
4337 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_SAMPLES, hints->samples);
4338 }
4339
4340 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_NONE, EGL_NONE);
4341 }
4342
4343 EGLint numConfigs, best_config = -1, best_samples = 0;
4344
4345 RGFW_eglChooseConfig(_RGFW->EGL_display, egl_config, NULL, 0, &numConfigs);
4346 EGLConfig* configs = (EGLConfig*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(EGLConfig) * (u32)numConfigs);
4347
4348 RGFW_eglChooseConfig(_RGFW->EGL_display, egl_config, configs, numConfigs, &numConfigs);
4349
4350#ifdef RGFW_X11
4351 RGFW_bool transparent = (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent);
4352 EGLint best_depth = 0;
4353#endif
4354
4355 for (EGLint i = 0; i < numConfigs; i++) {
4356 EGLint visual_id = 0;
4357 EGLint samples = 0;
4358
4359 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib(_RGFW->EGL_display, configs[i], EGL_NATIVE_VISUAL_ID, &visual_id);
4360 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib(_RGFW->EGL_display, configs[i], EGL_SAMPLES, &samples);
4361
4362 if (best_config == -1) best_config = i;
4363
4364#ifdef RGFW_X11
4365 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool == RGFW_FALSE) {
4366 XVisualInfo vinfo_template;
4367 vinfo_template.visualid = (VisualID)visual_id;
4368
4369 int num_visuals = 0;
4370 XVisualInfo* vi = XGetVisualInfo(_RGFW->display, VisualIDMask, &vinfo_template, &num_visuals);
4371 if (!vi) continue;
4372 if ((!transparent || vi->depth == 32) && best_depth == 0) {
4373 best_config = i;
4374 best_depth = vi->depth;
4375 }
4376
4377 if ((!(transparent) || vi->depth == 32) && (samples <= hints->samples && samples > best_samples)) {
4378 best_depth = vi->depth;
4379 best_config = i;
4380 best_samples = samples;
4381 XFree(vi);
4382 continue;
4383 }
4384 }
4385#endif
4386
4387 if (samples <= hints->samples && samples > best_samples) {
4388 best_config = i;
4389 best_samples = samples;
4390 }
4391 }
4392
4393 EGLConfig config = configs[best_config];
4394 RGFW_FREE(configs);
4395#ifdef RGFW_X11
4396 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool == RGFW_FALSE) {
4397 /* This is required so that way the user can create their own OpenGL context after RGFW_createWindow is used */
4398 XVisualInfo* result;
4399 XVisualInfo desired;
4400 EGLint visualID = 0, count = 0;
4401
4402 RGFW_eglGetConfigAttrib(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, EGL_NATIVE_VISUAL_ID, &visualID);
4403 if (visualID) {
4404 desired.visualid = (VisualID)visualID;
4405 result = XGetVisualInfo(_RGFW->display, VisualIDMask, &desired, &count);
4406 } else RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to fetch a valid EGL VisualID");
4407
4408 if (result == NULL || count == 0) {
4409 if (win->src.window == 0) {
4410 /* try to create a EGL context anyway (this will work if you're not using a NVidia driver) */
4411 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowEGL;
4412 RGFW_createWindowPlatform("", win->internal.flags, win);
4413 }
4414 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to find a valid visual for the EGL config");
4415 } else {
4416 if (win->src.window) RGFW_window_closePlatform(win);
4417 RGFW_XCreateWindow(*result, "", win->internal.flags, win);
4418 XFree(result);
4419 }
4420 }
4421#endif
4422
4423 EGLint surf_attribs[9];
4424
4425 {
4426 RGFW_attribStack stack;
4427 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, surf_attribs, 9);
4428
4429 const char present_opaque_str[] = "EGL_EXT_present_opaque";
4430 RGFW_bool opaque_extension_Found = RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(present_opaque_str, sizeof(present_opaque_str));
4431
4432 #ifndef EGL_PRESENT_OPAQUE_EXT
4433 #define EGL_PRESENT_OPAQUE_EXT 0x31df
4434 #endif
4435
4436 #ifndef EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_KHR
4437 #define EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_KHR 0x309D
4438 #ifndef EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_KHR
4439 #define EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_KHR 0x3089
4440 #endif
4441 #endif
4442
4443 const char gl_colorspace_str[] = "EGL_KHR_gl_colorspace";
4444 RGFW_bool gl_colorspace_Found = RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(gl_colorspace_str, sizeof(gl_colorspace_str));
4445
4446 if (hints->sRGB && gl_colorspace_Found) {
4447 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_KHR, EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_KHR);
4448 }
4449
4450 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent) && opaque_extension_Found)
4451 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_PRESENT_OPAQUE_EXT, EGL_TRUE);
4452
4453 if (hints->doubleBuffer == 0) {
4454 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_RENDER_BUFFER, EGL_SINGLE_BUFFER);
4455 }
4456
4457 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_NONE, EGL_NONE);
4458 }
4459 #if defined(RGFW_MACOS)
4460 void* layer = RGFW_getLayer_OSX();
4461
4462 RGFW_window_setLayer_OSX(win, layer);
4463
4464 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) layer, surf_attribs);
4465 #elif defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
4466 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) win->src.window, surf_attribs);
4467 #elif defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
4468 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool)
4469 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow, surf_attribs);
4470 else
4471 #endif
4472 #ifdef RGFW_X11
4473 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = RGFW_eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, (EGLNativeWindowType) win->src.window, surf_attribs);
4474 #else
4475 {}
4476 #endif
4477 #ifdef RGFW_WASM
4478 win->src.ctx.egl->surface = eglCreateWindowSurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, 0, 0);
4479 #endif
4480
4481 if (win->src.ctx.egl->surface == NULL) {
4482 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to create an EGL surface.");
4483 return RGFW_FALSE;
4484 }
4485
4486 EGLint attribs[20];
4487 {
4488 RGFW_attribStack stack;
4489 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, attribs, 20);
4490
4491 if (hints->major || hints->minor) {
4492 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION, hints->major);
4493 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION, hints->minor);
4494 }
4495
4496 if (hints->profile == RGFW_glCore) {
4497 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_PROFILE_MASK, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_CORE_PROFILE_BIT);
4498 } else if (hints->profile == RGFW_glCompatibility) {
4499 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_PROFILE_MASK, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT);
4500 }
4501
4502 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_ROBUST_ACCESS, hints->robustness);
4503 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_DEBUG, hints->debug);
4504
4505 #ifndef EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR
4506 #define EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR 0x2097
4507 #endif
4508
4509 #ifndef EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_KHR
4510 #define EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_KHR 0x2098
4511 #endif
4512
4513 if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseFlush) {
4514 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR, EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_KHR);
4515 } else {
4516 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_KHR, 0x0000);
4517 }
4518
4519 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, EGL_NONE, EGL_NONE);
4520 }
4521
4522 if (hints->profile == RGFW_glES)
4523 RGFW_eglBindAPI(EGL_OPENGL_ES_API);
4524 else
4525 RGFW_eglBindAPI(EGL_OPENGL_API);
4526
4527 win->src.ctx.egl->ctx = RGFW_eglCreateContext(_RGFW->EGL_display, config, hints->shareEGL, attribs);
4528
4529 if (win->src.ctx.egl->ctx == NULL) {
4530 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errEGLContext, "Failed to create an EGL context.");
4531 return RGFW_FALSE;
4532 }
4533
4534 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->ctx);
4535 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface);
4536 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "EGL context initalized.");
4537 return RGFW_TRUE;
4538}
4539
4540RGFW_eglContext* RGFW_window_getContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win) {
4541 if (win->src.gfxType == RGFW_windowOpenGL) return NULL;
4542 return win->src.ctx.egl;
4543}
4544
4545void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eglContext* ctx) {
4546 if (_RGFW->EGL_display == NULL) return;
4547
4548 RGFW_eglDestroySurface(_RGFW->EGL_display, ctx->surface);
4549 RGFW_eglDestroyContext(_RGFW->EGL_display, ctx->ctx);
4550 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "EGL context freed");
4551 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4552 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool == RGFW_FALSE) return;
4553 wl_egl_window_destroy(win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow);
4554 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "EGL window context freed");
4555 #endif
4556 win->src.ctx.egl = NULL;
4557}
4558
4559void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win) { if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.egl);
4560 if (win == NULL)
4561 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent(_RGFW->EGL_display, EGL_NO_SURFACE, EGL_NO_SURFACE, EGL_NO_CONTEXT);
4562 else {
4563 RGFW_eglMakeCurrent(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->surface, win->src.ctx.egl->ctx);
4564 }
4565}
4566
4567void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_EGL(RGFW_window* win) {
4568 if (RGFW_eglSwapBuffers)
4569 RGFW_eglSwapBuffers(_RGFW->EGL_display, win->src.ctx.egl->surface);
4570 else RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(win);
4571}
4572
4573void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_EGL(void) {
4574 return RGFW_eglGetCurrentContext();
4575}
4576
4577RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_EGL(const char* procname) {
4578 #if defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
4579 RGFW_proc proc = (RGFW_proc) GetProcAddress(RGFW_wgl_dll, procname);
4580
4581 if (proc)
4582 return proc;
4583 #endif
4584
4585 return (RGFW_proc) RGFW_eglGetProcAddress(procname);
4586}
4587
4588RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
4589 if (RGFW_loadEGL() == RGFW_FALSE) return RGFW_FALSE;
4590 const char* extensions = RGFW_eglQueryString(_RGFW->EGL_display, EGL_EXTENSIONS);
4591 return extensions != NULL && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len);
4592}
4593
4594void RGFW_window_swapInterval_EGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
4595 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
4596 RGFW_eglSwapInterval(_RGFW->EGL_display, swapInterval);
4597}
4598
4599RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupported_EGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
4600 if (RGFW_extensionSupported_base(extension, len)) return RGFW_TRUE;
4601 return RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(extension, len);
4602}
4603
4604void RGFW_window_makeCurrentWindow_EGL(RGFW_window* win) {
4605 _RGFW->current = win;
4606 RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_EGL(win);
4607}
4608
4609RGFW_window* RGFW_getCurrentWindow_EGL(void) { return _RGFW->current; }
4610
4611RGFW_eglContext* RGFW_window_createContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
4612 RGFW_eglContext* ctx = (RGFW_eglContext*)RGFW_ALLOC(sizeof(RGFW_eglContext));
4613 if (RGFW_window_createContextPtr_EGL(win, ctx, hints) == RGFW_FALSE) {
4614 RGFW_FREE(ctx);
4615 win->src.ctx.egl = NULL;
4616 return NULL;
4617 }
4618 win->src.gfxType |= RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW;
4619 return ctx;
4620}
4621
4622void RGFW_window_deleteContext_EGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_eglContext* ctx) {
4623 RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_EGL(win, ctx);
4624 if (win->src.gfxType & RGFW_gfxOwnedByRGFW) RGFW_FREE(ctx);
4625}
4626
4627#endif /* RGFW_EGL */
4628
4629/*
4630 end of RGFW_EGL defines
4631*/
4632#endif /* end of RGFW_GL (OpenGL, EGL, OSMesa )*/
4633
4634/*
4635 RGFW_VULKAN defines
4636*/
4637#ifdef RGFW_VULKAN
4638#ifdef RGFW_MACOS
4639#include <objc/message.h>
4640#endif
4641
4642const char** RGFW_getRequiredInstanceExtensions_Vulkan(size_t* count) {
4643 static const char* arr[2] = {VK_KHR_SURFACE_EXTENSION_NAME};
4644 arr[1] = RGFW_VK_SURFACE;
4645 if (count != NULL) *count = 2;
4646
4647 return (const char**)arr;
4648}
4649
4650VkResult RGFW_window_createSurface_Vulkan(RGFW_window* win, VkInstance instance, VkSurfaceKHR* surface) {
4651 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL); RGFW_ASSERT(instance);
4652 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
4653
4654 *surface = VK_NULL_HANDLE;
4655
4656#ifdef RGFW_X11
4657
4658 VkXlibSurfaceCreateInfoKHR x11 = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_XLIB_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_KHR, 0, 0, (Display*) _RGFW->display, (Window) win->src.window };
4659 return vkCreateXlibSurfaceKHR(instance, &x11, NULL, surface);
4660#endif
4661#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
4662
4663 VkWaylandSurfaceCreateInfoKHR wayland = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_WAYLAND_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_KHR, 0, 0, (struct wl_display*) _RGFW->wl_display, (struct wl_surface*) win->src.surface };
4664 return vkCreateWaylandSurfaceKHR(instance, &wayland, NULL, surface);
4665#elif defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
4666 VkWin32SurfaceCreateInfoKHR win32 = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_WIN32_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_KHR, 0, 0, GetModuleHandle(NULL), (HWND)win->src.window };
4667
4668 return vkCreateWin32SurfaceKHR(instance, &win32, NULL, surface);
4669#elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) && !defined(RGFW_MACOS_X11)
4670 void* contentView = ((void* (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_getUid("contentView"));
4671 VkMacOSSurfaceCreateSurfaceMVK macos = { VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_MACOS_SURFACE_CREATE_INFO_MVK, 0, 0, 0, (void*)contentView };
4672 return vkCreateMacOSSurfaceMVK(instance, &macos, NULL, surface);
4673#endif
4674}
4675
4676
4677RGFW_bool RGFW_getPresentationSupport_Vulkan(VkInstance instance, VkPhysicalDevice physicalDevice, u32 queueFamilyIndex) {
4678 RGFW_ASSERT(instance);
4679 if (_RGFW == NULL) RGFW_init();
4680#ifdef RGFW_X11
4681
4682 Visual* visual = DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
4683 RGFW_bool out = vkGetPhysicalDeviceXlibPresentationSupportKHR(physicalDevice, queueFamilyIndex, _RGFW->display, XVisualIDFromVisual(visual));
4684 return out;
4685#endif
4686#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
4687
4688 RGFW_bool wlout = vkGetPhysicalDeviceWaylandPresentationSupportKHR(physicalDevice, queueFamilyIndex, _RGFW->wl_display);
4689 return wlout;
4690#elif defined(RGFW_WINDOWS)
4691#elif defined(RGFW_MACOS) && !defined(RGFW_MACOS_X11)
4692 return RGFW_FALSE; /* TODO */
4693#endif
4694}
4695#endif /* end of RGFW_vulkan */
4696
4697/*
4698This is where OS specific stuff starts
4699*/
4700
4701/* start of unix (wayland or X11 (unix) ) defines */
4702
4703#ifdef RGFW_UNIX
4704#include <fcntl.h>
4705#include <poll.h>
4706#include <unistd.h>
4707
4708void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
4709
4710 _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[2] = 1;
4711 while (1) {
4712 const char byte = 0;
4713 const ssize_t result = write(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1], &byte, 1);
4714 if (result == 1 || result == -1)
4715 break;
4716 }
4717}
4718
4719RGFWDEF u64 RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(i32 clock);
4720u64 RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(i32 clock) {
4721 struct timespec ts;
4722 const u64 scale_factor = 1000000000;
4723 clock_gettime(clock, &ts);
4724 return (u64)ts.tv_sec * scale_factor + (u64)ts.tv_nsec;
4725}
4726
4727void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) {
4728 if (waitMS == 0) return;
4729
4730 if (_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0] == 0 || _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1] == 0) {
4731 if (pipe(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop) != -1) {
4732 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], F_GETFL, 0);
4733 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], F_GETFD, 0);
4734 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1], F_GETFL, 0);
4735 fcntl(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1], F_GETFD, 0);
4736 }
4737 }
4738
4739 struct pollfd fds[2];
4740 fds[0].fd = 0;
4741 fds[0].events = POLLIN;
4742 fds[0].revents = 0;
4743 fds[1].fd = _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0];
4744 fds[1].events = POLLIN;
4745 fds[1].revents = 0;
4746
4747
4748 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) {
4749 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4750 fds[0].fd = wl_display_get_fd(_RGFW->wl_display);
4751
4752 /* empty the queue */
4753 while (wl_display_prepare_read(_RGFW->wl_display) != 0) {
4754 /* error occured when dispatching the queue */
4755 if (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
4756 return;
4757 }
4758 }
4759
4760 /* send any pending requests to the compositor */
4761 while (wl_display_flush(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
4762
4763 /* queue is full dispatch them */
4764 if (errno == EAGAIN) {
4765 if (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
4766 return;
4767 }
4768 } else {
4769 return;
4770 }
4771 }
4772 #endif
4773 } else {
4774 #ifdef RGFW_X11
4775 fds[0].fd = ConnectionNumber(_RGFW->display);
4776 #endif
4777 }
4778
4779 i32 clock = 0;
4780 #if defined(_POSIX_MONOTONIC_CLOCK)
4781 struct timespec ts;
4782 RGFW_MEMSET(&ts, 0, sizeof(struct timespec));
4783
4784 if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &ts) == 0)
4785 clock = CLOCK_MONOTONIC;
4786 #else
4787 clock = CLOCK_REALTIME;
4788 #endif
4789
4790 u64 start = RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(clock);
4791 if (RGFW_usingWayland()) {
4792 #ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4793 while (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) == 0) {
4794 if (poll(fds, 1, waitMS) <= 0) {
4795 wl_display_cancel_read(_RGFW->wl_display);
4796 break;
4797 } else {
4798 if (wl_display_read_events(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1)
4799 return;
4800 }
4801
4802 if (waitMS != RGFW_eventWaitNext) {
4803 waitMS -= (i32)(RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(clock) - start) / (i32)1e+6;
4804 }
4805 }
4806
4807 /* queue contains events from read, dispatch them */
4808 if (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
4809 return;
4810 }
4811 #endif
4812 } else {
4813 #ifdef RGFW_X11
4814 while (XPending(_RGFW->display) == 0) {
4815 if (poll(fds, 1, waitMS) <= 0)
4816 break;
4817
4818 if (waitMS != RGFW_eventWaitNext) {
4819 waitMS -= (i32)(RGFW_linux_getTimeNS(clock) - start) / (i32)1e+6;
4820 }
4821 }
4822 #endif
4823 }
4824
4825 /* drain any data in the stop request */
4826 if (_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[2]) {
4827 char data[64];
4828 RGFW_MEMSET(data, 0, sizeof(data));
4829 (void)!read(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0], data, sizeof(data));
4830
4831 _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[2] = 0;
4832 }
4833}
4834
4835char* RGFW_strtok(char* str, const char* delimStr);
4836char* RGFW_strtok(char* str, const char* delimStr) {
4837 static char* static_str = NULL;
4838
4839 if (str != NULL)
4840 static_str = str;
4841
4842 if (static_str == NULL) {
4843 return NULL;
4844 }
4845
4846 while (*static_str != '\0') {
4847 RGFW_bool delim = 0;
4848 const char* d;
4849 for (d = delimStr; *d != '\0'; d++) {
4850 if (*static_str == *d) {
4851 delim = 1;
4852 break;
4853 }
4854 }
4855 if (!delim)
4856 break;
4857 static_str++;
4858 }
4859
4860 if (*static_str == '\0')
4861 return NULL;
4862
4863 char* token_start = static_str;
4864 while (*static_str != '\0') {
4865 int delim = 0;
4866 const char* d;
4867 for (d = delimStr; *d != '\0'; d++) {
4868 if (*static_str == *d) {
4869 delim = 1;
4870 break;
4871 }
4872 }
4873
4874 if (delim) {
4875 *static_str = '\0';
4876 static_str++;
4877 break;
4878 }
4879 static_str++;
4880 }
4881
4882 return token_start;
4883}
4884
4885#ifdef RGFW_X11
4886RGFWDEF i32 RGFW_initPlatform_X11(void);
4887RGFWDEF void RGFW_deinitPlatform_X11(void);
4888#endif
4889#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
4890RGFWDEF i32 RGFW_initPlatform_Wayland(void);
4891RGFWDEF void RGFW_deinitPlatform_Wayland(void);
4892#endif
4893
4894RGFWDEF void RGFW_load_X11(void);
4895RGFWDEF void RGFW_load_Wayland(void);
4896
4897#if !defined(RGFW_X11) || !defined(RGFW_WAYLAND)
4898void RGFW_load_X11(void) { }
4899void RGFW_load_Wayland(void) { }
4900#endif
4901
4902/*
4903 * Sadly we have to use magic linux keycodes
4904 * We can't use X11 functions, because that breaks Wayland, but they use the same keycodes so there's no use redeffing them
4905 * We can't use linux enums, because the headers don't exist on BSD
4906 */
4907void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
4908 _RGFW->keycodes[49] = RGFW_backtick;
4909 _RGFW->keycodes[19] = RGFW_0;
4910 _RGFW->keycodes[10] = RGFW_1;
4911 _RGFW->keycodes[11] = RGFW_2;
4912 _RGFW->keycodes[12] = RGFW_3;
4913 _RGFW->keycodes[13] = RGFW_4;
4914 _RGFW->keycodes[14] = RGFW_5;
4915 _RGFW->keycodes[15] = RGFW_6;
4916 _RGFW->keycodes[16] = RGFW_7;
4917 _RGFW->keycodes[17] = RGFW_8;
4918 _RGFW->keycodes[18] = RGFW_9;
4919 _RGFW->keycodes[65] = RGFW_space;
4920 _RGFW->keycodes[38] = RGFW_a;
4921 _RGFW->keycodes[56] = RGFW_b;
4922 _RGFW->keycodes[54] = RGFW_c;

4924 _RGFW->keycodes[26] = RGFW_e;
4925 _RGFW->keycodes[41] = RGFW_f;

4927 _RGFW->keycodes[43] = RGFW_h;
4928 _RGFW->keycodes[31] = RGFW_i;
4929 _RGFW->keycodes[44] = RGFW_j;
4930 _RGFW->keycodes[45] = RGFW_k;

4933 _RGFW->keycodes[57] = RGFW_n;

4935 _RGFW->keycodes[33] = RGFW_p;
4936 _RGFW->keycodes[24] = RGFW_q;
4937 _RGFW->keycodes[27] = RGFW_r;
4938 _RGFW->keycodes[39] = RGFW_s;
4939 _RGFW->keycodes[28] = RGFW_t;
4940 _RGFW->keycodes[30] = RGFW_u;
4941 _RGFW->keycodes[55] = RGFW_v;
4942 _RGFW->keycodes[25] = RGFW_w;

4944 _RGFW->keycodes[29] = RGFW_y;
4945 _RGFW->keycodes[52] = RGFW_z;

4947 _RGFW->keycodes[59] = RGFW_comma;

4955 _RGFW->keycodes[119] = RGFW_delete;

5024 _RGFW->keycodes[162] = RGFW_world2; /* non-US key #2 */
5025}
5026
5027i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) {
5028#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
5029 RGFW_load_Wayland();
5030 i32 ret = RGFW_initPlatform_Wayland();
5031 if (ret == 0) {
5032 return 0;
5033 } else {
5034 #ifdef RGFW_X11
5035 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningWayland, "Falling back to X11");
5036 RGFW_useWayland(0);
5037 #else
5038 return ret;
5039 #endif
5040 }
5041#endif
5042#ifdef RGFW_X11
5043 RGFW_load_X11();
5044 return RGFW_initPlatform_X11();
5045#else
5046 return 0;
5047#endif
5048}
5049
5050
5051void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) {
5052#ifndef RGFW_NO_LINUX
5053 if (_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0] || _RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1]){
5054 close(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[0]);
5055 close(_RGFW->eventWait_forceStop[1]);
5056 }
5057#endif
5058#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
5059 if (_RGFW->useWaylandBool) {
5060 RGFW_deinitPlatform_Wayland();
5061 return;
5062 }
5063#endif
5064#ifdef RGFW_X11
5065 RGFW_deinitPlatform_X11();
5066#endif
5067}
5068
5069#endif /* end of wayland or X11 defines */
5070
5071
5072/*
5073
5074
5075Start of Linux / Unix defines
5076
5077
5078*/
5079
5080#ifdef RGFW_X11
5081#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
5082#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func##_X11
5083#else
5084#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func
5085#endif
5086
5087#include <dlfcn.h>
5088#include <unistd.h>
5089
5090#include <limits.h> /* for data limits (mainly used in drag and drop functions) */
5091#include <poll.h>
5092
5093void RGFW_setXInstName(const char* name) { _RGFW->instName = name; }
5094#if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR) && defined(RGFW_X11)
5095 #include <X11/Xcursor/Xcursor.h>
5096#endif
5097
5098#ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
5099 #include <X11/extensions/Xrandr.h>
5100 #include <X11/Xresource.h>
5101#endif
5102
5103#include <X11/Xatom.h>
5104#include <X11/keysymdef.h>
5105#include <X11/extensions/sync.h>
5106
5107#include <X11/XKBlib.h> /* for converting keycode to string */
5108#include <X11/cursorfont.h> /* for hiding */
5109#include <X11/extensions/shapeconst.h>
5110#include <X11/extensions/shape.h>
5111#include <X11/extensions/XInput2.h>
5112
5113#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
5114 #ifndef __gl_h_
5115 #define __gl_h_
5116 #define RGFW_gl_ndef
5117 #define GLubyte unsigned char
5118 #define GLenum unsigned int
5119 #define GLint int
5120 #define GLuint unsigned int
5121 #define GLsizei int
5122 #define GLfloat float
5123 #define GLvoid void
5124 #define GLbitfield unsigned int
5125 #define GLintptr ptrdiff_t
5126 #define GLsizeiptr ptrdiff_t
5127 #define GLboolean unsigned char
5128 #endif
5129
5130 #include <GL/glx.h> /* GLX defs, xlib.h, gl.h */
5131 #ifndef GLX_MESA_swap_control
5132 #define GLX_MESA_swap_control
5133 #endif
5134
5135 #ifdef RGFW_gl_ndef
5136 #undef __gl_h_
5137 #undef GLubyte
5138 #undef GLenum
5139 #undef GLint
5140 #undef GLuint
5141 #undef GLsizei
5142 #undef GLfloat
5143 #undef GLvoid
5144 #undef GLbitfield
5145 #undef GLintptr
5146 #undef GLsizeiptr
5147 #undef GLboolean
5148 #endif
5149 typedef GLXContext(*glXCreateContextAttribsARBProc)(Display*, GLXFBConfig, GLXContext, Bool, const int*);
5150#endif
5151
5152/* atoms needed for drag and drop */
5153#if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR) && !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR_PRELOAD)
5154 typedef XcursorImage* (*PFN_XcursorImageCreate)(int, int);
5155 typedef void (*PFN_XcursorImageDestroy)(XcursorImage*);
5156 typedef Cursor(*PFN_XcursorImageLoadCursor)(Display*, const XcursorImage*);
5157#endif
