5161 PFN_XISelectEvents XISelectEventsSRC = NULL;
5162 #define XISelectEvents XISelectEventsSRC
5163
5164 void* X11Xihandle = NULL;
5165#endif
5166
5167#if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_EXT_PRELOAD)
5168 typedef void (* PFN_XSyncIntToValue)(XSyncValue*, int);
5169 PFN_XSyncIntToValue XSyncIntToValueSRC = NULL;
5170 #define XSyncIntToValue XSyncIntToValueSRC
5171
5172 typedef Status (* PFN_XSyncSetCounter)(Display*, XSyncCounter, XSyncValue);
5173 PFN_XSyncSetCounter XSyncSetCounterSRC = NULL;
5174 #define XSyncSetCounter XSyncSetCounterSRC
5175
5176 typedef XSyncCounter (* PFN_XSyncCreateCounter)(Display*, XSyncValue);
5177 PFN_XSyncCreateCounter XSyncCreateCounterSRC = NULL;
5178 #define XSyncCreateCounter XSyncCreateCounterSRC
5179
5180 typedef void (* PFN_XShapeCombineMask)(Display*,Window,int,int,int,Pixmap,int);
5181 PFN_XShapeCombineMask XShapeCombineMaskSRC;
5182 #define XShapeCombineMask XShapeCombineMaskSRC
5183
5184 typedef void (* PFN_XShapeCombineRegion)(Display*,Window,int,int,int,Region,int);
5185 PFN_XShapeCombineRegion XShapeCombineRegionSRC;
5186 #define XShapeCombineRegion XShapeCombineRegionSRC
5187 void* X11XEXThandle = NULL;
5188#endif
5189
5190#if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR) && !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR_PRELOAD)
5191 PFN_XcursorImageLoadCursor XcursorImageLoadCursorSRC = NULL;
5192 PFN_XcursorImageCreate XcursorImageCreateSRC = NULL;
5193 PFN_XcursorImageDestroy XcursorImageDestroySRC = NULL;
5194
5195 #define XcursorImageLoadCursor XcursorImageLoadCursorSRC
5196 #define XcursorImageCreate XcursorImageCreateSRC
5197 #define XcursorImageDestroy XcursorImageDestroySRC
5198
5199 void* X11Cursorhandle = NULL;
5200#endif
5201
5202void* RGFW_getDisplay_X11(void) { return _RGFW->display; }
5203u64 RGFW_window_getWindow_X11(RGFW_window* win) { return (u64)win->src.window; }
5204
5205RGFWDEF RGFW_format RGFW_XImage_getFormat(XImage* image);
5206RGFW_format RGFW_XImage_getFormat(XImage* image) {
5207 switch (image->bits_per_pixel) {
5208 case 24:
5209 if (image->red_mask == 0xFF0000 && image->green_mask == 0x00FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x0000FF)
5210 return RGFW_formatRGB8;
5211 if (image->red_mask == 0x0000FF && image->green_mask == 0x00FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0xFF0000)
5212 return RGFW_formatBGR8;
5213 break;
5214 case 32:
5215 if (image->red_mask == 0x00FF0000 && image->green_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x000000FF)
5216 return RGFW_formatBGRA8;
5217 if (image->red_mask == 0x000000FF && image->green_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x00FF0000)
5218 return RGFW_formatRGBA8;
5219 if (image->red_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->green_mask == 0x00FF0000 && image->blue_mask == 0xFF000000)
5220 return RGFW_formatABGR8;
5221 if (image->red_mask == 0x00FF0000 && image->green_mask == 0x0000FF00 && image->blue_mask == 0x000000FF)
5222 return RGFW_formatARGB8; /* ambiguous without alpha */
5223 break;
5224 }
5225 return RGFW_formatARGB8;
5226}
5227
5228RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
5229 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
5230 surface->data = data;
5231 surface->w = w;
5232 surface->h = h;
5233 surface->format = format;
5234
5235 XWindowAttributes attrs;
5236 if (XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &attrs) == 0) {
5237 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to get window attributes.");
5238 return RGFW_FALSE;
5239 }
5240
5241 surface->native.bitmap = XCreateImage(_RGFW->display, attrs.visual, (u32)attrs.depth,
5242 ZPixmap, 0, NULL, (u32)surface->w, (u32)surface->h, 32, 0);
5243
5244 surface->native.buffer = (u8*)RGFW_ALLOC((size_t)(w * h * 4));
5245 surface->native.format = RGFW_XImage_getFormat(surface->native.bitmap);
5246
5247 if (surface->native.bitmap == NULL) {
5248 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to create XImage.");
5249 return RGFW_FALSE;
5250 }
5251
5252 surface->native.format = RGFW_formatBGRA8;
5253 return RGFW_TRUE;
5254}
5255
5256RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createSurfacePtr) (u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
5257 return RGFW_window_createSurfacePtr(_RGFW->root, data, w, h, format, surface);
5258}
5259
5260void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_blitSurface) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
5261 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
5262 surface->native.bitmap->data = (char*)surface->native.buffer;
5263 RGFW_copyImageData((u8*)surface->native.buffer, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
5264
5265 XPutImage(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, win->src.gc, surface->native.bitmap, 0, 0, 0, 0, (u32)RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w), (u32)RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h));
5266 surface->native.bitmap->data = NULL;
5267 return;
5268}
5269
5270void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_surface_freePtr) (RGFW_surface* surface) {
5271 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
5272 RGFW_FREE(surface->native.buffer);
5273 XDestroyImage(surface->native.bitmap);
5274 return;
5275}
5276
5277#define RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(name) \
5278 static Atom name = 0; \
5279 if (name == 0) name = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, #name, False);
5280
5281void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setBorder) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
5282 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
5283 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_MOTIF_WM_HINTS);
5284
5285 struct __x11WindowHints {
5286 unsigned long flags, functions, decorations, status;
5287 long input_mode;
5288 } hints;
5289 hints.flags = 2;
5290 hints.decorations = border;
5291
5292 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _MOTIF_WM_HINTS, _MOTIF_WM_HINTS, 32, PropModeReplace, (u8*)&hints, 5);
5293
5294 if (RGFW_window_isHidden(win) == 0) {
5295 RGFW_window_hide(win);
5296 RGFW_window_show(win);
5297 }
5298}
5299
5300void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_releaseCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
5301 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
5302 XUngrabPointer(_RGFW->display, CurrentTime);
5303
5304 /* disable raw input */
5305 unsigned char mask[] = { 0 };
5306 XIEventMask em;
5307 em.deviceid = XIAllMasterDevices;
5308 em.mask_len = sizeof(mask);
5309 em.mask = mask;
5310
5311 XISelectEvents(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), &em, 1);
5312}
5313
5314void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_captureCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
5315 /* enable raw input */
5316 unsigned char mask[XIMaskLen(XI_RawMotion)] = { 0 };
5317 XISetMask(mask, XI_RawMotion);
5318
5319 XIEventMask em;
5320 em.deviceid = XIAllMasterDevices;
5321 em.mask_len = sizeof(mask);
5322 em.mask = mask;
5323
5324 XISelectEvents(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), &em, 1);
5325
5326 unsigned int event_mask = ButtonPressMask | ButtonReleaseMask | PointerMotionMask;
5327 XGrabPointer(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, False, event_mask, GrabModeAsync, GrabModeAsync, None, None, CurrentTime);
5328 RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (i32)(win->w / 2), win->y + (i32)(win->h / 2));
5329}
5330
5331#define RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(x, lib) if (x == NULL) x = dlopen(lib, RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_LOCAL)
5332#define RGFW_PROC_DEF(proc, name) if (name##SRC == NULL && proc != NULL) { \
5333 void* ptr = dlsym(proc, #name); \
5334 if (ptr != NULL) RGFW_MEMCPY(&name##SRC, &ptr, sizeof(PFN_##name)); \
5335}
5336
5337RGFWDEF void RGFW_window_getVisual(XVisualInfo* visual, RGFW_bool transparent);
5338void RGFW_window_getVisual(XVisualInfo* visual, RGFW_bool transparent) {
5339 visual->visual = DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
5340 visual->depth = DefaultDepth(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
5341 if (transparent) {
5342 XMatchVisualInfo(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display), 32, TrueColor, visual);
5343 if (visual->depth != 32)
5344 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Failed to load a 32-bit depth.");
5345 }
5346}
5347
5348RGFWDEF int RGFW_XErrorHandler(Display* display, XErrorEvent* ev);
5349int RGFW_XErrorHandler(Display* display, XErrorEvent* ev) {
5350 char errorText[512];
5351 XGetErrorText(display, ev->error_code, errorText, sizeof(errorText));
5352
5353 char buf[1024];
5354 RGFW_SNPRINTF(buf, sizeof(buf), "[X Error] %s\n Error code: %d\n Request code: %d\n Minor code: %d\n Serial: %lu\n",
5355 errorText,
5356 ev->error_code, ev->request_code, ev->minor_code, ev->serial);
5357
5358 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errX11, buf);
5359 _RGFW->x11Error = ev;
5360 return 0;
5361}
5362
5363void RGFW_XCreateWindow (XVisualInfo visual, const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
5364 i64 event_mask = KeyPressMask | KeyReleaseMask | ButtonPressMask | ButtonReleaseMask | PointerMotionMask | StructureNotifyMask | FocusChangeMask |
5365 LeaveWindowMask | EnterWindowMask | ExposureMask | VisibilityChangeMask | PropertyChangeMask;
5366
5367 /* make X window attrubutes */
5368 XSetWindowAttributes swa;
5369 RGFW_MEMSET(&swa, 0, sizeof(swa));
5370
5371 win->src.parent = DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display);
5372
5373 Colormap cmap;
5374 swa.colormap = cmap = XCreateColormap(_RGFW->display,
5375 win->src.parent,
5376 visual.visual, AllocNone);
5377 swa.event_mask = event_mask;
5378 swa.background_pixmap = None;
5379
5380 /* create the window */
5381 win->src.window = XCreateWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.parent, win->x, win->y, (u32)win->w, (u32)win->h,
5382 0, visual.depth, InputOutput, visual.visual,
5383 CWBorderPixel | CWColormap | CWEventMask, &swa);
5384
5385 XFreeColors(_RGFW->display, cmap, NULL, 0, 0);
5386
5387 XSaveContext(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _RGFW->context, (XPointer)win);
5388
5389 win->src.gc = XCreateGC(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, 0, NULL);
5390
5391 /* In your .desktop app, if you set the property
5392 StartupWMClass=RGFW that will assoicate the launcher icon
5393 with your application - robrohan */
5394 if (_RGFW->className == NULL)
5395 _RGFW->className = (char*)name;
5396
5397 XClassHint hint;
5398 hint.res_class = (char*)_RGFW->className;
5399 if (_RGFW->instName == NULL) hint.res_name = (char*)name;
5400 else hint.res_name = (char*)_RGFW->instName;
5401 XSetClassHint(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hint);
5402
5403 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
5404 if (flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor)
5405 RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
5406 #endif
5407 XSelectInput(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, event_mask);
5409 /* make it so the user can't close the window until the program does */
5410 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_DELETE_WINDOW);
5411 XSetWMProtocols(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, &WM_DELETE_WINDOW, 1);
5412 /* set the background */
5413 RGFW_window_setName(win, name);
5414
5415 XMoveWindow(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, win->x, win->y);
5417 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) { /* init drag and drop atoms and turn on drag and drop for this window */
5418 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
5419
5420 /* actions */
5421 Atom XdndAware = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "XdndAware", False);
5422 const u8 version = 5;
5423
5424 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window,
5425 XdndAware, 4, 32,
5426 PropModeReplace, &version, 1);
5427 }
5428
5429#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
5430 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST_COUNTER)
5431 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST)
5432
5433 Atom protcols[2] = {_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST, WM_DELETE_WINDOW};
5434 XSetWMProtocols(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, protcols, 2);
5435
5436 XSyncValue initial_value;
5437 XSyncIntToValue(&initial_value, 0);
5438 win->src.counter = XSyncCreateCounter(_RGFW->display, initial_value);
5439
5440 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST_COUNTER, XA_CARDINAL, 32, PropModeReplace, (uint8_t*)&win->src.counter, 1);
5441#endif
5442
5443 win->src.x = win->x;
5444 win->src.y = win->y;
5445 win->src.w = win->w;
5446 win->src.h = win->h;
5447
5448 XSetWindowBackground(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, None);
5449 XClearWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
5450
5451 /* stupid hack to make resizing the window less bad */
5452 XSetWindowBackgroundPixmap(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, None);
5453}
5454
5455RGFW_window* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createWindowPlatform) (const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
5456 if ((flags & RGFW_windowOpenGL) || (flags & RGFW_windowEGL)) {
5457 win->src.window = 0;
5458 return win;
5459 }
5460
5461 XVisualInfo visual;
5462 RGFW_window_getVisual(&visual, RGFW_BOOL(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent));
5463 RGFW_XCreateWindow(visual, name, flags, win);
5464 return win; /*return newly created window */
5465}
5466
5467RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getGlobalMouse) (i32* fX, i32* fY) {
5468 RGFW_init();
5469 i32 x, y;
5470 u32 z;
5471 Window window1, window2;
5472 XQueryPointer(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), &window1, &window2, fX, fY, &x, &y, &z);
5473 return RGFW_TRUE;
5474}
5475
5476RGFWDEF void RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(XEvent* event);
5477void RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(XEvent* event) { RGFW_UNUSED(event);
5478 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(ATOM_PAIR);
5479 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(MULTIPLE);
5480 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(TARGETS);
5481 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS);
5482 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(UTF8_STRING);
5483
5484 const XSelectionRequestEvent* request = &event->xselectionrequest;
5485 Atom formats[2] = {0};
5486 formats[0] = UTF8_STRING;
5487 formats[1] = XA_STRING;
5488 const int formatCount = sizeof(formats) / sizeof(formats[0]);
5489
5490 if (request->target == TARGETS) {
5491 Atom targets[4] = {0};
5492 targets[0] = TARGETS;
5493 targets[1] = MULTIPLE;
5494 targets[2] = UTF8_STRING;
5495 targets[3] = XA_STRING;
5496
5497 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property,
5498 XA_ATOM, 32, PropModeReplace, (u8*) targets, sizeof(targets) / sizeof(Atom));
5499 } else if (request->target == MULTIPLE) {
5500 Atom* targets = NULL;
5501
5502 Atom actualType = 0;
5503 int actualFormat = 0;
5504 unsigned long count = 0, bytesAfter = 0;
5505
5506 XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property, 0, LONG_MAX,
5507 False, ATOM_PAIR, &actualType, &actualFormat, &count, &bytesAfter, (u8**) &targets);
5508
5509 unsigned long i;
5510 for (i = 0; i < (u32)count; i += 2) {
5511 if (targets[i] == UTF8_STRING || targets[i] == XA_STRING)
5512 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, targets[i + 1], targets[i],
5513 8, PropModeReplace, (const unsigned char *)_RGFW->clipboard, (i32)_RGFW->clipboard_len);
5514 else
5515 targets[i + 1] = None;
5516 }
5517
5518 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display,
5519 request->requestor, request->property, ATOM_PAIR, 32,
5520 PropModeReplace, (u8*) targets, (i32)count);
5521
5522 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5523 XFree(targets);
5524 } else if (request->target == SAVE_TARGETS)
5525 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property, 0, 32, PropModeReplace, NULL, 0);
5526 else {
5527 int i;
5528 for (i = 0; i < formatCount; i++) {
5529 if (request->target != formats[i])
5530 continue;
5531 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, request->property, request->target,
5532 8, PropModeReplace, (u8*) _RGFW->clipboard, (i32)_RGFW->clipboard_len);
5533 }
5534 }
5535
5536 XEvent reply = { SelectionNotify };
5537 reply.xselection.property = request->property;
5538 reply.xselection.display = request->display;
5539 reply.xselection.requestor = request->requestor;
5540 reply.xselection.selection = request->selection;
5541 reply.xselection.target = request->target;
5542 reply.xselection.time = request->time;
5543
5544 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, request->requestor, False, 0, &reply);
5545 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5546}
5547
5548i32 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelectionHelper(void);
5549
5550u8 RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar) (u32 key) {
5551 u32 keycode = RGFW_rgfwToApiKey(key);
5552
5553 Window root = DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display);
5554 Window ret_root, ret_child;
5555 int root_x, root_y, win_x, win_y;
5556 unsigned int mask;
5557 XQueryPointer(_RGFW->display, root, &ret_root, &ret_child, &root_x, &root_y, &win_x, &win_y, &mask);
5558 KeySym sym = (KeySym)XkbKeycodeToKeysym(_RGFW->display, (KeyCode)keycode, 0, (KeyCode)mask & ShiftMask ? 1 : 0);
5559
5560 if ((mask & LockMask) && sym >= XK_a && sym <= XK_z)
5561 sym = (mask & ShiftMask) ? sym + 32 : sym - 32;
5562 if ((u8)sym != (u32)sym)
5563 sym = 0;
5564
5565 return (u8)sym;
5566}
5567
5568RGFWDEF void RGFW_XHandleEvent(void);
5569void RGFW_XHandleEvent(void) {
5570 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndTypeList);
5571 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndSelection);
5572 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndEnter);
5573 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndPosition);
5574 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndStatus);
5575 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndLeave);
5576 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndDrop);
5577 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndFinished);
5578 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XdndActionCopy);
5579 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST);
5580 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_PROTOCOLS);
5581 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_STATE);
5582 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
5583
5584 /* xdnd data */
5585 static Window source = 0;
5586 static long version = 0;
5587 static i32 format = 0;
5588
5589 XEvent reply = { ClientMessage };
5590 XEvent E;
5591 RGFW_event event;
5592 RGFW_MEMSET(&event, 0, sizeof(event));
5593
5594 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &E);
5595 switch (E.type) {
5596 case SelectionRequest:
5597 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(&E);
5598 return;
5599 case GenericEvent: {
5600 RGFW_window* win = _RGFW->mouseOwner;
5601 if (win == NULL) return;
5602 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_BIT(RGFW_mousePosChanged))) return;
5603
5604 /* MotionNotify is used for mouse events if the mouse isn't held */
5605 if (!(win->internal.holdMouse)) {
5606 XFreeEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
5607 return;
5608 }
5609
5610 XGetEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
5611 if (E.xcookie.evtype == XI_RawMotion) {
5612 XIRawEvent *raw = (XIRawEvent *)E.xcookie.data;
5613 if (raw->valuators.mask_len == 0) {
5614 XFreeEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
5615 return;
5616 }
5617
5618 double deltaX = 0.0f;
5619 double deltaY = 0.0f;
5620
5621 /* check if relative motion data exists where we think it does */
5622 if (XIMaskIsSet(raw->valuators.mask, 0) != 0)
5623 deltaX += raw->raw_values[0];
5624 if (XIMaskIsSet(raw->valuators.mask, 1) != 0)
5625 deltaY += raw->raw_values[1];
5626
5627 event.mouse.vecX = (float)deltaX;
5628 event.mouse.vecY = (float)deltaY;
5629 _RGFW->vectorX = (float)event.mouse.vecX;
5630 _RGFW->vectorY = (float)event.mouse.vecY;
5631 event.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX + (i32)event.mouse.vecX;
5632 event.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY + (i32)event.mouse.vecY;
5633 win->internal.lastMouseX = event.mouse.x;
5634 win->internal.lastMouseY = event.mouse.y;
5635 RGFW_window_moveMouse(win, win->x + (win->w / 2), win->y + (win->h / 2));
5636
5637 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
5638 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, (float)event.mouse.vecX, (float)event.mouse.vecY);
5639 }
5640
5641 XFreeEventData(_RGFW->display, &E.xcookie);
5642 if (event.type)
5643 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
5644 return;
5645 }
5646 }
5647
5648 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
5649 if (XFindContext(_RGFW->display, E.xany.window, _RGFW->context, (XPointer*) &win) != 0) {
5650 return;
5651 }
5652
5653 event.common.win = win;
5654
5655 /*
5656 Repeated key presses are sent as a release followed by another press at the same time.
5657 We want to convert that into a single key press event with the repeat flag set
5658 */
5659 if (E.type == KeyRelease && XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAfterReading)) {
5660 XEvent NE;
5661 XPeekEvent(_RGFW->display, &NE);
5662 if (NE.type == KeyPress && E.xkey.time == NE.xkey.time && E.xkey.keycode == NE.xkey.keycode) {
5663 /* Use the next KeyPress event */
5664 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &E);
5665 event.key.repeat = RGFW_TRUE;
5666 }
5667 }
5668
5669 switch (E.type) {
5670 case KeyPress: {
5671 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag)) return;
5672 event.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
5673 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(E.xkey.keycode);
5674 event.key.sym = (u8)RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(event.key.value);
5675
5676 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
5677 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = RGFW_TRUE;
5678
5679 XkbStateRec state;
5680 XkbGetState(_RGFW->display, XkbUseCoreKbd, &state);
5681 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (state.locked_mods & LockMask), (state.locked_mods & Mod2Mask), (state.locked_mods & Mod3Mask));
5682
5683 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, win->internal.mod, event.key.repeat, RGFW_TRUE);
5684 break;
5685 }
5686 case KeyRelease: {
5687 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag)) return;
5688
5689 event.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
5690 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(E.xkey.keycode);
5691 event.key.sym = (u8)RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(event.key.value);
5692
5693 /* get keystate data */
5694 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
5695 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = RGFW_FALSE;
5696
5697 XkbStateRec state;
5698 XkbGetState(_RGFW->display, XkbUseCoreKbd, &state);
5699 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (state.locked_mods & LockMask), (state.locked_mods & Mod2Mask), (state.locked_mods & Mod3Mask));
5700
5701 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, win->internal.mod, event.key.repeat, RGFW_FALSE);
5702 break;
5703 }
5704 case ButtonPress:
5705 if (E.xbutton.button >= Button4 && E.xbutton.button <= 7) {
5706 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return;
5707 event.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
5708 } else {
5709 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag) || E.xbutton.button > RGFW_mouseFinal) return;
5710 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
5711 }
5712
5713 switch(E.xbutton.button) {
5714 case Button1: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
5715 case Button2: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
5716 case Button3: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
5717 case Button4: event.scroll.y = 1.0; break;
5718 case Button5: event.scroll.y = -1.0; break;
5719 case 6: event.scroll.x = 1.0f; break;
5720 case 7: event.scroll.x = -1.0f; break;
5721 default:
5722 event.button.value = (u8)E.xbutton.button - Button1 - 4;
5723 break;
5724 }
5725
5726 if (event.type == RGFW_mouseScroll) {
5727 _RGFW->scrollX = event.scroll.x;
5728 _RGFW->scrollY = event.scroll.y;
5729 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, event.scroll.x, event.scroll.y);
5730 break;
5731 }
5732
5733 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
5734 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = RGFW_TRUE;
5735 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, RGFW_TRUE);
5736 break;
5737 case ButtonRelease:
5738 if (E.xbutton.button >= Button4 && E.xbutton.button <= 7) break;
5739 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag) || E.xbutton.button > RGFW_mouseFinal) return;
5740 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
5741 switch(E.xbutton.button) {
5742 case Button1: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
5743 case Button2: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
5744 case Button3: event.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
5745 default:
5746 event.button.value = (u8)E.xbutton.button - Button1 - 4;
5747 break;
5748 }
5749
5750 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
5751 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = RGFW_FALSE;
5752 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, RGFW_FALSE);
5753 break;
5754 case MotionNotify:
5755 if (win->internal.holdMouse) return;
5756 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return;
5757 event.mouse.x = E.xmotion.x;
5758 event.mouse.y = E.xmotion.y;
5759
5760 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(event.mouse.x - win->internal.lastMouseX);
5761 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(event.mouse.y - win->internal.lastMouseY);
5762 _RGFW->vectorX = event.mouse.vecX;
5763 _RGFW->vectorY = event.mouse.vecY;
5764 win->internal.lastMouseX = event.mouse.x;
5765 win->internal.lastMouseY = event.mouse.y;
5766 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
5767 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, (float)event.mouse.vecX, (float)event.mouse.vecY);
5768 break;
5769
5770 case Expose: {
5771 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return;
5772 event.type = RGFW_windowRefresh;
5773 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
5774
5775#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
5776 XSyncValue value;
5777 XSyncIntToValue(&value, (i32)win->src.counter_value);
5778 XSyncSetCounter(_RGFW->display, win->src.counter, value);
5779#endif
5780 break;
5781 }
5782
5783 case PropertyNotify:
5784 if (E.xproperty.state != PropertyNewValue) break;
5785
5786 if (E.xproperty.atom == WM_STATE) {
5787 if (RGFW_window_isMinimized(win) && !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowMinimized)) {
5788 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMinimize;
5789 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMinimized; e.common.win = win);
5790 RGFW_windowMinimizedCallback(win);
5791 break;
5792 }
5793 } else if (E.xproperty.atom == _NET_WM_STATE) {
5794 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowMaximize)) {
5795 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMaximize;
5796 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMaximized; e.common.win = win);
5797 RGFW_windowMaximizedCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
5798 break;
5799 }
5800 }
5801
5802 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
5803 break;
5804 case MapNotify: case UnmapNotify: RGFW_window_checkMode(win); break;
5805 case ClientMessage: {
5806 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_DELETE_WINDOW);
5807 /* if the client closed the window */
5808 if (E.xclient.data.l[0] == (long)WM_DELETE_WINDOW) {
5809 event.type = RGFW_quit;
5810 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
5811 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
5812 break;
5813 }
5814#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
5815 if (E.xclient.message_type == WM_PROTOCOLS && (Atom)E.xclient.data.l[0] == _NET_WM_SYNC_REQUEST) {
5816 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
5817 win->src.counter_value = 0;
5818 win->src.counter_value |= E.xclient.data.l[2];
5819 win->src.counter_value |= (E.xclient.data.l[3] << 32);
5820
5821 XSyncValue value;
5822 XSyncIntToValue(&value, (i32)win->src.counter_value);
5823 XSyncSetCounter(_RGFW->display, win->src.counter, value);
5824 break;
5825 }
5826#endif
5827 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) == 0)
5828 return;
5829
5830 reply.xclient.window = source;
5831 reply.xclient.format = 32;
5832 reply.xclient.data.l[0] = (long)win->src.window;
5833 reply.xclient.data.l[1] = 0;
5834 reply.xclient.data.l[2] = None;
5835
5836 if (E.xclient.message_type == XdndEnter) {
5837 if (version > 5)
5838 break;
5839
5840 unsigned long count;
5841 Atom* formats;
5842 Atom real_formats[6];
5843 Bool list = E.xclient.data.l[1] & 1;
5844
5845 source = (unsigned long int)E.xclient.data.l[0];
5846 version = E.xclient.data.l[1] >> 24;
5847 format = None;
5848 if (list) {
5849 Atom actualType;
5850 i32 actualFormat;
5851 unsigned long bytesAfter;
5852
5853 XGetWindowProperty(
5854 _RGFW->display, source, XdndTypeList,
5855 0, LONG_MAX, False, 4,
5856 &actualType, &actualFormat, &count, &bytesAfter, (u8**)&formats
5857 );
5858 } else {
5859 count = 0;
5860
5861 size_t i;
5862 for (i = 2; i < 5; i++) {
5863 if (E.xclient.data.l[i] != None) {
5864 real_formats[count] = (unsigned long int)E.xclient.data.l[i];
5865 count += 1;
5866 }
5867 }
5868
5869 formats = real_formats;
5870 }
5871
5872 Atom XtextPlain = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "text/plain", False);
5873 Atom XtextUriList = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "text/uri-list", False);
5874
5875 size_t i;
5876 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
5877 if (formats[i] == XtextUriList || formats[i] == XtextPlain) {
5878 format = (int)formats[i];
5879 break;
5880 }
5881 }
5882
5883 if (list) {
5884 XFree(formats);
5885 }
5886
5887 break;
5888 }
5889
5890 if (E.xclient.message_type == XdndPosition) {
5891 const i32 xabs = (E.xclient.data.l[2] >> 16) & 0xffff;
5892 const i32 yabs = (E.xclient.data.l[2]) & 0xffff;
5893 Window dummy;
5894 i32 xpos, ypos;
5895
5896 if (version > 5)
5897 break;
5898
5899 XTranslateCoordinates(
5900 _RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), win->src.window,
5901 xabs, yabs, &xpos, &ypos, &dummy
5902 );
5903
5904 event.drag.x = xpos;
5905 event.drag.y = ypos;
5906
5907 reply.xclient.window = source;
5908 reply.xclient.message_type = XdndStatus;
5909
5910 if (format) {
5911 reply.xclient.data.l[1] = 1;
5912 if (version >= 2)
5913 reply.xclient.data.l[4] = (long)XdndActionCopy;
5914 }
5915
5916 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, source, False, NoEventMask, &reply);
5917 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5918 break;
5919 }
5920 if (E.xclient.message_type != XdndDrop)
5921 break;
5922
5923 if (version > 5)
5924 break;
5925
5926 event.type = RGFW_dataDrag;
5927
5928 if (format) {
5929 Time time = (version >= 1)
5930 ? (Time)E.xclient.data.l[2]
5931 : CurrentTime;
5932
5933 XConvertSelection(
5934 _RGFW->display, XdndSelection, (Atom)format,
5935 XdndSelection, win->src.window, time
5936 );
5937 } else if (version >= 2) {
5938 XEvent new_reply = { ClientMessage };
5939
5940 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, source, False, NoEventMask, &new_reply);
5941 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
5942 }
5943
5944 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
5945 _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging = RGFW_TRUE;
5946 _RGFW->windowState.dropX = event.drag.x;
5947 _RGFW->windowState.dropY = event.drag.y;
5948
5949 if (win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDragFlag) return;
5950 RGFW_dataDragCallback(win, event.drag.x, event.drag.y);
5951 } break;
5952 case SelectionNotify: {
5953 /* this is only for checking for xdnd drops */
5954 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag) || E.xselection.property != XdndSelection || !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND))
5955 return;
5956 char* data;
5957 unsigned long result;
5958
5959 Atom actualType;
5960 i32 actualFormat;
5961 unsigned long bytesAfter;
5962
5963 XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, E.xselection.requestor, E.xselection.property, 0, LONG_MAX, False, E.xselection.target, &actualType, &actualFormat, &result, &bytesAfter, (u8**) &data);
5964
5965 if (result == 0)
5966 break;
5967
5968 const char* prefix = (const char*)"file://";
5969
5970 char* line;
5971
5972 event.drop.files = _RGFW->files;
5973 event.drop.count = 0;
5974 event.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
5975
5976 while ((line = (char*)RGFW_strtok(data, "\r\n"))) {
5977 char path[RGFW_MAX_PATH];
5978
5979 data = NULL;
5980
5981 if (line[0] == '#')
5982 continue;
5983
5984 char* l;
5985 for (l = line; 1; l++) {
5986 if ((l - line) > 7)
5987 break;
5988 else if (*l != prefix[(l - line)])
5989 break;
5990 else if (*l == '\0' && prefix[(l - line)] == '\0') {
5991 line += 7;
5992 while (*line != '/')
5993 line++;
5994 break;
5995 } else if (*l == '\0')
5996 break;
5997 }
5998
5999 event.drop.count++;
6000
6001 size_t index = 0;
6002 while (*line) {
6003 if (line[0] == '%' && line[1] && line[2]) {
6004 char digits[3] = {0};
6005 digits[0] = line[1];
6006 digits[1] = line[2];
6007 digits[2] = '\0';
6008 path[index] = (char) RGFW_STRTOL(digits, NULL, 16);
6009 line += 2;
6010 } else
6011 path[index] = *line;
6012
6013 index++;
6014 line++;
6015 }
6016 path[index] = '\0';
6017 RGFW_MEMCPY(event.drop.files[event.drop.count - 1], path, index + 1);
6018 }
6019
6020 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
6021 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
6022 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = event.drop.count;
6023
6024 RGFW_dataDropCallback(win, event.drop.files, event.drop.count);
6025 if (data)
6026 XFree(data);
6027
6028 if (version >= 2) {
6029 XEvent new_reply = { ClientMessage };
6030 new_reply.xclient.window = source;
6031 new_reply.xclient.message_type = XdndFinished;
6032 new_reply.xclient.format = 32;
6033 new_reply.xclient.data.l[1] = (long int)result;
6034 new_reply.xclient.data.l[2] = (long int)XdndActionCopy;
6035 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, source, False, NoEventMask, &new_reply);
6036 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
6037 }
6038 break;
6039 }
6040 case FocusIn:
6041 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen))
6042 XMapRaised(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6043 if ((win->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(win);
6044
6045 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return;
6046 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
6047 event.type = RGFW_focusIn;
6048 RGFW_focusCallback(win, 1);
6049
6050 break;
6051 case FocusOut:
6052 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return;
6053 event.type = RGFW_focusOut;
6054 RGFW_focusCallback(win, 0);
6055 RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
6056 break;
6057 case EnterNotify: {
6058 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
6059 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
6060 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
6061
6062 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseEnterFlag)) return;
6063 event.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
6064 event.mouse.x = E.xcrossing.x;
6065 event.mouse.y = E.xcrossing.y;
6066 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 1);
6067 break;
6068 }
6069
6070 case LeaveNotify: {
6071 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
6072 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
6073 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
6074 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return;
6075 event.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
6076 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 0);
6077 break;
6078 }
6079 case ReparentNotify:
6080 win->src.parent = E.xreparent.parent;
6081 break;
6082 case ConfigureNotify: {
6083 /* detect resize */
6084 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
6085 if (E.xconfigure.width != win->src.w || E.xconfigure.height != win->src.h) {
6086 win->src.w = win->w = E.xconfigure.width;
6087 win->src.h = win->h = E.xconfigure.height;
6088
6089 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return;
6090 event.type = RGFW_windowResized;
6091 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
6092 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
6093 }
6094
6095 i32 x = E.xconfigure.x;
6096 i32 y = E.xconfigure.y;
6097
6098 /*
6099 if the event came from the server and we're not a direct child of the root window then
6100 we're using local coords which need to be translated into screen coords
6101 */
6102 Window root = DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display);
6103 if (E.xany.send_event == 0 && win->src.parent != root) {
6104 Window dummy = 0;
6105 XTranslateCoordinates(_RGFW->display, win->src.parent, root, x, y, &x, &y, &dummy);
6106 }
6107
6108 /* detect move */
6109 if (E.xconfigure.x != win->src.x || E.xconfigure.y != win->src.y) {
6110 win->src.x = win->x = E.xconfigure.x;
6111 win->src.y = win->y = E.xconfigure.y;
6112
6113 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return;
6114 event.type = RGFW_windowMoved;
6115 RGFW_windowMovedCallback(win, win->x, win->y);
6116 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
6117 }
6118 return;
6119 }
6120 default:
6121 break;
6122 }
6123
6124 if (event.type) {
6125 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
6126 }
6127
6128 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
6129}
6130
6131void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_pollEvents) (void) {
6132 RGFW_resetPrevState();
6133
6134 XPending(_RGFW->display);
6135 /* if there is no unread queued events, get a new one */
6136 while ((QLength(_RGFW->display) || XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAlready) + XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAfterReading))) {
6137 RGFW_XHandleEvent();
6138 }
6139}
6140
6141void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_move) (RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
6142 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6143 win->x = x;
6144 win->y = y;
6145
6146 XMoveWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, x, y);
6147 return;
6148}
6149
6150
6151void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_resize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6152 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6153 win->w = (i32)w;
6154 win->h = (i32)h;
6155
6156 XResizeWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (u32)w, (u32)h);
6157
6158 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoResize)) {
6159 XSizeHints sh;
6160 sh.flags = (1L << 4) | (1L << 5);
6161 sh.min_width = sh.max_width = (i32)w;
6162 sh.min_height = sh.max_height = (i32)h;
6163
6164 XSetWMSizeHints(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window, &sh, XA_WM_NORMAL_HINTS);
6165 }
6166 return;
6167}
6168
6169void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setAspectRatio) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6170 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6171
6172
6173 if (w == 0 && h == 0)
6174 return;
6175 XSizeHints hints;
6176 long flags;
6177
6178 XGetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints, &flags);
6179
6180 hints.flags |= PAspect;
6181
6182 hints.min_aspect.x = hints.max_aspect.x = (i32)w;
6183 hints.min_aspect.y = hints.max_aspect.y = (i32)h;
6184
6185 XSetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints);
6186 return;
6187}
6188
6189void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMinSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6190 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6191
6192 long flags;
6193 XSizeHints hints;
6194 RGFW_MEMSET(&hints, 0, sizeof(XSizeHints));
6195
6196 XGetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints, &flags);
6197
6198 hints.flags |= PMinSize;
6199
6200 hints.min_width = (i32)w;
6201 hints.min_height = (i32)h;
6202
6203 XSetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints);
6204 return;
6205}
6206
6207void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMaxSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
6208 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6209
6210 long flags;
6211 XSizeHints hints;
6212 RGFW_MEMSET(&hints, 0, sizeof(XSizeHints));
6213
6214 XGetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints, &flags);
6215
6216 hints.flags |= PMaxSize;
6217
6218 hints.max_width = (i32)w;
6219 hints.max_height = (i32)h;
6220
6221 XSetWMNormalHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &hints);
6222 return;
6223}
6224
6225void RGFW_toggleXMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized);
6226void RGFW_toggleXMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized) {
6227 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6228 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
6229 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT);
6230 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ);
6231
6232 XEvent xev = {0};
6233 xev.type = ClientMessage;
6234 xev.xclient.window = win->src.window;
6235 xev.xclient.message_type = _NET_WM_STATE;
6236 xev.xclient.format = 32;
6237 xev.xclient.data.l[0] = maximized;
6238 xev.xclient.data.l[1] = (long int)_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ;
6239 xev.xclient.data.l[2] = (long int)_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT;
6240 xev.xclient.data.l[3] = 0;
6241 xev.xclient.data.l[4] = 0;
6242
6243 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), False, SubstructureRedirectMask | SubstructureNotifyMask, &xev);
6244}
6245
6246void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_maximize) (RGFW_window* win) {
6247 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
6248 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
6249 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
6250 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
6251
6252 RGFW_toggleXMaximized(win, 1);
6253 return;
6254}
6255
6256void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_focus) (RGFW_window* win) {
6257 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
6258
6259 XWindowAttributes attr;
6260 XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &attr);
6261 if (attr.map_state != IsViewable) return;
6262
6263 XSetInputFocus(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, RevertToPointerRoot, CurrentTime);
6264 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
6265}
6266
6267void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_raise) (RGFW_window* win) {
6268 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
6269 XRaiseWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6270 XMapRaised(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6271}
6272
6273void RGFW_window_setXAtom(RGFW_window* win, Atom netAtom, RGFW_bool fullscreen);
6274void RGFW_window_setXAtom(RGFW_window* win, Atom netAtom, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
6275 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6276 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
6277
6278 XEvent xev = {0};
6279 xev.xclient.type = ClientMessage;
6280 xev.xclient.serial = 0;
6281 xev.xclient.send_event = True;
6282 xev.xclient.message_type = _NET_WM_STATE;
6283 xev.xclient.window = win->src.window;
6284 xev.xclient.format = 32;
6285 xev.xclient.data.l[0] = fullscreen;
6286 xev.xclient.data.l[1] = (long int)netAtom;
6287 xev.xclient.data.l[2] = 0;
6288
6289 XSendEvent(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), False, SubstructureNotifyMask | SubstructureRedirectMask, &xev);
6290}
6291
6292void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFullscreen)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
6293 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6294
6295 if (fullscreen) {
6296 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
6297 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
6298 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
6299 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
6300 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
6301 }
6302 else win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
6303 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN);
6304
6305 RGFW_window_setXAtom(win, _NET_WM_STATE_FULLSCREEN, fullscreen);
6306
6307 XRaiseWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6308 XMapRaised(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6309}
6310
6311void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFloating)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
6312 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6313 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE);
6314 RGFW_window_setXAtom(win, _NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE, floating);
6315}
6316
6317void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setOpacity)(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
6318 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6319 const u32 value = (u32) (0xffffffffu * (double) opacity);
6320 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(NET_WM_WINDOW_OPACITY);
6321 XChangeProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window,
6322 NET_WM_WINDOW_OPACITY, XA_CARDINAL, 32, PropModeReplace, (unsigned char*) &value, 1);
6323}
6324
6325void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_minimize)(RGFW_window* win) {
6326 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6327
6328 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) return;
6329
6330 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
6331 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
6332 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
6333 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
6334 XIconifyWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
6335 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
6336}
6337
6338void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_restore)(RGFW_window* win) {
6339 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6340 RGFW_toggleXMaximized(win, RGFW_FALSE);
6341 RGFW_window_move(win, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY);
6342 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->internal.oldW, win->internal.oldH);
6343
6344 RGFW_window_show(win);
6345 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
6346}
6347
6348RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isFloating)(RGFW_window* win) {
6349 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
6350 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE);
6351
6352 Atom actual_type;
6353 int actual_format;
6354 unsigned long nitems, bytes_after;
6355 Atom* prop_return = NULL;
6356
6357 int status = XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_STATE, 0, (~0L), False, XA_ATOM,
6358 &actual_type, &actual_format, &nitems, &bytes_after,
6359 (unsigned char **)&prop_return);
6360
6361 if (status != Success || actual_type != XA_ATOM)
6362 return RGFW_FALSE;
6363
6364 unsigned long i;
6365 for (i = 0; i < nitems; i++)
6366 if (prop_return[i] == _NET_WM_STATE_ABOVE) return RGFW_TRUE;
6367
6368 if (prop_return)
6369 XFree(prop_return);
6370 return RGFW_FALSE;
6371}
6372
6373void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setName)(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
6374 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6375
6376 XStoreName(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, name);
6377
6378 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_NAME); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(UTF8_STRING);
6379
6380 char buf[256];
6381 RGFW_MEMSET(buf, 0, sizeof(buf));
6382 RGFW_STRNCPY(buf, name, sizeof(buf) - 1);
6383
6384 XChangeProperty(
6385 _RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_NAME, UTF8_STRING,
6386 8, PropModeReplace, (u8*)buf, sizeof(buf)
6387 );
6388}
6389
6390#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
6391void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
6392 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6393 if (passthrough) {
6394 Region region = XCreateRegion();
6395 XShapeCombineRegion(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, ShapeInput, 0, 0, region, ShapeSet);
6396 XDestroyRegion(region);
6397
6398 return;
6399 }
6400
6401 XShapeCombineMask(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, ShapeInput, 0, 0, None, ShapeSet);
6402}
6403#endif /* RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH */
6404
6405RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setIconEx) (RGFW_window* win, u8* data_src, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
6406 Atom _NET_WM_ICON = XInternAtom(_RGFW->display, "_NET_WM_ICON", False);
6407 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6408 if (data_src == NULL) {
6409 RGFW_bool res = (RGFW_bool)XChangeProperty(
6410 _RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_ICON, XA_CARDINAL, 32,
6411 PropModeReplace, (u8*)NULL, 0
6412 );
6413 return res;
6414 }
6415
6416 i32 count = (i32)(2 + (w * h));
6417
6418 unsigned long* data = (unsigned long*) RGFW_ALLOC((u32)count * sizeof(unsigned long));
6419 RGFW_ASSERT(data != NULL);
6420
6421 RGFW_MEMSET(data, 0, (u32)count * sizeof(unsigned long));
6422 data[0] = (unsigned long)w;
6423 data[1] = (unsigned long)h;
6424
6425 RGFW_copyImageData64((u8*)&data[2], w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data_src, format, RGFW_TRUE);
6426 RGFW_bool res = RGFW_TRUE;
6427 if (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar) {
6428 res = (RGFW_bool)XChangeProperty(
6429 _RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_ICON, XA_CARDINAL, 32,
6430 PropModeReplace, (u8*)data, count
6431 );
6432 }
6433
6434 RGFW_copyImageData64((u8*)&data[2], w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data_src, format, RGFW_FALSE);
6435
6436 if (type & RGFW_iconWindow) {
6437 XWMHints wm_hints;
6438 wm_hints.flags = IconPixmapHint;
6439
6440 i32 depth = DefaultDepth(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
6441 XImage *image = XCreateImage(_RGFW->display, DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)),
6442 (u32)depth, ZPixmap, 0, (char *)&data[2], (u32)w, (u32)h, 32, 0);
6443
6444 wm_hints.icon_pixmap = XCreatePixmap(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (u32)w, (u32)h, (u32)depth);
6445 XPutImage(_RGFW->display, wm_hints.icon_pixmap, DefaultGC(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)), image, 0, 0, 0, 0, (u32)w, (u32)h);
6446 image->data = NULL;
6447 XDestroyImage(image);
6448
6449 XSetWMHints(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &wm_hints);
6450 }
6451
6452 RGFW_FREE(data);
6453 XFlush(_RGFW->display);
6454 return RGFW_BOOL(res);
6455}
6456
6457RGFW_mouse* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_loadMouse) (u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
6458 RGFW_ASSERT(data);
6459#ifndef RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR
6460 RGFW_init();
6461 XcursorImage* native = XcursorImageCreate((i32)w, (i32)h);
6462 native->xhot = 0;
6463 native->yhot = 0;
6464 RGFW_MEMSET(native->pixels, 0, (u32)(w * h * 4));
6465 RGFW_copyImageData((u8*)native->pixels, w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data, format);
6466
6467 Cursor cursor = XcursorImageLoadCursor(_RGFW->display, native);
6468 XcursorImageDestroy(native);
6469
6470 return (void*)cursor;
6471#else
6472 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format);
6473 return NULL;
6474#endif
6475}
6476
6477void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouse)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
6478 RGFW_ASSERT(win && mouse);
6479 XDefineCursor(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (Cursor)mouse);
6480}
6481
6482void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_freeMouse)(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
6483 RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
6484 XFreeCursor(_RGFW->display, (Cursor)mouse);
6485}
6486
6487void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_moveMouse)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
6488 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6489
6490 XEvent event;
6491 XQueryPointer(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display),
6492 &event.xbutton.root, &event.xbutton.window,
6493 &event.xbutton.x_root, &event.xbutton.y_root,
6494 &event.xbutton.x, &event.xbutton.y,
6495 &event.xbutton.state);
6496
6497 win->internal.lastMouseX = x - win->x;
6498 win->internal.lastMouseY = y - win->y;
6499 if (event.xbutton.x == x && event.xbutton.y == y)
6500 return;
6501
6502 XWarpPointer(_RGFW->display, None, win->src.window, 0, 0, 0, 0, (int) x - win->x, (int) y - win->y);
6503}
6504
6505RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseDefault) (RGFW_window* win) {
6506 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
6507}
6508
6509RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseStandard) (RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
6510 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6511
6512 static const u8 mouseIconSrc[16] = { XC_arrow, XC_left_ptr, XC_xterm, XC_crosshair, XC_hand2, XC_sb_h_double_arrow, XC_sb_v_double_arrow, XC_bottom_left_corner, XC_bottom_right_corner, XC_fleur, XC_X_cursor};
6513
6514 if (mouse > (sizeof(mouseIconSrc) / sizeof(u8)))
6515 return RGFW_FALSE;
6516
6517 mouse = mouseIconSrc[mouse];
6518
6519 Cursor cursor = XCreateFontCursor(_RGFW->display, mouse);
6520 XDefineCursor(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, (Cursor) cursor);
6521 XFreeCursor(_RGFW->display, (Cursor) cursor);
6522 return RGFW_TRUE;
6523}
6524
6525void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_hide)(RGFW_window* win) {
6526 XUnmapWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6527}
6528
6529void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_show) (RGFW_window* win) {
6530 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowHide;
6531 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow) RGFW_window_focus(win);
6532
6533 XMapWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.window);
6534 RGFW_window_move(win, win->x, win->y);
6535 return;
6536}
6537
6538RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_readClipboardPtr)(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
6539 RGFW_init();
6540 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(XSEL_DATA); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(UTF8_STRING); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD);
6541 if (XGetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD) == _RGFW->helperWindow) {
6542 if (str != NULL)
6543 RGFW_STRNCPY(str, _RGFW->clipboard, _RGFW->clipboard_len - 1);
6544 _RGFW->clipboard[_RGFW->clipboard_len - 1] = '\0';
6545 return (RGFW_ssize_t)_RGFW->clipboard_len - 1;
6546 }
6547
6548 XEvent event;
6549 int format;
6550 unsigned long N, sizeN;
6551 char* data;
6552 Atom target;
6553
6554 XConvertSelection(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD, UTF8_STRING, XSEL_DATA, _RGFW->helperWindow, CurrentTime);
6555 XSync(_RGFW->display, 0);
6556 while (1) {
6557 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &event);
6558 if (event.type != SelectionNotify) continue;
6559
6560 if (event.xselection.selection != CLIPBOARD || event.xselection.property == 0)
6561 return -1;
6562 break;
6563 }
6564
6565 XGetWindowProperty(event.xselection.display, event.xselection.requestor,
6566 event.xselection.property, 0L, (~0L), 0, AnyPropertyType, &target,
6567 &format, &sizeN, &N, (u8**) &data);
6568
6569 RGFW_ssize_t size;
6570 if (sizeN > strCapacity && str != NULL)
6571 size = -1;
6572
6573 if ((target == UTF8_STRING || target == XA_STRING) && str != NULL) {
6574 RGFW_MEMCPY(str, data, sizeN);
6575 str[sizeN] = '\0';
6576 XFree(data);
6577 } else if (str != NULL) size = -1;
6578
6579 XDeleteProperty(event.xselection.display, event.xselection.requestor, event.xselection.property);
6580 size = (RGFW_ssize_t)sizeN;
6581
6582 return size;
6583}
6584
6585i32 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelectionHelper(void) {
6586 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS);
6587
6588 XEvent event;
6589 XPending(_RGFW->display);
6590
6591 if (QLength(_RGFW->display) || XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAlready) + XEventsQueued(_RGFW->display, QueuedAfterReading))
6592 XNextEvent(_RGFW->display, &event);
6593 else
6594 return 0;
6595
6596 switch (event.type) {
6597 case SelectionRequest:
6598 RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelection(&event);
6599 return 0;
6600 case SelectionNotify:
6601 if (event.xselection.target == SAVE_TARGETS)
6602 return 0;
6603 break;
6604 default: break;
6605 }
6606
6607 return 0;
6608}
6609
6610void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_writeClipboard)(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
6611 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD);
6612 RGFW_init();
6613
6614 /* request ownership of the clipboard section and request to convert it, this means its our job to convert it */
6615 XSetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD, _RGFW->helperWindow, CurrentTime);
6616 if (XGetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD) != _RGFW->helperWindow) {
6617 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errClipboard, "X11 failed to become owner of clipboard selection");
6618 return;
6619 }
6620
6621 if (_RGFW->clipboard)
6622 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard);
6623
6624 _RGFW->clipboard = (char*)RGFW_ALLOC(textLen);
6625 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->clipboard != NULL);
6626
6627 RGFW_STRNCPY(_RGFW->clipboard, text, textLen - 1);
6628 _RGFW->clipboard[textLen - 1] = '\0';
6629 _RGFW->clipboard_len = textLen;
6630 return;
6631}
6632
6633RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isHidden)(RGFW_window* win) {
6634 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6635 XWindowAttributes windowAttributes;
6636 XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &windowAttributes);
6637
6638 return (windowAttributes.map_state == IsUnmapped && !RGFW_window_isMinimized(win));
6639}
6640
6641RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMinimized)(RGFW_window* win) {
6642 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6643 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(WM_STATE);
6644
6645 Atom actual_type;
6646 i32 actual_format;
6647 unsigned long nitems, bytes_after;
6648 unsigned char* prop_data;
6649
6650 i32 status = XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, WM_STATE, 0, 2, False,
6651 AnyPropertyType, &actual_type, &actual_format,
6652 &nitems, &bytes_after, &prop_data);
6653
6654 if (status == Success && nitems >= 1 && prop_data == (unsigned char*)IconicState) {
6655 XFree(prop_data);
6656 return RGFW_TRUE;
6657 }
6658
6659 if (prop_data != NULL)
6660 XFree(prop_data);
6661
6662 XWindowAttributes windowAttributes;
6663 XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &windowAttributes);
6664 return windowAttributes.map_state != IsViewable;
6665}
6666
6667RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMaximized)(RGFW_window* win) {
6668 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6669 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE);
6670 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT);
6671 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(_NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ);
6672
6673 Atom actual_type;
6674 i32 actual_format;
6675 unsigned long nitems, bytes_after;
6676 unsigned char* prop_data;
6677
6678 i32 status = XGetWindowProperty(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _NET_WM_STATE, 0, 1024, False,
6679 XA_ATOM, &actual_type, &actual_format,
6680 &nitems, &bytes_after, &prop_data);
6681
6682 if (status != Success) {
6683 if (prop_data != NULL)
6684 XFree(prop_data);
6685
6686 return RGFW_FALSE;
6687 }
6688
6689 u64 i;
6690 for (i = 0; i < nitems; ++i) {
6691 if (prop_data[i] == _NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_VERT ||
6692 prop_data[i] == _NET_WM_STATE_MAXIMIZED_HORZ) {
6693 XFree(prop_data);
6694 return RGFW_TRUE;
6695 }
6696 }
6697
6698 if (prop_data != NULL)
6699 XFree(prop_data);
6700
6701 return RGFW_FALSE;
6702}
6703
6704static float XGetSystemContentDPI(Display* display, i32 screen) {
6705 float dpi = 96.0f;
6706
6707 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
6708 RGFW_UNUSED(screen);
6709 char* rms = XResourceManagerString(display);
6710 XrmDatabase db = NULL;
6711 if (rms) db = XrmGetStringDatabase(rms);
6712
6713 if (rms && db) {
6714 XrmValue value;
6715 char* type = NULL;
6716
6717 if (XrmGetResource(db, "Xft.dpi", "Xft.Dpi", &type, &value) && type && RGFW_STRNCMP(type, "String", 7) == 0)
6718 dpi = (float)RGFW_ATOF(value.addr);
6719 XrmDestroyDatabase(db);
6720 }
6721 #else
6722 dpi = RGFW_ROUND(DisplayWidth(display, screen) / (DisplayWidthMM(display, screen) / 25.4));
6723 #endif
6724
6725 return dpi;
6726}
6727
6728RGFW_monitor RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i32 screen);
6729RGFW_monitor RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i32 screen) {
6730 RGFW_monitor monitor;
6731 RGFW_init();
6732
6733 Display* display = _RGFW->display;
6734
6735 if (screen == -1) screen = DefaultScreen(display);
6736
6737 Screen* scrn = DefaultScreenOfDisplay(display);
6738
6739 monitor.x = 0;
6740 monitor.y = 0;
6741 monitor.mode.w = scrn->width;
6742 monitor.mode.h = scrn->height;
6743 monitor.physW = (float)DisplayWidthMM(display, screen) / 25.4f;
6744 monitor.physH = (float)DisplayHeightMM(display, screen) / 25.4f;
6745
6746 RGFW_splitBPP((u32)DefaultDepth(display, screen), &monitor.mode);
6747
6748 char* name = XDisplayName((const char*)display);
6749 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor.name, name, sizeof(monitor.name) - 1);
6750 monitor.name[sizeof(monitor.name) - 1] = '\0';
6751
6752 float dpi = XGetSystemContentDPI(display, screen);
6753 monitor.pixelRatio = dpi >= 192.0f ? 2 : 1.0f;
6754 monitor.scaleX = (float) (dpi) / 96.0f;
6755 monitor.scaleY = (float) (dpi) / 96.0f;
6756
6757 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
6758 XRRCrtcInfo* ci = NULL;
6759 XRRScreenResources* sr = NULL;
6760
6761 {
6762 XRRScreenConfiguration* conf = XRRGetScreenInfo(display, RootWindow(display, screen));
6763 monitor.mode.refreshRate = (u32)XRRConfigCurrentRate(conf);
6764
6765 sr = XRRGetScreenResourcesCurrent(display, RootWindow(display, screen));
6766 int crtc = screen;
6767
6768 if (sr->ncrtc > crtc) {
6769 ci = XRRGetCrtcInfo(display, sr, sr->crtcs[crtc]);
6770 }
6771
6772 XRRFreeScreenConfigInfo(conf);
6773 }
6774 #endif
6775
6776 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
6777 XRROutputInfo* info = XRRGetOutputInfo (display, sr, sr->outputs[screen]);
6778
6779 if (info == NULL || ci == NULL) {
6780 XRRFreeScreenResources(sr);
6781 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
6782 return monitor;
6783 }
6784
6785
6786 float physW = (float)info->mm_width / 25.4f;
6787 float physH = (float)info->mm_height / 25.4f;
6788
6789 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor.name, info->name, sizeof(monitor.name) - 1);
6790 monitor.name[sizeof(monitor.name) - 1] = '\0';
6791
6792 XRRFreeOutputInfo(info);
6793 info = NULL;
6794
6795 if (physW > 0.0f && physH > 0.0f) {
6796 monitor.physW = physW;
6797 monitor.physH = physH;
6798 }
6799
6800 monitor.x = ci->x;
6801 monitor.y = ci->y;
6802
6803 if (ci->width && ci->height) {
6804 monitor.mode.w = (i32)ci->width;
6805 monitor.mode.h = (i32)ci->height;
6806 }
6807 #endif
6808
6809 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
6810 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(ci);
6811 XRRFreeScreenResources(sr);
6812 #endif
6813
6814 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
6815 return monitor;
6816}
6817
6818RGFW_monitor* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getMonitors)(size_t* len) {
6819 static RGFW_monitor monitors[7];
6820 RGFW_init();
6821
6822 Display* display = _RGFW->display;
6823 i32 max = ScreenCount(display);
6824
6825 i32 i;
6826 for (i = 0; i < max && i < 6; i++)
6827 monitors[i] = RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i);
6828
6829 if (len != NULL) *len = (size_t)((max <= 6) ? (max) : (6));
6830
6831 return monitors;
6832}
6833
6834RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor)(void) {
6835 return RGFW_XCreateMonitor(-1);
6836}
6837
6838RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_monitor_requestMode)(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
6839 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
6840 RGFW_init();
6841 XRRScreenConfiguration *conf = XRRGetScreenInfo(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display));
6842 XRRScreenResources* screenRes = XRRGetScreenResources(_RGFW->display, DefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display));
6843 if (screenRes == NULL) return RGFW_FALSE;
6844
6845 int i;
6846 for (i = 0; i < screenRes->ncrtc; i++) {
6847 XRRCrtcInfo* crtcInfo = XRRGetCrtcInfo(_RGFW->display, screenRes, screenRes->crtcs[i]);
6848 if (!crtcInfo) continue;
6849
6850 if (mon.x == crtcInfo->x && mon.y == crtcInfo->y && (u32)mon.mode.w == crtcInfo->width && (u32)mon.mode.h == crtcInfo->height) {
6851 RRMode rmode = None;
6852 int index;
6853 for (index = 0; index < screenRes->nmode; index++) {
6854 RGFW_monitorMode foundMode;
6855 foundMode.w = (i32)screenRes->modes[index].width;
6856 foundMode.h = (i32)screenRes->modes[index].height;
6857 foundMode.refreshRate = (u32)XRRConfigCurrentRate(conf);
6858 RGFW_splitBPP((u32)DefaultDepth(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)), &foundMode);
6859
6860 if (RGFW_monitorModeCompare(mode, foundMode, request)) {
6861 rmode = screenRes->modes[index].id;
6862
6863 RROutput output = screenRes->outputs[i];
6864 XRROutputInfo* info = XRRGetOutputInfo(_RGFW->display, screenRes, output);
6865 if (info) {
6866 XRRSetCrtcConfig(_RGFW->display, screenRes, screenRes->crtcs[i],
6867 CurrentTime, 0, 0, rmode, RR_Rotate_0, &output, 1);
6868 XRRFreeOutputInfo(info);
6869 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(crtcInfo);
6870 XRRFreeScreenResources(screenRes);
6871 return RGFW_TRUE;
6872 }
6873 }
6874 }
6875
6876 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(crtcInfo);
6877 XRRFreeScreenResources(screenRes);
6878 return RGFW_FALSE;
6879 }
6880
6881 XRRFreeCrtcInfo(crtcInfo);
6882 }
6883
6884 XRRFreeScreenResources(screenRes);
6885 XRRFreeScreenConfigInfo(conf);
6886#endif
6887 return RGFW_FALSE;
6888}
6889
6890RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_getMonitor) (RGFW_window* win) {
6891 RGFW_monitor mon;
6892 RGFW_MEMSET(&mon, 0, sizeof(mon));
6893
6894 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
6895
6896 XWindowAttributes attrs;
6897 if (!XGetWindowAttributes(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, &attrs)) {
6898 return mon;
6899 }
6900
6901 i32 i;
6902 for (i = 0; i < ScreenCount(_RGFW->display) && i < 6; i++) {
6903 Screen* screen = ScreenOfDisplay(_RGFW->display, i);
6904 if (attrs.x >= 0 && attrs.x < XWidthOfScreen(screen) &&
6905 attrs.y >= 0 && attrs.y < XHeightOfScreen(screen))
6906 return RGFW_XCreateMonitor(i);
6907 }
6908 return mon;
6909
6910}
6911
6912#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
6913RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* context, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
6914 /* for checking extensions later */
6915 const char sRGBARBstr[] = "GLX_ARB_framebuffer_sRGB";
6916 const char sRGBEXTstr[] = "GLX_EXT_framebuffer_sRGB";
6917 const char noErorrStr[] = "GLX_ARB_create_context_no_error";
6918 const char flushStr[] = "GLX_ARB_context_flush_control";
6919 const char robustStr[] = "GLX_ARB_create_context_robustness";
6920
6921 /* basic RGFW int */
6922 win->src.ctx.native = context;
6923 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
6924 /* This is required so that way the user can create their own OpenGL context after RGFW_createWindow is used */
6925 if (win->src.window) RGFW_window_closePlatform(win);
6926
6927 RGFW_bool transparent = (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent);
6928
6929 /* start by creating a GLX config / X11 Viusal */
6930 XVisualInfo visual;
6931 GLXFBConfig bestFbc;
6932
6933 i32 visual_attribs[40];
6934 RGFW_attribStack stack;
6935 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, visual_attribs, 40);
6936 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_X_VISUAL_TYPE, GLX_TRUE_COLOR);
6937 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_X_RENDERABLE, 1);
6938 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_RENDER_TYPE, GLX_RGBA_BIT);
6939 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_DRAWABLE_TYPE, GLX_WINDOW_BIT);
6940 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
6941 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ALPHA_SIZE, hints->alpha);
6942 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_DEPTH_SIZE, hints->depth);
6943 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_STENCIL_SIZE, hints->stencil);
6944 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_STEREO, hints->stereo);
6945 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_AUX_BUFFERS, hints->auxBuffers);
6946 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_RED_SIZE, hints->red);
6947 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_GREEN_SIZE, hints->green);
6948 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_BLUE_SIZE, hints->blue);
6949 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_RED_SIZE, hints->accumRed);
6950 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_GREEN_SIZE, hints->accumGreen);
6951 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_BLUE_SIZE, hints->accumBlue);
6952 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_ACCUM_ALPHA_SIZE, hints->accumAlpha);
6953
6954 if (hints->sRGB) {
6955 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(sRGBARBstr, sizeof(sRGBARBstr)))
6956 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_ARB, hints->sRGB);
6957 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(sRGBEXTstr, sizeof(sRGBEXTstr)))
6958 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_EXT, hints->sRGB);
6959 }
6960
6961 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
6962
6963 /* find the configs */
6964 i32 fbcount;
6965 GLXFBConfig* fbc = glXChooseFBConfig(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display), visual_attribs, &fbcount);
6966
6967 i32 best_fbc = -1;
6968 i32 best_depth = 0;
6969 i32 best_samples = 0;
6970
6971 if (fbcount == 0) {
6972 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to find any valid GLX visual configs.");
6973 return 0;
6974 }
6975
6976 /* search through all found configs to find the best match */
6977 i32 i;
6978 for (i = 0; i < fbcount; i++) {
6979 XVisualInfo* vi = glXGetVisualFromFBConfig(_RGFW->display, fbc[i]);
6980 if (vi == NULL)
6981 continue;
6982
6983 i32 samp_buf, samples;
6984 glXGetFBConfigAttrib(_RGFW->display, fbc[i], GLX_SAMPLE_BUFFERS, &samp_buf);
6985 glXGetFBConfigAttrib(_RGFW->display, fbc[i], GLX_SAMPLES, &samples);
6986
6987 if (best_fbc == -1) best_fbc = i;
6988 if ((!(transparent) || vi->depth == 32) && best_depth == 0) {
6989 best_fbc = i;
6990 best_depth = vi->depth;
6991 }
6992 if ((!(transparent) || vi->depth == 32) && samples <= hints->samples && samples > best_samples) {
6993 best_fbc = i;
6994 best_depth = vi->depth;
6995 best_samples = samples;
6996 }
6997 XFree(vi);
6998 }
6999
7000 if (best_fbc == -1) {
7001 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to get a valid GLX visual.");
7002 return 0;
7003 }
7004
7005 /* we found a config */
7006 bestFbc = fbc[best_fbc];
7007 XVisualInfo* vi = glXGetVisualFromFBConfig(_RGFW->display, bestFbc);
7008 if (vi->depth != 32 && transparent)
7009 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Failed to to find a matching visual with a 32-bit depth.");
7010
7011 if (best_samples < hints->samples)
7012 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Failed to load a matching sample count.");
7013
7014 XFree(fbc);
7015 visual = *vi;
7016 XFree(vi);
7017
7018 /* use the visual to create a new window */
7019 RGFW_XCreateWindow(visual, "", win->internal.flags, win);
7020
7021 /* create the actual OpenGL context */
7022 i32 context_attribs[40];
7023 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, context_attribs, 40);
7024
7025 i32 mask = 0;
7026 switch (hints->profile) {
7027 case RGFW_glES: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT; break;
7028 case RGFW_glCompatibility: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
7029 case RGFW_glCore: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
7030 default: mask |= GLX_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
7031 }
7032
7033 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB, mask);
7034
7035 if (hints->minor || hints->major) {
7036 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->major);
7037 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->minor);
7038 }
7039
7040
7041 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(flushStr, sizeof(flushStr))) {
7042 if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseFlush) {
7043 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_ARB);
7044 } else if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseNone) {
7045 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB, GLX_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE_ARB);
7046 }
7047 }
7048
7049 i32 flags = 0;
7050 if (hints->debug) flags |= GLX_CONTEXT_DEBUG_BIT_ARB;
7051 if (hints->robustness && RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(robustStr, sizeof(robustStr))) flags |= GLX_CONTEXT_ROBUST_ACCESS_BIT_ARB;
7052 if (flags) {
7053 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB, flags);
7054 }
7055
7056 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(noErorrStr, sizeof(noErorrStr))) {
7057 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, GLX_CONTEXT_OPENGL_NO_ERROR_ARB, hints->noError);
7058 }
7059
7060 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
7061
7062 /* create the context */
7063 glXCreateContextAttribsARBProc glXCreateContextAttribsARB = 0;
7064 char str[] = "glXCreateContextAttribsARB";
7065 glXCreateContextAttribsARB = (glXCreateContextAttribsARBProc)glXGetProcAddressARB((u8*) str);
7066
7067 GLXContext ctx = NULL;
7068 if (hints->share) {
7069 ctx = hints->share->ctx;
7070 }
7071
7072 if (glXCreateContextAttribsARB == NULL) {
7073 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load proc address 'glXCreateContextAttribsARB', loading a generic OpenGL context.");
7074 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = glXCreateContext(_RGFW->display, &visual, ctx, True);
7075 } else {
7076 _RGFW->x11Error = NULL;
7077 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = glXCreateContextAttribsARB(_RGFW->display, bestFbc, ctx, True, context_attribs);
7078 if (_RGFW->x11Error || win->src.ctx.native->ctx == NULL) {
7079 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to create an OpenGL context with AttribsARB, loading a generic OpenGL context.");
7080 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = glXCreateContext(_RGFW->display, &visual, ctx, True);
7081 }
7082 }
7083
7084 #ifndef RGFW_NO_GLXWINDOW
7085 win->src.ctx.native->window = glXCreateWindow(_RGFW->display, bestFbc, win->src.window, NULL);
7086 #else
7087 win->src.ctx.native->window = win->src.window;
7088 #endif
7089
7090 glXMakeCurrent(_RGFW->display, (Drawable)win->src.ctx.native->window, (GLXContext)win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
7091 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
7092
7093 return RGFW_TRUE;
7094}
7095
7096void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
7097 #ifndef RGFW_NO_GLXWINDOW
7098 if (win->src.ctx.native->window != win->src.window) {
7099 glXDestroyWindow(_RGFW->display, win->src.ctx.native->window);
7100 }
7101 #endif
7102
7103 glXDestroyContext(_RGFW->display, ctx->ctx);
7104 win->src.ctx.native = NULL;
7105 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
7106}
7107
7108RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL)(const char * extension, size_t len) {
7109 RGFW_init();
7110 const char* extensions = glXQueryExtensionsString(_RGFW->display, XDefaultScreen(_RGFW->display));
7111 return (extensions != NULL) && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len);
7112}
7113
7114RGFW_proc RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL)(const char* procname) { return glXGetProcAddress((u8*) procname); }
7115
7116void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
7117 if (win == NULL)
7118 glXMakeCurrent(NULL, (Drawable)NULL, (GLXContext) NULL);
7119 else
7120 glXMakeCurrent(_RGFW->display, (Drawable)win->src.ctx.native->window, (GLXContext) win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
7121 return;
7122}
7123void* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL) (void) { return glXGetCurrentContext(); }
7124void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native); glXSwapBuffers(_RGFW->display, win->src.ctx.native->window); }
7125
7126void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
7127 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
7128 /* cached pfn to avoid calling glXGetProcAddress more than once */
7129 static PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC pfn = NULL;
7130 static int (*pfn2)(int) = NULL;
7131
7132 if (pfn == NULL) {
7133 u8 str[] = "glXSwapIntervalEXT";
7134 pfn = (PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)glXGetProcAddress(str);
7135 if (pfn == NULL) {
7136 pfn = (PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)1;
7137 const char* array[] = {"GLX_MESA_swap_control", "GLX_SGI_swap_control"};
7138
7139 size_t i;
7140 for (i = 0; i < sizeof(array) / sizeof(char*) && pfn2 == NULL; i++) {
7141 pfn2 = (int(*)(int))glXGetProcAddress((u8*)array[i]);
7142 }
7143
7144 if (pfn2 != NULL) {
7145 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load swap interval function, fallingback to the native swapinterval function");
7146 } else {
7147 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load swap interval function");
7148 }
7149 }
7150 }
7151
7152 if (pfn != (PFNGLXSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)1) {
7153 pfn(_RGFW->display, win->src.ctx.native->window, swapInterval);
7154 }
7155 else if (pfn2 != NULL) {
7156 pfn2(swapInterval);
7157 }
7158}
7159#endif /* RGFW_OPENGL */
7160
7161i32 RGFW_initPlatform_X11(void) {
7162 #ifdef RGFW_USE_XDL
7163 XDL_init();
7164 #endif
7165
7166 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR) && !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR_PRELOAD)
7167 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
7168 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle, "libXcursor-1.so");
7169 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
7170 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle, "libXcursor.so");
7171 #else
7172 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle, "libXcursor.so.1");
7173 #endif
7174 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Cursorhandle, XcursorImageCreate);
7175 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Cursorhandle, XcursorImageDestroy);
7176 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Cursorhandle, XcursorImageLoadCursor);
7177 #endif
7178
7179 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_XI_PRELOAD)
7180 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
7181 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle, "libXi-6.so");
7182 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
7183 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle, "libXi.so");
7184 #else
7185 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle, "libXi.so.6");
7186 #endif
7187 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11Xihandle, XISelectEvents);
7188 #endif
7189
7190 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_EXT_PRELOAD)
7191 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
7192 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle, "libXext-6.so");
7193 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__) || defined(__NetBSD__)
7194 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle, "libXext.so");
7195 #else
7196 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle, "libXext.so.6");
7197 #endif
7198 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XSyncCreateCounter);
7199 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XSyncIntToValue);
7200 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XSyncSetCounter);
7201 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XShapeCombineRegion);
7202 RGFW_PROC_DEF(X11XEXThandle, XShapeCombineMask);
7203 #endif
7204
7205 XInitThreads();
7206 _RGFW->display = XOpenDisplay(0);
7207 _RGFW->context = XUniqueContext();
7208
7209 XSetWindowAttributes wa;
7210 RGFW_MEMSET(&wa, 0, sizeof(wa));
7211 wa.event_mask = PropertyChangeMask;
7212 _RGFW->helperWindow = XCreateWindow(_RGFW->display, XDefaultRootWindow(_RGFW->display), 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0,
7213 InputOnly, DefaultVisual(_RGFW->display, DefaultScreen(_RGFW->display)), CWEventMask, &wa);
7214
7215 u8 RGFW_blk[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
7216 _RGFW->hiddenMouse = RGFW_loadMouse(RGFW_blk, 1, 1, RGFW_formatRGBA8);
7217 _RGFW->clipboard = NULL;
7218
7219 XkbComponentNamesRec rec;
7220 XkbDescPtr desc = XkbGetMap(_RGFW->display, 0, XkbUseCoreKbd);
7221 XkbDescPtr evdesc;
7222 XSetErrorHandler(RGFW_XErrorHandler);
7223 u8 old[256];
7224
7225 XkbGetNames(_RGFW->display, XkbKeyNamesMask, desc);
7226
7227 RGFW_MEMSET(&rec, 0, sizeof(rec));
7228 char evdev[] = "evdev";
7229 rec.keycodes = evdev;
7230 evdesc = XkbGetKeyboardByName(_RGFW->display, XkbUseCoreKbd, &rec, XkbGBN_KeyNamesMask, XkbGBN_KeyNamesMask, False);
7231 /* memo: RGFW_keycodes[x11 keycode] = rgfw keycode */
7232 if(evdesc != NULL && desc != NULL) {
7233 int i, j;
7234 for(i = 0; i < (int)sizeof(old); i++){
7235 old[i] = _RGFW->keycodes[i];
7236 _RGFW->keycodes[i] = 0;
7237 }
7238 for(i = evdesc->min_key_code; i <= evdesc->max_key_code; i++){
7239 for(j = desc->min_key_code; j <= desc->max_key_code; j++){
7240 if(RGFW_STRNCMP(evdesc->names->keys[i].name, desc->names->keys[j].name, XkbKeyNameLength) == 0){
7241 _RGFW->keycodes[j] = old[i];
7242 break;
7243 }
7244 }
7245 }
7246 XkbFreeKeyboard(desc, 0, True);
7247 XkbFreeKeyboard(evdesc, 0, True);
7248 }
7249 return 0;
7250}
7251
7252void RGFW_deinitPlatform_X11(void) {
7253 #define RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(x) if (x != NULL) dlclose(x); x = NULL;
7254 /* to save the clipboard on the x server after the window is closed */
7255 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD_MANAGER); RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(CLIPBOARD);
7256 RGFW_LOAD_ATOM(SAVE_TARGETS);
7257 if (XGetSelectionOwner(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD) == _RGFW->helperWindow) {
7258 XConvertSelection(_RGFW->display, CLIPBOARD_MANAGER, SAVE_TARGETS, None, _RGFW->helperWindow, CurrentTime);
7259 while (RGFW_XHandleClipboardSelectionHelper());
7260 }
7261 if (_RGFW->clipboard) {
7262 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard);
7263 _RGFW->clipboard = NULL;
7264 }
7265
7266 if (_RGFW->hiddenMouse) {
7267 RGFW_freeMouse(_RGFW->hiddenMouse);
7268 _RGFW->hiddenMouse = NULL;
7269 }
7270
7271 XDestroyWindow(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) _RGFW->helperWindow);
7272 XCloseDisplay(_RGFW->display);
7274 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR_PRELOAD) && !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_CURSOR)
7275 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(X11Cursorhandle);
7276 #endif
7277 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_XI_PRELOAD)
7278 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(X11Xihandle);
7279 #endif
7280
7281 #ifdef RGFW_USE_XDL
7282 XDL_close();
7283 #endif
7284
7285 #if !defined(RGFW_NO_X11_EXT_PRELOAD)
7286 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(X11XEXThandle);
7287 #endif
7288}
7289
7290void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_closePlatform)(RGFW_window* win) {
7291 if (win->internal.holdMouse)
7292 XUngrabPointer(_RGFW->display, CurrentTime);
7293
7294 XFreeGC(_RGFW->display, win->src.gc);
7295 XDeleteContext(_RGFW->display, win->src.window, _RGFW->context);
7296 XDestroyWindow(_RGFW->display, (Drawable) win->src.window);
7297 return;
7298}
7299
7300#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
7301WGPUSurface RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU) (RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
7302 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
7303 WGPUSurfaceSourceXlibWindow fromXlib = {0};
7304 fromXlib.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceXlibWindow;
7305 fromXlib.display = _RGFW->display;
7306 fromXlib.window = window->src.window;
7307
7308 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromXlib.chain;
7309 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
7310}
7311#endif

7313#endif

7316*/

7319
7320 Start of Wayland defayland
7321*/
7322
7323#ifdef RGFW_WAYLAND
7324#ifdef RGFW_X11
7325#undef RGFW_FUNC /* remove previous define */
7326#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func##_Wayland
7327#else
7328#define RGFW_FUNC(func) func
7329#endif
7330
7331/*
7332Wayland TODO: (out of date)
7333- fix RGFW_keyPressed lock state
7334
7335 RGFW_windowMoved, the window was moved (by the user)
7336 RGFW_windowRefresh The window content needs to be refreshed
7337
7338 RGFW_dataDrop a file has been dropped into the window
7339 RGFW_dataDrag
7340
7341- window args:
7342 #define RGFW_windowNoResize the window cannot be resized by the user
7343 #define RGFW_windowAllowDND the window supports drag and drop
7344 #define RGFW_scaleToMonitor scale the window to the screen
7345
7346- other missing functions functions ("TODO wayland") (~30 functions)
7347- fix buffer rendering weird behavior
7348*/
7349#include <errno.h>
7350#include <unistd.h>
7351#include <sys/mman.h>
7352#include <xkbcommon/xkbcommon.h>
7353#include <xkbcommon/xkbcommon-keysyms.h>
7354#include <dirent.h>
7355#include <linux/kd.h>
7356#include <wayland-cursor.h>
7357#include <fcntl.h>
7358
7359struct wl_display* RGFW_getDisplay_Wayland(void) { return _RGFW->wl_display; }
7360struct wl_surface* RGFW_window_getWindow_Wayland(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.surface; }
7361
7362
7363/* wayland global garbage (wayland bad, X11 is fine (ish) (not really)) */
7364#include "xdg-shell.h"
7365#include "xdg-toplevel-icon-v1.h"
7366#include "xdg-decoration-unstable-v1.h"
7367#include "relative-pointer-unstable-v1.h"
7368#include "pointer-constraints-unstable-v1.h"
7369#include "xdg-output-unstable-v1.h"
7370
7371
7372void RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized);
7373
7374static void RGFW_wl_setOpaque(RGFW_window* win) {
7375 struct wl_region* wl_region = wl_compositor_create_region(_RGFW->compositor);
7376
7377 if (!wl_region) return; /* return if no region was created */
7378
7379 wl_region_add(wl_region, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
7380 wl_surface_set_opaque_region(win->src.surface, wl_region);
7381 wl_region_destroy(wl_region);
7382
7383}
7384
7385static void RGFW_wl_xdg_wm_base_ping_handler(void* data, struct xdg_wm_base* wm_base,
7386 u32 serial) {
7387 RGFW_UNUSED(data);
7388 xdg_wm_base_pong(wm_base, serial);
7389}
7390static void RGFW_wl_xdg_surface_configure_handler(void* data, struct xdg_surface* xdg_surface,
7391 u32 serial) {
7392
7393 xdg_surface_ack_configure(xdg_surface, serial);
7394
7395 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
7396
7397 if (win == NULL) {
7398 win = _RGFW->kbOwner;
7399 if (win == NULL)
7400 return;
7401 }
7402
7403 /* useful for libdecor */
7404 if (win->src.activated != win->src.pending_activated) {
7405 win->src.activated = win->src.pending_activated;
7406 }
7407
7408 if (win->src.maximized != win->src.pending_maximized) {
7409 RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(win, win->src.pending_maximized);
7410
7411 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
7412 }
7413
7414
7415 if (win->src.resizing) {
7416
7417 /* Do not create a resize event if the window is maximized */
7418 if (!win->src.maximized && win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag) {
