7419 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = win);
7420 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
7421 }
7422 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h);
7423 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent)) {
7424 RGFW_wl_setOpaque(win);
7425 }
7426 }
7427
7428}
7429
7430static void RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_configure_handler(void* data, struct xdg_toplevel* toplevel,
7431 i32 width, i32 height, struct wl_array* states) {
7432
7433 RGFW_UNUSED(toplevel);
7434 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
7435
7436
7437 win->src.pending_activated = RGFW_FALSE;
7438 win->src.pending_maximized = RGFW_FALSE;
7439 win->src.resizing = RGFW_FALSE;
7440
7441
7442 enum xdg_toplevel_state* state;
7443 wl_array_for_each(state, states) {
7444 switch (*state) {
7445 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_ACTIVATED:
7446 win->src.pending_activated = RGFW_TRUE;
7447 break;
7448 case XDG_TOPLEVEL_STATE_MAXIMIZED:
7449 win->src.pending_maximized = RGFW_TRUE;
7450 break;
7451 default:
7452 break;
7453 }
7454
7455 }
7456 /* if width and height are not zero and are not the same as the window */
7457 /* the window is resizing so update the values */
7458 if ((width && height) && (win->w != width || win->h != height)) {
7459 win->src.resizing = RGFW_TRUE;
7460 win->src.w = win->w = width;
7461 win->src.h = win->h = height;
7462 }
7463}
7464
7465static void RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_close_handler(void* data, struct xdg_toplevel *toplevel) {
7466 RGFW_UNUSED(toplevel);
7467 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
7468
7469 if (!win->internal.shouldClose) {
7470 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_quit; e.common.win = win);
7471 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
7472 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
7473 }
7474}
7475
7476static void RGFW_wl_xdg_decoration_configure_handler(void* data,
7477 struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1* zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1, u32 mode) {
7478 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data; RGFW_UNUSED(zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1);
7479
7480 /* this is expected to run once */
7481 /* set the decoration mode set by earlier request */
7482 if (mode != win->src.decoration_mode) {
7483 win->src.decoration_mode = mode;
7484 }
7485}
7486
7487static void RGFW_wl_shm_format_handler(void* data, struct wl_shm *shm, u32 format) {
7488 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(shm); RGFW_UNUSED(format);
7489}
7490
7491static void RGFW_wl_relative_pointer_motion(void *data, struct zwp_relative_pointer_v1 *zwp_relative_pointer_v1,
7492 u32 time_hi, u32 time_lo, wl_fixed_t dx, wl_fixed_t dy, wl_fixed_t dx_unaccel, wl_fixed_t dy_unaccel) {
7493
7494 RGFW_UNUSED(zwp_relative_pointer_v1); RGFW_UNUSED(time_hi); RGFW_UNUSED(time_lo);
7495 RGFW_UNUSED(dx_unaccel); RGFW_UNUSED(dy_unaccel);
7496
7497 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7498 RGFW_window* win = RGFW->mouseOwner;
7499
7500 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
7501
7502 float vecX = (float)wl_fixed_to_double(dx);
7503 float vecY = (float)wl_fixed_to_double(dy);
7504
7505 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
7506 e.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX;
7507 e.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY;
7508 e.mouse.vecX = vecX;
7509 e.mouse.vecY = vecY;
7510 e.common.win = win);
7511
7512 RGFW->vectorX = vecX;
7513 RGFW->vectorY = vecY;
7514 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, win->internal.lastMouseX, win->internal.lastMouseY, vecX, vecY);
7515}
7516
7517static void RGFW_wl_pointer_locked(void *data, struct zwp_locked_pointer_v1 *zwp_locked_pointer_v1) {
7518 RGFW_UNUSED(zwp_locked_pointer_v1);
7519 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7520 RGFW_window* win = RGFW->mouseOwner;
7521
7522 win->internal.lastMouseX = win->w / 2;
7523 win->internal.lastMouseY = win->h / 2;
7524 zwp_locked_pointer_v1_set_cursor_position_hint(win->src.locked_pointer, wl_fixed_from_int((win->w / 2)), wl_fixed_from_int((win->h / 2)));
7525 wl_pointer_set_cursor(RGFW->wl_pointer, RGFW->mouse_enter_serial, NULL, 0, 0); /* draw no cursor */
7526}
7527
7528static void RGFW_wl_pointer_enter(void* data, struct wl_pointer* pointer, u32 serial,
7529 struct wl_surface *surface, wl_fixed_t surface_x, wl_fixed_t surface_y) {
7530 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7531 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
7532
7533 /* save when the pointer is locked or using default cursor */
7534 RGFW->mouse_enter_serial = serial;
7535 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
7536 RGFW->windowState.win = win;
7537 RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
7538
7539 RGFW->mouseOwner = win;
7540
7541 /* set the cursor */
7542 if (win->src.using_custom_cursor) {
7543 wl_pointer_set_cursor(pointer, serial, win->src.custom_cursor_surface, 0, 0);
7544 }
7545 else {
7546 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
7547 }
7548
7549 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseEnterFlag)) return;
7550
7551 i32 x = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(surface_x);
7552 i32 y = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(surface_y);
7553
7554 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
7555 e.mouse.x = x;
7556 e.mouse.y = y;
7557 e.common.win = win);
7558
7559 win->internal.lastMouseX = x;
7560 win->internal.lastMouseY = y;
7561
7562 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, x, y, RGFW_TRUE);
7563}
7564
7565static void RGFW_wl_pointer_leave(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 serial, struct wl_surface *surface) {
7566 RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
7567 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
7568 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7569 if (RGFW->mouseOwner == win)
7570 RGFW->mouseOwner = NULL;
7571
7572 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
7573 RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
7574 RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
7575
7576 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return;
7577
7578 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
7579 e.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX;
7580 e.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY;
7581 e.common.win = win);
7582
7583 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, win->internal.lastMouseX, win->internal.lastMouseY, RGFW_FALSE);
7584}
7585
7586static void RGFW_wl_pointer_motion(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 time, wl_fixed_t x, wl_fixed_t y) {
7587 RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(time);
7588
7589 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7590 RGFW_ASSERT(RGFW->mouseOwner != NULL);
7591
7592 RGFW_window* win = RGFW->mouseOwner;
7593
7594 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return;
7595
7596 i32 convertedX = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(x);
7597 i32 convertedY = (i32)wl_fixed_to_double(y);
7598 float newVecX = (float)(convertedX - win->internal.lastMouseX);
7599 float newVecY = (float)(convertedY - win->internal.lastMouseY);
7600
7601 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
7602 e.mouse.x = convertedX;
7603 e.mouse.y = convertedY;
7604 e.mouse.vecX = newVecX;
7605 e.mouse.vecY = newVecY;
7606 e.common.win = win);
7607
7608 RGFW->vectorX = newVecX;
7609 RGFW->vectorY = newVecY;
7610 win->internal.lastMouseX = convertedX;
7611 win->internal.lastMouseY = convertedY;
7612 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, convertedX, convertedY, newVecX, newVecY);
7613}
7614
7615static void RGFW_wl_pointer_button(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 serial, u32 time, u32 button, u32 state) {
7616 RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(time); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
7617 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7618
7619 RGFW_ASSERT(RGFW->mouseOwner != NULL);
7620 RGFW_window* win = RGFW->mouseOwner;
7621
7622 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_mouseButtonReleased - RGFW_BOOL(state))))) return;
7623 u32 b = (button - 0x110);
7624
7625 /* flip right and middle button codes */
7626 if (b == 1) b = 2;
7627 else if (b == 2) b = 1;
7628
7629 RGFW->mouseButtons[b].prev = RGFW->mouseButtons[b].current;
7630 RGFW->mouseButtons[b].current = RGFW_BOOL(state);
7631
7632 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased - RGFW_BOOL(state);
7633 e.button.value = (u8)b;
7634 e.common.win = win);
7635 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, (u8)b, RGFW_BOOL(state));
7636}
7637
7638static void RGFW_wl_pointer_axis(void* data, struct wl_pointer *pointer, u32 time, u32 axis, wl_fixed_t value) {
7639 RGFW_UNUSED(pointer); RGFW_UNUSED(time); RGFW_UNUSED(axis);
7640
7641 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7642 RGFW_ASSERT(RGFW->mouseOwner != NULL);
7643 RGFW_window* win = RGFW->mouseOwner;
7644
7645 float scrollX = 0.0;
7646 float scrollY = 0.0;
7647
7648 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_mouseScroll)))) return;
7649
7650 if (axis == WL_POINTER_AXIS_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL)
7651 scrollX = (float)(-wl_fixed_to_double(value) / 10.0);
7652 else if (axis == WL_POINTER_AXIS_VERTICAL_SCROLL)
7653 scrollY = (float)(-wl_fixed_to_double(value) / 10.0);
7654
7655
7656 RGFW->scrollX = (float)scrollX;
7657 RGFW->scrollY = (float)scrollY;
7658 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, scrollX, scrollY);
7659 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
7660 e.scroll.x = scrollX;
7661 e.scroll.y = scrollY;
7662 e.common.win = win);
7663}
7664
7665
7666static void RGFW_doNothing(void) { }
7667
7668static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_keymap(void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 format, i32 fd, u32 size) {
7669 RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(format);
7670 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7671
7672 char *keymap_string = mmap (NULL, size, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
7673 xkb_keymap_unref(RGFW->keymap);
7674 RGFW->keymap = xkb_keymap_new_from_string(RGFW->xkb_context, keymap_string, XKB_KEYMAP_FORMAT_TEXT_V1, XKB_KEYMAP_COMPILE_NO_FLAGS);
7675
7676 munmap(keymap_string, size);
7677 close(fd);
7678 xkb_state_unref(RGFW->xkb_state);
7679 RGFW->xkb_state = xkb_state_new(RGFW->keymap);
7680}
7681
7682static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_enter(void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, struct wl_surface *surface, struct wl_array *keys) {
7683 RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(keys);
7684
7685 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7686 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
7687 RGFW->kbOwner = win;
7688
7689 // this is to prevent race conditions
7690 if (RGFW->data_device != NULL && win->src.data_source != NULL) {
7691 wl_data_device_set_selection(RGFW->data_device, win->src.data_source, serial);
7692 }
7693 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return;
7694
7695 /* is set when RGFW_window_minimize is called; if the minimize button is */
7696 /* pressed this flag is not set since there is no event to listen for */
7697 if (win->src.minimized == RGFW_TRUE) win->src.minimized = RGFW_FALSE;
7698
7699 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
7700 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusIn; e.common.win = win);
7701 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_TRUE);
7702
7703 if ((win->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(win);
7704}
7705
7706static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_leave(void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, struct wl_surface *surface) {
7707 RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial);
7708
7709 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7710 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)wl_surface_get_user_data(surface);
7711 if (RGFW->kbOwner == win)
7712 RGFW->kbOwner = NULL;
7713
7714 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return;
7715
7716 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusOut; e.common.win = win);
7717 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_FALSE);
7718 RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
7719}
7720
7721static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_key(void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, u32 time, u32 key, u32 state) {
7722 RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial); RGFW_UNUSED(time);
7723
7724 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7725 if (RGFW->kbOwner == NULL) return;
7726
7727 RGFW_window *RGFW_key_win = RGFW->kbOwner;
7728 if (!(RGFW_key_win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_keyPressed + state)))) return;
7729
7730 xkb_keysym_t keysym = xkb_state_key_get_one_sym(RGFW->xkb_state, key + 8);
7731
7732 u32 RGFWkey = RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(key + 8);
7733 RGFW->keyboard[RGFWkey].prev = RGFW->keyboard[RGFWkey].current;
7734 RGFW->keyboard[RGFWkey].current = RGFW_BOOL(state);
7735
7736 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = (u8)(RGFW_keyPressed + state);
7737 e.key.value = (u8)RGFWkey;
7738 e.key.sym = (u8)keysym;
7739 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(RGFW_key_win, (u8)RGFWkey);
7740 e.common.win = RGFW_key_win);
7741
7742 RGFW_updateKeyMods(RGFW_key_win, RGFW_BOOL(xkb_keymap_mod_get_index(RGFW->keymap, "Lock")), RGFW_BOOL(xkb_keymap_mod_get_index(RGFW->keymap, "Mod2")), RGFW_BOOL(xkb_keymap_mod_get_index(RGFW->keymap, "ScrollLock")));
7743 RGFW_keyCallback(RGFW_key_win, (u8)RGFWkey, (u8)keysym, RGFW_key_win->internal.mod, RGFW_window_isKeyDown(RGFW_key_win, (u8)RGFWkey), RGFW_BOOL(state));
7744}
7745
7746static void RGFW_wl_keyboard_modifiers(void* data, struct wl_keyboard *keyboard, u32 serial, u32 mods_depressed, u32 mods_latched, u32 mods_locked, u32 group) {
7747 RGFW_UNUSED(keyboard); RGFW_UNUSED(serial); RGFW_UNUSED(time);
7748 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7749 xkb_state_update_mask(RGFW->xkb_state, mods_depressed, mods_latched, mods_locked, 0, 0, group);
7750}
7751
7752static void RGFW_wl_seat_capabilities(void* data, struct wl_seat *seat, u32 capabilities) {
7753 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7754 static struct wl_pointer_listener pointer_listener;
7755 RGFW_MEMSET(&pointer_listener, 0, sizeof(pointer_listener));
7756 pointer_listener.enter = &RGFW_wl_pointer_enter;
7757 pointer_listener.leave = &RGFW_wl_pointer_leave;
7758 pointer_listener.motion = &RGFW_wl_pointer_motion;
7759 pointer_listener.button = &RGFW_wl_pointer_button;
7760 pointer_listener.axis = &RGFW_wl_pointer_axis;
7761
7762 static struct wl_keyboard_listener keyboard_listener;
7763 RGFW_MEMSET(&keyboard_listener, 0, sizeof(keyboard_listener));
7764 keyboard_listener.keymap = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_keymap;
7765 keyboard_listener.enter = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_enter;
7766 keyboard_listener.leave = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_leave;
7767 keyboard_listener.key = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_key;
7768 keyboard_listener.modifiers = &RGFW_wl_keyboard_modifiers;
7769
7770 if ((capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_POINTER) && !RGFW->wl_pointer) {
7771 RGFW->wl_pointer = wl_seat_get_pointer(seat);
7772 wl_pointer_add_listener(RGFW->wl_pointer, &pointer_listener, RGFW);
7773 }
7774 if ((capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_KEYBOARD) && !RGFW->wl_keyboard) {
7775 RGFW->wl_keyboard = wl_seat_get_keyboard(seat);
7776 wl_keyboard_add_listener(RGFW->wl_keyboard, &keyboard_listener, RGFW);
7777 }
7778
7779 if (!(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_POINTER) && RGFW->wl_pointer) {
7780 wl_pointer_destroy(RGFW->wl_pointer);
7781 }
7782 if (!(capabilities & WL_SEAT_CAPABILITY_KEYBOARD) && RGFW->wl_keyboard) {
7783 wl_keyboard_destroy(RGFW->wl_keyboard);
7784 }
7785}
7786
7787static void RGFW_wl_output_set_geometry(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output,
7788 int32_t x, int32_t y, int32_t physical_width, int32_t physical_height,
7789 int32_t subpixel, const char *make, const char *model, int32_t transform) {
7790
7791 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
7792 monitor->x = x;
7793 monitor->y = y;
7794
7795 monitor->physW = (float)physical_width / 25.4f;
7796 monitor->physH = (float)physical_height / 25.4f;
7797
7798 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
7799 RGFW_UNUSED(subpixel);
7800 RGFW_UNUSED(make);
7801 RGFW_UNUSED(model);
7802 RGFW_UNUSED(transform);
7803}
7804
7805static void RGFW_wl_output_set_mode(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output, uint32_t flags,
7806 int32_t width, int32_t height, int32_t refresh) {
7807
7808 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
7809
7810 monitor->mode.w = width;
7811 monitor->mode.h = height;
7812 monitor->mode.refreshRate = (u32)RGFW_ROUND( ((float)refresh / 1000) );
7813 RGFW_UNUSED(width);
7814 RGFW_UNUSED(height);
7815 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
7816 RGFW_UNUSED(flags);
7817}
7818
7819static void RGFW_wl_output_set_scale(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output, int32_t factor) {
7820 /* this is for pixelRatio */
7821 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
7822
7823 monitor->pixelRatio = (float)factor;
7824 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
7825}
7826
7827static void RGFW_wl_output_set_name(void *data, struct wl_output *wl_output, const char *name) {
7828 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
7829
7830 RGFW_STRNCPY(monitor->name, name, sizeof(monitor->name) - 1);
7831 monitor->name[sizeof(monitor->name) - 1] = '\0';
7832
7833 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_output);
7834
7835}
7836
7837static void RGFW_xdg_output_logical_pos(void *data, struct zxdg_output_v1 *zxdg_output_v1, int32_t x, int32_t y) {
7838 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
7839 monitor->x = x;
7840 monitor->y = y;
7841 RGFW_UNUSED(zxdg_output_v1);
7842}
7843
7844static void RGFW_xdg_output_logical_size(void *data, struct zxdg_output_v1 *zxdg_output_v1, int32_t width, int32_t height) {
7845 RGFW_monitor* monitor = &((RGFW_monitorNode*)data)->mon;
7846
7847 float mon_float_width = (float) monitor->mode.w;
7848 float mon_float_height = (float) monitor->mode.h;
7849
7850 monitor->scaleX = (mon_float_width / (float) width);
7851 monitor->scaleY = (mon_float_height / (float) height);
7852
7853 /* under xwayland the monitor changes w & h when compositor scales it */
7854 monitor->mode.w = width;
7855 monitor->mode.h = height;
7856 RGFW_UNUSED(zxdg_output_v1);
7857}
7858
7859static void RGFW_wl_create_outputs(struct wl_registry *const registry, uint32_t id) {
7860 struct wl_output *output = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_output_interface, wl_display_get_version(_RGFW->wl_display) < 4 ? 3 : 4);
7861 RGFW_monitorNode* node;
7862 RGFW_monitor mon;
7863
7864 if (!output) return;
7865
7866 char RGFW_mon_default_name[10];
7867
7868 RGFW_SNPRINTF(RGFW_mon_default_name, sizeof(RGFW_mon_default_name), "monitor-%li", _RGFW->monitors.count);
7869 RGFW_STRNCPY(mon.name, RGFW_mon_default_name, sizeof(mon.name) - 1);
7870 mon.name[sizeof(mon.name) - 1] = '\0';
7871
7872 /* set in case compositor does not send one */
7873 /* or no xdg_output support */
7874 mon.scaleY = mon.scaleX = mon.pixelRatio = 1.0f;
7875
7876 node = RGFW_monitors_add(mon);
7877 if (node == NULL) return;
7878
7879 node->id = id;
7880 node->output = output;
7881
7882 static const struct wl_output_listener wl_output_listener = {
7883 .geometry = RGFW_wl_output_set_geometry,
7884 .mode = RGFW_wl_output_set_mode,
7885 .done = (void (*)(void *,struct wl_output *))&RGFW_doNothing,
7886 .scale = RGFW_wl_output_set_scale,
7887 .name = RGFW_wl_output_set_name,
7888 .description = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_output *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing
7889 };
7890
7891 /* the wl_output will have a reference to the node */
7892 wl_output_set_user_data(output, node);
7893
7894 /* pass the monitor so we can access it in the callback functions */
7895 wl_output_add_listener(output, &wl_output_listener, node);
7896
7897 if (!_RGFW->xdg_output_manager) return; /* compositor does not support it */
7898
7899 static const struct zxdg_output_v1_listener xdg_output_listener = {
7900 .name = (void (*)(void *,struct zxdg_output_v1 *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing,
7901 .done = (void (*)(void *,struct zxdg_output_v1 *))&RGFW_doNothing,
7902 .description = (void (*)(void *,struct zxdg_output_v1 *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing,
7903 .logical_position = RGFW_xdg_output_logical_pos,
7904 .logical_size = RGFW_xdg_output_logical_size
7905 };
7906
7907 node->xdg_output = zxdg_output_manager_v1_get_xdg_output(_RGFW->xdg_output_manager, node->output);
7908 zxdg_output_v1_add_listener(node->xdg_output, &xdg_output_listener, node);
7909}
7910
7911static void RGFW_wl_surface_enter(void *data, struct wl_surface *wl_surface, struct wl_output *output) {
7912 RGFW_UNUSED(wl_surface);
7913
7914 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)data;
7915 RGFW_monitorNode* node = wl_output_get_user_data(output);
7916 win->src.active_monitor = node->mon;
7917
7918 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
7919 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor)
7920 RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
7921 #endif
7922}
7923
7924static void RGFW_wl_data_source_send(void *data, struct wl_data_source *wl_data_source, const char *mime_type, int32_t fd) {
7925 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(wl_data_source);
7926
7927 // a client can accept our clipboard
7928 if (RGFW_STRNCMP(mime_type, "text/plain;charset=utf-8", 25) == 0) {
7929 // do not write \0
7930 write(fd, _RGFW->clipboard, _RGFW->clipboard_len - 1);
7931 }
7932
7933 close(fd);
7934}
7935
7936static void RGFW_wl_data_source_cancelled(void *data, struct wl_data_source *wl_data_source) {
7937
7938 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7939
7940 if (RGFW->kbOwner->src.data_source == wl_data_source) {
7941 RGFW->kbOwner->src.data_source = NULL;
7942 }
7943
7944 wl_data_source_destroy(wl_data_source);
7945
7946}
7947
7948static void RGFW_wl_data_device_data_offer(void *data, struct wl_data_device *wl_data_device, struct wl_data_offer *wl_data_offer) {
7949
7950 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(wl_data_device);
7951 static const struct wl_data_offer_listener wl_data_offer_listener = {
7952 .offer = (void (*)(void *data, struct wl_data_offer *wl_data_offer, const char *))RGFW_doNothing,
7953 .source_actions = (void (*)(void *data, struct wl_data_offer *wl_data_offer, uint32_t dnd_action))RGFW_doNothing,
7954 .action = (void (*)(void *data, struct wl_data_offer *wl_data_offer, uint32_t dnd_action))RGFW_doNothing
7955 };
7956 wl_data_offer_add_listener(wl_data_offer, &wl_data_offer_listener, NULL);
7957}
7958
7959static void RGFW_wl_data_device_selection(void *data, struct wl_data_device *wl_data_device, struct wl_data_offer *wl_data_offer) {
7960 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(wl_data_device);
7961 /* Clipboard is empty */
7962 if (wl_data_offer == NULL) {
7963 return;
7964 }
7965
7966 int pfds[2];
7967 pipe(pfds);
7968
7969 wl_data_offer_receive(wl_data_offer, "text/plain;charset=utf-8", pfds[1]);
7970 close(pfds[1]);
7971
7972 wl_display_roundtrip(_RGFW->wl_display);
7973
7974 char buf[1024];
7975
7976 ssize_t n = read(pfds[0], buf, sizeof(buf));
7977
7978 _RGFW->clipboard = (char*)RGFW_ALLOC((size_t)n);
7979 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->clipboard != NULL);
7980 RGFW_STRNCPY(_RGFW->clipboard, buf, (size_t)n);
7981
7982 _RGFW->clipboard_len = (size_t)n + 1;
7983
7984 close(pfds[0]);
7985
7986 wl_data_offer_destroy(wl_data_offer);
7987
7988}
7989
7990static void RGFW_wl_global_registry_handler(void* data, struct wl_registry *registry, u32 id, const char *interface, u32 version) {
7991
7992 static struct wl_seat_listener seat_listener = {&RGFW_wl_seat_capabilities, (void (*)(void *, struct wl_seat *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing};
7993 static const struct wl_shm_listener shm_listener = { .format = RGFW_wl_shm_format_handler };
7994
7995 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
7996 RGFW_UNUSED(version);
7997
7998 if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, "wl_compositor", 16) == 0) {
7999 RGFW->compositor = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_compositor_interface, 4);
8000 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, "xdg_wm_base", 12) == 0) {
8001 RGFW->xdg_wm_base = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &xdg_wm_base_interface, 1);
8002 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
8003 RGFW->decoration_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_interface, 1);
8004 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, zwp_pointer_constraints_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
8005 RGFW->constraint_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &zwp_pointer_constraints_v1_interface, 1);
8006 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, zwp_relative_pointer_manager_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
8007 RGFW->relative_pointer_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &zwp_relative_pointer_manager_v1_interface, 1);
8008 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, xdg_toplevel_icon_manager_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
8009 RGFW->icon_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &xdg_toplevel_icon_manager_v1_interface, 1);
8010 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, "wl_shm", 7) == 0) {
8011 RGFW->shm = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_shm_interface, 1);
8012 wl_shm_add_listener(RGFW->shm, &shm_listener, RGFW);
8013 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface,"wl_seat", 8) == 0) {
8014 RGFW->seat = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_seat_interface, 1);
8015 wl_seat_add_listener(RGFW->seat, &seat_listener, RGFW);
8016 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface, zxdg_output_manager_v1_interface.name, 255) == 0) {
8017 RGFW->xdg_output_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &zxdg_output_manager_v1_interface, 1);
8018 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface,"wl_output", 10) == 0) {
8019 RGFW_wl_create_outputs(registry, id);
8020 } else if (RGFW_STRNCMP(interface,"wl_data_device_manager", 23) == 0) {
8021 RGFW->data_device_manager = wl_registry_bind(registry, id, &wl_data_device_manager_interface, 1);
8022 }
8023}
8024
8025static void RGFW_wl_global_registry_remove(void* data, struct wl_registry *registry, u32 id) {
8026 RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(registry);
8027 RGFW_info* RGFW = (RGFW_info*)data;
8028 RGFW_monitorNode* prev = RGFW->monitors.list.head;
8029 RGFW_monitorNode* node = NULL;
8030 if (prev == NULL) return;
8031
8032 if (prev->id != id) {
8033 /* find the first node that has a matching id */
8034 while(prev->next != NULL && prev->next->id != id) {
8035 prev = prev->next;
8036 }
8037
8038 if (prev->next == NULL) return;
8039 node = prev->next;
8040 } else {
8041 node = prev;
8042 }
8043
8044 if (node->output) {
8045 wl_output_destroy(node->output);
8046 }
8047
8048 if (node->xdg_output) {
8049 zxdg_output_v1_destroy(node->xdg_output);
8050 }
8051
8052 RGFW_monitors_remove(node, prev);
8053}
8054
8055static void RGFW_wl_randname(char *buf) {
8056 struct timespec ts;
8057 clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &ts);
8058 long r = ts.tv_nsec;
8059
8060 int i;
8061 for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
8062 buf[i] = (char)('A'+(r&15)+(r&16)*2);
8063 r >>= 5;
8064 }
8065}
8066
8067static size_t RGFW_wl_stringlen(char* name) {
8068 size_t i = 0;
8069 while (name[i]) { i++; }
8070 return i;
8071}
8072
8073static int RGFW_wl_anonymous_shm_open(void) {
8074 char name[] = "/RGFW-wayland-XXXXXX";
8075 int retries = 100;
8076
8077 do {
8078 RGFW_wl_randname(name + RGFW_wl_stringlen(name) - 6);
8079
8080 --retries;
8081 /* shm_open guarantees that O_CLOEXEC is set */
8082 int fd = shm_open(name, O_RDWR | O_CREAT | O_EXCL, 0600);
8083 if (fd >= 0) {
8084 shm_unlink(name);
8085 return fd;
8086 }
8087 } while (retries > 0 && errno == EEXIST);
8088
8089 return -1;
8090}
8091
8092static int RGFW_wl_create_shm_file(off_t size) {
8093 int fd = RGFW_wl_anonymous_shm_open();
8094 if (fd < 0) {
8095 return fd;
8096 }
8097
8098 if (ftruncate(fd, size) < 0) {
8099 close(fd);
8100 return -1;
8101 }
8102
8103 return fd;
8104}
8105
8106i32 RGFW_initPlatform_Wayland(void) {
8107 _RGFW->wl_display = wl_display_connect(NULL);
8108 if (_RGFW->wl_display == NULL) {
8109 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errWayland, "Failed to load Wayland display");
8110 return -1;
8111 }
8112
8113 _RGFW->compositor = NULL;
8114 static const struct wl_registry_listener registry_listener = {
8115 .global = RGFW_wl_global_registry_handler,
8116 .global_remove = RGFW_wl_global_registry_remove,
8117 };
8118
8119 _RGFW->registry = wl_display_get_registry(_RGFW->wl_display);
8120 wl_registry_add_listener(_RGFW->registry, &registry_listener, _RGFW);
8121
8122 wl_display_roundtrip(_RGFW->wl_display); /* bind to globals */
8123
8124 if (_RGFW->compositor == NULL) {
8125 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errWayland, "Can't find compositor.");
8126 return 1;
8127 }
8128
8129 if (_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme == NULL) {
8130 _RGFW->wl_cursor_theme = wl_cursor_theme_load(NULL, 24, _RGFW->shm);
8131 _RGFW->cursor_surface = wl_compositor_create_surface(_RGFW->compositor);
8132 }
8133
8134 u8 RGFW_blk[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
8135 _RGFW->hiddenMouse = RGFW_loadMouse(RGFW_blk, 1, 1, RGFW_formatRGBA8);
8136
8137 static const struct xdg_wm_base_listener xdg_wm_base_listener = {
8138 .ping = RGFW_wl_xdg_wm_base_ping_handler,
8139 };
8140
8141 xdg_wm_base_add_listener(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base, &xdg_wm_base_listener, NULL);
8142
8143 _RGFW->xkb_context = xkb_context_new(XKB_CONTEXT_NO_FLAGS);
8144
8145 static const struct wl_data_device_listener wl_data_device_listener = {
8146 .data_offer = RGFW_wl_data_device_data_offer,
8147 .enter = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_device *, u32, struct wl_surface*, wl_fixed_t, wl_fixed_t, struct wl_data_offer *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8148 .leave = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_device *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8149 .motion = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_device *, u32, wl_fixed_t, wl_fixed_t))&RGFW_doNothing,
8150 .drop = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_device *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8151 .selection = RGFW_wl_data_device_selection
8152 };
8153
8154 if (_RGFW->seat && _RGFW->data_device_manager) {
8155 _RGFW->data_device = wl_data_device_manager_get_data_device(_RGFW->data_device_manager, _RGFW->seat);
8156 wl_data_device_add_listener(_RGFW->data_device, &wl_data_device_listener, NULL);
8157 }
8158
8159 return 0;
8160}
8161
8162void RGFW_deinitPlatform_Wayland(void) {
8163 if (_RGFW->clipboard) {
8164 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard);
8165 _RGFW->clipboard = NULL;
8166 }
8167
8168 if (_RGFW->wl_pointer) {
8169 wl_pointer_destroy(_RGFW->wl_pointer);
8170 }
8171 if (_RGFW->wl_keyboard) {
8172 wl_keyboard_destroy(_RGFW->wl_keyboard);
8173 }
8174
8175 wl_registry_destroy(_RGFW->registry);
8176 if (_RGFW->decoration_manager != NULL)
8177 zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_destroy(_RGFW->decoration_manager);
8178 if (_RGFW->relative_pointer_manager != NULL) {
8179 zwp_relative_pointer_manager_v1_destroy(_RGFW->relative_pointer_manager);
8180 }
8181
8182 if (_RGFW->relative_pointer) {
8183 zwp_relative_pointer_v1_destroy(_RGFW->relative_pointer);
8184 }
8185
8186 if (_RGFW->constraint_manager != NULL) {
8187 zwp_pointer_constraints_v1_destroy(_RGFW->constraint_manager);
8188 }
8189
8190 if (_RGFW->xdg_output_manager != NULL)
8191 if (_RGFW->icon_manager != NULL) {
8192 xdg_toplevel_icon_manager_v1_destroy(_RGFW->icon_manager);
8193 }
8194
8195 if (_RGFW->xdg_output_manager) {
8196 zxdg_output_manager_v1_destroy(_RGFW->xdg_output_manager);
8197 }
8198
8199 if (_RGFW->data_device_manager) {
8200 wl_data_device_manager_destroy(_RGFW->data_device_manager);
8201 }
8202
8203 if (_RGFW->data_device) {
8204 wl_data_device_destroy(_RGFW->data_device);
8205 }
8206
8207 if (_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme != NULL) {
8208 wl_cursor_theme_destroy(_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme);
8209 }
8210
8211 RGFW_freeMouse(_RGFW->hiddenMouse);
8212
8213 RGFW_monitorNode* node = _RGFW->monitors.list.head;
8214
8215 while (node != NULL) {
8216 if (node->output) {
8217 wl_output_destroy(node->output);
8218 }
8219
8220 if (node->xdg_output) {
8221 zxdg_output_v1_destroy(node->xdg_output);
8222 }
8223
8224 _RGFW->monitors.count -= 1;
8225 node = node->next;
8226
8227 }
8228
8229 wl_surface_destroy(_RGFW->cursor_surface);
8230 wl_shm_destroy(_RGFW->shm);
8231 wl_seat_release(_RGFW->seat);
8232 xdg_wm_base_destroy(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base);
8233 wl_compositor_destroy(_RGFW->compositor);
8234 wl_display_disconnect(_RGFW->wl_display);
8235}
8236
8237RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createSurfacePtr) (u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
8238 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
8239 surface->data = data;
8240 surface->w = w;
8241 surface->h = h;
8242 surface->format = format;
8243 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoBuffer, "Creating a 4 channel buffer");
8244
8245 u32 size = (u32)(surface->w * surface->h * 4);
8246 int fd = RGFW_wl_create_shm_file(size);
8247 if (fd < 0) {
8248 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to create a buffer.");
8249 return RGFW_FALSE;
8250 }
8251
8252 surface->native.buffer = mmap(NULL, size, PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
8253 if (surface->native.buffer == MAP_FAILED) {
8254 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "mmap failed.");
8255 return RGFW_FALSE;
8256 }
8257
8258 struct wl_shm_pool* pool = wl_shm_create_pool(_RGFW->shm, fd, (i32)size);
8259 surface->native.wl_buffer = wl_shm_pool_create_buffer(pool, 0, (i32)surface->w, (i32)surface->h, (i32)surface->w * 4, WL_SHM_FORMAT_ARGB8888);
8260 wl_shm_pool_destroy(pool);
8261
8262 close(fd);
8263
8264 surface->native.format = RGFW_formatBGRA8;
8265 return RGFW_TRUE;
8266}
8267
8268void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_blitSurface) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
8269 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
8270 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->native.buffer, win->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
8271
8272 wl_surface_attach(win->src.surface, surface->native.wl_buffer, 0, 0);
8273 wl_surface_damage(win->src.surface, 0, 0, RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h));
8274 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
8275}
8276
8277void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_surface_freePtr) (RGFW_surface* surface) {
8278 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
8279 wl_buffer_destroy(surface->native.wl_buffer);
8280 munmap(surface->native.buffer, (size_t)(surface->w * surface->h * 4));
8281}
8282
8283void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setBorder) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
8284 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
8285
8286 /* for now just toggle between SSD & CSD depending on the bool */
8287 if (_RGFW->decoration_manager != NULL) {
8288 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_set_mode(win->src.decoration, (border ? ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_SERVER_SIDE : ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_CLIENT_SIDE));
8289 }
8290}
8291
8292void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_releaseCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
8293 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8294 /* compositor has no support or window is not locked do nothing */
8295 if (_RGFW->constraint_manager == NULL || _RGFW->relative_pointer_manager == NULL) return;
8296
8297 if (win->src.locked_pointer != NULL) {
8298 zwp_locked_pointer_v1_destroy(win->src.locked_pointer);
8299 win->src.locked_pointer = NULL;
8300 }
8301 if (_RGFW->relative_pointer != NULL) {
8302 zwp_relative_pointer_v1_destroy(_RGFW->relative_pointer);
8303 _RGFW->relative_pointer = NULL;
8304 }
8305
8306 _RGFW->mouseOwner = win; /* unhold mouse sets this to null; set it back */
8307}
8308
8309void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_captureCursor) (RGFW_window* win) {
8310 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8311 /* compositor has no support or window already is locked do nothing */
8312 if (_RGFW->constraint_manager == NULL || _RGFW->relative_pointer_manager == NULL) return;
8313
8314 if (_RGFW->relative_pointer == NULL) {
8315 _RGFW->relative_pointer = zwp_relative_pointer_manager_v1_get_relative_pointer(_RGFW->relative_pointer_manager, _RGFW->wl_pointer);
8316
8317 static const struct zwp_relative_pointer_v1_listener relative_motion_listener = {
8318 .relative_motion = RGFW_wl_relative_pointer_motion
8319 };
8320
8321 zwp_relative_pointer_v1_add_listener(_RGFW->relative_pointer, &relative_motion_listener, _RGFW);
8322 }
8323
8324 if (win->src.locked_pointer == NULL) {
8325 win->src.locked_pointer = zwp_pointer_constraints_v1_lock_pointer(_RGFW->constraint_manager, win->src.surface, _RGFW->wl_pointer, NULL, ZWP_POINTER_CONSTRAINTS_V1_LIFETIME_PERSISTENT);
8326
8327 static const struct zwp_locked_pointer_v1_listener locked_listener = {
8328 .locked = RGFW_wl_pointer_locked,
8329 .unlocked = (void (*)(void *, struct zwp_locked_pointer_v1 *))RGFW_doNothing
8330 };
8331
8332 zwp_locked_pointer_v1_add_listener(win->src.locked_pointer, &locked_listener, _RGFW);
8333 }
8334}
8335
8336RGFW_window* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_createWindowPlatform) (const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
8337 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningWayland, "RGFW Wayland support is experimental");
8338
8339 static const struct xdg_surface_listener xdg_surface_listener = {
8340 .configure = RGFW_wl_xdg_surface_configure_handler,
8341 };
8342
8343 static const struct wl_surface_listener wl_surface_listener = {
8344 .enter = RGFW_wl_surface_enter,
8345 .leave = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_surface *, struct wl_output *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8346 .preferred_buffer_scale = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_surface *, i32))&RGFW_doNothing,
8347 .preferred_buffer_transform = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_surface *, u32))&RGFW_doNothing
8348 };
8349
8350 win->src.surface = wl_compositor_create_surface(_RGFW->compositor);
8351 wl_surface_add_listener(win->src.surface, &wl_surface_listener, win);
8352
8353 /* create a surface for a custom cursor */
8354 win->src.custom_cursor_surface = wl_compositor_create_surface(_RGFW->compositor);
8355
8356 win->src.xdg_surface = xdg_wm_base_get_xdg_surface(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base, win->src.surface);
8357 xdg_surface_add_listener(win->src.xdg_surface, &xdg_surface_listener, win);
8358
8359 xdg_wm_base_set_user_data(_RGFW->xdg_wm_base, win);
8360
8361 win->src.xdg_toplevel = xdg_surface_get_toplevel(win->src.xdg_surface);
8362
8363 xdg_surface_set_window_geometry(win->src.xdg_surface, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
8364
8365 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent)) { /* no transparency */
8366 RGFW_wl_setOpaque(win);
8367 }
8368
8369 static const struct xdg_toplevel_listener xdg_toplevel_listener = {
8370 .configure = RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_configure_handler,
8371 .close = RGFW_wl_xdg_toplevel_close_handler,
8372 };
8373
8374 xdg_toplevel_add_listener(win->src.xdg_toplevel, &xdg_toplevel_listener, win);
8375
8376 /* compositor supports both SSD & CSD
8377 So choose accordingly
8378 */
8379 if (_RGFW->decoration_manager) {
8380 u32 decoration_mode = ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_SERVER_SIDE;
8381 win->src.decoration = zxdg_decoration_manager_v1_get_toplevel_decoration(
8382 _RGFW->decoration_manager, win->src.xdg_toplevel);
8383
8384 static const struct zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_listener xdg_decoration_listener = {
8385 .configure = RGFW_wl_xdg_decoration_configure_handler
8386 };
8387
8388 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_add_listener(win->src.decoration, &xdg_decoration_listener, win);
8389
8390 /* we want no decorations */
8391 if ((flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder)) {
8392 decoration_mode = ZXDG_TOPLEVEL_DECORATION_V1_MODE_CLIENT_SIDE;
8393 }
8394
8395 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_set_mode(win->src.decoration, decoration_mode);
8396
8397 /* no xdg_decoration support */
8398 } else if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder)) {
8399 /* TODO, some fallback */
8400 #ifdef RGFW_LIBDECOR
8401 static struct libdecor_interface interface = {
8402 .error = NULL,
8403 };
8404
8405 static struct libdecor_frame_interface frameInterface = {0}; /*= {
8406 RGFW_wl_handle_configure,
8407 RGFW_wl_handle_close,
8408 RGFW_wl_handle_commit,
8409 RGFW_wl_handle_dismiss_popup,
8410 };*/
8411
8412 win->src.decorContext = libdecor_new(_RGFW->wl_display, &interface);
8413 if (win->src.decorContext) {
8414 struct libdecor_frame *frame = libdecor_decorate(win->src.decorContext, win->src.surface, &frameInterface, win);
8415 if (!frame) {
8416 libdecor_unref(win->src.decorContext);
8417 win->src.decorContext = NULL;
8418 } else {
8419 libdecor_frame_set_app_id(frame, "my-libdecor-app");
8420 libdecor_frame_set_title(frame, "My Libdecor Window");
8421 }
8422 }
8423 #endif
8424 }
8425
8426 if (_RGFW->icon_manager != NULL) {
8427 /* set the default wayland icon */
8428 xdg_toplevel_icon_manager_v1_set_icon(_RGFW->icon_manager, win->src.xdg_toplevel, NULL);
8429 }
8430
8431 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
8432 wl_display_dispatch(_RGFW->wl_display);
8433 RGFW_UNUSED(name);
8434
8435 return win;
8436}
8437
8438RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getGlobalMouse) (i32* x, i32* y) {
8439 RGFW_init();
8440 if (x) *x = 0;
8441 if (y) *y = 0;
8442 return RGFW_FALSE;
8443}
8444
8445u8 RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar)(u32 key) {
8446 return (u8)key;
8447}
8448
8449void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_pollEvents) (void) {
8450 RGFW_resetPrevState();
8451
8452 /* send buffered requests to compositor */
8453 while (wl_display_flush(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
8454 /* compositor not responding to new requests */
8455 /* so let's dispatch some events so the compositor responds */
8456 if (errno == EAGAIN) {
8457 if (wl_display_dispatch_pending(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
8458 return;
8459 }
8460 } else {
8461 return;
8462 }
8463 }
8464
8465 /* read the events; if empty this reads from the */
8466 /* wayland file descriptor */
8467 if (wl_display_dispatch(_RGFW->wl_display) == -1) {
8468 return;
8469 }
8470
8471}
8472
8473void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_move) (RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
8474 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8475 win->x = x;
8476 win->y = y;
8477}
8478
8479
8480void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_resize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8481 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8482 win->w = w;
8483 win->h = h;
8484 if (_RGFW->compositor) {
8485 xdg_surface_set_window_geometry(win->src.xdg_surface, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
8486 #ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
8487 if (win->src.ctx.egl)
8488 wl_egl_window_resize(win->src.ctx.egl->eglWindow, (i32)w, (i32)h, 0, 0);
8489 #endif
8490 }
8491}
8492
8493void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setAspectRatio) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8494 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8495
8496 if (w == 0 && h == 0)
8497 return;
8498 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(win->src.xdg_toplevel, (i32)w, (i32)h);
8499}
8500
8501void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMinSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8502 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8503 xdg_toplevel_set_min_size(win->src.xdg_toplevel, w, h);
8504}
8505
8506void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMaxSize) (RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
8507 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8508 xdg_toplevel_set_max_size(win->src.xdg_toplevel, w, h);
8509}
8510
8511void RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool maximized) {
8512 win->src.maximized = maximized;
8513 if (maximized) {
8514 xdg_toplevel_set_maximized(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
8515 } else {
8516 xdg_toplevel_unset_maximized(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
8517 }
8518}
8519
8520void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_maximize) (RGFW_window* win) {
8521 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
8522 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
8523 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
8524 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
8525 RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(win, 1);
8526 return;
8527}
8528
8529void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_focus)(RGFW_window* win) {
8530 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8531}
8532
8533void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_raise)(RGFW_window* win) {
8534 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8535}
8536
8537void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFullscreen)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
8538 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8539 if (fullscreen) {
8540
8541 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
8542 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
8543 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
8544 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
8545 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
8546 xdg_toplevel_set_fullscreen(win->src.xdg_toplevel, NULL); /* let the compositor decide */
8547 } else {
8548 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
8549 xdg_toplevel_unset_fullscreen(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
8550 }
8551
8552}
8553
8554void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setFloating) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
8555 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8556 RGFW_UNUSED(floating);
8557}
8558
8559void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setOpacity) (RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
8560 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8561 RGFW_UNUSED(opacity);
8562}
8563
8564void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_minimize)(RGFW_window* win) {
8565 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8566 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) return;
8567 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
8568 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
8569 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
8570 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
8571 win->src.minimized = RGFW_TRUE;
8572 xdg_toplevel_set_minimized(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
8573}
8574
8575void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_restore)(RGFW_window* win) {
8576 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8577 RGFW_toggleWaylandMaximized(win, RGFW_FALSE);
8578
8579 RGFW_window_move(win, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY);
8580 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->internal.oldW, win->internal.oldH);
8581
8582 RGFW_window_show(win);
8583 RGFW_window_move(win, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY);
8584 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->internal.oldW, win->internal.oldH);
8585
8586 RGFW_window_show(win);
8587}
8588
8589RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isFloating)(RGFW_window* win) {
8590 return (!RGFW_window_isFullscreen(win) && !RGFW_window_isMaximized(win));
8591}
8592
8593void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setName) (RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
8594 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8595 if (_RGFW->compositor)
8596 xdg_toplevel_set_title(win->src.xdg_toplevel, name);
8597}
8598
8599#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
8600void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
8601 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8602 RGFW_UNUSED(passthrough);
8603}
8604#endif /* RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH */
8605
8606RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setIconEx) (RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
8607 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8608 RGFW_UNUSED(type);
8609
8610 if (_RGFW->icon_manager == NULL || w != h) return RGFW_FALSE;
8611
8612 if (win->src.icon) {
8613 xdg_toplevel_icon_v1_destroy(win->src.icon);
8614 win->src.icon= NULL;
8615 }
8616
8617 RGFW_surface* surface = RGFW_createSurface(data, w, h, format);
8618
8619 if (surface == NULL) return RGFW_FALSE;
8620
8621 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->native.buffer, RGFW_MIN(w, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
8622
8623 win->src.icon = xdg_toplevel_icon_manager_v1_create_icon(_RGFW->icon_manager);
8624 xdg_toplevel_icon_v1_add_buffer(win->src.icon, surface->native.wl_buffer, 1);
8625 xdg_toplevel_icon_manager_v1_set_icon(_RGFW->icon_manager, win->src.xdg_toplevel, win->src.icon);
8626
8627 RGFW_surface_free(surface);
8628 return RGFW_TRUE;
8629}
8630
8631RGFW_mouse* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_loadMouse)(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
8632
8633 RGFW_surface *mouse_surface = RGFW_createSurface(data, w, h, format);
8634
8635 if (mouse_surface == NULL) return NULL;
8636
8637 RGFW_copyImageData(mouse_surface->native.buffer, RGFW_MIN(w, mouse_surface->w), RGFW_MIN(h, mouse_surface->h), mouse_surface->native.format, mouse_surface->data, mouse_surface->format);
8638
8639 return (void*) mouse_surface;
8640}
8641
8642void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouse)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
8643 RGFW_ASSERT(win); RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
8644 RGFW_surface *mouse_surface = (RGFW_surface*)mouse;
8645
8646 win->src.using_custom_cursor = RGFW_TRUE;
8647
8648 struct wl_buffer *mouse_buffer = mouse_surface->native.wl_buffer;
8649
8650 wl_surface_attach(win->src.custom_cursor_surface, mouse_buffer, 0, 0);
8651 wl_surface_damage(win->src.custom_cursor_surface, 0, 0, mouse_surface->w, mouse_surface->h);
8652 wl_surface_commit(win->src.custom_cursor_surface);
8653
8654}
8655
8656void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_freeMouse)(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
8657 if (mouse != NULL) {
8658 RGFW_surface_free((RGFW_surface*)mouse);
8659 }
8660}
8661
8662void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_moveMouse)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
8663 RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(x); RGFW_UNUSED(y);
8664}
8665
8666RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseDefault)(RGFW_window* win) {
8667 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
8668}
8669
8670RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_setMouseStandard)(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
8671 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8672 static const char* iconStrings[16] = { "arrow", "left_ptr", "xterm", "crosshair", "hand2", "sb_h_double_arrow", "sb_v_double_arrow", "bottom_left_corner", "bottom_right_corner", "fleur", "forbidden" };
8673
8674 win->src.using_custom_cursor = RGFW_FALSE;
8675
8676 if (mouse > RGFW_mouseIconCount - 1) return RGFW_FALSE;
8677
8678 struct wl_cursor* wlcursor = wl_cursor_theme_get_cursor(_RGFW->wl_cursor_theme, iconStrings[mouse]);
8679 struct wl_cursor_image* cursor_image = wlcursor->images[0];
8680 struct wl_buffer* cursor_buffer = wl_cursor_image_get_buffer(cursor_image);
8681 wl_pointer_set_cursor(_RGFW->wl_pointer, _RGFW->mouse_enter_serial, _RGFW->cursor_surface, (i32)cursor_image->hotspot_x, (i32)cursor_image->hotspot_y);
8682 wl_surface_attach(_RGFW->cursor_surface, cursor_buffer, 0, 0);
8683 wl_surface_damage(_RGFW->cursor_surface, 0, 0, (i32)cursor_image->width, (i32)cursor_image->height);
8684 wl_surface_commit(_RGFW->cursor_surface);
8685 return RGFW_TRUE;
8686}
8687
8688void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_hide) (RGFW_window* win) {
8689 wl_surface_attach(win->src.surface, NULL, 0, 0);
8690 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
8691 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowHide;
8692}
8693
8694void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_show) (RGFW_window* win) {
8695 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowHide;
8696 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow) RGFW_window_focus(win);
8697 /* wl_surface_attach(win->src.surface, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h, 0, 0); */
8698 wl_surface_commit(win->src.surface);
8699}
8700
8701RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_readClipboardPtr) (char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
8702
8703 RGFW_UNUSED(strCapacity);
8704
8705 if (str != NULL)
8706 RGFW_STRNCPY(str, _RGFW->clipboard, _RGFW->clipboard_len - 1);
8707 _RGFW->clipboard[_RGFW->clipboard_len - 1] = '\0';
8708 return (RGFW_ssize_t)_RGFW->clipboard_len - 1;
8709}
8710
8711void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_writeClipboard) (const char* text, u32 textLen) {
8712
8713 // compositor does not support wl_data_device_manager
8714 // clients cannot read rgfw's clipboard
8715 if (_RGFW->data_device_manager == NULL) return;
8716 // clear the clipboard
8717 if (_RGFW->clipboard)
8718 RGFW_FREE(_RGFW->clipboard);
8719
8720 // set the contents
8721 _RGFW->clipboard = (char*)RGFW_ALLOC(textLen);
8722 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->clipboard != NULL);
8723 RGFW_STRNCPY(_RGFW->clipboard, text, textLen - 1);
8724 _RGFW->clipboard[textLen - 1] = '\0';
8725 _RGFW->clipboard_len = textLen;
8726
8727 // means we already wrote to the clipboard
8728 // so destroy it to create a new one
8729 RGFW_window* win = _RGFW->kbOwner;
8730
8731 if (win->src.data_source != NULL) {
8732 wl_data_source_destroy(win->src.data_source);
8733 win->src.data_source = NULL;
8734 }
8735
8736 // advertise to other clients that we offer text
8737 win->src.data_source = wl_data_device_manager_create_data_source(_RGFW->data_device_manager);
8738
8739 // basic error checking
8740 if (win->src.data_source == NULL) {
8741 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errClipboard, "Could not create clipboard data source");
8742 return;
8743 }
8744 wl_data_source_offer(win->src.data_source , "text/plain;charset=utf-8");
8745
8746 // needed RGFW_doNothing because wayland will call the functions
8747 // if not set they are random data that lead to a crash
8748 static const struct wl_data_source_listener data_source_listener = {
8749 .target = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_source *, const char *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8750 .action = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_source *, u32))&RGFW_doNothing,
8751 .dnd_drop_performed = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_source *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8752 .dnd_finished = (void (*)(void *, struct wl_data_source *))&RGFW_doNothing,
8753 .send = RGFW_wl_data_source_send,
8754 .cancelled = RGFW_wl_data_source_cancelled
8755 };
8756
8757 wl_data_source_add_listener(win->src.data_source, &data_source_listener, _RGFW);
8758
8759}
8760
8761RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isHidden) (RGFW_window* win) {
8762 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8763 return RGFW_FALSE;
8764}
8765
8766RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMinimized) (RGFW_window* win) {
8767 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8768 return win->src.minimized;
8769}
8770
8771RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_isMaximized) (RGFW_window* win) {
8772 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8773 return win->src.maximized;
8774}
8775
8776RGFW_monitor* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getMonitors) (size_t* len) {
8777 static RGFW_monitor monitors[RGFW_MAX_MONITORS];
8778 RGFW_init();
8779 if (len != NULL) {
8780 *len = _RGFW->monitors.count;
8781 }
8782
8783 u8 i = 0;
8784 RGFW_monitorNode* cur_node = _RGFW->monitors.list.head;
8785 while (cur_node != NULL) {
8786 monitors[i] = cur_node->mon;
8787 ++i;
8788 cur_node = cur_node->next;
8789 }
8790 return monitors;
8791}
8792
8793RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor) (void) {
8794 return _RGFW->monitors.list.head->mon;
8795}
8796
8797RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_monitor_requestMode) (RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
8798 RGFW_UNUSED(mon); RGFW_UNUSED(mode); RGFW_UNUSED(request);
8799 return RGFW_FALSE;
8800}
8801
8802RGFW_monitor RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_getMonitor) (RGFW_window* win) {
8803 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
8804 return win->src.active_monitor;
8805}
8806
8807#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
8808RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL) (const char * extension, size_t len) { return RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_EGL(extension, len); }
8809RGFW_proc RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL) (const char* procname) { return RGFW_getProcAddress_EGL(procname); }
8810
8811
8812RGFW_bool RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
8813 RGFW_bool out = RGFW_window_createContextPtr_EGL(win, &ctx->egl, hints);
8814 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
8815 return out;
8816}
8817void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) { RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_EGL(win, &ctx->egl); win->src.ctx.native = NULL; }
8818
8819void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_EGL(win); }
8820void* RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL) (void) { return RGFW_getCurrentContext_EGL(); }
8821void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_window_swapBuffers_EGL(win); }
8822void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL) (RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) { RGFW_window_swapInterval_EGL(win, swapInterval); }
8823#endif /* RGFW_OPENGL */
8824
8825void RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_closePlatform)(RGFW_window* win) {
8826 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
8827 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoWindow, "a window was freed");
8828 #ifdef RGFW_LIBDECOR
8829 if (win->src.decorContext)
8830 libdecor_unref(win->src.decorContext);
8831 #endif
8832
8833 if (win->src.decoration) {
8834 zxdg_toplevel_decoration_v1_destroy(win->src.decoration);
8835 }
8836
8837 if (win->src.xdg_toplevel) {
8838 xdg_toplevel_destroy(win->src.xdg_toplevel);
8839 }
8840
8841 wl_surface_destroy(win->src.custom_cursor_surface);
8842
8843 if (win->src.locked_pointer) {
8844 zwp_locked_pointer_v1_destroy(win->src.locked_pointer);
8845 }
8846
8847 if (win->src.icon) {
8848 xdg_toplevel_icon_v1_destroy(win->src.icon);
8849 }
8850
8851 xdg_surface_destroy(win->src.xdg_surface);
8852 wl_surface_destroy(win->src.surface);
8853}
8854
8855#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
8856WGPUSurface RGFW_FUNC(RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU) (RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
8857 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
8858 WGPUSurfaceSourceWaylandSurface fromWl = {0};
8859 fromWl.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceWaylandSurface;
8860 fromWl.display = _RGFW->wl_display;
8861 fromWl.surface = window->src.surface;
8862
8863 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromWl.chain;
8864 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
8865}
8866#endif
8867
8868
8869
8870#endif /* RGFW_WAYLAND */
8871/*
8872 End of Wayland defines
8873*/
8874
8875/*
8876
8877 Start of Windows defines
8878
8879
8880*/
8881
8882#ifdef RGFW_WINDOWS
8883#define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
8884#define OEMRESOURCE
8885#include <windows.h>
8886
8887#ifndef OCR_NORMAL
8888#define OCR_NORMAL 32512
8889#define OCR_IBEAM 32513
8890#define OCR_WAIT 32514
8891#define OCR_CROSS 32515
8892#define OCR_UP 32516
8893#define OCR_SIZENWSE 32642
8894#define OCR_SIZENESW 32643
8895#define OCR_SIZEWE 32644
8896#define OCR_SIZENS 32645
8897#define OCR_SIZEALL 32646
8898#define OCR_NO 32648
8899#define OCR_HAND 32649
8900#define OCR_APPSTARTING 32650
8901#endif
8902
8903#include <windowsx.h>
8904#include <shellapi.h>
8905#include <shellscalingapi.h>
8906#include <wchar.h>
8907#include <locale.h>
8908#include <winuser.h>
8909
8910#ifndef WM_DPICHANGED
8911#define WM_DPICHANGED 0x02E0
8912#endif
8913
8914RGFW_bool RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(const WCHAR* source, char* out, size_t max);
8915
8916#define GL_FRONT 0x0404
8917#define GL_BACK 0x0405
8918#define GL_LEFT 0x0406
8919#define GL_RIGHT 0x0407
8920
8921typedef int (*PFN_wglGetSwapIntervalEXT)(void);
8922PFN_wglGetSwapIntervalEXT wglGetSwapIntervalEXTSrc = NULL;
8923#define wglGetSwapIntervalEXT wglGetSwapIntervalEXTSrc
8924
8925/* these two wgl functions need to be preloaded */
8926typedef HGLRC (WINAPI *PFNWGLCREATECONTEXTATTRIBSARBPROC)(HDC hdc, HGLRC hglrc, const int *attribList);
8927PFNWGLCREATECONTEXTATTRIBSARBPROC wglCreateContextAttribsARB = NULL;
8928
8929HMODULE RGFW_wgl_dll = NULL;
8930
8931#ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WGL
8932 typedef HGLRC(WINAPI* PFN_wglCreateContext)(HDC);
8933 typedef BOOL(WINAPI* PFN_wglDeleteContext)(HGLRC);
8934 typedef PROC(WINAPI* PFN_wglGetProcAddress)(LPCSTR);
8935 typedef BOOL(WINAPI* PFN_wglMakeCurrent)(HDC, HGLRC);
8936 typedef HDC(WINAPI* PFN_wglGetCurrentDC)(void);
8937 typedef HGLRC(WINAPI* PFN_wglGetCurrentContext)(void);
8938 typedef BOOL(WINAPI* PFN_wglShareLists)(HGLRC, HGLRC);
8939
8940 PFN_wglCreateContext wglCreateContextSRC;
8941 PFN_wglDeleteContext wglDeleteContextSRC;
8942 PFN_wglGetProcAddress wglGetProcAddressSRC;
8943 PFN_wglMakeCurrent wglMakeCurrentSRC;
8944 PFN_wglGetCurrentDC wglGetCurrentDCSRC;
8945 PFN_wglGetCurrentContext wglGetCurrentContextSRC;
8946 PFN_wglShareLists wglShareListsSRC;
8947
8948 #define wglCreateContext wglCreateContextSRC
8949 #define wglDeleteContext wglDeleteContextSRC
8950 #define wglGetProcAddress wglGetProcAddressSRC
8951 #define wglMakeCurrent wglMakeCurrentSRC
8952 #define wglGetCurrentDC wglGetCurrentDCSRC
8953 #define wglGetCurrentContext wglGetCurrentContextSRC
8954 #define wglShareLists wglShareListsSRC
8955#endif
8956
8957void* RGFW_window_getHWND(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.window; }
8958void* RGFW_window_getHDC(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.hdc; }
8959
8960#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
8961RGFWDEF void RGFW_win32_loadOpenGLFuncs(HWND dummyWin);
8962
8963typedef HRESULT (APIENTRY* PFNWGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATARBPROC)(HDC hdc, const int* piAttribIList, const FLOAT* pfAttribFList, UINT nMaxFormats, int* piFormats, UINT* nNumFormats);
8964PFNWGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATARBPROC wglChoosePixelFormatARB = NULL;
8965
8966typedef BOOL(APIENTRY* PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)(int interval);
8967PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC wglSwapIntervalEXT = NULL;
8968#endif
8969
8970#ifndef RGFW_NO_DWM
8971HMODULE RGFW_dwm_dll = NULL;
8972#ifndef _DWMAPI_H_
8973typedef struct { DWORD dwFlags; int fEnable; HRGN hRgnBlur; int fTransitionOnMaximized;} DWM_BLURBEHIND;
8974#endif
8975typedef HRESULT (WINAPI * PFN_DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow)(HWND, const DWM_BLURBEHIND*);
8976PFN_DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow DwmEnableBlurBehindWindowSRC = NULL;
8977#endif
8978void RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(RGFW_window* win);
8979void RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(RGFW_window* win) {
8980 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent)) return;
8981
8982 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DWM
8983 if (DwmEnableBlurBehindWindowSRC != NULL) {
8984 DWM_BLURBEHIND bb = {0, 0, 0, 0};
8985 bb.dwFlags = 0x1;
8986 bb.fEnable = TRUE;
8987 bb.hRgnBlur = NULL;
8988 DwmEnableBlurBehindWindowSRC(win->src.window, &bb);
8989
8990 } else
8991 #endif
8992 {
8993 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE, WS_EX_LAYERED);
8994 SetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, 0, 128, LWA_ALPHA);
8995 }
8996}
8997
8998LRESULT CALLBACK WndProcW(HWND hWnd, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam);
8999LRESULT CALLBACK WndProcW(HWND hWnd, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam) {
9000 RGFW_window* win = (RGFW_window*)GetPropW(hWnd, L"RGFW");
9001 if (win == NULL) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9002
9003 static BYTE keyboardState[256];
9004 GetKeyboardState(keyboardState);
9005
9006 RGFW_event event;
9007 RGFW_MEMSET(&event, 0, sizeof(event));
9008 event.common.win = win;
9009
9010 RECT windowRect;
9011 GetWindowRect(hWnd, &windowRect);
9012
9013 switch (message) {
9014 case WM_CLOSE:
9015 case WM_QUIT:
9016 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
9017 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
9018 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_quit; e.common.win = win);
9019 return 0;
9020 case WM_ACTIVATE: {
9021 RGFW_bool inFocus = RGFW_BOOL(LOWORD(wParam) != WA_INACTIVE);
9022
9023 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_BOOL(inFocus);
9024 if ((win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(RGFW_focusIn - inFocus)))) {
9025 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = (RGFW_eventType)((u8)RGFW_focusOut - inFocus); e.common.win = win);
9026 RGFW_focusCallback(win, inFocus);
9027 }
9028 if (inFocus == RGFW_FALSE) RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
9029 if ((win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen) && inFocus == RGFW_TRUE)
9030 RGFW_window_setFullscreen(win, 1);
9031 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9032 }
9033 case WM_MOVE:
9034 win->x = windowRect.left;
9035 win->y = windowRect.top;
9036
9037 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);;
9038 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMoved; e.common.win = win);
9039 RGFW_windowMovedCallback(win, win->x, win->y);
9040 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9041 case WM_SIZE: {
9042 if (win->src.aspectRatioW != 0 && win->src.aspectRatioH != 0) {
9043 double aspectRatio = (double)win->src.aspectRatioW / win->src.aspectRatioH;
9044
9045 int width = windowRect.right - windowRect.left;
9046 int height = windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top;
9047 int newHeight = (int)(width / aspectRatio);
9048 int newWidth = (int)(height * aspectRatio);
9049
9050 if (win->w > (i32)((windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - win->src.offsetW) ||
9051 win->h > (i32)((windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - win->src.offsetH))
9052 {
9053 if (newHeight > height) windowRect.right = windowRect.left + newWidth;
9054 else windowRect.bottom = windowRect.top + newHeight;
9055 } else {
9056 if (newHeight < height) windowRect.right = windowRect.left + newWidth;
9057 else windowRect.bottom = windowRect.top + newHeight;
9058 }
9059
9060 RGFW_window_resize(win, (windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - win->src.offsetW,
9061 (windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - win->src.offsetH);
9062 }
9063
9064 win->w = (windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - (i32)win->src.offsetW;
9065 win->h = (windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - (i32)win->src.offsetH;
9066 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);;
9067 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = win);
9068 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
9069 RGFW_window_checkMode(win);
9070 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9071 }
9072 #ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
9073 case WM_DPICHANGED: {
9074 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowScaleToMonitor) RGFW_window_scaleToMonitor(win);
9075
9076 const float scaleX = HIWORD(wParam) / (float) 96;
9077 const float scaleY = LOWORD(wParam) / (float) 96;
9078
9079 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_scaleUpdatedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);;
9080 RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallback(win, scaleX, scaleY);
9081 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_scaleUpdated; e.scale.x = scaleX; e.scale.y = scaleY; e.common.win = win);
9082 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9083 }
9084 #endif
9085 case WM_GETMINMAXINFO: {
9086 MINMAXINFO* mmi = (MINMAXINFO*) lParam;
9087 mmi->ptMinTrackSize.x = (LONG)(win->src.minSizeW + win->src.offsetW);
9088 mmi->ptMinTrackSize.y = (LONG)(win->src.minSizeH + win->src.offsetH);
9089 if (win->src.maxSizeW == 0 && win->src.maxSizeH == 0)
9090 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9091
9092 mmi->ptMaxTrackSize.x = (LONG)(win->src.maxSizeW + win->src.offsetW);
9093 mmi->ptMaxTrackSize.y = (LONG)(win->src.maxSizeH + win->src.offsetH);
9094 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9095 }
9096 case WM_PAINT: {
9097 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9098 PAINTSTRUCT ps;
9099 BeginPaint(hWnd, &ps);
9100 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRefresh; e.common.win = win);
9101 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
9102 EndPaint(hWnd, &ps);
9103
9104 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9105 }
9106 #if(_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
9107 case WM_DWMCOMPOSITIONCHANGED:
9108 case WM_DWMCOLORIZATIONCOLORCHANGED:
9109 RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(win);
9110 break;
9111 #endif
9112/* based on sokol_app.h */
9113#ifdef RGFW_ADVANCED_SMOOTH_RESIZE
9114 case WM_ENTERSIZEMOVE: SetTimer(win->src.window, 1, USER_TIMER_MINIMUM, NULL); break;
9115 case WM_EXITSIZEMOVE: KillTimer(win->src.window, 1); break;
9116 case WM_TIMER:
9117 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9118 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win); break;
9119#endif
9120 case WM_NCLBUTTONDOWN: {
9121 /* workaround for half-second pause when starting to move window
9122 see: https://gamedev.net/forums/topic/672094-keeping-things-moving-during-win32-moveresize-events/5254386/
9123 */
9124 POINT point = { 0, 0 };
9125 if (SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_NCHITTEST, wParam, lParam) != HTCAPTION || GetCursorPos(&point) == FALSE)
9126 break;
9127
9128 ScreenToClient(win->src.window, &point);
9129 PostMessage(win->src.window, WM_MOUSEMOVE, 0, (u32)(point.x)|((u32)(point.y) << 16));
9130 break;
9131 }
9132 case WM_MOUSELEAVE:
9133 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
9134 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
9135 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
9136 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9137 event.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
9138 RGFW_window_getMouse(win, &event.mouse.x, &event.mouse.y);
9139 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 0);
9140 break;
9141 case WM_SYSKEYUP: case WM_KEYUP: {
9142 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9143 i32 scancode = (HIWORD(lParam) & (KF_EXTENDED | 0xff));
9144 if (scancode == 0)
9145 scancode = (i32)MapVirtualKeyW((UINT)wParam, MAPVK_VK_TO_VSC);
9146
9147 switch (scancode) {
9148 case 0x54: scancode = 0x137; break; /* Alt+PrtS */
9149 case 0x146: scancode = 0x45; break; /* Ctrl+Pause */
9150 case 0x136: scancode = 0x36; break; /* CJK IME sets the extended bit for right Shift */
9151 default: break;
9152 }
9153
9154 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW((u32) scancode);
9155
9156 if (wParam == VK_CONTROL) {
9157 if (HIWORD(lParam) & KF_EXTENDED)
9158 event.key.value = RGFW_controlR;
9159 else event.key.value = RGFW_controlL;
9160 }
9161
9162 wchar_t charBuffer;
9163 ToUnicodeEx((UINT)wParam, (UINT)scancode, keyboardState, (wchar_t*)&charBuffer, 1, 0, NULL);
9164
9165 event.key.sym = (u8)charBuffer;
9166
9167 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
9168 event.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
9169 event.key.repeat = ((lParam & 0x40000000) != 0) || RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, event.key.value);
9170 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = 0;
9171
9172 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (GetKeyState(VK_CAPITAL) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_NUMLOCK) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_SCROLL) & 0x0001));
9173 event.key.mod = win->internal.mod;
9174
9175 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, event.key.mod, event.key.repeat,0);
9176 break;
9177 }
9178 case WM_SYSKEYDOWN: case WM_KEYDOWN: {
9179 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9180 i32 scancode = (HIWORD(lParam) & (KF_EXTENDED | 0xff));
9181 if (scancode == 0)
9182 scancode = (i32)MapVirtualKeyW((u32)wParam, MAPVK_VK_TO_VSC);
9183
9184 switch (scancode) {
9185 case 0x54: scancode = 0x137; break; /* Alt+PrtS */
9186 case 0x146: scancode = 0x45; break; /* Ctrl+Pause */
9187 case 0x136: scancode = 0x36; break; /* CJK IME sets the extended bit for right Shift */
9188 default: break;
9189 }
9190
9191 event.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW((u32) scancode);
9192 if (wParam == VK_CONTROL) {
9193 if (HIWORD(lParam) & KF_EXTENDED)
9194 event.key.value = RGFW_controlR;
9195 else event.key.value = RGFW_controlL;
9196 }
9197
9198 wchar_t charBuffer;
9199 ToUnicodeEx((UINT)wParam, (UINT)scancode, keyboardState, &charBuffer, 1, 0, NULL);
9200 event.key.sym = (u8)charBuffer;
9201
9202 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current;
9203 event.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
9204 event.key.repeat = ((lParam & 0x40000000) != 0) || RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, event.key.value);
9205 _RGFW->keyboard[event.key.value].current = 1;
9206
9207 RGFW_updateKeyMods(win, (GetKeyState(VK_CAPITAL) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_NUMLOCK) & 0x0001), (GetKeyState(VK_SCROLL) & 0x0001));
9208 event.key.mod = win->internal.mod;
9209
9210 RGFW_keyCallback(win, event.key.value, event.key.sym, event.key.mod, event.key.repeat, 1);
9211 break;
9212 }
9213 case WM_MOUSEMOVE: {
9214 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9215 if ((win->internal.holdMouse))
9216 break;
9217
9218
9219 event.mouse.x = GET_X_LPARAM(lParam);
9220 event.mouse.y = GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam);
9221 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(event.mouse.x - win->internal.lastMouseX);
9222 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(event.mouse.y - win->internal.lastMouseY);
9223 _RGFW->vectorX = event.mouse.vecX;
9224 _RGFW->vectorY = event.mouse.vecY;
9225
9226 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, event.mouse.vecX, event.mouse.vecY);
9227
9228 if (win->internal.mouseInside == RGFW_FALSE) {
9229 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
9230 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
9231 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
9232 event.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
9233 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, 1);
9234 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
9235 }
9236
9237 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
9238 win->internal.lastMouseX = event.mouse.x;
9239 win->internal.lastMouseY = event.mouse.y;
9240 break;
9241 }
9242 case WM_INPUT: {
9243 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag) || !(win->internal.holdMouse)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9244 unsigned size = sizeof(RAWINPUT);
9245 static RAWINPUT raw;
9246
9247 GetRawInputData((HRAWINPUT)lParam, RID_INPUT, &raw, &size, sizeof(RAWINPUTHEADER));
9248
9249 if (raw.header.dwType != RIM_TYPEMOUSE || (raw.data.mouse.lLastX == 0 && raw.data.mouse.lLastY == 0) )
9250 break;
9251
9252 if (raw.data.mouse.usFlags & MOUSE_MOVE_ABSOLUTE) {
9253 POINT pos = {0, 0};
9254 int width, height;
9255
9256 if (raw.data.mouse.usFlags & MOUSE_VIRTUAL_DESKTOP) {
9257 pos.x += GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN);
9258 pos.y += GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN);
9259 width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN);
9260 height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN);
9261 }
9262 else {
9263 width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN);
9264 height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN);
9265 }
9266
9267 pos.x += (int) (((float)raw.data.mouse.lLastX / 65535.f) * (float)width);
9268 pos.y += (int) (((float)raw.data.mouse.lLastY / 65535.f) * (float)height);
9269 ScreenToClient(win->src.window, &pos);
9270
9271 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(pos.x - win->internal.lastMouseX);
9272 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(pos.y - win->internal.lastMouseY);
9273 } else {
9274 event.mouse.vecX = (float)(raw.data.mouse.lLastX);
9275 event.mouse.vecY = (float)(raw.data.mouse.lLastY);
9276 }
9277
9278 event.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
9279 win->internal.lastMouseX += (i32)event.mouse.vecX;
9280 win->internal.lastMouseY += (i32)event.mouse.vecY;
9281 _RGFW->vectorX = event.mouse.vecX;
9282 _RGFW->vectorY = event.mouse.vecY;
9283 event.mouse.x = win->internal.lastMouseX;
9284 event.mouse.y = win->internal.lastMouseY;
9285 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, event.mouse.x, event.mouse.y, event.mouse.vecX, event.mouse.vecY);
9286 break;
9287 }
9288 case WM_LBUTTONDOWN: case WM_RBUTTONDOWN: case WM_MBUTTONDOWN: case WM_XBUTTONDOWN:
9289 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9290 if (message == WM_XBUTTONDOWN)
9291 event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMisc1 + (GET_XBUTTON_WPARAM(wParam) == XBUTTON2);
9292 else event.button.value = (message == WM_LBUTTONDOWN) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseLeft :
9293 (message == WM_RBUTTONDOWN) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseRight : (u8)RGFW_mouseMiddle;
9294
9295 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
9296 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
9297 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = 1;
9298 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, 1);
9299 break;
9300 case WM_LBUTTONUP: case WM_RBUTTONUP: case WM_MBUTTONUP: case WM_XBUTTONUP:
9301 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9302 if (message == WM_XBUTTONUP)
9303 event.button.value = RGFW_mouseMisc1 + (GET_XBUTTON_WPARAM(wParam) == XBUTTON2);
9304 else event.button.value = (message == WM_LBUTTONUP) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseLeft :
9305 (message == WM_RBUTTONUP) ? (u8)RGFW_mouseRight : (u8)RGFW_mouseMiddle;
9306 event.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
9307 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current;
9308 _RGFW->mouseButtons[event.button.value].current = 0;
9309 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, event.button.value, 0);
9310 break;
9311 case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:
9312 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9313
9314 event.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
9315 event.scroll.x = 0.0f;
9316 event.scroll.y = (float)((i16) HIWORD(wParam) / (double) WHEEL_DELTA);
9317 _RGFW->scrollX = event.scroll.x;
9318 _RGFW->scrollY = event.scroll.y;
9319
9320 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, event.scroll.x, event.scroll.y);
9321 break;
9322 case 0x020E: /* WM_MOUSEHWHEEL */
9323 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9324
9325 event.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
9326 event.scroll.x = -(float)((i16) HIWORD(wParam) / (double) WHEEL_DELTA);
9327 event.scroll.y = (float)0.0f;
9328 _RGFW->scrollX = event.scroll.x;
9329 _RGFW->scrollY = event.scroll.y;
9330
9331 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, event.scroll.x, event.scroll.y);
9332 break;
9333 case WM_DROPFILES: {
9334 event.type = RGFW_dataDrag;
9335
9336 HDROP drop = (HDROP) wParam;
9337 POINT pt;
9338
9339 /* Move the mouse to the position of the drop */
9340 DragQueryPoint(drop, &pt);
9341
9342 event.drag.x = pt.x;
9343 event.drag.y = pt.y;
9344
9345 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
9346 _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging = RGFW_TRUE;
9347 _RGFW->windowState.dropX = event.drag.x;
9348 _RGFW->windowState.dropY = event.drag.y;
9349
9350 if ((win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDrag)) {
9351 RGFW_dataDragCallback(win, event.drag.x, event.drag.y);
9352 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
9353 }
9354
9355 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDrop)) return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9356 event.type = 0;
9357 event.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
9358 event.drop.files = _RGFW->files;
9359 event.drop.count = 0;
9360 event.drop.count = DragQueryFileW(drop, 0xffffffff, NULL, 0);
9361
9362 u32 i;
9363 for (i = 0; i < event.drop.count; i++) {
9364 UINT length = DragQueryFileW(drop, i, NULL, 0);
9365 if (length == 0)
9366 continue;
9367
9368 WCHAR buffer[RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2];
9369 if (length > (RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2) - 1)
9370 length = RGFW_MAX_PATH * 2;
9371
9372 DragQueryFileW(drop, i, buffer, length + 1);
9373
9374 RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(buffer, event.drop.files[i], RGFW_MAX_PATH);
9375
9376 event.drop.files[i][RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1] = '\0';
9377 event.common.win = win;
9378 }
9379
9380 DragFinish(drop);
9381
9382 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
9383 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
9384 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = event.drop.count;
9385 RGFW_dataDropCallback(win, event.drop.files, event.drop.count);
9386 break;
9387 }
9388 default: break;
9389 }
9390
9391 if (event.type) {
9392 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&event);
9393 }
9394
9395 return DefWindowProcW(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
9396}
9397
9398#ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
9399 HMODULE RGFW_Shcore_dll = NULL;
9400 typedef HRESULT (WINAPI *PFN_GetDpiForMonitor)(HMONITOR,MONITOR_DPI_TYPE,UINT*,UINT*);
9401 PFN_GetDpiForMonitor GetDpiForMonitorSRC = NULL;
9402 #define GetDpiForMonitor GetDpiForMonitorSRC
9403#endif
9404
9405#if !defined(RGFW_NO_LOAD_WINMM) && !defined(RGFW_NO_WINMM)
9406 HMODULE RGFW_winmm_dll = NULL;
9407 typedef u32 (WINAPI * PFN_timeBeginPeriod)(u32);
9408 typedef PFN_timeBeginPeriod PFN_timeEndPeriod;
9409 PFN_timeBeginPeriod timeBeginPeriodSRC, timeEndPeriodSRC;
9410 #define timeBeginPeriod timeBeginPeriodSRC
9411 #define timeEndPeriod timeEndPeriodSRC
9412#elif !defined(RGFW_NO_WINMM)
9413 __declspec(dllimport) u32 __stdcall timeBeginPeriod(u32 uPeriod);
9414 __declspec(dllimport) u32 __stdcall timeEndPeriod(u32 uPeriod);
9415#endif
9416#define RGFW_PROC_DEF(proc, name) if (name##SRC == NULL && proc != NULL) { \
9417 name##SRC = (PFN_##name)(RGFW_proc)GetProcAddress((proc), (#name)); \
9418 RGFW_ASSERT(name##SRC != NULL); \
9419 }
9420
9421RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
9422 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
9423 surface->data = data;
9424 surface->w = w;
9425 surface->h = h;
9426 surface->format = format;
9427
9428 BITMAPV5HEADER bi;
9429 ZeroMemory(&bi, sizeof(bi));
9430 bi.bV5Size = sizeof(bi);
9431 bi.bV5Width = (i32)w;
9432 bi.bV5Height = -((LONG) h);
9433 bi.bV5Planes = 1;
9434 bi.bV5BitCount = (format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 32 : 24;
9435 bi.bV5Compression = BI_RGB;
9436
9437 surface->native.bitmap = CreateDIBSection(_RGFW->root->src.hdc,
9438 (BITMAPINFO*) &bi, DIB_RGB_COLORS,
9439 (void**) &surface->native.bitmapBits,
9440 NULL, (DWORD) 0);
9441
9442 surface->native.format = (format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? RGFW_formatBGRA8 : RGFW_formatBGR8;
9443
9444 if (surface->native.bitmap == NULL) {
9445 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errBuffer, "Failed to create DIB section.");
9446 return RGFW_FALSE;
9447 }
9448
9449 surface->native.hdcMem = CreateCompatibleDC(_RGFW->root->src.hdc);
9450 SelectObject(surface->native.hdcMem, surface->native.bitmap);
9451
9452 return RGFW_TRUE;
9453}
9454
9455void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) {
9456 RGFW_ASSERT(surface != NULL);
9457
9458 DeleteDC(surface->native.hdcMem);
9459 DeleteObject(surface->native.bitmap);
9460}
9461
9462void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
9463 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->native.bitmapBits, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
9464 BitBlt(win->src.hdc, 0, 0, RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.hdcMem, 0, 0, SRCCOPY);
9465}
9466
9467void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
9468 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
9469 ClipCursor(NULL);
9470 const RAWINPUTDEVICE id = { 0x01, 0x02, RIDEV_REMOVE, NULL };
9471 RegisterRawInputDevices(&id, 1, sizeof(id));
9472}
9473
9474void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
9475 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
9476
9477 RECT clipRect;
9478 GetClientRect(win->src.window, &clipRect);
9479 ClientToScreen(win->src.window, (POINT*) &clipRect.left);
9480 ClientToScreen(win->src.window, (POINT*) &clipRect.right);
9481 ClipCursor(&clipRect);
9482
9483 const RAWINPUTDEVICE id = { 0x01, 0x02, 0, win->src.window };
9484 RegisterRawInputDevices(&id, 1, sizeof(id));
9485}
9486
9487#define RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(x, lib) if (x == NULL) { x = LoadLibraryA(lib); RGFW_ASSERT(x != NULL); }
9488
9489#ifdef RGFW_DIRECTX
9490int RGFW_window_createSwapChain_DirectX(RGFW_window* win, IDXGIFactory* pFactory, IUnknown* pDevice, IDXGISwapChain** swapchain) {
9491 RGFW_ASSERT(win && pFactory && pDevice && swapchain);
9492
9493 static DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_DESC swapChainDesc = { 0 };
9494 swapChainDesc.BufferCount = 2;
