9495 swapChainDesc.BufferDesc.Width = win->w;
9496 swapChainDesc.BufferDesc.Height = win->h;
9497 swapChainDesc.BufferDesc.Format = DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM;
9498 swapChainDesc.BufferUsage = DXGI_USAGE_RENDER_TARGET_OUTPUT;
9499 swapChainDesc.OutputWindow = (HWND)win->src.window;
9500 swapChainDesc.SampleDesc.Count = 1;
9501 swapChainDesc.SampleDesc.Quality = 0;
9502 swapChainDesc.Windowed = TRUE;
9503 swapChainDesc.Flags = DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FLAG_ALLOW_MODE_SWITCH;
9504
9505 HRESULT hr = pFactory->lpVtbl->CreateSwapChain(pFactory, (IUnknown*)pDevice, &swapChainDesc, swapchain);
9506 if (FAILED(hr)) {
9507 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errDirectXContext, "Failed to create DirectX swap chain!");
9508 return -2;
9509 }
9510
9511 return 0;
9512}
9513#endif
9514
9515/* we're doing it with magic numbers because some keys are missing */
9516void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
9517 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00B] = RGFW_0;
9518 _RGFW->keycodes[0x002] = RGFW_1;
9519 _RGFW->keycodes[0x003] = RGFW_2;
9520 _RGFW->keycodes[0x004] = RGFW_3;
9521 _RGFW->keycodes[0x005] = RGFW_4;
9522 _RGFW->keycodes[0x006] = RGFW_5;
9523 _RGFW->keycodes[0x007] = RGFW_6;
9524 _RGFW->keycodes[0x008] = RGFW_7;
9525 _RGFW->keycodes[0x009] = RGFW_8;
9526 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00A] = RGFW_9;
9527 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01E] = RGFW_a;
9528 _RGFW->keycodes[0x030] = RGFW_b;
9529 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02E] = RGFW_c;
9530 _RGFW->keycodes[0x020] = RGFW_d;
9531 _RGFW->keycodes[0x012] = RGFW_e;
9532 _RGFW->keycodes[0x021] = RGFW_f;
9533 _RGFW->keycodes[0x022] = RGFW_g;
9534 _RGFW->keycodes[0x023] = RGFW_h;
9535 _RGFW->keycodes[0x017] = RGFW_i;
9536 _RGFW->keycodes[0x024] = RGFW_j;
9537 _RGFW->keycodes[0x025] = RGFW_k;
9538 _RGFW->keycodes[0x026] = RGFW_l;
9539 _RGFW->keycodes[0x032] = RGFW_m;
9540 _RGFW->keycodes[0x031] = RGFW_n;
9541 _RGFW->keycodes[0x018] = RGFW_o;
9542 _RGFW->keycodes[0x019] = RGFW_p;
9543 _RGFW->keycodes[0x010] = RGFW_q;
9544 _RGFW->keycodes[0x013] = RGFW_r;
9545 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01F] = RGFW_s;
9546 _RGFW->keycodes[0x014] = RGFW_t;
9547 _RGFW->keycodes[0x016] = RGFW_u;
9548 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02F] = RGFW_v;
9549 _RGFW->keycodes[0x011] = RGFW_w;
9550 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02D] = RGFW_x;
9551 _RGFW->keycodes[0x015] = RGFW_y;
9552 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02C] = RGFW_z;
9553 _RGFW->keycodes[0x028] = RGFW_apostrophe;
9554 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02B] = RGFW_backSlash;
9555 _RGFW->keycodes[0x033] = RGFW_comma;
9556 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00D] = RGFW_equals;
9557 _RGFW->keycodes[0x029] = RGFW_backtick;
9558 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01A] = RGFW_bracket;
9559 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00C] = RGFW_minus;
9560 _RGFW->keycodes[0x034] = RGFW_period;
9561 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01B] = RGFW_closeBracket;
9562 _RGFW->keycodes[0x027] = RGFW_semicolon;
9563 _RGFW->keycodes[0x035] = RGFW_slash;
9564 _RGFW->keycodes[0x056] = RGFW_world2;
9565 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00E] = RGFW_backSpace;
9566 _RGFW->keycodes[0x153] = RGFW_delete;
9567 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14F] = RGFW_end;
9568 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01C] = RGFW_enter;
9569 _RGFW->keycodes[0x001] = RGFW_escape;
9570 _RGFW->keycodes[0x147] = RGFW_home;
9571 _RGFW->keycodes[0x152] = RGFW_insert;
9572 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15D] = RGFW_menu;
9573 _RGFW->keycodes[0x151] = RGFW_pageDown;
9574 _RGFW->keycodes[0x149] = RGFW_pageUp;
9575 _RGFW->keycodes[0x045] = RGFW_pause;
9576 _RGFW->keycodes[0x039] = RGFW_space;
9577 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00F] = RGFW_tab;
9578 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03A] = RGFW_capsLock;
9579 _RGFW->keycodes[0x145] = RGFW_numLock;
9580 _RGFW->keycodes[0x046] = RGFW_scrollLock;
9581 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03B] = RGFW_F1;
9582 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03C] = RGFW_F2;
9583 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03D] = RGFW_F3;
9584 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03E] = RGFW_F4;
9585 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03F] = RGFW_F5;
9586 _RGFW->keycodes[0x040] = RGFW_F6;
9587 _RGFW->keycodes[0x041] = RGFW_F7;
9588 _RGFW->keycodes[0x042] = RGFW_F8;
9589 _RGFW->keycodes[0x043] = RGFW_F9;
9590 _RGFW->keycodes[0x044] = RGFW_F10;
9591 _RGFW->keycodes[0x057] = RGFW_F11;
9592 _RGFW->keycodes[0x058] = RGFW_F12;
9593 _RGFW->keycodes[0x064] = RGFW_F13;
9594 _RGFW->keycodes[0x065] = RGFW_F14;
9595 _RGFW->keycodes[0x066] = RGFW_F15;
9596 _RGFW->keycodes[0x067] = RGFW_F16;
9597 _RGFW->keycodes[0x068] = RGFW_F17;
9598 _RGFW->keycodes[0x069] = RGFW_F18;
9599 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06A] = RGFW_F19;
9600 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06B] = RGFW_F20;
9601 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06C] = RGFW_F21;
9602 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06D] = RGFW_F22;
9603 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06E] = RGFW_F23;
9604 _RGFW->keycodes[0x076] = RGFW_F24;
9605 _RGFW->keycodes[0x038] = RGFW_altL;
9606 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01D] = RGFW_controlL;
9607 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02A] = RGFW_shiftL;
9608 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15B] = RGFW_superL;
9609 _RGFW->keycodes[0x137] = RGFW_printScreen;
9610 _RGFW->keycodes[0x138] = RGFW_altR;
9611 _RGFW->keycodes[0x11D] = RGFW_controlR;
9612 _RGFW->keycodes[0x036] = RGFW_shiftR;
9613 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15C] = RGFW_superR;
9614 _RGFW->keycodes[0x150] = RGFW_down;
9615 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14B] = RGFW_left;
9616 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14D] = RGFW_right;
9617 _RGFW->keycodes[0x148] = RGFW_up;
9618 _RGFW->keycodes[0x052] = RGFW_kp0;
9619 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04F] = RGFW_kp1;
9620 _RGFW->keycodes[0x050] = RGFW_kp2;
9621 _RGFW->keycodes[0x051] = RGFW_kp3;
9622 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04B] = RGFW_kp4;
9623 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04C] = RGFW_kp5;
9624 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04D] = RGFW_kp6;
9625 _RGFW->keycodes[0x047] = RGFW_kp7;
9626 _RGFW->keycodes[0x048] = RGFW_kp8;
9627 _RGFW->keycodes[0x049] = RGFW_kp9;
9628 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04E] = RGFW_kpPlus;
9629 _RGFW->keycodes[0x053] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
9630 _RGFW->keycodes[0x135] = RGFW_kpSlash;
9631 _RGFW->keycodes[0x11C] = RGFW_kpReturn;
9632 _RGFW->keycodes[0x059] = RGFW_kpEqual;
9633 _RGFW->keycodes[0x037] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
9634 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04A] = RGFW_kpMinus;
9635}
9636
9637
9638i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) {
9639#ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
9640 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
9641 SetProcessDPIAware();
9642 #endif
9643#endif
9644
9645 #ifndef RGFW_NO_WINMM
9646 #ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WINMM
9647 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_winmm_dll, "winmm.dll");
9648 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_winmm_dll, timeBeginPeriod);
9649 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_winmm_dll, timeEndPeriod);
9650 #endif
9651 timeBeginPeriod(1);
9652 #endif
9653
9654 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DWM
9655 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_dwm_dll, "dwmapi.dll");
9656 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_dwm_dll, DwmEnableBlurBehindWindow);
9657 #endif
9658
9659 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_wgl_dll, "opengl32.dll");
9660 #ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WGL
9661 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglCreateContext);
9662 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglDeleteContext);
9663 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglGetProcAddress);
9664 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglMakeCurrent);
9665 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglGetCurrentDC);
9666 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglGetCurrentContext);
9667 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_wgl_dll, wglShareLists);
9668 #endif
9669
9670 u8 RGFW_blk[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
9671 _RGFW->hiddenMouse = RGFW_loadMouse(RGFW_blk, 1, 1, RGFW_formatRGBA8);
9672 return 1;
9673}
9674
9675RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
9676 if (name[0] == 0) name = (char*) " ";
9677 win->src.hIconSmall = win->src.hIconBig = NULL;
9678 win->src.maxSizeW = 0;
9679 win->src.maxSizeH = 0;
9680 win->src.minSizeW = 0;
9681 win->src.minSizeH = 0;
9682 win->src.aspectRatioW = 0;
9683 win->src.aspectRatioH = 0;
9684
9685 HINSTANCE inh = GetModuleHandleA(NULL);
9686
9687 #ifndef __cplusplus
9688 WNDCLASSW Class = {0};
9689 #else
9690 WNDCLASSW Class = {};
9691 #endif
9692
9693 if (_RGFW->className == NULL)
9694 _RGFW->className = (char*)name;
9695
9696 wchar_t wide_class[256];
9697 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, _RGFW->className, -1, wide_class, 255);
9698
9699 Class.lpszClassName = wide_class;
9700 Class.hInstance = inh;
9701 Class.hCursor = LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW);
9702 Class.lpfnWndProc = WndProcW;
9703 Class.cbClsExtra = sizeof(RGFW_window*);
9704
9705 Class.hIcon = (HICON)LoadImageA(GetModuleHandleW(NULL), "RGFW_ICON", IMAGE_ICON, 0, 0, LR_DEFAULTSIZE | LR_SHARED);
9706 if (Class.hIcon == NULL)
9707 Class.hIcon = (HICON)LoadImageA(NULL, (LPCSTR)IDI_APPLICATION, IMAGE_ICON, 0, 0, LR_DEFAULTSIZE | LR_SHARED);
9708
9709 RegisterClassW(&Class);
9710
9711 DWORD window_style = WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | WS_CLIPCHILDREN;
9712
9713 RECT windowRect, clientRect;
9714
9715 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder)) {
9716 window_style |= WS_CAPTION | WS_SYSMENU | WS_BORDER | WS_MINIMIZEBOX;
9717
9718 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoResize))
9719 window_style |= WS_SIZEBOX | WS_MAXIMIZEBOX;
9720 } else
9721 window_style |= WS_POPUP | WS_VISIBLE | WS_SYSMENU;
9722
9723 wchar_t wide_name[256];
9724 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, name, -1, wide_name, 255);
9725 HWND dummyWin = CreateWindowW(Class.lpszClassName, (wchar_t*)wide_name, window_style, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h, 0, 0, inh, 0);
9726
9727 GetWindowRect(dummyWin, &windowRect);
9728 GetClientRect(dummyWin, &clientRect);
9729
9730#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
9731 RGFW_win32_loadOpenGLFuncs(dummyWin);
9732#endif
9733
9734 DestroyWindow(dummyWin);
9735
9736 win->src.offsetW = (i32)(windowRect.right - windowRect.left) - (i32)(clientRect.right - clientRect.left);
9737 win->src.offsetH = (i32)(windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top) - (i32)(clientRect.bottom - clientRect.top);
9738 win->src.window = CreateWindowW(Class.lpszClassName, (wchar_t*)wide_name, window_style, win->x, win->y, win->w + (i32)win->src.offsetW, win->h + (i32)win->src.offsetH, 0, 0, inh, 0);
9739 SetPropW(win->src.window, L"RGFW", win);
9740 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h); /* so WM_GETMINMAXINFO gets called again */
9741
9742 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) {
9743 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
9744 RGFW_window_setDND(win, 1);
9745 }
9746 win->src.hdc = GetDC(win->src.window);
9747
9748 RGFW_win32_makeWindowTransparent(win);
9749 return win;
9750}
9751
9752void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
9753 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
9754 LONG style = GetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_STYLE);
9755
9756 if (border == 0) {
9757 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_STYLE, style & ~WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW);
9758 SetWindowPos(
9759 win->src.window, HWND_TOP, 0, 0, 0, 0,
9760 SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED | SWP_SHOWWINDOW | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE
9761 );
9762 }
9763 else {
9764 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoResize) style &= ~WS_MAXIMIZEBOX;
9765 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_STYLE, style | WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW);
9766 SetWindowPos(
9767 win->src.window, HWND_TOP, 0, 0, 0, 0,
9768 SWP_NOZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED | SWP_SHOWWINDOW | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE
9769 );
9770 }
9771}
9772
9773void RGFW_window_setDND(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool allow) {
9774 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowAllowDND, allow);
9775 DragAcceptFiles(win->src.window, allow);
9776}
9777
9778RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) {
9779 POINT p;
9780 GetCursorPos(&p);
9781 if (x) *x = p.x;
9782 if (y) *y = p.y;
9783 return RGFW_TRUE;
9784}
9785
9786void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
9787 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9788 win->src.aspectRatioW = w;
9789 win->src.aspectRatioH = h;
9790}
9791
9792void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
9793 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9794 win->src.minSizeW = w;
9795 win->src.minSizeH = h;
9796}
9797
9798void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
9799 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9800 win->src.maxSizeW = w;
9801 win->src.maxSizeH = h;
9802}
9803
9804void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) {
9805 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
9806 SetForegroundWindow(win->src.window);
9807 SetFocus(win->src.window);
9808}
9809
9810void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) {
9811 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
9812 BringWindowToTop(win->src.window);
9813 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOP, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h, SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOOWNERZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED);
9814}
9815
9816void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
9817 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9818
9819 if (fullscreen == RGFW_FALSE) {
9820 RGFW_window_setBorder(win, 1);
9821 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_NOTOPMOST, win->internal.oldX, win->internal.oldY, win->internal.oldW + (i32)win->src.offsetW, win->internal.oldH + (i32)win->src.offsetH,
9822 SWP_NOOWNERZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED);
9823
9824 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
9825 win->x = win->internal.oldX;
9826 win->y = win->internal.oldY;
9827 win->w = win->internal.oldW;
9828 win->h = win->internal.oldH;
9829 return;
9830 }
9831
9832 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
9833 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
9834 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
9835 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
9836 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
9837
9838 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
9839 RGFW_window_setBorder(win, 0);
9840
9841 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOPMOST, (i32)mon.x, (i32)mon.x, (i32)mon.mode.w, (i32)mon.mode.h, SWP_NOOWNERZORDER | SWP_FRAMECHANGED | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
9842 RGFW_monitor_scaleToWindow(mon, win);
9843
9844 win->x = mon.x; win->y = mon.x;
9845 win->w = mon.mode.w;
9846 win->h = mon.mode.h;
9847}
9848
9849void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) {
9850 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9851 RGFW_window_hide(win);
9852 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_MAXIMIZE);
9853}
9854
9855void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) {
9856 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9857 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_MINIMIZE);
9858}
9859
9860void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
9861 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9862 if (floating) SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
9863 else SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_NOTOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
9864}
9865
9866void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
9867 SetWindowLong(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE, WS_EX_LAYERED);
9868 SetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, 0, opacity, LWA_ALPHA);
9869}
9870
9871void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_window_show(win); }
9872
9873RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) {
9874 return (GetWindowLongPtr(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE) & WS_EX_TOPMOST) != 0;
9875}
9876
9877void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
9878 PostMessageW(_RGFW->root->src.window, WM_NULL, 0, 0);
9879}
9880
9881void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) {
9882 MsgWaitForMultipleObjects(0, NULL, FALSE, (DWORD)waitMS, QS_ALLINPUT);
9883}
9884
9885u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 rgfw_keycode) {
9886 UINT vsc = RGFW_rgfwToApiKey(rgfw_keycode); /* Should return a Windows VK_* code */
9887 BYTE keyboardState[256] = {0};
9888
9889 if (!GetKeyboardState(keyboardState))
9890 return (u8)rgfw_keycode;
9891
9892 UINT vk = MapVirtualKeyW(vsc, MAPVK_VSC_TO_VK);
9893 HKL layout = GetKeyboardLayout(0);
9894
9895 wchar_t charBuffer[2] = {0};
9896 int result = ToUnicodeEx(vk, vsc, keyboardState, charBuffer, 1, 0, layout);
9897
9898 if (result <= 0)
9899 return (u8)rgfw_keycode;
9900
9901 return (u8)charBuffer[0];
9902}
9903
9904void RGFW_pollEvents(void) {
9905 RGFW_resetPrevState();
9906 MSG msg;
9907 while (PeekMessageA(&msg, NULL, 0u, 0u, PM_REMOVE)) {
9908 TranslateMessage(&msg);
9909 DispatchMessageA(&msg);
9910 }
9911}
9912
9913RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) {
9914 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9915 return IsWindowVisible(win->src.window) == 0 && !RGFW_window_isMinimized(win);
9916}
9917
9918RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) {
9919 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9920
9921 #ifndef __cplusplus
9922 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {0};
9923 #else
9924 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {};
9925 #endif
9926 GetWindowPlacement(win->src.window, &placement);
9927 return placement.showCmd == SW_SHOWMINIMIZED;
9928}
9929
9930RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) {
9931 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
9932
9933 #ifndef __cplusplus
9934 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {0};
9935 #else
9936 WINDOWPLACEMENT placement = {};
9937 #endif
9938 GetWindowPlacement(win->src.window, &placement);
9939 return placement.showCmd == SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED || IsZoomed(win->src.window);
9940}
9941
9942typedef struct { int iIndex; HMONITOR hMonitor; RGFW_monitor* monitors; } RGFW_mInfo;
9943#ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
9944RGFW_monitor RGFW_win32_createMonitor(HMONITOR src);
9945RGFW_monitor RGFW_win32_createMonitor(HMONITOR src) {
9946 RGFW_monitor monitor;
9947 RGFW_MEMSET(&monitor, 0, sizeof(monitor));
9948
9949 MONITORINFOEXW monitorInfo;
9950 monitorInfo.cbSize = sizeof(MONITORINFOEXW);
9951 GetMonitorInfoW(src, (LPMONITORINFO)&monitorInfo);
9952
9953 /* get the monitor's index */
9954 DISPLAY_DEVICEW dd;
9955 dd.cb = sizeof(dd);
9956
9957 DWORD deviceNum;
9958 for (deviceNum = 0; EnumDisplayDevicesW(NULL, deviceNum, &dd, 0); deviceNum++) {
9959 if (!(dd.StateFlags & DISPLAY_DEVICE_ACTIVE))
9960 continue;
9961
9962 DEVMODEW dm;
9963 ZeroMemory(&dm, sizeof(dm));
9964 dm.dmSize = sizeof(dm);
9965
9966 if (EnumDisplaySettingsW(dd.DeviceName, ENUM_CURRENT_SETTINGS, &dm)) {
9967 monitor.mode.refreshRate = dm.dmDisplayFrequency;
9968 RGFW_splitBPP(dm.dmBitsPerPel, &monitor.mode);
9969 }
9970
9971 DISPLAY_DEVICEW mdd;
9972 mdd.cb = sizeof(mdd);
9973
9974 if (EnumDisplayDevicesW(dd.DeviceName, (DWORD)deviceNum, &mdd, 0)) {
9975 RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(mdd.DeviceString, monitor.name, sizeof(monitor.name));
9976 monitor.name[sizeof(monitor.name) - 1] = '\0';
9977 break;
9978 }
9979 }
9980
9981 monitor.x = monitorInfo.rcWork.left;
9982 monitor.y = monitorInfo.rcWork.top;
9983 monitor.mode.w = (i32)(monitorInfo.rcMonitor.right - monitorInfo.rcMonitor.left);
9984 monitor.mode.h = (i32)(monitorInfo.rcMonitor.bottom - monitorInfo.rcMonitor.top);
9985
9986 HDC hdc = CreateDCW(monitorInfo.szDevice, NULL, NULL, NULL);
9987 /* get pixels per inch */
9988 float dpiX = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, LOGPIXELSX);
9989 float dpiY = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, LOGPIXELSX);
9990
9991 monitor.scaleX = dpiX / 96.0f;
9992 monitor.scaleY = dpiY / 96.0f;
9993 monitor.pixelRatio = dpiX >= 192.0f ? 2.0f : 1.0f;
9994
9995 monitor.physW = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, HORZSIZE) / 25.4f;
9996 monitor.physH = (float)GetDeviceCaps(hdc, VERTSIZE) / 25.4f;
9997 DeleteDC(hdc);
9998
9999 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
10000 RGFW_LOAD_LIBRARY(RGFW_Shcore_dll, "shcore.dll");
10001 RGFW_PROC_DEF(RGFW_Shcore_dll, GetDpiForMonitor);
10002
10003 if (GetDpiForMonitor != NULL) {
10004 u32 x, y;
10005 GetDpiForMonitor(src, MDT_EFFECTIVE_DPI, &x, &y);
10006 monitor.scaleX = (float) (x) / (float) 96.0f;
10007 monitor.scaleY = (float) (y) / (float) 96.0f;
10008 monitor.pixelRatio = dpiX >= 192.0f ? 2.0f : 1.0f;
10009 }
10010 #endif
10011
10012 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
10013 return monitor;
10014}
10015#endif /* RGFW_NO_MONITOR */
10016
10017#ifndef RGFW_NO_MONITOR
10018BOOL CALLBACK GetMonitorHandle(HMONITOR hMonitor, HDC hdcMonitor, LPRECT lprcMonitor, LPARAM dwData);
10019BOOL CALLBACK GetMonitorHandle(HMONITOR hMonitor, HDC hdcMonitor, LPRECT lprcMonitor, LPARAM dwData) {
10020 RGFW_UNUSED(hdcMonitor);
10021 RGFW_UNUSED(lprcMonitor);
10022
10023 RGFW_mInfo* info = (RGFW_mInfo*) dwData;
10024
10025
10026 if (info->iIndex >= 6)
10027 return FALSE;
10028
10029 info->monitors[info->iIndex] = RGFW_win32_createMonitor(hMonitor);
10030 info->iIndex++;
10031
10032 return TRUE;
10033}
10034
10035RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) {
10036 #ifdef __cplusplus
10037 return RGFW_win32_createMonitor(MonitorFromPoint({0, 0}, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY));
10038 #else
10039 return RGFW_win32_createMonitor(MonitorFromPoint((POINT){0, 0}, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY));
10040 #endif
10041}
10042
10043RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) {
10044 static RGFW_monitor monitors[6];
10045 RGFW_mInfo info;
10046 info.iIndex = 0;
10047 info.monitors = monitors;
10048
10049 EnumDisplayMonitors(NULL, NULL, GetMonitorHandle, (LPARAM) &info);
10050
10051 if (len != NULL) *len = (size_t)info.iIndex;
10052 return monitors;
10053}
10054
10055RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) {
10056 HMONITOR src = MonitorFromWindow(win->src.window, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY);
10057 return RGFW_win32_createMonitor(src);
10058}
10059
10060RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
10061 POINT p = { mon.x, mon.y };
10062 HMONITOR src = MonitorFromPoint(p, MONITOR_DEFAULTTOPRIMARY);
10063
10064 MONITORINFOEX monitorInfo;
10065 monitorInfo.cbSize = sizeof(MONITORINFOEX);
10066 GetMonitorInfoA(src, (LPMONITORINFO)&monitorInfo);
10067
10068 DISPLAY_DEVICEA dd;
10069 dd.cb = sizeof(dd);
10070
10071 /* Enumerate display devices */
10072 DWORD deviceNum;
10073 for (deviceNum = 0; EnumDisplayDevicesA(NULL, deviceNum, &dd, 0); deviceNum++) {
10074 if (!(dd.StateFlags & DISPLAY_DEVICE_ACTIVE))
10075 continue;
10076
10077 if (strcmp(dd.DeviceName, (const char*)monitorInfo.szDevice) != 0)
10078 continue;
10079
10080 DEVMODEA dm;
10081 ZeroMemory(&dm, sizeof(dm));
10082 dm.dmSize = sizeof(dm);
10083
10084 if (EnumDisplaySettingsA(dd.DeviceName, ENUM_CURRENT_SETTINGS, &dm)) {
10085 if (request & RGFW_monitorScale) {
10086 dm.dmFields |= DM_PELSWIDTH | DM_PELSHEIGHT;
10087 dm.dmPelsWidth = (u32)mode.w;
10088 dm.dmPelsHeight = (u32)mode.h;
10089 }
10090
10091 if (request & RGFW_monitorRefresh) {
10092 dm.dmFields |= DM_DISPLAYFREQUENCY;
10093 dm.dmDisplayFrequency = mode.refreshRate;
10094 }
10095
10096 if (request & RGFW_monitorRGB) {
10097 dm.dmFields |= DM_BITSPERPEL;
10098 dm.dmBitsPerPel = (DWORD)(mode.red + mode.green + mode.blue);
10099 }
10100
10101 if (ChangeDisplaySettingsExA(dd.DeviceName, &dm, NULL, CDS_TEST, NULL) == DISP_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL) {
10102 if (ChangeDisplaySettingsExA(dd.DeviceName, &dm, NULL, CDS_UPDATEREGISTRY, NULL) == DISP_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL)
10103 return RGFW_TRUE;
10104 return RGFW_FALSE;
10105 } else return RGFW_FALSE;
10106 }
10107 }
10108
10109 return RGFW_FALSE;
10110}
10111
10112#endif
10113HICON RGFW_loadHandleImage(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, BOOL icon);
10114HICON RGFW_loadHandleImage(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, BOOL icon) {
10115 BITMAPV5HEADER bi;
10116 ZeroMemory(&bi, sizeof(bi));
10117 bi.bV5Size = sizeof(bi);
10118 bi.bV5Width = (i32)w;
10119 bi.bV5Height = -((LONG) h);
10120 bi.bV5Planes = 1;
10121 bi.bV5BitCount = (WORD)32;
10122 bi.bV5Compression = BI_RGB;
10123 HDC dc = GetDC(NULL);
10124 u8* target = NULL;
10125
10126 HBITMAP color = CreateDIBSection(dc,
10127 (BITMAPINFO*) &bi, DIB_RGB_COLORS, (void**) &target,
10128 NULL, (DWORD) 0);
10129
10130 RGFW_copyImageData(target, w, h, RGFW_formatBGRA8, data, format);
10131 ReleaseDC(NULL, dc);
10132
10133 HBITMAP mask = CreateBitmap((i32)w, (i32)h, 1, 1, NULL);
10134
10135 ICONINFO ii;
10136 ZeroMemory(&ii, sizeof(ii));
10137 ii.fIcon = icon;
10138 ii.xHotspot = (u32)w / 2;
10139 ii.yHotspot = (u32)h / 2;
10140 ii.hbmMask = mask;
10141 ii.hbmColor = color;
10142
10143 HICON handle = CreateIconIndirect(&ii);
10144
10145 DeleteObject(color);
10146 DeleteObject(mask);
10147
10148 return handle;
10149}
10150RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
10151 HCURSOR cursor = (HCURSOR) RGFW_loadHandleImage(data, w, h, format, FALSE);
10152 return cursor;
10153}
10154
10155void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
10156 RGFW_ASSERT(win && mouse);
10157 SetClassLongPtrA(win->src.window, GCLP_HCURSOR, (LPARAM) mouse);
10158 SetCursor((HCURSOR)mouse);
10159}
10160
10161void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
10162 RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
10163 DestroyCursor((HCURSOR)mouse);
10164}
10165
10166RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) {
10167 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
10168}
10169
10170RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
10171 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10172
10173 static const u32 mouseIconSrc[16] = {OCR_NORMAL, OCR_NORMAL, OCR_IBEAM, OCR_CROSS, OCR_HAND, OCR_SIZEWE, OCR_SIZENS, OCR_SIZENWSE, OCR_SIZENESW, OCR_SIZEALL, OCR_NO};
10174 if (mouse > (sizeof(mouseIconSrc) / sizeof(u32)))
10175 return RGFW_FALSE;
10176
10177 char* icon = MAKEINTRESOURCEA(mouseIconSrc[mouse]);
10178
10179 SetClassLongPtrA(win->src.window, GCLP_HCURSOR, (LPARAM) LoadCursorA(NULL, icon));
10180 SetCursor(LoadCursorA(NULL, icon));
10181 return RGFW_TRUE;
10182}
10183
10184void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) {
10185 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_HIDE);
10186}
10187
10188void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) {
10189 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow) RGFW_window_focus(win);
10190 ShowWindow(win->src.window, SW_RESTORE);
10191}
10192
10193#define RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(x) if (x != NULL) FreeLibrary(x); x = NULL;
10194void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) {
10195 #ifndef RGFW_NO_DPI
10196 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(RGFW_Shcore_dll);
10197 #endif
10198
10199 #ifndef RGFW_NO_WINMM
10200 timeEndPeriod(1);
10201 #ifndef RGFW_NO_LOAD_WINMM
10202 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(RGFW_winmm_dll);
10203 #endif
10204 #endif
10205
10206 RGFW_FREE_LIBRARY(RGFW_wgl_dll);
10207
10208 RGFW_freeMouse(_RGFW->hiddenMouse);
10209 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoGlobal, "global context deinitialized");
10210}
10211
10212
10213void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) {
10214 RemovePropW(win->src.window, L"RGFW");
10215 ReleaseDC(win->src.window, win->src.hdc);
10216 DestroyWindow(win->src.window);
10218 if (win->src.hIconSmall) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconSmall);
10219 if (win->src.hIconBig) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconBig);
10220}
10221
10222void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
10223 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10224
10225 win->x = x;
10226 win->y = y;
10227 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOP, win->x, win->y, 0, 0, SWP_NOSIZE);
10228}
10229
10230void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
10231 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10232
10233 win->w = w;
10234 win->h = h;
10235 SetWindowPos(win->src.window, HWND_TOP, 0, 0, win->w + (i32)win->src.offsetW, win->h + (i32)win->src.offsetH, SWP_NOMOVE);
10236}
10237
10238
10239void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
10240 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10241
10242 wchar_t wide_name[256];
10243 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, name, -1, wide_name, 256);
10244 SetWindowTextW(win->src.window, wide_name);
10245}
10246
10247#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
10248void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
10249 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10250 COLORREF key = 0;
10251 BYTE alpha = 0;
10252 DWORD flags = 0;
10253 i32 exStyle = GetWindowLongW(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE);
10254
10255 if (exStyle & WS_EX_LAYERED)
10256 GetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, &key, &alpha, &flags);
10257
10258 if (passthrough)
10259 exStyle |= (WS_EX_TRANSPARENT | WS_EX_LAYERED);
10260 else {
10261 exStyle &= ~WS_EX_TRANSPARENT;
10262 if (exStyle & WS_EX_LAYERED && !(flags & LWA_ALPHA))
10263 exStyle &= ~WS_EX_LAYERED;
10264 }
10265
10266 SetWindowLongW(win->src.window, GWL_EXSTYLE, exStyle);
10267
10268 if (passthrough)
10269 SetLayeredWindowAttributes(win->src.window, key, alpha, flags);
10270}
10271#endif
10272
10273RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
10274 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10275 #ifndef RGFW_WIN95
10276 if (win->src.hIconSmall && (type & RGFW_iconWindow)) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconSmall);
10277 if (win->src.hIconBig && (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar)) DestroyIcon(win->src.hIconBig);
10278
10279 if (data == NULL) {
10280 HICON defaultIcon = LoadIcon(NULL, IDI_APPLICATION);
10281 if (type & RGFW_iconWindow)
10282 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_SMALL, (LPARAM)defaultIcon);
10283 if (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar)
10284 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_BIG, (LPARAM)defaultIcon);
10285 return RGFW_TRUE;
10286 }
10287
10288 if (type & RGFW_iconWindow) {
10289 win->src.hIconSmall = RGFW_loadHandleImage(data, w, h, format, TRUE);
10290 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_SMALL, (LPARAM)win->src.hIconSmall);
10291 }
10292 if (type & RGFW_iconTaskbar) {
10293 win->src.hIconBig = RGFW_loadHandleImage(data, w, h, format, TRUE);
10294 SendMessage(win->src.window, WM_SETICON, (WPARAM)ICON_BIG, (LPARAM)win->src.hIconBig);
10295 }
10296 return RGFW_TRUE;
10297 #else
10298 RGFW_UNUSED(img);
10299 RGFW_UNUSED(type);
10300 return RGFW_FALSE;
10301 #endif
10302}
10303
10304RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_readClipboardPtr(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
10305 /* Open the clipboard */
10306 if (OpenClipboard(NULL) == 0)
10307 return -1;
10308
10309 /* Get the clipboard data as a Unicode string */
10310 HANDLE hData = GetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT);
10311 if (hData == NULL) {
10312 CloseClipboard();
10313 return -1;
10314 }
10315
10316 wchar_t* wstr = (wchar_t*) GlobalLock(hData);
10317
10318 RGFW_ssize_t textLen = 0;
10319
10320 {
10321 setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.UTF-8");
10322
10323 textLen = (RGFW_ssize_t)wcstombs(NULL, wstr, 0) + 1;
10324 if (str != NULL && (RGFW_ssize_t)strCapacity <= textLen - 1)
10325 textLen = 0;
10326
10327 if (str != NULL && textLen) {
10328 if (textLen > 1)
10329 wcstombs(str, wstr, (size_t)(textLen));
10330
10331 str[textLen - 1] = '\0';
10332 }
10333 }
10334
10335 /* Release the clipboard data */
10336 GlobalUnlock(hData);
10337 CloseClipboard();
10338
10339 return textLen;
10340}
10341
10342void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
10343 HANDLE object;
10344 WCHAR* buffer;
10345
10346 object = GlobalAlloc(GMEM_MOVEABLE, (1 + textLen) * sizeof(WCHAR));
10347 if (!object)
10348 return;
10349
10350 buffer = (WCHAR*) GlobalLock(object);
10351 if (!buffer) {
10352 GlobalFree(object);
10353 return;
10354 }
10355
10356 MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, text, -1, buffer, (i32)textLen);
10357 GlobalUnlock(object);
10358
10359 if (!OpenClipboard(_RGFW->root->src.window)) {
10360 GlobalFree(object);
10361 return;
10362 }
10363
10364 EmptyClipboard();
10365 SetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT, object);
10366 CloseClipboard();
10367}
10368
10369void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
10370 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10371 win->internal.lastMouseX = x - win->x;
10372 win->internal.lastMouseX = y - win->y;
10373 SetCursorPos(x, y);
10374}
10375
10376#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
10377RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char * extension, size_t len) {
10378 const char* extensions = NULL;
10379
10380 RGFW_proc proc = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("wglGetExtensionsStringARB");
10381 RGFW_proc proc2 = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL("wglGetExtensionsStringEXT");
10382
10383 if (proc)
10384 extensions = ((const char* (*)(HDC))proc)(wglGetCurrentDC());
10385 else if (proc2)
10386 extensions = ((const char*(*)(void))proc2)();
10387 return extensions != NULL && RGFW_extensionSupportedStr(extensions, extension, len);
10388}
10389
10390RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) {
10391 RGFW_proc proc = (RGFW_proc)wglGetProcAddress(procname);
10392 if (proc)
10393 return proc;
10394
10395 return (RGFW_proc) GetProcAddress(RGFW_wgl_dll, procname);
10396}
10397
10398void RGFW_win32_loadOpenGLFuncs(HWND dummyWin) {
10399 if (wglSwapIntervalEXT != NULL && wglChoosePixelFormatARB != NULL && wglChoosePixelFormatARB != NULL)
10400 return;
10401
10402 HDC dummy_dc = GetDC(dummyWin);
10403 u32 pfd_flags = PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW | PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL | PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER;
10404
10405 PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd = {sizeof(pfd), 1, pfd_flags, PFD_TYPE_RGBA, 32, 8, PFD_MAIN_PLANE, 32, 8, 8, 8, 8, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32, 8, 0, PFD_MAIN_PLANE, 0, 0, 0, 0};
10406
10407 int dummy_pixel_format = ChoosePixelFormat(dummy_dc, &pfd);
10408 SetPixelFormat(dummy_dc, dummy_pixel_format, &pfd);
10409
10410 HGLRC dummy_context = wglCreateContext(dummy_dc);
10411
10412 HGLRC cur = wglGetCurrentContext();
10413 wglMakeCurrent(dummy_dc, dummy_context);
10414
10415 wglCreateContextAttribsARB = ((PFNWGLCREATECONTEXTATTRIBSARBPROC(WINAPI *)(const char*)) wglGetProcAddress)("wglCreateContextAttribsARB");
10416 wglChoosePixelFormatARB = ((PFNWGLCHOOSEPIXELFORMATARBPROC(WINAPI *)(const char*)) wglGetProcAddress)("wglChoosePixelFormatARB");
10417
10418 wglSwapIntervalEXT = (PFNWGLSWAPINTERVALEXTPROC)(RGFW_proc)wglGetProcAddress("wglSwapIntervalEXT");
10419 if (wglSwapIntervalEXT == NULL) {
10420 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load swap interval function");
10421 }
10422
10423 wglMakeCurrent(dummy_dc, cur);
10424 wglDeleteContext(dummy_context);
10425 ReleaseDC(dummyWin, dummy_dc);
10426}
10427
10428#define WGL_ACCELERATION_ARB 0x2003
10429#define WGL_FULL_ACCELERATION_ARB 0x2027
10430#define WGL_DRAW_TO_WINDOW_ARB 0x2001
10431#define WGL_PIXEL_TYPE_ARB 0x2013
10432#define WGL_TYPE_RGBA_ARB 0x202b
10433#define WGL_SUPPORT_OPENGL_ARB 0x2010
10434#define WGL_COLOR_BITS_ARB 0x2014
10435#define WGL_DOUBLE_BUFFER_ARB 0x2011
10436#define WGL_ALPHA_BITS_ARB 0x201b
10437#define WGL_DEPTH_BITS_ARB 0x2022
10438#define WGL_STENCIL_BITS_ARB 0x2023
10439#define WGL_STEREO_ARB 0x2012
10440#define WGL_AUX_BUFFERS_ARB 0x2024
10441#define WGL_RED_BITS_ARB 0x2015
10442#define WGL_GREEN_BITS_ARB 0x2017
10443#define WGL_BLUE_BITS_ARB 0x2019
10444#define WGL_ACCUM_RED_BITS_ARB 0x201e
10445#define WGL_ACCUM_GREEN_BITS_ARB 0x201f
10446#define WGL_ACCUM_BLUE_BITS_ARB 0x2020
10447#define WGL_ACCUM_ALPHA_BITS_ARB 0x2021
10448#define WGL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_EXT 0x3089
10449#define WGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_NO_ERROR_ARB 0x31b3
10450#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB 0x2097
10451#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE_ARB 0x0000
10452#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_ARB 0x2098
10453#define WGL_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB 0x2094
10454#define WGL_ACCESS_READ_WRITE_NV 0x00000001
10455#define WGL_COVERAGE_SAMPLES_NV 0x2042
10456#define WGL_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT 0x00000004
10457#define WGL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB 0x9126
10458#define WGL_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB 0x00000001
10459#define WGL_CONTEXT_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT_ARB 0x00000002
10460#define WGL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION_ARB 0x2091
10461#define WGL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION_ARB 0x2092
10462#define WGL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_ARB 0x20A9
10463#define WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB 0x2097
10464#define WGL_CONTEXT_DEBUG_BIT_ARB 0x00000001
10465#define WGL_CONTEXT_ROBUST_ACCESS_BIT_ARB 0x00000004
10466
10467RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
10468 const char flushControl[] = "WGL_ARB_context_flush_control";
10469 const char noError[] = "WGL_ARB_create_context_no_error";
10470 const char robustness[] = "WGL_ARB_create_context_robustness";
10471
10472 win->src.ctx.native = ctx;
10473 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
10474
10475 PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd;
10476 pfd.nSize = sizeof(PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR);
10477 pfd.nVersion = 1;
10478 pfd.dwFlags = PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW | PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL | PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER;
10479 pfd.iPixelType = PFD_TYPE_RGBA;
10480 pfd.iLayerType = PFD_MAIN_PLANE;
10481 pfd.cColorBits = 32;
10482 pfd.cAlphaBits = 8;
10483 pfd.cDepthBits = 24;
10484 pfd.cStencilBits = (BYTE)hints->stencil;
10485 pfd.cAuxBuffers = (BYTE)hints->auxBuffers;
10486 if (hints->stereo) pfd.dwFlags |= PFD_STEREO;
10487
10488 /* try to create the pixel format we want for OpenGL and then try to create an OpenGL context for the specified version */
10489 if (hints->renderer == RGFW_glSoftware)
10490 pfd.dwFlags |= PFD_GENERIC_FORMAT | PFD_GENERIC_ACCELERATED;
10491
10492 /* get pixel format, default to a basic pixel format */
10493 int pixel_format = ChoosePixelFormat(win->src.hdc, &pfd);
10494 if (wglChoosePixelFormatARB != NULL) {
10495 i32 pixel_format_attribs[50];
10496 RGFW_attribStack stack;
10497 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, pixel_format_attribs, 50);
10498
10499 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCELERATION_ARB, WGL_FULL_ACCELERATION_ARB);
10500 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_DRAW_TO_WINDOW_ARB, 1);
10501 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_PIXEL_TYPE_ARB, WGL_TYPE_RGBA_ARB);
10502 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_SUPPORT_OPENGL_ARB, 1);
10503 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_COLOR_BITS_ARB, 32);
10504 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_DOUBLE_BUFFER_ARB, 1);
10505 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ALPHA_BITS_ARB, hints->alpha);
10506 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_DEPTH_BITS_ARB, hints->depth);
10507 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_STENCIL_BITS_ARB, hints->stencil);
10508 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_STEREO_ARB, hints->stereo);
10509 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_AUX_BUFFERS_ARB, hints->auxBuffers);
10510 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_RED_BITS_ARB, hints->red);
10511 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_GREEN_BITS_ARB, hints->blue);
10512 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_BLUE_BITS_ARB, hints->green);
10513 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_RED_BITS_ARB, hints->accumRed);
10514 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_GREEN_BITS_ARB, hints->accumGreen);
10515 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_BLUE_BITS_ARB, hints->accumBlue);
10516 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_ACCUM_ALPHA_BITS_ARB, hints->accumAlpha);
10517
10518 if(hints->sRGB) {
10519 if (hints->profile != RGFW_glES)
10520 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE_ARB, 1);
10521 else
10522 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_COLORSPACE_SRGB_EXT, hints->sRGB);
10523 }
10524
10525 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_COVERAGE_SAMPLES_NV, hints->samples);
10526
10527 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
10528
10529 int new_pixel_format;
10530 UINT num_formats;
10531 wglChoosePixelFormatARB(win->src.hdc, pixel_format_attribs, 0, 1, &new_pixel_format, &num_formats);
10532 if (!num_formats)
10533 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to create a pixel format for WGL");
10534 else pixel_format = new_pixel_format;
10535 }
10536
10537 PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR suggested;
10538 if (!DescribePixelFormat(win->src.hdc, pixel_format, sizeof(suggested), &suggested) ||
10539 !SetPixelFormat(win->src.hdc, pixel_format, &pfd))
10540 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to set the WGL pixel format");
10541
10542 if (wglCreateContextAttribsARB != NULL) {
10543 /* create OpenGL/WGL context for the specified version */
10544 i32 attribs[40];
10545 RGFW_attribStack stack;
10546 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, attribs, 50);
10547
10548
10549 i32 mask = 0;
10550 switch (hints->profile) {
10551 case RGFW_glES: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_ES_PROFILE_BIT_EXT; break;
10552 case RGFW_glCompatibility: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_COMPATIBILITY_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
10553 case RGFW_glCore: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
10554 default: mask |= WGL_CONTEXT_CORE_PROFILE_BIT_ARB; break;
10555 }
10556
10557 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK_ARB, mask);
10558
10559 if (hints->minor || hints->major) {
10560 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->major);
10561 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION_ARB, hints->minor);
10562 }
10563
10564 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(noError, sizeof(noError)))
10565 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_OPENGL_NO_ERROR_ARB, hints->noError);
10566
10567 if (RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(flushControl, sizeof(flushControl))) {
10568 if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseFlush) {
10569 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB, WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH_ARB); /* WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB */
10570 } else if (hints->releaseBehavior == RGFW_glReleaseNone) {
10571 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_ARB, WGL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE_ARB);
10572 }
10573 }
10574
10575 i32 flags = 0;
10576 if (hints->debug) flags |= WGL_CONTEXT_DEBUG_BIT_ARB;
10577 if (hints->robustness && RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(robustness, sizeof(robustness))) flags |= WGL_CONTEXT_ROBUST_ACCESS_BIT_ARB;
10578 if (flags) {
10579 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, WGL_CONTEXT_FLAGS_ARB, flags);
10580 }
10581
10582
10583 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
10584
10585 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = (HGLRC)wglCreateContextAttribsARB(win->src.hdc, NULL, attribs);
10586 }
10587
10588 if (wglCreateContextAttribsARB == NULL || win->src.ctx.native->ctx == NULL) { /* fall back to a default context (probably OpenGL 2 or something) */
10589 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to create an accelerated OpenGL Context.");
10590 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = wglCreateContext(win->src.hdc);
10591 }
10592
10593 ReleaseDC(win->src.window, win->src.hdc);
10594 win->src.hdc = GetDC(win->src.window);
10595
10596 if (hints->share) {
10597 wglShareLists((HGLRC)RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(), hints->share->ctx);
10598 }
10599
10600 wglMakeCurrent(win->src.hdc, win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
10601 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
10602 return RGFW_TRUE;
10603}
10604
10605void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
10606 wglDeleteContext((HGLRC) ctx->ctx);
10607 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = NULL;
10608 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
10609}
10610
10611void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
10612 if (win == NULL)
10613 wglMakeCurrent(NULL, NULL);
10614 else
10615 wglMakeCurrent(win->src.hdc, (HGLRC) win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
10616}
10617void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) {
10618 return wglGetCurrentContext();
10619}
10620void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
10621 RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
10622 SwapBuffers(win->src.hdc);
10623}
10624
10625void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
10626 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
10627 if (wglSwapIntervalEXT == NULL || wglSwapIntervalEXT(swapInterval) == FALSE)
10628 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to set swap interval");
10629}
10630#endif
10631
10632RGFW_bool RGFW_createUTF8FromWideStringWin32(const WCHAR* source, char* output, size_t max) {
10633 i32 size = 0;
10634 if (source == NULL) {
10635 return RGFW_FALSE;
10636 }
10637 size = WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, source, -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
10638 if (!size) {
10639 return RGFW_FALSE;
10640 }
10641
10642 if (size > (i32)max)
10643 size = (i32)max;
10644
10645 if (!WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, source, -1, output, size, NULL, NULL)) {
10646 return RGFW_FALSE;
10647 }
10648
10649 output[size] = 0;
10650 return RGFW_TRUE;
10651}
10652
10653#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
10654WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
10655 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
10656 WGPUSurfaceSourceWindowsHWND fromHwnd = {0};
10657 fromHwnd.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceWindowsHWND;
10658 fromHwnd.hwnd = window->src.window; /* Get HWND from RGFW window source */
10659 if (!fromHwnd.hwnd) {
10660 fprintf(stderr, "RGFW Error: HWND is NULL for Windows window.\n");
10661 return NULL;
10662 }
10663 fromHwnd.hinstance = GetModuleHandle(NULL); /* Get current process HINSTANCE */
10664
10665 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromHwnd.chain;
10666 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
10667}
10668#endif
10669
10670#endif /* RGFW_WINDOWS */
10671
10672/*
10673 End of Windows defines
10674*/

10682
10683*/

10687 based on silicon.h
10688 start of cocoa wrapper
10689*/

10749typedef RGFW_ENUM(NSInteger, NSOpenGLContextParameter) {
10750 NSOpenGLContextParameterSwapInterval = 222, /* 1 param. 0 -> Don't sync, 1 -> Sync to vertical retrace */
10751 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceOrder = 235, /* 1 param. 1 -> Above Window (default), -1 -> Below Window */
10752 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceOpacity = 236, /* 1 param. 1-> Surface is opaque (default), 0 -> non-opaque */
10753 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceBackingSize = 304, /* 2 params. Width/height of surface backing size */
10754 NSOpenGLContextParameterReclaimResources = 308, /* 0 params. */
10755 NSOpenGLContextParameterCurrentRendererID = 309, /* 1 param. Retrieves the current renderer ID */
10756 NSOpenGLContextParameterGPUVertexProcessing = 310, /* 1 param. Currently processing vertices with GPU (get) */
10757 NSOpenGLContextParameterGPUFragmentProcessing = 311, /* 1 param. Currently processing fragments with GPU (get) */
10758 NSOpenGLContextParameterHasDrawable = 314, /* 1 param. Boolean returned if drawable is attached */
10759 NSOpenGLContextParameterMPSwapsInFlight = 315, /* 1 param. Max number of swaps queued by the MP GL engine */
10760
10761 NSOpenGLContextParameterSwapRectangle API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 200, /* 4 params. Set or get the swap rectangle {x, y, w, h} */
10762 NSOpenGLContextParameterSwapRectangleEnable API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 201, /* Enable or disable the swap rectangle */
10763 NSOpenGLContextParameterRasterizationEnable API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 221, /* Enable or disable all rasterization */
10764 NSOpenGLContextParameterStateValidation API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 301, /* Validate state for multi-screen functionality */
10765 NSOpenGLContextParametectxaceSurfaceVolatile API_DEPRECATED("", macos(10.0, 10.14)) = 306, /* 1 param. Surface volatile state */
10766};

10769 NSWindowCloseButton = 0,
10770 NSWindowMiniaturizeButton = 1,
10771 NSWindowZoomButton = 2,
10772 NSWindowToolbarButton = 3,
10773 NSWindowDocumentIconButton = 4,

10778#define NSPasteboardTypeURL "public.url"
10779#define NSPasteboardTypeFileURL "public.file-url"
10780#define NSTrackingMouseEnteredAndExited 0x01
10781#define NSTrackingMouseMoved 0x02
10782#define NSTrackingCursorUpdate 0x04
10783#define NSTrackingActiveWhenFirstResponder 0x10
10784#define NSTrackingActiveInKeyWindow 0x20
10785#define NSTrackingActiveInActiveApp 0x40
10786#define NSTrackingActiveAlways 0x80
10787#define NSTrackingAssumeInside 0x100
10788#define NSTrackingInVisibleRect 0x200
10789#define NSTrackingEnabledDuringMouseDrag 0x400
10790enum {
10791 NSOpenGLPFAAllRenderers = 1, /* choose from all available renderers */
10792 NSOpenGLPFATripleBuffer = 3, /* choose a triple buffered pixel format */
10793 NSOpenGLPFADoubleBuffer = 5, /* choose a double buffered pixel format */
10794 NSOpenGLPFAAuxBuffers = 7, /* number of aux buffers */
10795 NSOpenGLPFAColorSize = 8, /* number of color buffer bits */
10796 NSOpenGLPFAAlphaSize = 11, /* number of alpha component bits */
10797 NSOpenGLPFADepthSize = 12, /* number of depth buffer bits */
10798 NSOpenGLPFAStencilSize = 13, /* number of stencil buffer bits */
10799 NSOpenGLPFAAccumSize = 14, /* number of accum buffer bits */
10800 NSOpenGLPFAMinimumPolicy = 51, /* never choose smaller buffers than requested */
10801 NSOpenGLPFAMaximumPolicy = 52, /* choose largest buffers of type requested */
10802 NSOpenGLPFASampleBuffers = 55, /* number of multi sample buffers */
10803 NSOpenGLPFASamples = 56, /* number of samples per multi sample buffer */
10804 NSOpenGLPFAAuxDepthStencil = 57, /* each aux buffer has its own depth stencil */
10805 NSOpenGLPFAColorFloat = 58, /* color buffers store floating point pixels */
10806 NSOpenGLPFAMultisample = 59, /* choose multisampling */
10807 NSOpenGLPFASupersample = 60, /* choose supersampling */
10808 NSOpenGLPFASampleAlpha = 61, /* request alpha filtering */
10809 NSOpenGLPFARendererID = 70, /* request renderer by ID */
10810 NSOpenGLPFANoRecovery = 72, /* disable all failure recovery systems */
10811 NSOpenGLPFAAccelerated = 73, /* choose a hardware accelerated renderer */
10812 NSOpenGLPFAClosestPolicy = 74, /* choose the closest color buffer to request */
10813 NSOpenGLPFABackingStore = 76, /* back buffer contents are valid after swap */
10814 NSOpenGLPFAScreenMask = 84, /* bit mask of supported physical screens */
10815 NSOpenGLPFAAllowOfflineRenderers = 96, /* allow use of offline renderers */
10816 NSOpenGLPFAAcceleratedCompute = 97, /* choose a hardware accelerated compute device */
10817 NSOpenGLPFAOpenGLProfile = 99, /* specify an OpenGL Profile to use */
10818 NSOpenGLProfileVersionLegacy = 0x1000, /* The requested profile is a legacy (pre-OpenGL 3.0) profile. */
10819 NSOpenGLProfileVersion3_2Core = 0x3200, /* The 3.2 Profile of OpenGL */
10820 NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core = 0x3200, /* The 4.1 profile of OpenGL */
10821 NSOpenGLPFAVirtualScreenCount = 128, /* number of virtual screens in this format */
10822 NSOpenGLPFAStereo = 6,
10823 NSOpenGLPFAOffScreen = 53,
10824 NSOpenGLPFAFullScreen = 54,
10825 NSOpenGLPFASingleRenderer = 71,
10826 NSOpenGLPFARobust = 75,
10827 NSOpenGLPFAMPSafe = 78,
10828 NSOpenGLPFAWindow = 80,
10829 NSOpenGLPFAMultiScreen = 81,
10830 NSOpenGLPFACompliant = 83,
10831 NSOpenGLPFAPixelBuffer = 90,
10832 NSOpenGLPFARemotePixelBuffer = 91,
10833};

10837};

10851 NSBitmapFormatAlphaNonpremultiplied = 1 << 1, /* 0 means is premultiplied */
10852 NSBitmapFormatFloatingpointSamples = 1 << 2, /* 0 is integer */
10853
10854 NSBitmapFormatSixteenBitLittleEndian = (1 << 8),
10855 NSBitmapFormatThirtyTwoBitLittleEndian = (1 << 9),
10856 NSBitmapFormatSixteenBitBigEndian = (1 << 10),
10857 NSBitmapFormatThirtyTwoBitBigEndian = (1 << 11)
10858};

10864
10865#ifdef __arm64__
10866 /* ARM just uses objc_msgSend */
10867#define abi_objc_msgSend_stret objc_msgSend
10868#define abi_objc_msgSend_fpret objc_msgSend
10869#else /* __i386__ */
10870 /* x86 just uses abi_objc_msgSend_fpret and (NSColor *)objc_msgSend_id respectively */
10871#define abi_objc_msgSend_stret objc_msgSend_stret
10872#define abi_objc_msgSend_fpret objc_msgSend_fpret
10873#endif
10874
10875#define NSAlloc(nsclass) objc_msgSend_id((id)nsclass, sel_registerName("alloc"))
10876#define objc_msgSend_bool(x, y) ((BOOL (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
10877#define objc_msgSend_void(x, y) ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
10878#define objc_msgSend_void_id(x, y, z) ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend) ((id)x, (SEL)y, (id)z)
10879#define objc_msgSend_uint(x, y) ((NSUInteger (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
10880#define objc_msgSend_void_bool(x, y, z) ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (BOOL)z)
10881#define objc_msgSend_bool_void(x, y) ((BOOL (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
10882#define objc_msgSend_void_SEL(x, y, z) ((void (*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (SEL)z)
10883#define objc_msgSend_id(x, y) ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y)
10884#define objc_msgSend_id_id(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (id)z)
10885#define objc_msgSend_id_bool(x, y, z) ((BOOL (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (id)z)
10886#define objc_msgSend_int(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (int)z)
10887#define objc_msgSend_arr(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (int)z)
10888#define objc_msgSend_ptr(x, y, z) ((id (*)(id, SEL, void*))objc_msgSend) ((id)(x), (SEL)y, (void*)z)
10889#define objc_msgSend_class(x, y) ((id (*)(Class, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((Class)(x), (SEL)y)
10890#define objc_msgSend_class_char(x, y, z) ((id (*)(Class, SEL, char*))objc_msgSend) ((Class)(x), (SEL)y, (char*)z)
10891
10892#define NSRelease(obj) objc_msgSend_void((id)obj, sel_registerName("release"))
10893RGFWDEF id NSString_stringWithUTF8String(const char* str);
10894id NSString_stringWithUTF8String(const char* str) {
10895 return ((id(*)(id, SEL, const char*))objc_msgSend) ((id)objc_getClass("NSString"), sel_registerName("stringWithUTF8String:"), str);
10896}
10897
10898const char* NSString_to_char(id str);
10899const char* NSString_to_char(id str) {
10900 return ((const char* (*)(id, SEL)) objc_msgSend) ((id)(id)str, sel_registerName("UTF8String"));
10901}
10902
10903unsigned char* NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(id imageRep);
10904unsigned char* NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(id imageRep) {
10905 return ((unsigned char* (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)imageRep, sel_registerName("bitmapData"));
10906}
10907
10908id NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(unsigned char** planes, NSInteger width, NSInteger height, NSInteger bps, NSInteger spp, bool alpha, bool isPlanar, const char* colorSpaceName, NSBitmapFormat bitmapFormat, NSInteger rowBytes, NSInteger pixelBits);
10909id NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(unsigned char** planes, NSInteger width, NSInteger height, NSInteger bps, NSInteger spp, bool alpha, bool isPlanar, const char* colorSpaceName, NSBitmapFormat bitmapFormat, NSInteger rowBytes, NSInteger pixelBits) {
10910 SEL func = sel_registerName("initWithBitmapDataPlanes:pixelsWide:pixelsHigh:bitsPerSample:samplesPerPixel:hasAlpha:isPlanar:colorSpaceName:bitmapFormat:bytesPerRow:bitsPerPixel:");
10911
10912 return (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, unsigned char**, NSInteger, NSInteger, NSInteger, NSInteger, bool, bool, id, NSBitmapFormat, NSInteger, NSInteger))objc_msgSend)
10913 (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSBitmapImageRep")), func, planes, width, height, bps, spp, alpha, isPlanar, NSString_stringWithUTF8String(colorSpaceName), bitmapFormat, rowBytes, pixelBits);
10914}
10915
10916id NSColor_colorWithSRGB(CGFloat red, CGFloat green, CGFloat blue, CGFloat alpha);
10917id NSColor_colorWithSRGB(CGFloat red, CGFloat green, CGFloat blue, CGFloat alpha) {
10918 Class nsclass = objc_getClass("NSColor");
10919 SEL func = sel_registerName("colorWithSRGBRed:green:blue:alpha:");
10920 return ((id(*)(id, SEL, CGFloat, CGFloat, CGFloat, CGFloat))objc_msgSend)
10921 ((id)nsclass, func, red, green, blue, alpha);
10922}
10923
10924id NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(void);
10925id NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(void) {
10926 return (id) objc_msgSend_id((id)objc_getClass("NSPasteboard"), sel_registerName("generalPasteboard"));
10927}
10928
10929id* cstrToNSStringArray(char** strs, size_t len);
10930id* cstrToNSStringArray(char** strs, size_t len) {
10931 static id nstrs[6];
10932 size_t i;
10933 for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
10934 nstrs[i] = NSString_stringWithUTF8String(strs[i]);
10935
10936 return nstrs;
10937}
10938
10939const char* NSPasteboard_stringForType(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType dataType, size_t* len);
10940const char* NSPasteboard_stringForType(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType dataType, size_t* len) {
10941 SEL func = sel_registerName("stringForType:");
10942 id nsstr = NSString_stringWithUTF8String((const char*)dataType);
10943 id nsString = ((id(*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(pasteboard, func, nsstr);
10944 const char* str = NSString_to_char(nsString);
10945 if (len != NULL)
10946 *len = (size_t)((NSUInteger(*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend)(nsString, sel_registerName("maximumLengthOfBytesUsingEncoding:"), 4);
10947 return str;
10948}
10949
10950id c_array_to_NSArray(void* array, size_t len);
10951id c_array_to_NSArray(void* array, size_t len) {
10952 return ((id (*)(id, SEL, void*, NSUInteger))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc(objc_getClass("NSArray")), sel_registerName("initWithObjects:count:"), array, len);
10953}
10954
10955
10956void NSregisterForDraggedTypes(id view, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len);
10957void NSregisterForDraggedTypes(id view, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len) {
10958 id* ntypes = cstrToNSStringArray((char**)newTypes, len);
10959
10960 id array = c_array_to_NSArray(ntypes, len);
10961 objc_msgSend_void_id(view, sel_registerName("registerForDraggedTypes:"), array);
10962 NSRelease(array);
10963}
10964
10965NSInteger NSPasteBoard_declareTypes(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len, void* owner);
10966NSInteger NSPasteBoard_declareTypes(id pasteboard, NSPasteboardType* newTypes, size_t len, void* owner) {
10967 id* ntypes = cstrToNSStringArray((char**)newTypes, len);
10968
10969 SEL func = sel_registerName("declareTypes:owner:");
10970
10971 id array = c_array_to_NSArray(ntypes, len);
10972
10973 NSInteger output = ((NSInteger(*)(id, SEL, id, void*))objc_msgSend)
10974 (pasteboard, func, array, owner);
10975 NSRelease(array);
10976
10977 return output;
10978}
10979
10980#define NSRetain(obj) objc_msgSend_void((id)obj, sel_registerName("retain"))
10981
10982/*
10983 End of cocoa wrapper
10984*/
10985
10986static id RGFW__osxCustomInitWithRGFWWindow(id self, SEL _cmd, RGFW_window* win) {
10987 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
10988 struct objc_super s = { self, class_getSuperclass(object_getClass(self)) };
10989 self = ((id (*)(struct objc_super*, SEL))objc_msgSendSuper)(&s, sel_registerName("init"));
10990
10991 if (self != nil) {
10992 object_setInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", win);
10993 object_setInstanceVariable(self, "trackingArea", nil);
10994
10995 object_setInstanceVariable(
10996 self, "markedText",
10997 ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(
10998 ((id (*)(Class, SEL))objc_msgSend)(objc_getClass("NSMutableAttributedString"), sel_registerName("alloc")),
10999 sel_registerName("init")
11000 )
11001 );
11002
11003 ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(self, sel_registerName("updateTrackingAreas"));
11004
11005 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(
11006 self, sel_registerName("registerForDraggedTypes:"),
11007 ((id (*)(Class, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(
11008 objc_getClass("NSArray"),
11009 sel_registerName("arrayWithObject:"),
11010 ((id (*)(Class, SEL, const char*))objc_msgSend)(
11011 objc_getClass("NSString"),
11012 sel_registerName("stringWithUTF8String:"),
11013 "public.url"
11014 )
11015 )
11016 );
11017 }
11018
11019 return self;
11020}
11021
11022static u32 RGFW_OnClose(id self) {
11023 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11024 object_getInstanceVariable(self, (const char*)"RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11025 if (win == NULL)
11026 return true;
11027
11028 RGFW_window_setShouldClose(win, RGFW_TRUE);
11029 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_quit; e.common.win = win);
11030 RGFW_windowQuitCallback(win);
11031
11032 return false;
11033}
11034
11035/* NOTE(EimaMei): Fixes the constant clicking when the app is running under a terminal. */
11036static bool RGFW__osxAcceptsFirstResponder(void) { return true; }
11037static bool RGFW__osxPerformKeyEquivalent(id event) { RGFW_UNUSED(event); return true; }
11038
11039static NSDragOperation RGFW__osxDraggingEntered(id self, SEL sel, id sender) {
11040 RGFW_UNUSED(sender); RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11041
11042 return NSDragOperationCopy;
11043}
11044static NSDragOperation RGFW__osxDraggingUpdated(id self, SEL sel, id sender) {
11045 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11046
11047 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11048
11049 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11050 if (win == NULL || (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND)))
11051 return 0;
11052 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDragFlag)) return NSDragOperationCopy;
11053
11054 NSPoint p = ((NSPoint(*)(id, SEL)) objc_msgSend)(sender, sel_registerName("draggingLocation"));
11055 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_dataDrag;
11056 e.mouse.x = (i32)p.x; e.mouse.y = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
11057 e.common.win = win);
11058
11059 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
11060 _RGFW->windowState.dataDragging = RGFW_TRUE;
11061 _RGFW->windowState.dropX = (i32)p.x;
11062 _RGFW->windowState.dropY = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
11063
11064 RGFW_dataDragCallback(win, (i32) p.x, (i32) (win->h - p.y));
11065 return NSDragOperationCopy;
11066}
11067static bool RGFW__osxPrepareForDragOperation(id self) {
11068 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11069 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11070 if (win == NULL || (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag)))
11071 return true;
11072
11073 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND)) {
11074 return false;
11075 }
11076
11077 return true;
11078}
11079
11080void RGFW__osxDraggingEnded(id self, SEL sel, id sender);
11081void RGFW__osxDraggingEnded(id self, SEL sel, id sender) { RGFW_UNUSED(sender); RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(sel); return; }
11082
11083static bool RGFW__osxPerformDragOperation(id self, SEL sel, id sender) {
11084 RGFW_UNUSED(sender); RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11085
11086 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11087 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11088
11089 if (win == NULL || (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag)))
11090 return false;
11091
11092 /* id pasteBoard = objc_msgSend_id(sender, sel_registerName("draggingPasteboard")); */
11093
11094 id pasteBoard = objc_msgSend_id(sender, sel_registerName("draggingPasteboard"));
11095
11096 /* Get the types of data available on the pasteboard */
11097 id types = objc_msgSend_id(pasteBoard, sel_registerName("types"));
11098
11099 /* Get the string type for file URLs */
11100 id fileURLsType = objc_msgSend_class_char(objc_getClass("NSString"), sel_registerName("stringWithUTF8String:"), "NSFilenamesPboardType");
11101
11102 /* Check if the pasteboard contains file URLs */
11103 if (objc_msgSend_id_bool(types, sel_registerName("containsObject:"), fileURLsType) == 0) {
11104 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errClipboard, "No files found on the pasteboard.");
11105 return 0;
11106 }
11107
11108 id fileURLs = objc_msgSend_id_id(pasteBoard, sel_registerName("propertyListForType:"), fileURLsType);
11109 int count = ((int (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(fileURLs, sel_registerName("count"));
11110
11111 if (count == 0)
11112 return 0;
11113
11114 RGFW_event event;
11115 event.drop.files = (char**)(void*)_RGFW->files;
11116
11117 u32 i;
11118 for (i = 0; i < (u32)count; i++) {
11119 id fileURL = objc_msgSend_arr(fileURLs, sel_registerName("objectAtIndex:"), i);
11120 const char *filePath = ((const char* (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(fileURL, sel_registerName("UTF8String"));
11121 RGFW_STRNCPY(event.drop.files[i], filePath, RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1);
11122 event.drop.files[i][RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1] = '\0';
11123 }
11124
11125 event.drop.count = (size_t)count;
11126 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
11127 e.drop.count = (size_t)count;
11128 e.drop.files = event.drop.files;
11129 e.common.win = win);
11130
11131 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
11132 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
11133 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = event.drop.count;
11134 RGFW_dataDropCallback(win, event.drop.files, event.drop.count);
11135
11136 return false;
11137}
11138
11139#ifndef RGFW_NO_IOKIT
11140#include <IOKit/IOKitLib.h>
11141
11142u32 RGFW_osx_getFallbackRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID displayID);
11143u32 RGFW_osx_getFallbackRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID displayID) {
11144 u32 refreshRate = 0;
11145 io_iterator_t it;
11146 io_service_t service;
11147 CFNumberRef indexRef, clockRef, countRef;
11148 u32 clock, count;
11149
11150#ifdef kIOMainPortDefault
11151 if (IOServiceGetMatchingServices(kIOMainPortDefault, IOServiceMatching("IOFramebuffer"), &it) != 0)
11152#elif defined(kIOMasterPortDefault)
11153 if (IOServiceGetMatchingServices(kIOMainPortDefault, IOServiceMatching("IOFramebuffer"), &it) != 0)
11154#endif
11155 return RGFW_FALSE;
11156
11157 while ((service = IOIteratorNext(it)) != 0) {
11158 u32 index;
11159 indexRef = (CFNumberRef)IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(service, CFSTR("IOFramebufferOpenGLIndex"), kCFAllocatorDefault, kNilOptions);
11160 if (indexRef == 0) continue;
11161
11162 if (CFNumberGetValue(indexRef, kCFNumberIntType, &index) && CGOpenGLDisplayMaskToDisplayID(1 << index) == displayID) {
11163 CFRelease(indexRef);
11164 break;
11165 }
11166
11167 CFRelease(indexRef);
11168 }
11169
11170 if (service) {
11171 clockRef = (CFNumberRef)IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(service, CFSTR("IOFBCurrentPixelClock"), kCFAllocatorDefault, kNilOptions);
11172 if (clockRef) {
11173 if (CFNumberGetValue(clockRef, kCFNumberIntType, &clock) && clock) {
11174 countRef = (CFNumberRef)IORegistryEntryCreateCFProperty(service, CFSTR("IOFBCurrentPixelCount"), kCFAllocatorDefault, kNilOptions);
11175 if (countRef && CFNumberGetValue(countRef, kCFNumberIntType, &count) && count) {
11176 float rate = (float)((double)clock / (double) count);
11177 refreshRate = (u32)RGFW_ROUND(rate);
11178 CFRelease(countRef);
11179 }
11180 }
11181 CFRelease(clockRef);
11182 }
11183 }
11184
11185 IOObjectRelease(it);
11186 return refreshRate;
11187}
11188#endif
11189
11190void RGFW_moveToMacOSResourceDir(void) {
11191 char resourcesPath[256];
11192
11193 CFBundleRef bundle = CFBundleGetMainBundle();
11194 if (!bundle)
11195 return;
11196
11197 CFURLRef resourcesURL = CFBundleCopyResourcesDirectoryURL(bundle);
11198 CFStringRef last = CFURLCopyLastPathComponent(resourcesURL);
11199
11200 if (
11201 CFStringCompare(CFSTR("Resources"), last, 0) != kCFCompareEqualTo ||
11202 CFURLGetFileSystemRepresentation(resourcesURL, true, (u8*) resourcesPath, 255) == 0
11203 ) {
11204 CFRelease(last);
11205 CFRelease(resourcesURL);
11206 return;
11207 }
11208
11209 CFRelease(last);
11210 CFRelease(resourcesURL);
11211
11212 chdir(resourcesPath);
11213}
11214
11215
11216static void RGFW__osxWindowDeminiaturize(id self, SEL sel) {
11217 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11218 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11219 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11220 if (win == NULL) return;
11221
11222 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMinimize;
11223 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMinimizedFlag)) return;
11224 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRestored; e.common.win = win);
11225 RGFW_windowRestoredCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
11226
11227}
11228static void RGFW__osxWindowMiniaturize(id self, SEL sel) {
11229 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11230 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11231 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11232 if (win == NULL) return;
11233
11234 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowMinimize;
11235 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMinimizedFlag)) return;
11236 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMinimized; e.common.win = win);
11237 RGFW_windowMinimizedCallback(win);
11238
11239}
11240
11241static void RGFW__osxWindowBecameKey(id self, SEL sel) {
11242 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11243 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11244 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11245 if (win == NULL) return;
11246
11247
11248 win->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
11249 if ((win->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(win);
11250 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return;
11251
11252 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusIn; e.common.win = win);
11253 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_TRUE);
11254}
11255
11256static void RGFW__osxWindowResignKey(id self, SEL sel) {
11257 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11258 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11259 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11260 if (win == NULL) return;
11261
11262 RGFW_window_focusLost(win);
11263 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return;
11264
11265 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusOut; e.common.win = win);
11266 RGFW_focusCallback(win, RGFW_FALSE);
11267}
11268
11269static void RGFW__osxDidWindowResize(id self, SEL _cmd, id notification) {
11270 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd); RGFW_UNUSED(notification);
11271 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11272 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11273 if (win == NULL) return;
11274
11275 NSRect frame;
11276 if (win->src.view) frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("frame"));
11277 else return;
11278
11279 if (frame.size.width == 0 || frame.size.height == 0) return;
11280 win->w = (i32)frame.size.width;
11281 win->h = (i32)frame.size.height;
11282
11283 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
11284 if ((i32)mon.mode.w == win->w && (i32)mon.mode.h - 102 <= win->h) {
11285 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMaximize;
11286 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMaximizedFlag)) return;
11287 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMaximized; e.common.win = win);
11288 RGFW_windowMaximizedCallback(win, 0, 0, win->w, win->h);
11289 } else if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowMaximize) {
11290 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowMaximize;
11291 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRestoredFlag)) return;
11292 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRestored; e.common.win = win);
11293 RGFW_windowRestoredCallback(win, win->x, win->y, win->w, win->h);
11294
11295 }
11296
11297 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return;
11298
11299 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = win);
11300 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(win, win->w, win->h);
11301}
11302
11303static void RGFW__osxWindowMove(id self, SEL sel) {
11304 RGFW_UNUSED(sel);
11305
11306 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11307 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11308 if (win == NULL) return;
11309
11310 NSRect frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("frame"));
11311 win->x = (i32) frame.origin.x;
11312 win->y = (i32) frame.origin.y;
11313
11314 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return;
11315 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowMoved; e.common.win = win);
11316 RGFW_windowMovedCallback(win, win->x, win->y);
11317}

11319static void RGFW__osxViewDidChangeBackingProperties(id self, SEL _cmd) {
11320 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11321 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11322 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11323 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_scaleUpdatedFlag)) return;
11324
11325 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
11326 RGFW_scaleUpdatedCallback(win, mon.scaleX, mon.scaleY);
11327 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_scaleUpdated; e.scale.x = mon.scaleX; e.scale.y = mon.scaleY ; e.common.win = win);
11328}

11330static BOOL RGFW__osxWantsUpdateLayer(id self, SEL _cmd) { RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd); return YES; }
11331
11332static void RGFW__osxUpdateLayer(id self, SEL _cmd) {
11333 RGFW_UNUSED(self); RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11334 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11335 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11336 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowRefreshFlag)) return;
11337 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
11338}

11340static void RGFW__osxDrawRect(id self, SEL _cmd, CGRect rect) {
11341 RGFW_UNUSED(rect); RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11342 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11343 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11344 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_scaleUpdatedFlag)) return;
11345
11346 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowRefresh; e.common.win = win);
11347 RGFW_windowRefreshCallback(win);
11348}
11349
11350static void RGFW__osxMouseEntered(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11351 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11352 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11353 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11354 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseEnterFlag)) return;
11355
11356 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_TRUE;
11357 _RGFW->windowState.win = win;
11358 _RGFW->windowState.mouseEnter = RGFW_TRUE;
11359
11360 RGFW_event e;
11361 e.type = RGFW_mouseEnter;
11362 NSPoint p = ((NSPoint(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("locationInWindow"));
11363 e.mouse.x = (i32)p.x;
11364 e.mouse.y = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
11365 e.common.win = win;
11366
11367 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11368 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, e.mouse.x, e.mouse.y, 1);
11369}
11370
11371static void RGFW__osxMouseExited(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11372 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd); RGFW_UNUSED(event);
11373 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11374 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11375 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseLeaveFlag)) return;
11376
11377
11378 win->internal.mouseInside = RGFW_FALSE;
11379 _RGFW->windowState.winLeave = win;
11380 _RGFW->windowState.mouseLeave = RGFW_TRUE;
11381
11382 RGFW_event e;
11383 e.type = RGFW_mouseLeave;
11384 e.mouse.x = 0;
11385 e.mouse.y = 0;
11386 e.common.win = win;
11387
11388 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11389 RGFW_mouseNotifyCallback(win, e.mouse.x, e.mouse.y, 0);
11390}
11391
11392static void RGFW__osxKeyDown(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11393 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11394 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11395 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11396 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag)) return;
11397
11398 RGFW_event e;
11399 u32 key = (u16)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("keyCode"));
11400 u32 mappedKey = (u32)*(((char*)(const char*)NSString_to_char(((id(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("charactersIgnoringModifiers")))));
11401 if ((u8)mappedKey == 239) mappedKey = 0;
11402
11403 e.key.sym = (u8)mappedKey;
11404 e.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(key);
11405 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current;
11406 e.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
11407 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyPressed(win, e.key.value);
11408 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current = 1;
11409 e.common.win = win;
11410
11411 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11412 RGFW_keyCallback(win, e.key.value, e.key.sym, win->internal.mod, e.key.repeat, 1);
11413}
11414
11415static void RGFW__osxKeyUp(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11416 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11417 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11418 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11419 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag)) return;
11420
11421 RGFW_event e;
11422 u32 key = (u16)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("keyCode"));
11423 u32 mappedKey = (u32)*(((char*)(const char*)NSString_to_char(((id(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("charactersIgnoringModifiers")))));
11424 if ((u8)mappedKey == 239) mappedKey = 0;
11425
11426 e.key.sym = (u8)mappedKey;
11427 e.key.value = (u8)RGFW_apiKeyToRGFW(key);
11428 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current;
11429 e.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
11430 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)e.key.value);
11431 _RGFW->keyboard[e.key.value].current = 0;
11432 e.common.win = win;
11433
11434 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11435 RGFW_keyCallback(win, e.key.value, e.key.sym, win->internal.mod, e.key.repeat, 0);
11436}
11437
11438static void RGFW__osxFlagsChanged(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11439 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11440 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11441 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11442 if (win == NULL) return;
11443
11444 RGFW_event e;
11445 u32 flags = (u32)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("modifierFlags"));
11446 RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(win,
11447 ((u32)(flags & NSEventModifierFlagCapsLock) % 255),
11448 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagNumericPad) % 255),
11449 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagControl) % 255),
11450 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagOption) % 255),
11451 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagShift) % 255),
11452 ((flags & NSEventModifierFlagCommand) % 255), 0);
11453 u8 i;
11454 for (i = 0; i < 9; i++)
11455 _RGFW->keyboard[i + RGFW_capsLock].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[i + RGFW_capsLock].current;
11456
11457 for (i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
11458 u32 shift = (1 << (i + 16));
11459 u32 key = i + RGFW_capsLock;
11460 if ((flags & shift) && !RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)key)) {
11461 _RGFW->keyboard[key].current = 1;
11462 if (key != RGFW_capsLock)
11463 _RGFW->keyboard[key + 4].current = 1;
11464 e.type = RGFW_keyPressed;
11465 e.key.value = (u8)key;
11466 break;
11467 }
11468 if (!(flags & shift) && RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)key)) {
11469 _RGFW->keyboard[key].current = 0;
11470 if (key != RGFW_capsLock)
11471 _RGFW->keyboard[key + 4].current = 0;
11472 e.type = RGFW_keyReleased;
11473 e.key.value = (u8)key;
11474 break;
11475 }
11476 }
11477 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(win, (u8)e.key.value);
11478 e.common.win = win;
11479
11480 if (!(win->internal.enabledEvents & (RGFW_BIT(e.type)))) return;
11481 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11482 RGFW_keyCallback(win, e.key.value, e.key.sym, win->internal.mod, e.key.repeat, e.type == RGFW_keyPressed);
11483}
11484
11485static void RGFW__osxMouseMoved(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11486 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11487 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11488 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11489 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowMovedFlag)) return;
11490
11491 RGFW_event e;
11492 e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
11493 NSPoint p = ((NSPoint(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("locationInWindow"));
11494 e.mouse.x = (i32)p.x;
11495 e.mouse.y = (i32)(win->h - p.y);
11496 p.x = ((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaX"));
11497 p.y = ((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaY"));
11498 e.mouse.vecX = (float)p.x;
11499 e.mouse.vecY = (float)p.y;
11500 _RGFW->vectorX = e.mouse.vecX;
11501 _RGFW->vectorY = e.mouse.vecY;
11502 win->internal.lastMouseX = e.mouse.x;
11503 win->internal.lastMouseY = e.mouse.y;
11504 e.common.win = win;
11505
11506 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11507 RGFW_mousePosCallback(win, e.mouse.x, e.mouse.y, e.mouse.vecX, e.mouse.vecY);
11508}
11509
11510static void RGFW__osxMouseDown(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11511 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11512 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11513 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11514 if (win == NULL || !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return;
11515
11516 RGFW_event e;
11517 u32 buttonNumber = (u32)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("buttonNumber"));
11518 switch (buttonNumber) {
11519 case 0: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
11520 case 1: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
11521 case 2: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
11522 default: e.button.value = (u8)buttonNumber;
11523 }
11524 e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
11525 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current;
11526 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current = 1;
11527 e.common.win = win;
11528
11529 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11530 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, e.button.value, 1);
11531}
11532
11533static void RGFW__osxMouseUp(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11534 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11535 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11536 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11537 if (win == NULL|| !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return;
11538
11539 RGFW_event e;
11540 u32 buttonNumber = (u32)((u32(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(event, sel_registerName("buttonNumber"));
11541 switch (buttonNumber) {
11542 case 0: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft; break;
11543 case 1: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseRight; break;
11544 case 2: e.button.value = RGFW_mouseMiddle; break;
11545 default: e.button.value = (u8)buttonNumber;
11546 }
11547 e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
11548 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current;
11549 _RGFW->mouseButtons[e.button.value].current = 0;
11550 e.common.win = win;
11551
11552 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11553 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(win, e.button.value, 0);
11554}
11555
11556static void RGFW__osxScrollWheel(id self, SEL _cmd, id event) {
11557 RGFW_UNUSED(_cmd);
11558 RGFW_window* win = NULL;
11559 object_getInstanceVariable(self, "RGFW_window", (void**)&win);
11560 if (win == NULL|| !(win->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScroll)) return;
11561
11562 RGFW_event e;
11563 float deltaX = (float)((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaX"));
11564 float deltaY = (float)((CGFloat(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret)(event, sel_registerName("deltaY"));
11565
11566 e.type = RGFW_mouseScroll;
11567 e.scroll.x = deltaX;
11568 e.scroll.y = deltaY;
11569 e.common.win = win;
11570 _RGFW->scrollX = e.scroll.x;
11571 _RGFW->scrollY = e.scroll.y;
11572
11573 RGFW_eventQueuePush(&e);
11574 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(win, deltaX, deltaY);
11575}
11576
11577RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
11578 surface->data = data;
11579 surface->w = w;
11580 surface->h = h;
