11581 surface->format = format;
11582 surface->native.format = RGFW_formatRGBA8;
11583 return RGFW_TRUE;
11584}
11585
11586void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) { RGFW_UNUSED(surface); }
11587
11588void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
11589 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->data, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), surface->native.format, surface->data, surface->format);
11590
11591 size_t depth = (surface->format >= RGFW_formatRGBA8) ? 4 : 3;
11592 id image = ((id (*)(Class, SEL))objc_msgSend)(objc_getClass("NSImage"), sel_getUid("alloc"));
11593 NSSize size = (NSSize){(double)surface->w, (double)surface->h};
11594 image = ((id (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend)((id)image, sel_getUid("initWithSize:"), size);
11595
11596 int minX = RGFW_MIN(win->w, surface->w);
11597 int minY = RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h);
11598
11599 id rep = NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(&surface->data, minX, minY, 8, (i32)depth, (depth == 4), false, "NSDeviceRGBColorSpace", 1 << 1, (u32)surface->w * (u32)depth, 8 * (u32)depth);
11600 RGFW_copyImageData(NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(rep), minX, minY , RGFW_formatRGBA8, surface->data, surface->format);
11601 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)((id)image, sel_getUid("addRepresentation:"), rep);
11602
11603 id contentView = ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_getUid("contentView"));
11604 ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend)(contentView, sel_getUid("setWantsLayer:"), YES);
11605 id layer = ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(contentView, sel_getUid("layer"));
11606
11607 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)(layer, sel_getUid("setContents:"), (id)image);
11608 ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend)(contentView, sel_getUid("setNeedsDisplay:"), YES);
11609
11610 NSRelease(rep);
11611 NSRelease(image);
11612}
11613
11614void* RGFW_window_getView_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.view; }
11615
11616void RGFW_window_setLayer_OSX(RGFW_window* win, void* layer) {
11617 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setLayer"), (id)layer);
11618}
11619
11620void* RGFW_getLayer_OSX(void) {
11621 return objc_msgSend_class((id)objc_getClass("CAMetalLayer"), (SEL)sel_registerName("layer"));
11622}
11623void* RGFW_window_getWindow_OSX(RGFW_window* win) { return win->src.window; }
11624
11625void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
11626 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1D] = RGFW_0;
11627 _RGFW->keycodes[0x12] = RGFW_1;
11628 _RGFW->keycodes[0x13] = RGFW_2;
11629 _RGFW->keycodes[0x14] = RGFW_3;
11630 _RGFW->keycodes[0x15] = RGFW_4;
11631 _RGFW->keycodes[0x17] = RGFW_5;
11632 _RGFW->keycodes[0x16] = RGFW_6;
11633 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1A] = RGFW_7;
11634 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1C] = RGFW_8;
11635 _RGFW->keycodes[0x19] = RGFW_9;
11636 _RGFW->keycodes[0x00] = RGFW_a;
11637 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0B] = RGFW_b;
11638 _RGFW->keycodes[0x08] = RGFW_c;
11639 _RGFW->keycodes[0x02] = RGFW_d;
11640 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0E] = RGFW_e;
11641 _RGFW->keycodes[0x03] = RGFW_f;
11642 _RGFW->keycodes[0x05] = RGFW_g;
11643 _RGFW->keycodes[0x04] = RGFW_h;
11644 _RGFW->keycodes[0x22] = RGFW_i;
11645 _RGFW->keycodes[0x26] = RGFW_j;
11646 _RGFW->keycodes[0x28] = RGFW_k;
11647 _RGFW->keycodes[0x25] = RGFW_l;
11648 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2E] = RGFW_m;
11649 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2D] = RGFW_n;
11650 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1F] = RGFW_o;
11651 _RGFW->keycodes[0x23] = RGFW_p;
11652 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0C] = RGFW_q;
11653 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0F] = RGFW_r;
11654 _RGFW->keycodes[0x01] = RGFW_s;
11655 _RGFW->keycodes[0x11] = RGFW_t;
11656 _RGFW->keycodes[0x20] = RGFW_u;
11657 _RGFW->keycodes[0x09] = RGFW_v;
11658 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0D] = RGFW_w;
11659 _RGFW->keycodes[0x07] = RGFW_x;
11660 _RGFW->keycodes[0x10] = RGFW_y;
11661 _RGFW->keycodes[0x06] = RGFW_z;
11662 _RGFW->keycodes[0x27] = RGFW_apostrophe;
11663 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2A] = RGFW_backSlash;
11664 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2B] = RGFW_comma;
11665 _RGFW->keycodes[0x18] = RGFW_equals;
11666 _RGFW->keycodes[0x32] = RGFW_backtick;
11667 _RGFW->keycodes[0x21] = RGFW_bracket;
11668 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1B] = RGFW_minus;
11669 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2F] = RGFW_period;
11670 _RGFW->keycodes[0x1E] = RGFW_closeBracket;
11671 _RGFW->keycodes[0x29] = RGFW_semicolon;
11672 _RGFW->keycodes[0x2C] = RGFW_slash;
11673 _RGFW->keycodes[0x0A] = RGFW_world1;
11674 _RGFW->keycodes[0x33] = RGFW_backSpace;
11675 _RGFW->keycodes[0x39] = RGFW_capsLock;
11676 _RGFW->keycodes[0x75] = RGFW_delete;
11677 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7D] = RGFW_down;
11678 _RGFW->keycodes[0x77] = RGFW_end;
11679 _RGFW->keycodes[0x24] = RGFW_enter;
11680 _RGFW->keycodes[0x35] = RGFW_escape;
11681 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7A] = RGFW_F1;
11682 _RGFW->keycodes[0x78] = RGFW_F2;
11683 _RGFW->keycodes[0x63] = RGFW_F3;
11684 _RGFW->keycodes[0x76] = RGFW_F4;
11685 _RGFW->keycodes[0x60] = RGFW_F5;
11686 _RGFW->keycodes[0x61] = RGFW_F6;
11687 _RGFW->keycodes[0x62] = RGFW_F7;
11688 _RGFW->keycodes[0x64] = RGFW_F8;
11689 _RGFW->keycodes[0x65] = RGFW_F9;
11690 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6D] = RGFW_F10;
11691 _RGFW->keycodes[0x67] = RGFW_F11;
11692 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6F] = RGFW_F12;
11693 _RGFW->keycodes[0x69] = RGFW_printScreen;
11694 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6B] = RGFW_F14;
11695 _RGFW->keycodes[0x71] = RGFW_F15;
11696 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6A] = RGFW_F16;
11697 _RGFW->keycodes[0x40] = RGFW_F17;
11698 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4F] = RGFW_F18;
11699 _RGFW->keycodes[0x50] = RGFW_F19;
11700 _RGFW->keycodes[0x5A] = RGFW_F20;
11701 _RGFW->keycodes[0x73] = RGFW_home;
11702 _RGFW->keycodes[0x72] = RGFW_insert;
11703 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7B] = RGFW_left;
11704 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3A] = RGFW_altL;
11705 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3B] = RGFW_controlL;
11706 _RGFW->keycodes[0x38] = RGFW_shiftL;
11707 _RGFW->keycodes[0x37] = RGFW_superL;
11708 _RGFW->keycodes[0x6E] = RGFW_menu;
11709 _RGFW->keycodes[0x47] = RGFW_numLock;
11710 _RGFW->keycodes[0x79] = RGFW_pageDown;
11711 _RGFW->keycodes[0x74] = RGFW_pageUp;
11712 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7C] = RGFW_right;
11713 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3D] = RGFW_altR;
11714 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3E] = RGFW_controlR;
11715 _RGFW->keycodes[0x3C] = RGFW_shiftR;
11716 _RGFW->keycodes[0x36] = RGFW_superR;
11717 _RGFW->keycodes[0x31] = RGFW_space;
11718 _RGFW->keycodes[0x30] = RGFW_tab;
11719 _RGFW->keycodes[0x7E] = RGFW_up;
11720 _RGFW->keycodes[0x52] = RGFW_kp0;
11721 _RGFW->keycodes[0x53] = RGFW_kp1;
11722 _RGFW->keycodes[0x54] = RGFW_kp2;
11723 _RGFW->keycodes[0x55] = RGFW_kp3;
11724 _RGFW->keycodes[0x56] = RGFW_kp4;
11725 _RGFW->keycodes[0x57] = RGFW_kp5;
11726 _RGFW->keycodes[0x58] = RGFW_kp6;
11727 _RGFW->keycodes[0x59] = RGFW_kp7;
11728 _RGFW->keycodes[0x5B] = RGFW_kp8;
11729 _RGFW->keycodes[0x5C] = RGFW_kp9;
11730 _RGFW->keycodes[0x45] = RGFW_kpSlash;
11731 _RGFW->keycodes[0x41] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
11732 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4B] = RGFW_kpSlash;
11733 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4C] = RGFW_kpReturn;
11734 _RGFW->keycodes[0x51] = RGFW_kpEqual;
11735 _RGFW->keycodes[0x43] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
11736 _RGFW->keycodes[0x4E] = RGFW_kpMinus;
11737}
11738
11739i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) {
11740 class_addMethod(objc_getClass("NSObject"), sel_registerName("windowShouldClose:"), (IMP)(void*)RGFW_OnClose, 0);
11741
11742 /* NOTE(EimaMei): Fixes the 'Boop' sfx from constantly playing each time you click a key. Only a problem when running in the terminal. */
11743 class_addMethod(objc_getClass("NSWindowClass"), sel_registerName("acceptsFirstResponder:"), (IMP)(void*)RGFW__osxAcceptsFirstResponder, 0);
11744 class_addMethod(objc_getClass("NSWindowClass"), sel_registerName("performKeyEquivalent:"), (IMP)(void*)RGFW__osxPerformKeyEquivalent, 0);
11745
11746 _RGFW->NSApp = objc_msgSend_id((id)objc_getClass("NSApplication"), sel_registerName("sharedApplication"));
11747
11748 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSUInteger))objc_msgSend)
11749 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("setActivationPolicy:"), NSApplicationActivationPolicyRegular);
11750
11751 _RGFW->customViewClasses[0] = objc_allocateClassPair(objc_getClass("NSView"), "RGFWCustomView", 0);
11752 _RGFW->customViewClasses[1] = objc_allocateClassPair(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLView"), "RGFWOpenGLCustomView", 0);
11753 for (size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
11754 class_addIvar((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], "RGFW_window", sizeof(RGFW_window*), sizeof(RGFW_window*), "L");
11755 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("drawRect:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDrawRect, "v@:{CGRect=ffff}");
11756 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("viewDidChangeBackingProperties"), (IMP)RGFW__osxViewDidChangeBackingProperties, "v@:");
11757 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseDown, "v@:@");
11758 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("rightMouseDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseDown, "v@:@");
11759 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("otherMouseDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseDown, "v@:@");
11760 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseUp, "v@:@");
11761 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("rightMouseUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseUp, "v@:@");
11762 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("otherMouseUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseUp, "v@:@");
11763 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("scrollWheel:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxScrollWheel, "v@:@");
11764 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseDragged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
11765 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("rightMouseDragged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
11766 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("otherMouseDragged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
11767 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("keyDown:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxKeyDown, "v@:@");
11768 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("keyUp:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxKeyUp, "v@:@");
11769 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseMoved:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseMoved, "v@:@");
11770 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseEntered:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseEntered, "v@:@");
11771 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("mouseExited:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxMouseExited, "v@:@");
11772 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("flagsChanged:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxFlagsChanged, "v@:@");
11773 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_getUid("acceptsFirstResponder"), (IMP)RGFW__osxAcceptsFirstResponder, "B@:");
11774 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("initWithRGFWWindow:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxCustomInitWithRGFWWindow, "@@:{CGRect={CGPoint=dd}{CGSize=dd}}");
11775 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("wantsUpdateLayer"), (IMP)RGFW__osxWantsUpdateLayer, "B@:");
11776 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i], sel_registerName("updateLayer"), (IMP)RGFW__osxUpdateLayer, "v@:");
11777 objc_registerClassPair((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[i]);
11778 }
11779 _RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass = objc_allocateClassPair(objc_getClass("NSObject"), "RGFWWindowDelegate", 0);
11780 class_addIvar((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, "RGFW_window", sizeof(RGFW_window*), sizeof(RGFW_window*), "L");
11781 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidResize:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDidWindowResize, "v@:@");
11782 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidMove:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowMove, "");
11783 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidMiniaturize:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowMiniaturize, "");
11784 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidDeminiaturize:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowDeminiaturize, "");
11785 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidBecomeKey:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowBecameKey, "");
11786 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("windowDidResignKey:"), (IMP) RGFW__osxWindowResignKey, "");
11787 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingEntered:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDraggingEntered, "l@:@");
11788 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingUpdated:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDraggingUpdated, "l@:@");
11789 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingExited:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDraggingEnded, "v@:@");
11790 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("draggingEnded:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxDraggingEnded, "v@:@");
11791 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("prepareForDragOperation:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxPrepareForDragOperation, "B@:@");
11792 class_addMethod((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass, sel_registerName("performDragOperation:"), (IMP)RGFW__osxPerformDragOperation, "B@:@");
11793 objc_registerClassPair((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass);
11794 return 0;
11795}
11796
11797void RGFW_osx_initView(RGFW_window* win) {
11798 NSRect contentRect;
11799 contentRect.origin.x = 0;
11800 contentRect.origin.y = 0;
11801 contentRect.size.width = (double)win->w;
11802 contentRect.size.height = (double)win->h;
11803 ((void(*)(id, SEL, CGRect))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setFrame:"), contentRect);
11804
11805
11806 if (RGFW_COCOA_FRAME_NAME)
11807 objc_msgSend_ptr(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setFrameAutosaveName:"), RGFW_COCOA_FRAME_NAME);
11808
11809 object_setInstanceVariable((id)win->src.view, "RGFW_window", win);
11810 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setContentView:"), win->src.view);
11811 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setWantsLayer:"), true);
11812 objc_msgSend_int((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setLayerContentsPlacement:"), 4);
11813
11814 id trackingArea = objc_msgSend_id(objc_getClass("NSTrackingArea"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
11815 trackingArea = ((id (*)(id, SEL, NSRect, NSUInteger, id, id))objc_msgSend)(
11816 trackingArea,
11817 sel_registerName("initWithRect:options:owner:userInfo:"),
11818 contentRect,
11819 NSTrackingMouseEnteredAndExited | NSTrackingActiveAlways | NSTrackingInVisibleRect,
11820 (id)win->src.view,
11821 nil
11822 );
11823
11824 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("addTrackingArea:"), trackingArea);
11825 ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(trackingArea, sel_registerName("release"));
11826}
11827
11828RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
11829 /* RR Create an autorelease pool */
11830 id pool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
11831 pool = objc_msgSend_id(pool, sel_registerName("init"));
11832
11833 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
11834
11835 NSRect windowRect;
11836 windowRect.origin.x = (double)win->x;
11837 windowRect.origin.y = (double)win->y;
11838 windowRect.size.width = (double)win->w;
11839 windowRect.size.height = (double)win->h;
11840 NSBackingStoreType macArgs = (NSBackingStoreType)(NSWindowStyleMaskClosable | NSWindowStyleMaskMiniaturizable | NSBackingStoreBuffered | NSWindowStyleMaskTitled);
11841
11842 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoResize))
11843 macArgs = (NSBackingStoreType)(macArgs | (NSBackingStoreType)NSWindowStyleMaskResizable);
11844 if (!(flags & RGFW_windowNoBorder))
11845 macArgs = (NSBackingStoreType)(macArgs | (NSBackingStoreType)NSWindowStyleMaskTitled);
11846 {
11847 void* nsclass = objc_getClass("NSWindow");
11848 SEL func = sel_registerName("initWithContentRect:styleMask:backing:defer:");
11849
11850 win->src.window = ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, NSWindowStyleMask, NSBackingStoreType, bool))objc_msgSend)
11851 (NSAlloc(nsclass), func, windowRect, (NSWindowStyleMask)macArgs, macArgs, false);
11852 }
11853
11854 id str = NSString_stringWithUTF8String(name);
11855 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setTitle:"), str);
11856
11857 id delegate = objc_msgSend_id(NSAlloc((Class)_RGFW->customWindowDelegateClass), sel_registerName("init"));
11858 object_setInstanceVariable(delegate, "RGFW_window", win);
11859
11860 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setDelegate:"), delegate);
11861
11862 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) {
11863 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
11864
11865 NSPasteboardType types[] = {NSPasteboardTypeURL, NSPasteboardTypeFileURL, NSPasteboardTypeString};
11866 NSregisterForDraggedTypes((id)win->src.window, types, 3);
11867 }
11868
11869 objc_msgSend_void_bool((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setAcceptsMouseMovedEvents:"), true);
11870
11871 if (flags & RGFW_windowTransparent) {
11872 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setOpaque:"), false);
11873
11874 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setBackgroundColor:"),
11875 NSColor_colorWithSRGB(0, 0, 0, 0));
11876 }
11877
11878 /* Show the window */
11879 objc_msgSend_void_bool((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("activateIgnoringOtherApps:"), true);
11880
11881 if (_RGFW->root == NULL) {
11882 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeMainWindow"));
11883 }
11884
11885 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeKeyWindow"));
11886
11887 objc_msgSend_void((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("finishLaunching"));
11888 NSRetain(win->src.window);
11889 NSRetain(_RGFW->NSApp);
11890
11891 win->src.view = ((id(*)(id, SEL, RGFW_window*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((Class)_RGFW->customViewClasses[0]), sel_registerName("initWithRGFWWindow:"), win);
11892 return win;
11893}
11894
11895void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) {
11896 NSRect frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("frame"));
11897 NSRect content = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("frame"));
11898 double offset = 0;
11899
11900 RGFW_setBit(&win->internal.flags, RGFW_windowNoBorder, !border);
11901 NSBackingStoreType storeType = (NSBackingStoreType)(NSWindowStyleMaskBorderless | NSWindowStyleMaskFullSizeContentView);
11902 if (border)
11903 storeType = (NSBackingStoreType)(NSWindowStyleMaskTitled | NSWindowStyleMaskClosable | NSWindowStyleMaskMiniaturizable);
11904 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowNoResize)) {
11905 storeType = (NSBackingStoreType)(storeType | (NSBackingStoreType)NSWindowStyleMaskResizable);
11906 }
11907
11908 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSBackingStoreType))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setStyleMask:"), storeType);
11909
11910 if (!border) {
11911 id miniaturizeButton = objc_msgSend_int((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("standardWindowButton:"), NSWindowMiniaturizeButton);
11912 id titleBarView = objc_msgSend_id(miniaturizeButton, sel_registerName("superview"));
11913 objc_msgSend_void_bool(titleBarView, sel_registerName("setHidden:"), true);
11914
11915 offset = (double)(frame.size.height - content.size.height);
11916 }
11917
11918 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h + (i32)offset);
11919 win->h -= (i32)offset;
11920}
11921
11922RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) {
11923 RGFW_ASSERT(_RGFW->root != NULL);
11924
11925 CGEventRef e = CGEventCreate(NULL);
11926 CGPoint point = CGEventGetLocation(e);
11927 CFRelease(e);
11928
11929 if (x) *x = (i32)point.x;
11930 if (y) *y = (i32)point.y;
11931 return RGFW_TRUE;
11932}
11933
11934void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
11935 id eventPool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
11936 eventPool = objc_msgSend_id(eventPool, sel_registerName("init"));
11937
11938 id e = (id) ((id(*)(Class, SEL, NSEventType, NSPoint, NSEventModifierFlags, void*, NSInteger, void**, short, NSInteger, NSInteger))objc_msgSend)
11939 (objc_getClass("NSEvent"), sel_registerName("otherEventWithType:location:modifierFlags:timestamp:windowNumber:context:subtype:data1:data2:"),
11940 NSEventTypeApplicationDefined, (NSPoint){0, 0}, (NSEventModifierFlags)0, NULL, (NSInteger)0, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
11941
11942 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
11943 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("postEvent:atStart:"), e, 1);
11944
11945 objc_msgSend_bool_void(eventPool, sel_registerName("drain"));
11946}
11947
11948void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) {
11949 id eventPool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
11950 eventPool = objc_msgSend_id(eventPool, sel_registerName("init"));
11951
11952 void* date = (void*) ((id(*)(Class, SEL, double))objc_msgSend)
11953 (objc_getClass("NSDate"), sel_registerName("dateWithTimeIntervalSinceNow:"), waitMS);
11954
11955 SEL eventFunc = sel_registerName("nextEventMatchingMask:untilDate:inMode:dequeue:");
11956 id e = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSEventMask, void*, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
11957 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, eventFunc,
11958 ULONG_MAX, date, NSString_stringWithUTF8String("kCFRunLoopDefaultMode"), true);
11959
11960 if (e) {
11961 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
11962 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("postEvent:atStart:"), e, 1);
11963 }
11964
11965 objc_msgSend_bool_void(eventPool, sel_registerName("drain"));
11966}
11967
11968u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 rgfw_keycode) {
11969 return (u8)rgfw_keycode; /* TODO */
11970}
11971
11972void RGFW_pollEvents(void) {
11973 /*
11974 * TODO look to see if all these events can be replaced with callbacks
11975 * callbacks seem to give better info on mac's api
11976 */
11977
11978 RGFW_resetPrevState();
11979
11980 id eventPool = objc_msgSend_class(objc_getClass("NSAutoreleasePool"), sel_registerName("alloc"));
11981 eventPool = objc_msgSend_id(eventPool, sel_registerName("init"));
11982 SEL eventFunc = sel_registerName("nextEventMatchingMask:untilDate:inMode:dequeue:");
11983
11984 while (1) {
11985 void* date = NULL;
11986 id e = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSEventMask, void*, id, bool))objc_msgSend)
11987 ((id)_RGFW->NSApp, eventFunc, ULONG_MAX, date, NSString_stringWithUTF8String("kCFRunLoopDefaultMode"), true);
11988
11989 if (e == NULL) {
11990 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("sendEvent:"), e);
11991 ((void(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("updateWindows"));
11992 break;
11993 }
11994
11995 RGFW_event event;
11996 RGFW_MEMSET(&event, 0, sizeof(event));
11997 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("sendEvent:"), e);
11998 ((void(*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("updateWindows"));
11999 }
12000
12001 objc_msgSend_bool_void(eventPool, sel_registerName("drain"));
12002}
12003
12004
12005void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
12006 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12007
12008 win->x = x;
12009 win->y = y;
12010 ((void(*)(id,SEL,NSPoint))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setFrameOrigin:"), (NSPoint){(double)x, (double)y});
12011}
12012
12013void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
12014 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12015
12016 NSRect frame = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("frame"));
12017 NSRect content = ((NSRect(*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_stret)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("frame"));
12018 float offset = (float)(frame.size.height - content.size.height);
12019
12020 win->w = w;
12021 win->h = h;
12022
12023
12024 ((void(*)(id, SEL, CGRect))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setFrame:"), (NSRect){{0, 0}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h}});
12025 ((void(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, bool, bool))objc_msgSend)
12026 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setFrame:display:animate:"), (NSRect){{(double)win->x, (double)win->y}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h + (double)offset}}, true, true);
12027}
12028
12029void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) {
12030 RGFW_ASSERT(win);
12031 objc_msgSend_void_bool((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("activateIgnoringOtherApps:"), true);
12032 ((void (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeKeyWindow"));
12033}
12034
12035void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) {
12036 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12037 ((id(*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("orderFront:"), (SEL)NULL);
12038 objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setLevel:"), kCGNormalWindowLevelKey);
12039}
12040
12041void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
12042 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12043 if (fullscreen && (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen)) return;
12044 if (!fullscreen && !(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen)) return;
12045
12046 if (fullscreen) {
12047 if (!(win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFullscreen)) {
12048 return;
12049 }
12050
12051 win->internal.oldX = win->x;
12052 win->internal.oldY = win->y;
12053 win->internal.oldW = win->w;
12054 win->internal.oldH = win->h;
12055 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
12056 win->x = mon.x;
12057 win->y = mon.y;
12058 win->w = mon.mode.w;
12059 win->h = mon.mode.h;
12060 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
12061 RGFW_window_resize(win, mon.mode.w, mon.mode.h);
12062 RGFW_window_move(win, mon.x, mon.y);
12063 }
12064 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("toggleFullScreen:"), NULL);
12065
12066 if (!fullscreen) {
12067 win->x = win->internal.oldX;
12068 win->y = win->internal.oldY;
12069 win->w = win->internal.oldW;
12070 win->h = win->internal.oldH;
12071 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
12072
12073 RGFW_window_resize(win, win->w, win->h);
12074 RGFW_window_move(win, win->x, win->y);
12075 }
12076}
12077
12078void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) {
12079 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12080 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win)) return;
12081
12082 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowMaximize;
12083 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("zoom:"), NULL);
12084}
12085
12086void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) {
12087 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12088 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("performMiniaturize:"), NULL);
12089}
12090
12091void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) {
12092 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12093 if (floating) objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setLevel:"), kCGFloatingWindowLevelKey);
12094 else objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setLevel:"), kCGNormalWindowLevelKey);
12095}
12096
12097void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
12098 objc_msgSend_int(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setAlphaValue:"), opacity);
12099 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setOpaque:"), (opacity < (u8)255));
12100
12101 if (opacity)
12102 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setBackgroundColor:"), NSColor_colorWithSRGB(0, 0, 0, opacity));
12103
12104}
12105
12106void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) {
12107 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12108
12109 if (RGFW_window_isMaximized(win))
12110 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("zoom:"), NULL);
12111
12112 objc_msgSend_void_SEL(win->src.window, sel_registerName("deminiaturize:"), NULL);
12113 RGFW_window_show(win);
12114}
12115
12116RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) {
12117 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12118 int level = ((int (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend) ((id)(win->src.window), (SEL)sel_registerName("level"));
12119 return level > kCGNormalWindowLevelKey;
12120}
12121
12122void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
12123 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12124
12125 id str = NSString_stringWithUTF8String(name);
12126 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setTitle:"), str);
12127}
12128
12129#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
12130void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
12131 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setIgnoresMouseEvents:"), passthrough);
12132}
12133#endif
12134
12135void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
12136 if (w == 0 && h == 0) { w = 1; h = 1; };
12137
12138 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend)
12139 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setContentAspectRatio:"), (NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h});
12140}
12141
12142void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
12143 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend) ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setMinSize:"), (NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h});
12144}
12145
12146void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
12147 if (w == 0 && h == 0) {
12148 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
12149 w = mon.mode.w;
12150 h = mon.mode.h;
12151 }
12152
12153 ((void (*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend)
12154 ((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setMaxSize:"), (NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h});
12155}
12156
12157RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) {
12158 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12159 RGFW_UNUSED(type);
12160
12161 if (data == NULL) {
12162 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("setApplicationIconImage:"), NULL);
12163 return RGFW_TRUE;
12164 }
12165
12166 id representation = NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(NULL, w, h, 8, (NSInteger)4, true, false, "NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace", 1 << 1, w * 4, 32);
12167 RGFW_copyImageData(NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(representation), w, h, RGFW_formatRGBA8, data, format);
12168
12169 id dock_image = ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSImage")), sel_registerName("initWithSize:"), ((NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h}));
12170
12171 objc_msgSend_void_id(dock_image, sel_registerName("addRepresentation:"), representation);
12172
12173 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)_RGFW->NSApp, sel_registerName("setApplicationIconImage:"), dock_image);
12174
12175 NSRelease(dock_image);
12176 NSRelease(representation);
12177
12178 return RGFW_TRUE;
12179}
12180
12181id NSCursor_arrowStr(const char* str);
12182id NSCursor_arrowStr(const char* str) {
12183 void* nclass = objc_getClass("NSCursor");
12184 SEL func = sel_registerName(str);
12185 return (id) objc_msgSend_id(nclass, func);
12186}
12187
12188RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) {
12189 if (data == NULL) {
12190 objc_msgSend_void(NSCursor_arrowStr("arrowCursor"), sel_registerName("set"));
12191 return NULL;
12192 }
12193
12194 id representation = (id)NSBitmapImageRep_initWithBitmapData(NULL, w, h, 8, (NSInteger)4, true, false, "NSCalibratedRGBColorSpace", 1 << 1, w * 4, 32);
12195 RGFW_copyImageData(NSBitmapImageRep_bitmapData(representation), w, h, RGFW_formatRGBA8, data, format);
12196
12197 id cursor_image = ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSSize))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSImage")), sel_registerName("initWithSize:"), ((NSSize){(CGFloat)w, (CGFloat)h}));
12198
12199 objc_msgSend_void_id(cursor_image, sel_registerName("addRepresentation:"), representation);
12200
12201 id cursor = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, id, NSPoint))objc_msgSend)
12202 (NSAlloc(objc_getClass("NSCursor")), sel_registerName("initWithImage:hotSpot:"), cursor_image, (NSPoint){0.0, 0.0});
12203
12204 NSRelease(cursor_image);
12205 NSRelease(representation);
12206
12207 return (void*)cursor;
12208}
12209
12210void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
12211 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL); RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
12212 CGDisplayShowCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
12213 objc_msgSend_void((id)mouse, sel_registerName("set"));
12214 win->src.mouse = mouse;
12215}
12216
12217void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) {
12218 RGFW_ASSERT(mouse);
12219 NSRelease((id)mouse);
12220}
12221
12222RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) {
12223 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseArrow);
12224}
12225
12226void RGFW_window_showMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
12227 RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(win, show);
12228 if (show) CGDisplayShowCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
12229 else CGDisplayHideCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
12230}
12231
12232RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 stdMouses) {
12233 static const char* mouseIconSrc[16] = {"arrowCursor", "arrowCursor", "IBeamCursor", "crosshairCursor", "pointingHandCursor", "resizeLeftRightCursor", "resizeUpDownCursor", "_windowResizeNorthWestSouthEastCursor", "_windowResizeNorthEastSouthWestCursor", "closedHandCursor", "operationNotAllowedCursor"};
12234 if (stdMouses > ((sizeof(mouseIconSrc)) / (sizeof(char*))))
12235 return RGFW_FALSE;
12236
12237 const char* mouseStr = mouseIconSrc[stdMouses];
12238 id mouse = NSCursor_arrowStr(mouseStr);
12239
12240 if (mouse == NULL)
12241 return RGFW_FALSE;
12242
12243 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
12244 CGDisplayShowCursor(kCGDirectMainDisplay);
12245 objc_msgSend_void(mouse, sel_registerName("set"));
12246 win->src.mouse = mouse;
12247
12248 return RGFW_TRUE;
12249}
12250
12251void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
12252 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
12253 CGAssociateMouseAndMouseCursorPosition(1);
12254}
12255
12256void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
12257 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
12258
12259 CGWarpMouseCursorPosition((CGPoint){(CGFloat)(win->x + (win->w / 2)), (CGFloat)(win->y + (win->h / 2))});
12260 CGAssociateMouseAndMouseCursorPosition(0);
12261}
12262
12263void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) {
12264 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
12265
12266 win->internal.lastMouseX = x - win->x;
12267 win->internal.lastMouseY = y - win->y;
12268 CGWarpMouseCursorPosition((CGPoint){(CGFloat)x, (CGFloat)y});
12269}
12270
12271
12272void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) {
12273 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setIsVisible:"), false);
12274}
12275
12276void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) {
12277 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowFocusOnShow)
12278 ((id(*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("makeKeyAndOrderFront:"), NULL);
12279
12280 ((id(*)(id, SEL, SEL))objc_msgSend)((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("orderFront:"), NULL);
12281 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("setIsVisible:"), true);
12282}
12283
12284RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) {
12285 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12286
12287 bool visible = objc_msgSend_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("isVisible"));
12288 return visible == NO && !RGFW_window_isMinimized(win);
12289}
12290
12291RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) {
12292 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12293
12294 return objc_msgSend_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("isMiniaturized")) == YES;
12295}
12296
12297RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) {
12298 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
12299 RGFW_bool b = (RGFW_bool)objc_msgSend_bool(win->src.window, sel_registerName("isZoomed"));
12300 return b;
12301}
12302
12303id RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(CGDirectDisplayID display);
12304id RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(CGDirectDisplayID display) {
12305 Class NSScreenClass = objc_getClass("NSScreen");
12306
12307 id screens = objc_msgSend_id(NSScreenClass, sel_registerName("screens"));
12308
12309 NSUInteger count = (NSUInteger)objc_msgSend_uint(screens, sel_registerName("count"));
12310 NSUInteger i;
12311 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
12312 id screen = ((id (*)(id, SEL, int))objc_msgSend) (screens, sel_registerName("objectAtIndex:"), (int)i);
12313 id description = objc_msgSend_id(screen, sel_registerName("deviceDescription"));
12314 id screenNumberKey = NSString_stringWithUTF8String("NSScreenNumber");
12315 id screenNumber = objc_msgSend_id_id(description, sel_registerName("objectForKey:"), screenNumberKey);
12316
12317 if ((CGDirectDisplayID)objc_msgSend_uint(screenNumber, sel_registerName("unsignedIntValue")) == display) {
12318 return screen;
12319 }
12320 }
12321
12322 return NULL;
12323}
12324
12325u32 RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID display, CGDisplayModeRef mode);
12326u32 RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(CGDirectDisplayID display, CGDisplayModeRef mode) {
12327 if (mode) {
12328 u32 refreshRate = (u32)CGDisplayModeGetRefreshRate(mode);
12329 if (refreshRate != 0) return refreshRate;
12330 }
12331
12332#ifndef RGFW_NO_IOKIT
12333 u32 res = RGFW_osx_getFallbackRefreshRate(display);
12334 if (res != 0) return res;
12335#else
12336 RGFW_UNUSED(display);
12337#endif
12338 return 60;
12339}
12340
12341RGFW_monitor RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(CGDirectDisplayID display, id screen);
12342RGFW_monitor RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(CGDirectDisplayID display, id screen) {
12343 RGFW_monitor monitor;
12344
12345 const char name[] = "MacOS\0";
12346 RGFW_MEMCPY(monitor.name, name, 6);
12347
12348 CGRect bounds = CGDisplayBounds(display);
12349 monitor.x = (i32)bounds.origin.x;
12350 monitor.y = (i32)bounds.origin.y;
12351 monitor.mode.w = (i32) bounds.size.width;
12352 monitor.mode.h = (i32) bounds.size.height;
12353
12354 monitor.mode.red = 8; monitor.mode.green = 8; monitor.mode.blue = 8;
12355
12356 CGDisplayModeRef mode = CGDisplayCopyDisplayMode(display);
12357 monitor.mode.refreshRate = RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(display, mode);
12358 CFRelease(mode);
12359
12360 CGSize screenSizeMM = CGDisplayScreenSize(display);
12361 monitor.physW = (float)screenSizeMM.width / 25.4f;
12362 monitor.physH = (float)screenSizeMM.height / 25.4f;
12363
12364 float ppi_width = (monitor.mode.w/monitor.physW);
12365 float ppi_height = (monitor.mode.h/monitor.physH);
12366
12367 monitor.pixelRatio = (float)((CGFloat (*)(id, SEL))abi_objc_msgSend_fpret) (screen, sel_registerName("backingScaleFactor"));
12368 float dpi = 96.0f * monitor.pixelRatio;
12369
12370 monitor.scaleX = ((i32)(((float) (ppi_width) / dpi) * 10.0f)) / 10.0f;
12371 monitor.scaleY = ((i32)(((float) (ppi_height) / dpi) * 10.0f)) / 10.0f;
12372
12373 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoMonitor, "monitor found");
12374 return monitor;
12375}
12376
12377
12378RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) {
12379 static CGDirectDisplayID displays[7];
12380 u32 count;
12381
12382 if (CGGetActiveDisplayList(6, displays, &count) != kCGErrorSuccess)
12383 return NULL;
12384
12385 if (count > 6) count = 6;
12386
12387 static RGFW_monitor monitors[7];
12388
12389 u32 i;
12390 for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
12391 monitors[i] = RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(displays[i], RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(displays[i]));
12392
12393 if (len != NULL) *len = count;
12394 return monitors;
12395}
12396
12397RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) {
12398 CGPoint point = { (CGFloat)mon.x, (CGFloat)mon.y };
12399
12400 CGDirectDisplayID display;
12401 u32 displayCount = 0;
12402 CGError err = CGGetDisplaysWithPoint(point, 1, &display, &displayCount);
12403 if (err != kCGErrorSuccess || displayCount != 1)
12404 return RGFW_FALSE;
12405
12406 CFArrayRef allModes = CGDisplayCopyAllDisplayModes(display, NULL);
12407
12408 if (allModes == NULL)
12409 return RGFW_FALSE;
12410
12411 CFIndex i;
12412 for (i = 0; i < CFArrayGetCount(allModes); i++) {
12413 CGDisplayModeRef cmode = (CGDisplayModeRef)CFArrayGetValueAtIndex(allModes, i);
12414
12415 RGFW_monitorMode foundMode;
12416 foundMode.w = (i32)CGDisplayModeGetWidth(cmode);
12417 foundMode.h = (i32)CGDisplayModeGetHeight(cmode);
12418 foundMode.refreshRate = RGFW_osx_getRefreshRate(display, cmode);
12419 foundMode.red = 8; foundMode.green = 8; foundMode.blue = 8;
12420
12421 if (RGFW_monitorModeCompare(mode, foundMode, request)) {
12422 if (CGDisplaySetDisplayMode(display, cmode, NULL) == kCGErrorSuccess) {
12423 CFRelease(allModes);
12424 return RGFW_TRUE;
12425 }
12426 break;
12427 }
12428 }
12429
12430 CFRelease(allModes);
12431
12432 return RGFW_FALSE;
12433}
12434
12435RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) {
12436 CGDirectDisplayID primary = CGMainDisplayID();
12437 return RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(primary, RGFW_getNSScreenForDisplayID(primary));
12438}
12439
12440RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) {
12441 id screen = objc_msgSend_id(win->src.window, sel_registerName("screen"));
12442 id description = objc_msgSend_id(screen, sel_registerName("deviceDescription"));
12443 id screenNumberKey = NSString_stringWithUTF8String("NSScreenNumber");
12444 id screenNumber = objc_msgSend_id_id(description, sel_registerName("objectForKey:"), screenNumberKey);
12445
12446 CGDirectDisplayID display = (CGDirectDisplayID)objc_msgSend_uint(screenNumber, sel_registerName("unsignedIntValue"));
12447
12448 return RGFW_NSCreateMonitor(display, screen);
12449}
12450
12451RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_readClipboardPtr(char* str, size_t strCapacity) {
12452 size_t clip_len;
12453 char* clip = (char*)NSPasteboard_stringForType(NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(), NSPasteboardTypeString, &clip_len);
12454 if (clip == NULL) return -1;
12455
12456 if (str != NULL) {
12457 if (strCapacity < clip_len)
12458 return 0;
12459
12460 RGFW_MEMCPY(str, clip, clip_len);
12461
12462 str[clip_len] = '\0';
12463 }
12464
12465 return (RGFW_ssize_t)clip_len;
12466}
12467
12468void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
12469 RGFW_UNUSED(textLen);
12470
12471 NSPasteboardType array[] = { NSPasteboardTypeString, NULL };
12472 NSPasteBoard_declareTypes(NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(), array, 1, NULL);
12473
12474 SEL func = sel_registerName("setString:forType:");
12475 ((bool (*)(id, SEL, id, id))objc_msgSend)
12476 (NSPasteboard_generalPasteboard(), func, NSString_stringWithUTF8String(text), NSString_stringWithUTF8String((const char*)NSPasteboardTypeString));
12477}
12478
12479#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
12480void NSOpenGLContext_setValues(id context, const int* vals, NSOpenGLContextParameter param);
12481void NSOpenGLContext_setValues(id context, const int* vals, NSOpenGLContextParameter param) {
12482 ((void (*)(id, SEL, const int*, NSOpenGLContextParameter))objc_msgSend)
12483 (context, sel_registerName("setValues:forParameter:"), vals, param);
12484}
12485
12486
12487/* MacOS OpenGL API spares us yet again (there are no extensions) */
12488RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char * extension, size_t len) { RGFW_UNUSED(extension); RGFW_UNUSED(len); return RGFW_FALSE; }
12489
12490RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) {
12491 static CFBundleRef RGFWnsglFramework = NULL;
12492 if (RGFWnsglFramework == NULL)
12493 RGFWnsglFramework = CFBundleGetBundleWithIdentifier(CFSTR("com.apple.opengl"));
12494
12495 CFStringRef symbolName = CFStringCreateWithCString(kCFAllocatorDefault, procname, kCFStringEncodingASCII);
12496
12497 RGFW_proc symbol = (RGFW_proc)CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(RGFWnsglFramework, symbolName);
12498
12499 CFRelease(symbolName);
12500
12501 return symbol;
12502}
12503
12504RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
12505 win->src.ctx.native = ctx;
12506 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
12507
12508 i32 attribs[40];
12509 size_t render_type_index = 0;
12510 {
12511 RGFW_attribStack stack;
12512 RGFW_attribStack_init(&stack, attribs, 40);
12513
12514 i32 colorBits = (i32)(hints->red + hints->green + hints->blue + hints->alpha) / 4;
12515 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAColorSize, colorBits);
12516
12517 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAlphaSize, hints->alpha);
12518 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFADepthSize, hints->depth);
12519 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAStencilSize, hints->stencil);
12520 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAuxBuffers, hints->auxBuffers);
12521 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAClosestPolicy);
12522 if (hints->samples) {
12523 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFASampleBuffers, 1);
12524 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFASamples, hints->samples);
12525 } else RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFASampleBuffers, 0);
12526
12527 if (hints->doubleBuffer)
12528 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFADoubleBuffer);
12529
12530 #ifdef RGFW_COCOA_GRAPHICS_SWITCHING
12531 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAllowOfflineRenderers, kCGLPFASupportsAutomaticGraphicsSwitching)
12532 #endif
12533 #if MAC_OS_X_VERSION_MAX_ALLOWED < 101200
12534 if (hints->stereo]) RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAStereo);
12535 #endif
12536
12537 /* macOS has the surface attribs and the OpenGL attribs connected for some reason maybe this is to give macOS more control to limit openGL/the OpenGL version? */
12538 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAOpenGLProfile,
12539 (hints->major >= 4) ? NSOpenGLProfileVersion4_1Core : (hints->major >= 3) ?
12540 NSOpenGLProfileVersion3_2Core : NSOpenGLProfileVersionLegacy);
12541
12542 if (hints->major <= 2) {
12543 i32 accumSize = (i32)(hints->accumRed + hints->accumGreen + hints->accumBlue + hints->accumAlpha) / 4;
12544 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAccumSize, accumSize);
12545 }
12546
12547 if (hints->renderer == RGFW_glSoftware) {
12548 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, NSOpenGLPFARendererID, kCGLRendererGenericFloatID);
12549 } else {
12550 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttrib(&stack, NSOpenGLPFAAccelerated);
12551 }
12552 render_type_index = stack.count - 1;
12553
12554 RGFW_attribStack_pushAttribs(&stack, 0, 0);
12555 }
12556
12557 void* format = (void*) ((id(*)(id, SEL, const u32*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSOpenGLPixelFormat")), sel_registerName("initWithAttributes:"), (u32*)attribs);
12558 if (format == NULL) {
12559 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "Failed to load pixel format for OpenGL");
12560
12561 assert(render_type_index + 3 < (sizeof(attribs) / sizeof(attribs[0])));
12562 attribs[render_type_index] = NSOpenGLPFARendererID;
12563 attribs[render_type_index + 1] = kCGLRendererGenericFloatID;
12564 attribs[render_type_index + 3] = 0;
12565
12566 format = (void*) ((id(*)(id, SEL, const u32*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc((id)objc_getClass("NSOpenGLPixelFormat")), sel_registerName("initWithAttributes:"), (u32*)attribs);
12567 if (format == NULL)
12568 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeError, RGFW_errOpenGLContext, "and loading software rendering OpenGL failed");
12569 else
12570 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeWarning, RGFW_warningOpenGL, "Switching to software rendering");
12571 }
12572
12573 /* the pixel format can be passed directly to OpenGL context creation to create a context
12574 this is because the format also includes information about the OpenGL version (which may be a bad thing) */
12575
12576 if (win->src.view)
12577 NSRelease(win->src.view);
12578 win->src.view = (id) ((id(*)(id, SEL, NSRect, u32*))objc_msgSend) (NSAlloc(_RGFW->customViewClasses[1]),
12579 sel_registerName("initWithFrame:pixelFormat:"), (NSRect){{0, 0}, {(double)win->w, (double)win->h}}, (u32*)format);
12580
12581 id share = NULL;
12582 if (hints->share) {
12583 share = (id)hints->share->ctx;
12584 }
12585
12586 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = ((id (*)(id, SEL, id, id))objc_msgSend)(NSAlloc(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLContext")),
12587 sel_registerName("initWithFormat:shareContext:"),
12588 (id)format, share);
12589
12590 objc_msgSend_void_id(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setOpenGLContext:"), win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
12591 if (win->internal.flags & RGFW_windowTransparent) {
12592 i32 opacity = 0;
12593 #define NSOpenGLCPSurfaceOpacity 236
12594 NSOpenGLContext_setValues((id)win->src.ctx.native->ctx, &opacity, (NSOpenGLContextParameter)NSOpenGLCPSurfaceOpacity);
12595
12596 }
12597
12598 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.ctx.native->ctx, sel_registerName("makeCurrentContext"));
12599
12600 objc_msgSend_void_id((id)win->src.window, sel_registerName("setContentView:"), win->src.view);
12601 objc_msgSend_void_bool(win->src.view, sel_registerName("setWantsLayer:"), true);
12602 objc_msgSend_int((id)win->src.view, sel_registerName("setLayerContentsPlacement:"), 4);
12603
12604 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
12605 return RGFW_TRUE;
12606}
12607
12608void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
12609 objc_msgSend_void(ctx->ctx, sel_registerName("release"));
12610 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = NULL;
12611 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
12612}
12613
12614void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
12615 if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
12616 if (win != NULL)
12617 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.ctx.native->ctx, sel_registerName("makeCurrentContext"));
12618 else
12619 objc_msgSend_id(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLContext"), sel_registerName("clearCurrentContext"));
12620}
12621void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) {
12622 return objc_msgSend_id(objc_getClass("NSOpenGLContext"), sel_registerName("currentContext"));
12623}
12624
12625void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
12626 RGFW_ASSERT(win && win->src.ctx.native);
12627 objc_msgSend_void(win->src.ctx.native->ctx, sel_registerName("flushBuffer"));
12628}
12629void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) {
12630 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL && win->src.ctx.native != NULL);
12631 NSOpenGLContext_setValues((id)win->src.ctx.native->ctx, &swapInterval, (NSOpenGLContextParameter)222);
12632}
12633#endif
12634
12635void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) { }
12636
12637void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) {
12638 NSRelease(win->src.view);
12639}
12640
12641#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
12642WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
12643 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
12644 id* nsView = (id*)window->src.view;
12645 if (!nsView) {
12646 fprintf(stderr, "RGFW Error: NSView is NULL for macOS window.\n");
12647 return NULL;
12648 }
12649
12650 ((void (*)(id, SEL, BOOL))objc_msgSend)(nsView, sel_registerName("setWantsLayer:"), YES);
12651 id layer = ((id (*)(id, SEL))objc_msgSend)(nsView, sel_registerName("layer"));
12652
12653 void* metalLayer = RGFW_getLayer_OSX();
12654 if (metalLayer == NULL) {
12655 return NULL;
12656 }
12657 ((void (*)(id, SEL, id))objc_msgSend)((id)nsView, sel_registerName("setLayer:"), metalLayer);
12658 layer = metalLayer; /* Use the newly created layer */
12659
12660 /* At this point, 'layer' should be a valid CAMetalLayer* */
12661 WGPUSurfaceSourceMetalLayer fromMetal = {0};
12662 fromMetal.chain.sType = WGPUSType_SurfaceSourceMetalLayer;
12663#ifdef __OBJC__
12664 fromMetal.layer = (__bridge CAMetalLayer*)layer; /* Use __bridge for ARC compatibility if mixing C/Obj-C */
12665#else
12666 fromMetal.layer = layer;
12667#endif
12668
12669 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = (WGPUChainedStruct*)&fromMetal.chain;
12670 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
12671}
12672#endif
12673
12674#endif /* RGFW_MACOS */
12675
12676/*
12677 End of MaOS defines
12678*/
12679
12680/*
12681 WASM defines
12682*/
12683
12684#ifdef RGFW_WASM
12685EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_resize(int eventType, const EmscriptenUiEvent* E, void* userData) {
12686 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12687
12688 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12689
12690 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12691 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(_RGFW->root, E->windowInnerWidth, E->windowInnerHeight);
12692 return EM_TRUE;
12693}
12694
12695EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_fullscreenchange(int eventType, const EmscriptenFullscreenChangeEvent* E, void* userData) {
12696 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12697
12698 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_windowResizedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12699
12700 static u8 fullscreen = RGFW_FALSE;
12701 static i32 originalW, originalH;
12702
12703 if (fullscreen == RGFW_FALSE) {
12704 originalW = _RGFW->root->w;
12705 originalH = _RGFW->root->h;
12706 }
12707
12708 fullscreen = !fullscreen;
12709 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_windowResized; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12710 _RGFW->root->w = E->screenWidth;
12711 _RGFW->root->h = E->screenHeight;
12712
12713 EM_ASM("Module.canvas.focus();");
12714
12715 if (fullscreen == RGFW_FALSE) {
12716 _RGFW->root->w = originalW;
12717 _RGFW->root->h = originalH;
12718 } else {
12719 #if __EMSCRIPTEN_major__ >= 1 && __EMSCRIPTEN_minor__ >= 29 && __EMSCRIPTEN_tiny__ >= 0
12720 EmscriptenFullscreenStrategy FSStrat = {0};
12721 FSStrat.scaleMode = EMSCRIPTEN_FULLSCREEN_SCALE_STRETCH;
12722 FSStrat.canvasResolutionScaleMode = EMSCRIPTEN_FULLSCREEN_CANVAS_SCALE_HIDEF;
12723 FSStrat.filteringMode = EMSCRIPTEN_FULLSCREEN_FILTERING_DEFAULT;
12724 emscripten_request_fullscreen_strategy("#canvas", 1, &FSStrat);
12725 #else
12726 emscripten_request_fullscreen("#canvas", 1);
12727 #endif
12728 }
12729
12730 emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", _RGFW->root->w, _RGFW->root->h);
12731 RGFW_windowResizedCallback(_RGFW->root, _RGFW->root->w, _RGFW->root->h);
12732 return EM_TRUE;
12733}
12734
12735EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_focusin(int eventType, const EmscriptenFocusEvent* E, void* userData) {
12736 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData); RGFW_UNUSED(E);
12737
12738 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusInFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12739
12740 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusIn; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12741 _RGFW->root->internal.inFocus = RGFW_TRUE;
12742 RGFW_focusCallback(_RGFW->root, 1);
12743
12744 if ((_RGFW->root->internal.holdMouse)) RGFW_window_holdMouse(_RGFW->root);
12745 return EM_TRUE;
12746}
12747
12748EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_focusout(int eventType, const EmscriptenFocusEvent* E, void* userData) {
12749 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData); RGFW_UNUSED(E);
12750
12751 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_focusOutFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12752
12753 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_focusOut; e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12754 RGFW_window_focusLost(_RGFW->root);
12755 RGFW_focusCallback(_RGFW->root, 0);
12756 return EM_TRUE;
12757}
12758
12759EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_mousemove(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* E, void* userData) {
12760 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12761
12762 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12763
12764 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
12765 e.mouse.x = E->targetX; e.mouse.y = E->targetY;
12766 e.mouse.vecX = E->movementX; e.mouse.vecY = E->movementY;
12767 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12768
12769 _RGFW->vectorX = E->movementX;
12770 _RGFW->vectorY = E->movementY;
12771 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->targetX;
12772 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseY = E->targetY;
12773 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->targetX, E->targetY, E->movementX, E->movementY);
12774 return EM_TRUE;
12775}
12776
12777EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_mousedown(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* E, void* userData) {
12778 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12779
12780 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12781
12782 int button = E->button;
12783 if (button > 2)
12784 button += 2;
12785
12786 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
12787 e.mouse.x = E->targetX; e.mouse.y = E->targetY;
12788 e.mouse.vecX = E->movementX; e.mouse.vecY = E->movementY;
12789 e.button.value = (u8)button;
12790 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12791 _RGFW->vectorX = E->movementX;
12792 _RGFW->vectorY = E->movementY;
12793 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current;
12794 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current = 1;
12795
12796 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, button, 1);
12797 return EM_TRUE;
12798}
12799
12800EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_mouseup(int eventType, const EmscriptenMouseEvent* E, void* userData) {
12801 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12802
12803 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12804
12805 int button = E->button;
12806 if (button > 2)
12807 button += 2;
12808
12809 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
12810 e.mouse.x = E->targetX; e.mouse.y = E->targetY;
12811 e.mouse.vecX = E->movementX; e.mouse.vecY = E->movementY;
12812 e.button.value = (u8)button;
12813 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12814 _RGFW->vectorX = E->movementX;
12815 _RGFW->vectorY = E->movementY;
12816 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current;
12817 _RGFW->mouseButtons[button].current = 0;
12818
12819 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, button, 0);
12820 return EM_TRUE;
12821}
12822
12823EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_wheel(int eventType, const EmscriptenWheelEvent* E, void* userData) {
12824 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12825
12826 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseScrollFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12827
12828 _RGFW->scrollX = E->deltaX;
12829 _RGFW->scrollY = E->deltaY;
12830 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
12831 e.scroll.x = E->deltaX;
12832 e.scroll.y = E->deltaY;
12833 );
12834 RGFW_mouseScrollCallback(_RGFW->root, E->deltaX, E->deltaY);
12835
12836 return EM_TRUE;
12837}
12838
12839EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchstart(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) {
12840 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12841
12842 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonPressedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12843
12844 size_t i;
12845 for (i = 0; i < (size_t)E->numTouches; i++) {
12846 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonPressed;
12847 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX; e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
12848 e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft;
12849 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12850
12851 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current;
12852 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current = 1;
12853
12854 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetX;
12855 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetY;
12856 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->touches[i].targetX, E->touches[i].targetY, 0, 0);
12857 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, RGFW_mouseLeft, 1);
12858 }
12859
12860 return EM_TRUE;
12861}
12862
12863EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchmove(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) {
12864 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12865
12866 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mousePosChangedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12867
12868 size_t i;
12869 for (i = 0; i < (size_t)E->numTouches; i++) {
12870 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mousePosChanged;
12871 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX;
12872 e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
12873 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX; e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
12874 e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft;
12875 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12876
12877 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetX;
12878 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetY;
12879 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->touches[i].targetX, E->touches[i].targetY, 0, 0);
12880 }
12881 return EM_TRUE;
12882}
12883
12884EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchend(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) {
12885 RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData);
12886
12887 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_mouseButtonReleasedFlag)) return EM_TRUE;
12888
12889 size_t i;
12890 for (i = 0; i < (size_t)E->numTouches; i++) {
12891 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_mouseButtonReleased;
12892 e.mouse.x = E->touches[i].targetX; e.mouse.y = E->touches[i].targetY;
12893 e.button.value = RGFW_mouseLeft;
12894 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12895
12896 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].prev = _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current;
12897 _RGFW->mouseButtons[RGFW_mouseLeft].current = 0;
12898
12899 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseX = E->touches[i].targetX;
12900 _RGFW->root->internal.lastMouseY = E->touches[i].targetY;
12901 RGFW_mousePosCallback(_RGFW->root, E->touches[i].targetX, E->touches[i].targetY, 0, 0);
12902 RGFW_mouseButtonCallback(_RGFW->root, RGFW_mouseLeft, 0);
12903 }
12904 return EM_TRUE;
12905}
12906
12907EM_BOOL Emscripten_on_touchcancel(int eventType, const EmscriptenTouchEvent* E, void* userData) { RGFW_UNUSED(eventType); RGFW_UNUSED(userData); return EM_TRUE; }
12908
12909u32 RGFW_WASMPhysicalToRGFW(u32 hash);
12910
12911void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_handleKeyEvent(char* key, char* code, RGFW_bool press) {
12912 const char* iCode = code;
12913
12914 u32 hash = 0;
12915 while(*iCode) hash = ((hash ^ 0x7E057D79U) << 3) ^ (unsigned int)*iCode++;
12916
12917 u32 physicalKey = RGFW_WASMPhysicalToRGFW(hash);
12918
12919 u8 mappedKey = (u8)(*((u32*)key));
12920
12921 if (*((u16*)key) != mappedKey) {
12922 mappedKey = 0;
12923 if (*((u32*)key) == *((u32*)"Tab")) mappedKey = RGFW_tab;
12924 }
12925
12926 if (!(press ? (_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyPressedFlag) : (_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_keyReleasedFlag))) return;
12927
12928 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = (RGFW_eventType)(press ? RGFW_keyPressed : RGFW_keyReleased);
12929 e.key.value = (u8)physicalKey;
12930 e.key.sym = (u8)mappedKey;
12931 e.key.mod = _RGFW->root->internal.mod;
12932 e.key.repeat = RGFW_window_isKeyDown(_RGFW->root, (u8)physicalKey);
12933 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12934
12935 _RGFW->keyboard[physicalKey].prev = _RGFW->keyboard[physicalKey].current;
12936 _RGFW->keyboard[physicalKey].current = press;
12937
12938 RGFW_keyCallback(_RGFW->root, physicalKey, mappedKey, _RGFW->root->internal.mod, RGFW_window_isKeyDown(_RGFW->root, (u8)physicalKey), press);
12939}
12940
12941void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_handleKeyMods(RGFW_bool capital, RGFW_bool numlock, RGFW_bool control, RGFW_bool alt, RGFW_bool shift, RGFW_bool super, RGFW_bool scroll) {
12942 RGFW_updateKeyModsEx(_RGFW->root, capital, numlock, control, alt, shift, super, scroll);
12943}
12944
12945void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE Emscripten_onDrop(size_t count) {
12946 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND))
12947 return;
12948
12949 if (!(_RGFW->root->internal.enabledEvents & RGFW_dataDropFlag)) return;
12950
12951 RGFW_eventQueuePushEx(e.type = RGFW_dataDrop;
12952 e.drop.count = count;
12953 e.common.win = _RGFW->root);
12954
12955 _RGFW->windowState.win = _RGFW->root;
12956 _RGFW->windowState.dataDrop = RGFW_TRUE;
12957 _RGFW->windowState.filesCount = count;
12958 RGFW_dataDropCallback(_RGFW->root, _RGFW->files, count);
12959}
12960
12961void RGFW_stopCheckEvents(void) {
12962 _RGFW->stopCheckEvents_bool = RGFW_TRUE;
12963}
12964
12965RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) {
12966 surface->data = data;
12967 surface->w = w;
12968 surface->h = h;
12969 surface->format = format;
12970 return RGFW_TRUE;
12971}
12972
12973void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) {
12974 /* TODO: Needs fixing. */
12975 RGFW_copyImageData(surface->data, surface->w, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h), RGFW_formatRGBA8, surface->data, surface->format);
12976 EM_ASM_({
12977 var data = Module.HEAPU8.slice($0, $0 + $1 * $2 * 4);
12978 let context = document.getElementById("canvas").getContext("2d");
12979 let image = context.getImageData(0, 0, $1, $2);
12980 image.data.set(data);
12981 context.putImageData(image, 0, $4 - $2);
12982 }, surface->data, surface->w, surface->h, RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->w), RGFW_MIN(win->h, surface->h));
12983}
12984
12985void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) { }
12986
12987void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_makeSetValue(size_t index, char* file) {
12988 /* This seems like a terrible idea, don't replicate this unless you hate yourself or the OS */
12989 /* TODO: find a better way to do this
12990 */
12991 RGFW_STRNCPY((char*)_RGFW->files[index], file, RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1);
12992 _RGFW->files[index][RGFW_MAX_PATH - 1] = '\0';
12993}
12994
12995#include <sys/stat.h>
12996#include <sys/types.h>
12997#include <errno.h>
12998#include <stdio.h>
12999
13000void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_mkdir(char* name) { mkdir(name, 0755); }
13001
13002void EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE RGFW_writeFile(const char *path, const char *data, size_t len) {
13003 FILE* file = fopen(path, "w+");
13004 if (file == NULL)
13005 return;
13006
13007 fwrite(data, sizeof(char), len, file);
13008 fclose(file);
13009}
13010
13011void RGFW_initKeycodesPlatform(void) {
13012 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_BACK_QUOTE] = RGFW_backtick;
13013 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_0] = RGFW_0;
13014 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_1] = RGFW_1;
13015 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_2] = RGFW_2;
13016 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_3] = RGFW_3;
13017 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_4] = RGFW_4;
13018 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_5] = RGFW_5;
13019 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_6] = RGFW_6;
13020 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_7] = RGFW_7;
13021 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_8] = RGFW_8;
13022 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_9] = RGFW_9;
13023 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SPACE] = RGFW_space;
13024 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_A] = RGFW_a;
13025 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_B] = RGFW_b;
13026 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_C] = RGFW_c;
13027 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_D] = RGFW_d;
13028 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_E] = RGFW_e;
13029 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F] = RGFW_f;
13030 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_G] = RGFW_g;
13031 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_H] = RGFW_h;
13032 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_I] = RGFW_i;
13033 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_J] = RGFW_j;
13034 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_K] = RGFW_k;
13035 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_L] = RGFW_l;
13036 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_M] = RGFW_m;
13037 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_N] = RGFW_n;
13038 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_O] = RGFW_o;
13039 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_P] = RGFW_p;
13040 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_Q] = RGFW_q;
13041 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_R] = RGFW_r;
13042 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_S] = RGFW_s;
13043 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_T] = RGFW_t;
13044 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_U] = RGFW_u;
13045 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_V] = RGFW_v;
13046 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_W] = RGFW_w;
13047 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_X] = RGFW_x;
13048 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_Y] = RGFW_y;
13049 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_Z] = RGFW_z;
13050 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PERIOD] = RGFW_period;
13051 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_COMMA] = RGFW_comma;
13052 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SLASH] = RGFW_slash;
13053 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_OPEN_BRACKET] = RGFW_bracket;
13054 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_CLOSE_BRACKET] = RGFW_closeBracket;
13055 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SEMICOLON] = RGFW_semicolon;
13056 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_QUOTE] = RGFW_apostrophe;
13057 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_BACK_SLASH] = RGFW_backSlash;
13058 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_RETURN] = RGFW_return;
13059 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DELETE] = RGFW_delete;
13060 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUM_LOCK] = RGFW_numLock;
13061 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DIVIDE] = RGFW_kpSlash;
13062 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_MULTIPLY] = RGFW_kpMultiply;
13063 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SUBTRACT] = RGFW_kpMinus;
13064 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD1] = RGFW_kp1;
13065 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD2] = RGFW_kp2;
13066 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD3] = RGFW_kp3;
13067 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD4] = RGFW_kp4;
13068 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD5] = RGFW_kp5;
13069 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD6] = RGFW_kp6;
13070 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD9] = RGFW_kp9;
13071 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_NUMPAD0] = RGFW_kp0;
13072 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DECIMAL] = RGFW_kpPeriod;
13073 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_RETURN] = RGFW_kpReturn;
13074 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_HYPHEN_MINUS] = RGFW_minus;
13075 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_EQUALS] = RGFW_equals;
13076 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_BACK_SPACE] = RGFW_backSpace;
13077 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_TAB] = RGFW_tab;
13078 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_CAPS_LOCK] = RGFW_capsLock;
13079 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SHIFT] = RGFW_shiftL;
13080 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_CONTROL] = RGFW_controlL;
13081 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_ALT] = RGFW_altL;
13082 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_META] = RGFW_superL;
13083 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F1] = RGFW_F1;
13084 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F2] = RGFW_F2;
13085 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F3] = RGFW_F3;
13086 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F4] = RGFW_F4;
13087 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F5] = RGFW_F5;
13088 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F6] = RGFW_F6;
13089 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F7] = RGFW_F7;
13090 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F8] = RGFW_F8;
13091 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F9] = RGFW_F9;
13092 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F10] = RGFW_F10;
13093 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F11] = RGFW_F11;
13094 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F12] = RGFW_F12;
13095 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_UP] = RGFW_up;
13096 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_DOWN] = RGFW_down;
13097 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_LEFT] = RGFW_left;
13098 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_RIGHT] = RGFW_right;
13099 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_INSERT] = RGFW_insert;
13100 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_END] = RGFW_end;
13101 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PAGE_UP] = RGFW_pageUp;
13102 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PAGE_DOWN] = RGFW_pageDown;
13103 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_ESCAPE] = RGFW_escape;
13104 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_HOME] = RGFW_home;
13105 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_SCROLL_LOCK] = RGFW_scrollLock;
13106 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PRINTSCREEN] = RGFW_printScreen;
13107 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_PAUSE] = RGFW_pause;
13108 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F13] = RGFW_F13;
13109 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F14] = RGFW_F14;
13110 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F15] = RGFW_F15;
13111 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F16] = RGFW_F16;
13112 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F17] = RGFW_F17;
13113 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F18] = RGFW_F18;
13114 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F19] = RGFW_F19;
13115 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F20] = RGFW_F20;
13116 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F21] = RGFW_F21;
13117 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F22] = RGFW_F22;
13118 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F23] = RGFW_F23;
13119 _RGFW->keycodes[DOM_VK_F24] = RGFW_F24;
13120}
13121
13122i32 RGFW_initPlatform(void) { return 0; }
13123
13124RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) {
13125 emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", win->w, win->h);
13126 emscripten_set_window_title(name);
13127
13128 /* load callbacks */
13129 emscripten_set_resize_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_WINDOW, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_resize);
13130 emscripten_set_fullscreenchange_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_DOCUMENT, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_fullscreenchange);
13131 emscripten_set_mousemove_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_mousemove);
13132 emscripten_set_touchstart_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchstart);
13133 emscripten_set_touchend_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchend);
13134 emscripten_set_touchmove_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchmove);
13135 emscripten_set_touchcancel_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_touchcancel);
13136 emscripten_set_mousedown_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_mousedown);
13137 emscripten_set_mouseup_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_mouseup);
13138 emscripten_set_wheel_callback("#canvas", NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_wheel);
13139 emscripten_set_focusin_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_WINDOW, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_focusin);
13140 emscripten_set_focusout_callback(EMSCRIPTEN_EVENT_TARGET_WINDOW, NULL, EM_FALSE, Emscripten_on_focusout);
13141
13142 if (flags & RGFW_windowAllowDND) {
13143 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowAllowDND;
13144 }
13145
13146 EM_ASM({
13147 window.addEventListener("keydown",
13148 (event) => {
13149 var key = stringToNewUTF8(event.key); var code = stringToNewUTF8(event.code);
13150 Module._RGFW_handleKeyMods(event.getModifierState("CapsLock"), event.getModifierState("NumLock"), event.getModifierState("Control"), event.getModifierState("Alt"), event.getModifierState("Shift"), event.getModifierState("Meta"), event.getModifierState("ScrollLock"));
13151 Module._RGFW_handleKeyEvent(key, code, 1);
13152 _free(key); _free(code);
13153 },
13154 true);
13155 window.addEventListener("keyup",
13156 (event) => {
13157 var key = stringToNewUTF8(event.key); var code = stringToNewUTF8(event.code);
13158 Module._RGFW_handleKeyMods(event.getModifierState("CapsLock"), event.getModifierState("NumLock"), event.getModifierState("Control"), event.getModifierState("Alt"), event.getModifierState("Shift"), event.getModifierState("Meta"), event.getModifierState("ScrollLock"));
13159 Module._RGFW_handleKeyEvent(key, code, 0);
13160 _free(key); _free(code);
13161 },
13162 true);
13163 });
13164
13165 EM_ASM({
13166 var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
13167 canvas.addEventListener('drop', function(e) {
13168 e.preventDefault();
13169 if (e.dataTransfer.file < 0)
13170 return;
13171
13172 var filenamesArray = [];
13173 var count = e.dataTransfer.files.length;
13174
13175 /* Read and save the files to emscripten's files */
13176 var drop_dir = '.rgfw_dropped_files';
13177 Module._RGFW_mkdir(drop_dir);
13178
13179 for (var i = 0; i < count; i++) {
13180 var file = e.dataTransfer.files[i];
13181
13182 var path = '/' + drop_dir + '/' + file.name.replace("//", '_');
13183 var reader = new FileReader();
13184
13185 reader.onloadend = (e) => {
13186 if (reader.readyState != 2) {
13187 out('failed to read dropped file: '+file.name+': '+reader.error);
13188 }
13189 else {
13190 var data = e.target.result;
13191
13192 Module._RGFW_writeFile(path, new Uint8Array(data), file.size);
13193 }
13194 };
13195
13196 reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);
13197 /* This works weird on modern OpenGL */
13198 var filename = stringToNewUTF8(path);
13199
13200 filenamesArray.push(filename);
13201
13202 Module._RGFW_makeSetValue(i, filename);
13203 }
13204
13205 Module._Emscripten_onDrop(count);
13206
13207 for (var i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
13208 _free(filenamesArray[i]);
13209 }
13210 }, true);
13211
13212 canvas.addEventListener('dragover', function(e) { e.preventDefault(); return false; }, true);
13213 });
13214
13215 return win;
13216}
13217
13218u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 rgfw_keycode) {
13219 return (u8)rgfw_keycode; /* TODO */
13220}
13221
13222void RGFW_pollEvents(void) {
13223 emscripten_sleep(0);
13224 RGFW_resetPrevState();
13225}
13226
13227void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) {
13228 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13229 emscripten_set_canvas_element_size("#canvas", w, h);
13230}
13231
13232/* NOTE: I don't know if this is possible */
13233void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(x); RGFW_UNUSED(y); }
13234/* this one might be possible but it looks iffy */
13235RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) { RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format); return NULL; }
13236
13237void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(mouse); }
13238void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_UNUSED(mouse); }
13239
13240RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) {
13241 static const char cursors[16][16] = {
13242 "default", "default", "text", "crosshair",
13243 "pointer", "ew-resize", "ns-resize", "nwse-resize", "nesw-resize",
13244 "move", "not-allowed"
13245 };
13246
13247 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13248 EM_ASM( { document.getElementById("canvas").style.cursor = UTF8ToString($0); }, cursors[mouse]);
13249 return RGFW_TRUE;
13250}
13251
13252RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) {
13253 return RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(win, RGFW_mouseNormal);
13254}
13255
13256void RGFW_window_showMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool show) {
13257 RGFW_window_showMouseFlags(win, show);
13258 if (show)
13259 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(win);
13260 else
13261 EM_ASM(document.getElementById('canvas').style.cursor = 'none';);
13262}
13263
13264RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) {
13265 if(x) *x = EM_ASM_INT({
13266 return window.mouseX || 0;
13267 });
13268 if (y) *y = EM_ASM_INT({
13269 return window.mouseY || 0;
13270 });
13271 return RGFW_TRUE;
13272}
13273
13274void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) {
13275 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13276
13277 EM_ASM_({
13278 var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
13279 if ($0) {
13280 canvas.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
13281 } else {
13282 canvas.style.pointerEvents = 'auto';
13283 }
13284 }, passthrough);
13285}
13286
13287void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) {
13288 RGFW_UNUSED(textLen);
13289 EM_ASM({ navigator.clipboard.writeText(UTF8ToString($0)); }, text);
13290}
