13294 RGFW_UNUSED(str); RGFW_UNUSED(strCapacity);
13295 /*
13296 placeholder code for later
13297 I'm not sure if this is possible do the the async stuff
13298 */
13299 return 0;
13300}
13301
13302#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
13303RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) {
13304 win->src.ctx.native = ctx;
13305 win->src.gfxType = RGFW_gfxNativeOpenGL;
13306
13307 EmscriptenWebGLContextAttributes attrs;
13308 attrs.alpha = hints->alpha;
13309 attrs.depth = hints->depth;
13310 attrs.stencil = hints->stencil;
13311 attrs.antialias = hints->samples;
13312 attrs.premultipliedAlpha = EM_TRUE;
13313 attrs.preserveDrawingBuffer = EM_FALSE;
13314
13315 if (hints->doubleBuffer == 0)
13316 attrs.renderViaOffscreenBackBuffer = 0;
13317 else
13318 attrs.renderViaOffscreenBackBuffer = hints->auxBuffers;
13319
13320 attrs.failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat = EM_FALSE;
13321 attrs.majorVersion = (hints->major == 0) ? 1 : hints->major;
13322 attrs.minorVersion = hints->minor;
13323
13324 attrs.enableExtensionsByDefault = EM_TRUE;
13325 attrs.explicitSwapControl = EM_TRUE;
13326
13327 emscripten_webgl_init_context_attributes(&attrs);
13328 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = emscripten_webgl_create_context("#canvas", &attrs);
13329 emscripten_webgl_make_context_current(win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
13330
13331 #ifdef LEGACY_GL_EMULATION
13332 EM_ASM("Module.useWebGL = true; GLImmediate.init();");
13333 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context initalized.");
13334 #endif
13335 return RGFW_TRUE;
13336}
13337
13338void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) {
13339 emscripten_webgl_destroy_context(ctx->ctx);
13340 win->src.ctx.native->ctx = 0;
13341 RGFW_sendDebugInfo(RGFW_typeInfo, RGFW_infoOpenGL, "OpenGL context freed.");
13342}
13343
13344void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
13345 if (win) RGFW_ASSERT(win->src.ctx.native);
13346 if (win == NULL)
13347 emscripten_webgl_make_context_current(0);
13348 else
13349 emscripten_webgl_make_context_current(win->src.ctx.native->ctx);
13350}
13351
13352void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) {
13353 RGFW_ASSERT(win && win->src.ctx.native);
13354 emscripten_webgl_commit_frame();
13355}
13356void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) { return (void*)emscripten_webgl_get_current_context(); }
13357
13358RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char* extension, size_t len) {
13359 return EM_ASM_INT({
13360 var ext = UTF8ToString($0, $1);
13361 var canvas = document.querySelector('canvas');
13362 var gl = canvas.getContext('webgl') || canvas.getContext('experimental-webgl');
13363 if (!gl) return 0;
13364
13365 var supported = gl.getSupportedExtensions();
13366 return supported && supported.includes(ext) ? 1 : 0;
13367 }, extension, len);
13368 return RGFW_FALSE;
13369}
13370
13371RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) {
13372 return (RGFW_proc)emscripten_webgl_get_proc_address(procname);
13373 return NULL;
13374}
13375
13376#endif
13377
13378void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(swapInterval); }
13379
13380void RGFW_deinitPlatform(void) { }
13381
13382void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) { }
13383
13384int RGFW_innerWidth(void) { return EM_ASM_INT({ return window.innerWidth; }); }
13385int RGFW_innerHeight(void) { return EM_ASM_INT({ return window.innerHeight; }); }
13386
13387void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
13388 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13389 emscripten_exit_pointerlock();
13390}
13391
13392void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) {
13393 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13394 emscripten_request_pointerlock("#canvas", 1);
13395}

13398void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) {
13399 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13400 emscripten_set_window_title(name);
13401}
13402
13403void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) {
13404 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
13405
13406 RGFW_monitor mon = RGFW_window_getMonitor(win);
13407 RGFW_window_move(win, 0, 0);
13408 RGFW_window_resize(win, mon.mode.w, mon.mode.h);
13409}
13410
13411void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) {
13412 RGFW_ASSERT(win != NULL);
13413 if (fullscreen) {
13414 win->internal.flags |= RGFW_windowFullscreen;
13415 EM_ASM( Module.requestFullscreen(false, true); );
13416 return;
13417 }
13418 win->internal.flags &= ~(u32)RGFW_windowFullscreen;
13419 EM_ASM( Module.exitFullscreen(false, true); );
13420}
13421
13422void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) {
13423 RGFW_UNUSED(win);
13424 EM_ASM({
13425 var element = document.getElementById("canvas");
13426 if (element)
13427 element.style.opacity = $1;
13428 }, "elementId", opacity);
13429}

13431#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
13432WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) {
13433 WGPUSurfaceDescriptor surfaceDesc = {0};
13434 WGPUEmscriptenSurfaceSourceCanvasHTMLSelector canvasDesc = {0};
13435 canvasDesc.chain.sType = WGPUSType_EmscriptenSurfaceSourceCanvasHTMLSelector;
13436 canvasDesc.selector = (WGPUStringView){.data = "#canvas", .length = 7};
13437
13438 surfaceDesc.nextInChain = &canvasDesc.chain;
13439 return wgpuInstanceCreateSurface(instance, &surfaceDesc);
13440}
13441#endif
13442
13443u32 RGFW_WASMPhysicalToRGFW(u32 hash) {
13444 switch(hash) { /* 0x0000 */
13445 case 0x67243A2DU /* Escape */: return RGFW_escape; /* 0x0001 */
13446 case 0x67251058U /* Digit0 */: return RGFW_0; /* 0x0002 */
13447 case 0x67251059U /* Digit1 */: return RGFW_1; /* 0x0003 */
13448 case 0x6725105AU /* Digit2 */: return RGFW_2; /* 0x0004 */
13449 case 0x6725105BU /* Digit3 */: return RGFW_3; /* 0x0005 */
13450 case 0x6725105CU /* Digit4 */: return RGFW_4; /* 0x0006 */
13451 case 0x6725105DU /* Digit5 */: return RGFW_5; /* 0x0007 */
13452 case 0x6725105EU /* Digit6 */: return RGFW_6; /* 0x0008 */
13453 case 0x6725105FU /* Digit7 */: return RGFW_7; /* 0x0009 */
13454 case 0x67251050U /* Digit8 */: return RGFW_8; /* 0x000A */
13455 case 0x67251051U /* Digit9 */: return RGFW_9; /* 0x000B */
13456 case 0x92E14DD3U /* Minus */: return RGFW_minus; /* 0x000C */
13457 case 0x92E1FBACU /* Equal */: return RGFW_equals; /* 0x000D */
13458 case 0x36BF1CB5U /* Backspace */: return RGFW_backSpace; /* 0x000E */
13459 case 0x7B8E51E2U /* Tab */: return RGFW_tab; /* 0x000F */
13460 case 0x2C595B51U /* KeyQ */: return RGFW_q; /* 0x0010 */
13461 case 0x2C595B57U /* KeyW */: return RGFW_w; /* 0x0011 */
13462 case 0x2C595B45U /* KeyE */: return RGFW_e; /* 0x0012 */
13463 case 0x2C595B52U /* KeyR */: return RGFW_r; /* 0x0013 */
13464 case 0x2C595B54U /* KeyT */: return RGFW_t; /* 0x0014 */
13465 case 0x2C595B59U /* KeyY */: return RGFW_y; /* 0x0015 */
13466 case 0x2C595B55U /* KeyU */: return RGFW_u; /* 0x0016 */
13467 case 0x2C595B4FU /* KeyO */: return RGFW_o; /* 0x0018 */
13468 case 0x2C595B50U /* KeyP */: return RGFW_p; /* 0x0019 */
13469 case 0x45D8158CU /* BracketLeft */: return RGFW_closeBracket; /* 0x001A */
13470 case 0xDEEABF7CU /* BracketRight */: return RGFW_bracket; /* 0x001B */
13471 case 0x92E1C5D2U /* Enter */: return RGFW_return; /* 0x001C */
13472 case 0xE058958CU /* ControlLeft */: return RGFW_controlL; /* 0x001D */
13473 case 0x2C595B41U /* KeyA */: return RGFW_a; /* 0x001E */
13474 case 0x2C595B53U /* KeyS */: return RGFW_s; /* 0x001F */
13475 case 0x2C595B44U /* KeyD */: return RGFW_d; /* 0x0020 */
13476 case 0x2C595B46U /* KeyF */: return RGFW_f; /* 0x0021 */
13477 case 0x2C595B47U /* KeyG */: return RGFW_g; /* 0x0022 */
13478 case 0x2C595B48U /* KeyH */: return RGFW_h; /* 0x0023 */
13479 case 0x2C595B4AU /* KeyJ */: return RGFW_j; /* 0x0024 */
13480 case 0x2C595B4BU /* KeyK */: return RGFW_k; /* 0x0025 */
13481 case 0x2C595B4CU /* KeyL */: return RGFW_l; /* 0x0026 */
13482 case 0x2707219EU /* Semicolon */: return RGFW_semicolon; /* 0x0027 */
13483 case 0x92E0B58DU /* Quote */: return RGFW_apostrophe; /* 0x0028 */
13484 case 0x36BF358DU /* Backquote */: return RGFW_backtick; /* 0x0029 */
13485 case 0x26B1958CU /* ShiftLeft */: return RGFW_shiftL; /* 0x002A */
13486 case 0x36BF2438U /* Backslash */: return RGFW_backSlash; /* 0x002B */
13487 case 0x2C595B5AU /* KeyZ */: return RGFW_z; /* 0x002C */
13488 case 0x2C595B58U /* KeyX */: return RGFW_x; /* 0x002D */
13489 case 0x2C595B43U /* KeyC */: return RGFW_c; /* 0x002E */
13490 case 0x2C595B56U /* KeyV */: return RGFW_v; /* 0x002F */
13491 case 0x2C595B42U /* KeyB */: return RGFW_b; /* 0x0030 */
13492 case 0x2C595B4EU /* KeyN */: return RGFW_n; /* 0x0031 */
13493 case 0x2C595B4DU /* KeyM */: return RGFW_m; /* 0x0032 */
13494 case 0x92E1A1C1U /* Comma */: return RGFW_comma; /* 0x0033 */
13495 case 0x672FFAD4U /* Period */: return RGFW_period; /* 0x0034 */
13496 case 0x92E0A438U /* Slash */: return RGFW_slash; /* 0x0035 */
13497 case 0xC5A6BF7CU /* ShiftRight */: return RGFW_shiftR;
13498 case 0x5D64DA91U /* NumpadMultiply */: return RGFW_kpMultiply;
13499 case 0xC914958CU /* AltLeft */: return RGFW_altL; /* 0x0038 */
13500 case 0x92E09CB5U /* Space */: return RGFW_space; /* 0x0039 */
13501 case 0xB8FAE73BU /* CapsLock */: return RGFW_capsLock; /* 0x003A */
13502 case 0x7174B789U /* F1 */: return RGFW_F1; /* 0x003B */
13503 case 0x7174B78AU /* F2 */: return RGFW_F2; /* 0x003C */
13504 case 0x7174B78BU /* F3 */: return RGFW_F3; /* 0x003D */
13505 case 0x7174B78CU /* F4 */: return RGFW_F4; /* 0x003E */
13506 case 0x7174B78DU /* F5 */: return RGFW_F5; /* 0x003F */
13507 case 0x7174B78EU /* F6 */: return RGFW_F6; /* 0x0040 */
13508 case 0x7174B78FU /* F7 */: return RGFW_F7; /* 0x0041 */
13509 case 0x7174B780U /* F8 */: return RGFW_F8; /* 0x0042 */
13510 case 0x7174B781U /* F9 */: return RGFW_F9; /* 0x0043 */
13511 case 0x7B8E57B0U /* F10 */: return RGFW_F10; /* 0x0044 */
13512 case 0xC925FCDFU /* Numpad7 */: return RGFW_kpMultiply; /* 0x0047 */
13513 case 0xC925FCD0U /* Numpad8 */: return RGFW_kp8; /* 0x0048 */
13514 case 0xC925FCD1U /* Numpad9 */: return RGFW_kp9; /* 0x0049 */
13515 case 0x5EA3E8A4U /* NumpadSubtract */: return RGFW_minus; /* 0x004A */
13516 case 0xC925FCDCU /* Numpad4 */: return RGFW_kp4; /* 0x004B */
13517 case 0xC925FCDDU /* Numpad5 */: return RGFW_kp5; /* 0x004C */
13518 case 0xC925FCDEU /* Numpad6 */: return RGFW_kp6; /* 0x004D */
13519 case 0xC925FCD9U /* Numpad1 */: return RGFW_kp1; /* 0x004F */
13520 case 0xC925FCDAU /* Numpad2 */: return RGFW_kp2; /* 0x0050 */
13521 case 0xC925FCDBU /* Numpad3 */: return RGFW_kp3; /* 0x0051 */
13522 case 0xC925FCD8U /* Numpad0 */: return RGFW_kp0; /* 0x0052 */
13523 case 0x95852DACU /* NumpadDecimal */: return RGFW_period; /* 0x0053 */
13524 case 0x7B8E57B1U /* F11 */: return RGFW_F11; /* 0x0057 */
13525 case 0x7B8E57B2U /* F12 */: return RGFW_F12; /* 0x0058 */
13526 case 0x7B8E57B3U /* F13 */: return DOM_PK_F13; /* 0x0064 */
13527 case 0x7B8E57B4U /* F14 */: return DOM_PK_F14; /* 0x0065 */
13528 case 0x7B8E57B5U /* F15 */: return DOM_PK_F15; /* 0x0066 */
13529 case 0x7B8E57B6U /* F16 */: return DOM_PK_F16; /* 0x0067 */
13530 case 0x7B8E57B7U /* F17 */: return DOM_PK_F17; /* 0x0068 */
13531 case 0x7B8E57B8U /* F18 */: return DOM_PK_F18; /* 0x0069 */
13532 case 0x7B8E57B9U /* F19 */: return DOM_PK_F19; /* 0x006A */
13533 case 0x7B8E57A8U /* F20 */: return DOM_PK_F20; /* 0x006B */
13534 case 0x7B8E57A9U /* F21 */: return DOM_PK_F21; /* 0x006C */
13535 case 0x7B8E57AAU /* F22 */: return DOM_PK_F22; /* 0x006D */
13536 case 0x7B8E57ABU /* F23 */: return DOM_PK_F23; /* 0x006E */
13537 case 0x7393FBACU /* NumpadEqual */: return RGFW_kpReturn;
13538 case 0xB88EBF7CU /* AltRight */: return RGFW_altR; /* 0xE038 */
13539 case 0xC925873BU /* NumLock */: return RGFW_numLock; /* 0xE045 */
13540 case 0x2C595F45U /* Home */: return RGFW_home; /* 0xE047 */
13541 case 0xC91BB690U /* ArrowUp */: return RGFW_up; /* 0xE048 */
13542 case 0x672F9210U /* PageUp */: return RGFW_pageUp; /* 0xE049 */
13543 case 0x3799258CU /* ArrowLeft */: return RGFW_left; /* 0xE04B */
13544 case 0x4CE33F7CU /* ArrowRight */: return RGFW_right; /* 0xE04D */
13545 case 0x7B8E55DCU /* End */: return RGFW_end; /* 0xE04F */
13546 case 0x3799379EU /* ArrowDown */: return RGFW_down; /* 0xE050 */
13547 case 0xBA90179EU /* PageDown */: return RGFW_pageDown; /* 0xE051 */
13548 case 0x6723CB2CU /* Insert */: return RGFW_insert; /* 0xE052 */
13549 case 0x6725C50DU /* Delete */: return RGFW_delete; /* 0xE053 */
13550 case 0x6723658CU /* OSLeft */: return RGFW_superL; /* 0xE05B */
13551 case 0x39643F7CU /* MetaRight */: return RGFW_superR; /* 0xE05C */
13552 case 0x380B9C8CU /* NumpadAdd */: return DOM_PK_NUMPAD_ADD; /* 0x004E */
13553 default: return DOM_PK_UNKNOWN;
13554 }
13555
13556 return 0;
13557}
13558
13559/* unsupported functions */
13560void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
13561void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
13562RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) { RGFW_UNUSED(mon); RGFW_UNUSED(mode); RGFW_UNUSED(request); return RGFW_FALSE; }
13563RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) { RGFW_UNUSED(len); return NULL; }
13564RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) { return (RGFW_monitor){}; }
13565void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(x); RGFW_UNUSED(y); }
13566void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); }
13567void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); }
13568void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); }
13569void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
13570void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
13571void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(floating); }
13572void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(border); }
13573RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_icon type) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); RGFW_UNUSED(data); RGFW_UNUSED(w); RGFW_UNUSED(h); RGFW_UNUSED(format); RGFW_UNUSED(type); return RGFW_FALSE; }
13574void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
13575void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) {RGFW_UNUSED(win); }
13576RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
13577RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
13578RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
13579RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return RGFW_FALSE; }
13580RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_UNUSED(win); return (RGFW_monitor){}; }
13581void RGFW_waitForEvent(i32 waitMS) { RGFW_UNUSED(waitMS); }
13582#endif
13583
13584/* end of web asm defines */
13585
13586/*
13587 * RGFW function pointer backend, made to allow you to compile for Wayland but fallback to X11
13588*/
13589#ifdef RGFW_DYNAMIC
13590typedef RGFW_window* (*RGFW_createWindowPlatform_ptr)(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win);
13591typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_getMouse_ptr)(i32* x, i32* y);
13592typedef u8 (*RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_ptr)(u32 key);
13593typedef void (*RGFW_pollEvents_ptr)(void);
13594typedef void (*RGFW_window_move_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y);
13595typedef void (*RGFW_window_resize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
13596typedef void (*RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
13597typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMinSize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
13598typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMaxSize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h);
13599typedef void (*RGFW_window_maximize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13600typedef void (*RGFW_window_focus_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13601typedef void (*RGFW_window_raise_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13602typedef void (*RGFW_window_setFullscreen_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen);
13603typedef void (*RGFW_window_setFloating_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating);
13604typedef void (*RGFW_window_setOpacity_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity);
13605typedef void (*RGFW_window_minimize_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13606typedef void (*RGFW_window_restore_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13607typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isFloating_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13608typedef void (*RGFW_window_setName_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, const char* name);
13609typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough);
13610typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_setIconEx_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, u8 type);
13611typedef RGFW_mouse* (*RGFW_loadMouse_ptr)(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format);
13612typedef void (*RGFW_window_setMouse_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse);
13613typedef void (*RGFW_window_moveMouse_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y);
13614typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13615typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse);
13616typedef void (*RGFW_window_hide_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13617typedef void (*RGFW_window_show_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13618typedef RGFW_ssize_t (*RGFW_readClipboardPtr_ptr)(char* str, size_t strCapacity);
13619typedef void (*RGFW_writeClipboard_ptr)(const char* text, u32 textLen);
13620typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isHidden_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13621typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isMinimized_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13622typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_isMaximized_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13623typedef RGFW_monitor* (*RGFW_getMonitors_ptr)(size_t* len);
13624typedef RGFW_monitor (*RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_ptr)(void);
13625typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_monitor_requestMode_ptr)(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request);
13626typedef RGFW_monitor (*RGFW_window_getMonitor_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13627typedef void (*RGFW_window_closePlatform_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13628typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_createSurfacePtr_ptr)(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface);
13629typedef void (*RGFW_window_blitSurface_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface);
13630typedef void (*RGFW_surface_freePtr_ptr)(RGFW_surface* surface);
13631typedef void (*RGFW_freeMouse_ptr)(RGFW_mouse* mouse);
13632typedef void (*RGFW_window_setBorder_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border);
13633typedef void (*RGFW_releaseCursor_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13634typedef void (*RGFW_captureCursor_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13635#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
13636typedef void (*RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13637typedef void* (*RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr)(void);
13638typedef void (*RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win);
13639typedef void (*RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval);
13640typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_ptr)(const char* extension, size_t len);
13641typedef RGFW_proc (*RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_ptr)(const char* procname);
13642typedef RGFW_bool (*RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints);
13643typedef void (*RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr)(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx);
13644#endif
13645#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
13646typedef WGPUSurface (*RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU_ptr)(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance);
13647#endif
13648
13649/* Structure to hold all function pointers */
13650typedef struct RGFW_FunctionPointers {
13651 RGFW_createSurfacePtr_ptr createSurfacePtr;
13652 RGFW_window_blitSurface_ptr window_blitSurface;
13653 RGFW_surface_freePtr_ptr surface_freePtr;
13654 RGFW_freeMouse_ptr freeMouse;
13655 RGFW_window_setBorder_ptr window_setBorder;
13656 RGFW_releaseCursor_ptr releaseCursor;
13657 RGFW_captureCursor_ptr captureCursor;
13658 RGFW_createWindowPlatform_ptr createWindowPlatform;
13659 RGFW_getMouse_ptr getGlobalMouse;
13660 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_ptr rgfwToKeyChar;
13661 RGFW_pollEvents_ptr pollEvents;
13662 RGFW_window_move_ptr window_move;
13663 RGFW_window_resize_ptr window_resize;
13664 RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_ptr window_setAspectRatio;
13665 RGFW_window_setMinSize_ptr window_setMinSize;
13666 RGFW_window_setMaxSize_ptr window_setMaxSize;
13667 RGFW_window_maximize_ptr window_maximize;
13668 RGFW_window_focus_ptr window_focus;
13669 RGFW_window_raise_ptr window_raise;
13670 RGFW_window_setFullscreen_ptr window_setFullscreen;
13671 RGFW_window_setFloating_ptr window_setFloating;
13672 RGFW_window_setOpacity_ptr window_setOpacity;
13673 RGFW_window_minimize_ptr window_minimize;
13674 RGFW_window_restore_ptr window_restore;
13675 RGFW_window_isFloating_ptr window_isFloating;
13676 RGFW_window_setName_ptr window_setName;
13677 RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough_ptr window_setMousePassthrough;
13678 RGFW_window_setIconEx_ptr window_setIconEx;
13679 RGFW_loadMouse_ptr loadMouse;
13680 RGFW_window_setMouse_ptr window_setMouse;
13681 RGFW_window_moveMouse_ptr window_moveMouse;
13682 RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_ptr window_setMouseDefault;
13683 RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_ptr window_setMouseStandard;
13684 RGFW_window_hide_ptr window_hide;
13685 RGFW_window_show_ptr window_show;
13686 RGFW_readClipboardPtr_ptr readClipboardPtr;
13687 RGFW_writeClipboard_ptr writeClipboard;
13688 RGFW_window_isHidden_ptr window_isHidden;
13689 RGFW_window_isMinimized_ptr window_isMinimized;
13690 RGFW_window_isMaximized_ptr window_isMaximized;
13691 RGFW_getMonitors_ptr getMonitors;
13692 RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_ptr getPrimaryMonitor;
13693 RGFW_monitor_requestMode_ptr monitor_requestMode;
13694 RGFW_window_getMonitor_ptr window_getMonitor;
13695 RGFW_window_closePlatform_ptr window_closePlatform;
13696#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
13697 RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_ptr extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL;
13698 RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_ptr getProcAddress_OpenGL;
13699 RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr window_createContextPtr_OpenGL;
13700 RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL_ptr window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL;
13701 RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL;
13702 RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL_ptr getCurrentContext_OpenGL;
13703 RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL_ptr window_swapBuffers_OpenGL;
13704 RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL_ptr window_swapInterval_OpenGL;
13705#endif
13706#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
13707 RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU_ptr window_createSurface_WebGPU;
13708#endif
13709} RGFW_functionPointers;
13710
13711RGFW_functionPointers RGFW_api;
13712
13713RGFW_bool RGFW_createSurfacePtr(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, RGFW_surface* surface) { return RGFW_api.createSurfacePtr(data, w, h, format, surface); }
13714void RGFW_surface_freePtr(RGFW_surface* surface) { RGFW_api.surface_freePtr(surface); }
13715void RGFW_freeMouse(RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_api.freeMouse(mouse); }
13716void RGFW_window_blitSurface(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_surface* surface) { RGFW_api.window_blitSurface(win, surface); }
13717void RGFW_window_setBorder(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool border) { RGFW_api.window_setBorder(win, border); }
13718void RGFW_releaseCursor(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.releaseCursor(win); }
13719void RGFW_captureCursor(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.captureCursor(win); }
13720RGFW_window* RGFW_createWindowPlatform(const char* name, RGFW_windowFlags flags, RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_init(); return RGFW_api.createWindowPlatform(name, flags, win); }
13721RGFW_bool RGFW_getGlobalMouse(i32* x, i32* y) { return RGFW_api.getGlobalMouse(x, y); }
13722u8 RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar(u32 key) { return RGFW_api.rgfwToKeyChar(key); }
13723void RGFW_pollEvents(void) { RGFW_api.pollEvents(); }
13724void RGFW_window_move(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_api.window_move(win, x, y); }
13725void RGFW_window_resize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_resize(win, w, h); }
13726void RGFW_window_setAspectRatio(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_setAspectRatio(win, w, h); }
13727void RGFW_window_setMinSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_setMinSize(win, w, h); }
13728void RGFW_window_setMaxSize(RGFW_window* win, i32 w, i32 h) { RGFW_api.window_setMaxSize(win, w, h); }
13729void RGFW_window_maximize(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_maximize(win); }
13730void RGFW_window_focus(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_focus(win); }
13731void RGFW_window_raise(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_raise(win); }
13732void RGFW_window_setFullscreen(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool fullscreen) { RGFW_api.window_setFullscreen(win, fullscreen); }
13733void RGFW_window_setFloating(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool floating) { RGFW_api.window_setFloating(win, floating); }
13734void RGFW_window_setOpacity(RGFW_window* win, u8 opacity) { RGFW_api.window_setOpacity(win, opacity); }
13735void RGFW_window_minimize(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_minimize(win); }
13736void RGFW_window_restore(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_restore(win); }
13737RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isFloating(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_isFloating(win); }
13738void RGFW_window_setName(RGFW_window* win, const char* name) { RGFW_api.window_setName(win, name); }
13739
13740#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
13741void RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_bool passthrough) { RGFW_api.window_setMousePassthrough(win, passthrough); }
13742#endif
13743
13744RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setIconEx(RGFW_window* win, u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format, u8 type) { return RGFW_api.window_setIconEx(win, data, w, h, format, type); }
13745RGFW_mouse* RGFW_loadMouse(u8* data, i32 w, i32 h, RGFW_format format) { return RGFW_api.loadMouse(data, w, h, format); }
13746void RGFW_window_setMouse(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_mouse* mouse) { RGFW_api.window_setMouse(win, mouse); }
13747void RGFW_window_moveMouse(RGFW_window* win, i32 x, i32 y) { RGFW_api.window_moveMouse(win, x, y); }
13748RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseDefault(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_setMouseDefault(win); }
13749RGFW_bool RGFW_window_setMouseStandard(RGFW_window* win, u8 mouse) { return RGFW_api.window_setMouseStandard(win, mouse); }
13750void RGFW_window_hide(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_hide(win); }
13751void RGFW_window_show(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_show(win); }
13752RGFW_ssize_t RGFW_readClipboardPtr(char* str, size_t strCapacity) { return RGFW_api.readClipboardPtr(str, strCapacity); }
13753void RGFW_writeClipboard(const char* text, u32 textLen) { RGFW_api.writeClipboard(text, textLen); }
13754RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isHidden(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_isHidden(win); }
13755RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMinimized(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_isMinimized(win); }
13756RGFW_bool RGFW_window_isMaximized(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_isMaximized(win); }
13757RGFW_monitor* RGFW_getMonitors(size_t* len) { return RGFW_api.getMonitors(len); }
13758RGFW_monitor RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor(void) { return RGFW_api.getPrimaryMonitor(); }
13759RGFW_bool RGFW_monitor_requestMode(RGFW_monitor mon, RGFW_monitorMode mode, RGFW_modeRequest request) { return RGFW_api.monitor_requestMode(mon, mode, request); }
13760RGFW_monitor RGFW_window_getMonitor(RGFW_window* win) { return RGFW_api.window_getMonitor(win); }
13761void RGFW_window_closePlatform(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_closePlatform(win); }
13762
13763#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
13764RGFW_bool RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(const char* extension, size_t len) { return RGFW_api.extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL(extension, len); }
13765RGFW_proc RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL(const char* procname) { return RGFW_api.getProcAddress_OpenGL(procname); }
13766RGFW_bool RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx, RGFW_glHints* hints) { return RGFW_api.window_createContextPtr_OpenGL(win, ctx, hints); }
13767void RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, RGFW_glContext* ctx) { RGFW_api.window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL(win, ctx); }
13768void RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL(win); }
13769void* RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL(void) { return RGFW_api.getCurrentContext_OpenGL(); }
13770void RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win) { RGFW_api.window_swapBuffers_OpenGL(win); }
13771void RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL(RGFW_window* win, i32 swapInterval) { RGFW_api.window_swapInterval_OpenGL(win, swapInterval); }
13772#endif
13773
13774#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
13775WGPUSurface RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU(RGFW_window* window, WGPUInstance instance) { return RGFW_api.window_createSurface_WebGPU(window, instance); }
13776#endif
13777#endif /* RGFW_DYNAMIC */
13778
13779/*
13780 * start of X11 AND wayland defines
13781 * this allows a single executable to support x11 AND wayland
13782 * falling back to x11 if wayland fails to initalize
13783*/
13784#if defined(RGFW_WAYLAND) && defined(RGFW_X11)
13785void RGFW_load_X11(void) {
13786 RGFW_api.createSurfacePtr = RGFW_createSurfacePtr_X11;
13787 RGFW_api.window_blitSurface = RGFW_window_blitSurface_X11;
13788 RGFW_api.surface_freePtr = RGFW_surface_freePtr_X11;
13789 RGFW_api.freeMouse = RGFW_freeMouse_X11;
13790 RGFW_api.window_setBorder = RGFW_window_setBorder_X11;
13791 RGFW_api.releaseCursor = RGFW_releaseCursor_X11;
13792 RGFW_api.captureCursor = RGFW_captureCursor_X11;
13793 RGFW_api.createWindowPlatform = RGFW_createWindowPlatform_X11;
13794 RGFW_api.getGlobalMouse = RGFW_getGlobalMouse_X11;
13795 RGFW_api.rgfwToKeyChar = RGFW_rgfwToKeyChar_X11;
13796 RGFW_api.pollEvents = RGFW_pollEvents_X11;
13797 RGFW_api.window_move = RGFW_window_move_X11;
13798 RGFW_api.window_resize = RGFW_window_resize_X11;
13799 RGFW_api.window_setAspectRatio = RGFW_window_setAspectRatio_X11;
13800 RGFW_api.window_setMinSize = RGFW_window_setMinSize_X11;
13801 RGFW_api.window_setMaxSize = RGFW_window_setMaxSize_X11;
13802 RGFW_api.window_maximize = RGFW_window_maximize_X11;
13803 RGFW_api.window_focus = RGFW_window_focus_X11;
13804 RGFW_api.window_raise = RGFW_window_raise_X11;
13805 RGFW_api.window_setFullscreen = RGFW_window_setFullscreen_X11;
13806 RGFW_api.window_setFloating = RGFW_window_setFloating_X11;
13807 RGFW_api.window_setOpacity = RGFW_window_setOpacity_X11;
13808 RGFW_api.window_minimize = RGFW_window_minimize_X11;
13809 RGFW_api.window_restore = RGFW_window_restore_X11;
13810 RGFW_api.window_isFloating = RGFW_window_isFloating_X11;
13811 RGFW_api.window_setName = RGFW_window_setName_X11;
13812#ifndef RGFW_NO_PASSTHROUGH
13813 RGFW_api.window_setMousePassthrough = RGFW_window_setMousePassthrough_X11;
13814#endif
13815 RGFW_api.window_setIconEx = RGFW_window_setIconEx_X11;
13816 RGFW_api.loadMouse = RGFW_loadMouse_X11;
13817 RGFW_api.window_setMouse = RGFW_window_setMouse_X11;
13818 RGFW_api.window_moveMouse = RGFW_window_moveMouse_X11;
13819 RGFW_api.window_setMouseDefault = RGFW_window_setMouseDefault_X11;
13820 RGFW_api.window_setMouseStandard = RGFW_window_setMouseStandard_X11;
13821 RGFW_api.window_hide = RGFW_window_hide_X11;
13822 RGFW_api.window_show = RGFW_window_show_X11;
13823 RGFW_api.readClipboardPtr = RGFW_readClipboardPtr_X11;
13824 RGFW_api.writeClipboard = RGFW_writeClipboard_X11;
13825 RGFW_api.window_isHidden = RGFW_window_isHidden_X11;
13826 RGFW_api.window_isMinimized = RGFW_window_isMinimized_X11;
13827 RGFW_api.window_isMaximized = RGFW_window_isMaximized_X11;
13828 RGFW_api.getMonitors = RGFW_getMonitors_X11;
13829 RGFW_api.getPrimaryMonitor = RGFW_getPrimaryMonitor_X11;
13830 RGFW_api.monitor_requestMode = RGFW_monitor_requestMode_X11;
13831 RGFW_api.window_getMonitor = RGFW_window_getMonitor_X11;
13832 RGFW_api.window_closePlatform = RGFW_window_closePlatform_X11;
13833#ifdef RGFW_OPENGL
13834 RGFW_api.extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL = RGFW_extensionSupportedPlatform_OpenGL_X11;
13835 RGFW_api.getProcAddress_OpenGL = RGFW_getProcAddress_OpenGL_X11;
13836 RGFW_api.window_createContextPtr_OpenGL = RGFW_window_createContextPtr_OpenGL_X11;
13837 RGFW_api.window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL = RGFW_window_deleteContextPtr_OpenGL_X11;
13838 RGFW_api.window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL = RGFW_window_makeCurrentContext_OpenGL_X11;
13839 RGFW_api.getCurrentContext_OpenGL = RGFW_getCurrentContext_OpenGL_X11;
13840 RGFW_api.window_swapBuffers_OpenGL = RGFW_window_swapBuffers_OpenGL_X11;
13841 RGFW_api.window_swapInterval_OpenGL = RGFW_window_swapInterval_OpenGL_X11;
13842#endif
13843#ifdef RGFW_WEBGPU
13844 RGFW_api.window_createSurface_WebGPU = RGFW_window_createSurface_WebGPU_X11;
13845#endif
13846}
13847
13848void RGFW_load_Wayland(void) {
13849 RGFW_api.createSurfacePtr = RGFW_createSurfacePtr_Wayland;
13850 RGFW_api.window_blitSurface = RGFW_window_blitSurface_Wayland;
13851 RGFW_api.surface_freePtr = RGFW_surface_freePtr_Wayland;
13852 RGFW_api.freeMouse = RGFW_freeMouse_Wayland;
13853 RGFW_api.window_setBorder = RGFW_window_setBorder_Wayland;

13855 RGFW_api.captureCursor = RGFW_captureCursor_Wayland;
